## <a name="gx_accordion_menu_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1070">gx_accordion_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1070">gx_accordion_menu_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1071">Skapa en drag meny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1071">Create an accordion menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1072">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1072">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_accordion_menu_create(
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style ,
    USHORT accordion_menu_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1073">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1073">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1074">Den här tjänsten skapar en dragspelswidget som anges och kopplar den till den angivna överordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1074">This service creates an accordion menu as specified and attaches the accordion menu to the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1075">En dragspelswidget-meny är anexpanding/komprimerar menyn Visa widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1075">An accordion menu is anexpanding/collapsing menu display widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1076">Den accepterar alla typer av widget som underordnade meny alternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1076">It accepts all types of widget as its child menu items.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1077">Drag menyer kan kapslas, vilket innebär att flera nivåer av meny djup kan skapas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1077">Accordion menus can be nested, meaning several levels of menu depth can be created.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1078">Om du vill infoga ett underordnat objekt i ett meny objekts widget, rekommenderar vi att touse GX_MENU typ widget som ett överordnat meny objekt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1078">To insert a child item into a menu item widget, it’s recommended touse GX_MENU type widget as a parent menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1079">Tips för att skapa en List meny för en nivå:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1079">Tips for creating a single level accordion menu:</span></span>

1.  <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1080">Skapa en drag meny.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1080">Create an accordion menu.</span></span>

2.  <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1081">Bifoga GX_MENU typ-widgetar till drag menyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1081">Attach GX_MENU type widgets to the accordion menu.</span></span>

3.  <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1082">Bifoga underordnade widgetar till GX_MENU typen parent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1082">Attach child widgets to the GX_MENU type parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1083">Typen av underordnad objekt kan vara vilken typ av widget som helst GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1083">The child item type can be any GUIX widget type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1084">Tips för att skapa en dragspelswidget på flera nivåer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1084">Tips for creating multi level accordion menu:</span></span>

1.  <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1085">Skapa en drag meny.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1085">Create an accordion menu.</span></span>

2.  <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1086">Bifoga GX_MENU typ-widgetar till drag menyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1086">Attach GX_MENU type widgets to the accordion menu.</span></span>

3.  <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1087">Koppla GX_ACCORDION_MENU typ widget till GX_MENU typen parent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1087">Attach GX_ACCORDION_MENU type widget to the GX_MENU type parent.</span></span>

4.  <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1088">Koppla meny alternativ till GX_ACCORDION_MENU typ överordnad enligt beskrivningen i skapa meny för att skapa en enda nivå.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1088">Attach menu items to the GX_ACCORDION_MENU type parent as described in the single level accordion menu creation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1089">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1089">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1090">**drag** Pekare till kontroll blocket för menyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1090">**accordion** Pointer to accordion menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1091">**namn** Namnet på drag spels menyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1091">**name** Name of the accordion menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1092">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1092">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1093">**stil** Widgetens format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1093">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1094">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-speciella format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1094">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1095">**accordion_menu_id** Programdefinierat ID för spel menyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1095">**accordion_menu_id** Application-defined ID of the accordion menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1096">**storlek** Storlek på drag spels menyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1096">**size** Size of the accordion menu</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1097">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1097">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1098">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) framgångs meny för att skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1098">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful accordion menu creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1099">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1099">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1100">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1100">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1101">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1101">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1102">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1102">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1103">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1103">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1104">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1104">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1105">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1105">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ACCORDION_MENU my_accordion;
GX_MENU menu_1;
GX_MENU item_1;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 100, 100, 300, 150);

status = gx_accordion_menu_create(&my_accordion, “my_accordion”,
                                  parent, GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                  MY_ACCORDION_ID, &size);

gx_menu_create(&menu_1, “menu_1”, &my_accordion,
               GX_STRING_ID_MENU_1, GX_ID_NONE,
               GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_TYLE_BORDER_THIN, 0, &size);

gx_menu_create(&item_1, “item_1”, &my_accordion,
               GX_STRING_ID_ITEM_1, GX_ID_NONE,
               GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN, 0, &size);

gx_text_offset_set(&item_1, 30, 0);

gx_menu_insert(&menu_1, &item_1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the accordion menu was successfully created. */

```

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1106">Demo programmet demo_guix_widget_types, som ingår i GUIX Studio-installationen, innehåller ett komplett exempel på hur du använder widgeten för dragspelswidgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1106">The demo application demo_guix_widget_types, provided as part of the GUIX Studio installation, provides a complete example of using the accordion menu widget.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_accordion_menu_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1117">gx_accordion_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1117">gx_accordion_menu_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1118">Menyn Rita drag</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1118">Draw accordion menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1119">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1119">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_accordion_menu_draw(GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1120">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1120">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1121">Den här tjänsten ritar den angivna drag menyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1121">This service draws the specified accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1122">Den här tjänsten kallas vanligt vis internt av GUIX-funktionen för uppdatering av arbets ytan, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med att implementera anpassade ritnings funktioner för anpassade dragspelswidgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1122">This service is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom accordion menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1123">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1123">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1124">**drag** Pekare till kontroll blocket för menyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1124">**accordion** Pointer to accordion menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1125">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1125">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1126">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1126">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1127">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1127">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1128">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1128">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1129">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1129">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom accordion menu draw function */

VOID my_accordion_menu_draw(GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion)
{
    /* Call default accordion menu draw. */
    gx_accordion_menu_draw(accordion);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}

```

## <a name="gx_accordion_menu_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1140">gx_accordion_menu_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1140">gx_accordion_menu_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1141">Händelse för processens bedrags meny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1141">Process accordion menu event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1142">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1142">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_accordion_menu_event_process(
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1143">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1143">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1144">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för den angivna drag menyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1144">This service processes an event for the specified accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1145">Den här tjänsten ska anropas som standard händelse hanterare med en anpassad funktion för händelse bearbetning av spel meny händelser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1145">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom accordion menu event processing functions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1146">Den här tjänsten hanterar GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN och GX_EVENT_PEN_UP händelser för att expandera/komprimera ett meny alternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1146">This service handles GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN and GX_EVENT_PEN_UP events to expand/collaps a menu item.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1147">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1147">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1148">**drag** Pekare till kontroll blocket för menyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1148">**accordion** Pointer to accordion menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1149">**event_ptr** Pekare till händelsen att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1149">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1150">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1150">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1151">Händelse processen för att **GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1151">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful accordion menu event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1152">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1152">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1153">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1153">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1154">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1154">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1155">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1155">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1156">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1156">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic accordion menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_accordion_event_process( 
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default accordion menu
            event processing */
        status =
        gx_accordion_menu_event_process(accordion, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```

## <a name="gx_accordion_menu_position"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1167">gx_accordion_menu_position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1167">gx_accordion_menu_position</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1168">Placera meny objekt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1168">Position menu items</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1169">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1169">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1170">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1170">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1171">Den här tjänsten placerar meny alternativen för spel menyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1171">This service positions the menu items for the accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1172">Den här funktionen kallas vanligt vis internt när drag menyn blir synlig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1172">This function is normally called internally when the accordion menu is becoming visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1173">Om du vill lägga till/ta bort objekt i/från en dragspelswidget eller ändra utöknings formatet för det underordnade objektet, ska funktionen anropas för att flytta underordnade objekt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1173">If you want to insert/remove items to/from an accordion menu, or change the expand styles of the child item, this function should be called to reposition the child items.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1174">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1174">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1175">**drag** Pekare till kontroll blocket för menyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1175">**accordion** Pointer to accordion menu control block</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1177">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) placering av placerings menyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1177">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful accordion menu position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1178">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1178">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1179">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1179">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

```C
“my_accordion” are positioned. */
```

## <a name="gx_animation_canvas_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1193">gx_animation_canvas_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1193">gx_animation_canvas_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1194">Ange arbets ytans minne till en styrenhet för animering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1194">Provide canvas memory to an animation controller</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1195">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1195">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_canvas_define(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1196">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1196">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1197">Den här tjänsten tillhandahåller en minnes arbets yta för en animeringssekvens som används för att implementera animeringssekvensen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1197">This service provides a memory canvas to an animation controller used to implement the animation sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1198">Den angivna arbets ytan bör vara tillräckligt stor för att rymma widgeten för animerings mål.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1198">This provided canvas should be large enough to hold the animation target widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1199">När en bildruteanimering definieras ritas mål-widgeten en gång till den här animeringen och skärm bilden eller tonings effekten görs genom att ändra arbets ytans förskjutning och/eller arbets ytans alfa värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1199">When an animation canvas is defined, the target widget is drawn once to this animation canvas, and the screen slide or fade effect is accomplished by modifying the canvas offset and/or canvas alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1200">När maskin varu stöd för flera grafik lager tillhandahålls kan du förbättra prestandan för bild-och tonings lager ***genom att definiera*** en animering som är kopplad till ett maskin varu lager som överlägg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1200">When hardware support for multiple graphics layers is provided, defining an animation canvas that is bound to a hardware graphics overlay layer can ***greatly*** improve the performance of slide and fade animations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1201">Animeringen kräver en bildruteanimering för att köra tonings-och tonings typer om de körs på ett färgdjup som är mindre än 16 BPP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1201">The animation manager does require an animation canvas to execute fade-in and fade-out animation types if running at color depth less than 16 bpp.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1202">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1202">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1203">**animering** Pekare till animerat kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1203">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1204">**arbets yta** Minnes arbets yta som används för att implementera översättnings-animeringen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1204">**canvas** Memory canvas used to implement the translation animation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1205">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1205">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1206">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har definierat animeringsbildrutor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1206">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully defined animation canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1207">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0X10) ogiltig status för animering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1207">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x10) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1208">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0X29) det tillhandahållna minnes blocket är inte tillräckligt stort för att skapa arbets ytan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1208">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) The provided memory block is not large enough to create the canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1209">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1209">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1210">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1210">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1211">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1211">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1212">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1212">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_CANVAS animation_canvas;
GX_ROOT_WINDOW animation_root;
/* Create animation canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_create(
        &animation_canvas, /* Canvas control block. */
        “animation_canvas”, /* Name of canvas. */
        display, /* Display control block. */
        GX_ANIMATION_MANAGED, /* Type of canvas. */
        width, /* Width of canvas. */
        height, /* Height of canvas. */
        memory_area, /* Memory area of canvas. */
        memory_size /* Size of canvas memory. */
        );
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    /* Create the root window for the canvas. */
    status = gx_window_root_create(
        &animation_root, /* Root window control block. */
        “animation_root”, /* Name of root window. */
        &animation_canvas, /* Canvas of the root window. */ GX_STYLE_NONE, /* Style of the window. */
        GX_ID_NONE, /* Root window ID. */
        &root_size /* Window size. */
        );
}
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    /* Define canvas for the animation. */
    status = gx_animation_canvas_define(&animation,
                &animation_canvas);
}
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new canvas was successfully set to the animation manager. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1221">gx_animation_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1221">gx_animation_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1222">Skapa en animering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1222">Create an animation controller</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1223">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1223">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_create(GX_ANIMATION *animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1224">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1224">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1225">Den här tjänsten skapar en animeringssekvens.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1225">This service creates an animation controller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1226">Kontrollanten initieras till inaktivt läge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1226">The controller is initialized to the idle state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1227">Det går inte att starta en animering om den inte är i inaktivt läge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1227">One cannot start an animation unless it is in the IDLE state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1228">GX_ANIMATION kontroll block pekare kan hämtas med hjälp av gx_system_animation_get (), eller så kan det vara ett statiskt definierat kontroll block.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1228">The GX_ANIMATION control block pointer may be obtained using gx_system_animation_get(), or it may be a statically defined control block.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1229">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1229">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1230">**animering** Pekare till animerat kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1230">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>


### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1231">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1231">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1232">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har skapat en animeringssekvens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1232">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created animation controller</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1233">Kontroll block för **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan initierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1233">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Control block already initialized</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1234">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1234">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1235">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1235">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1236">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1236">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1237">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1237">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

/* Allocate an animaton control from system pool */
gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

/* Initialize the control block */

if (animation)
{
    status = gx_animation_create(&animation);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new animation controller was successfully created and initialized. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_drag_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1248">gx_animation_drag_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1248">gx_animation_drag_disable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1249">Inaktivera skärm dra Animations-Hook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1249">Disable screen drag animation hook</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1250">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1250">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_drag_disable(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1251">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1251">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1252">Den här tjänsten tar bort den skärm som drar animeringen hook-procedur från widgetens standard händelse process funktion och stoppar animeringssekvensen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1252">This service removes the screen drag animation hook procedure from the widget’s default event process function and stops the animation sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1253">Skärmen dra animering av hook-procedur hanterar händelser för en skärm som drar animering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1253">The screen drag animation hook procedure handles events for a screen drag animation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1254">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1254">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1255">**animering** Pekare till animerat kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1255">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1256">**widget** Pekare till kontroll block för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1256">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1257">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1257">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1258">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1258">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1259">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1259">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1260">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1260">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1261">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1261">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1262">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1262">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1263">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1263">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_WIDGET *animation_parent;

/* Disable screen drag animation of “animation_parent”. */
status = gx_animation_drag_disable(&animation, animation_parent);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen drag hook has been removed
    from the event process of “animation_parent”. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_drag_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1273">gx_animation_drag_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1273">gx_animation_drag_enable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1274">Aktivera skärm dra animation-Hook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1274">Enable screen drag animation hook</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1275">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1275">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_drag_enable(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation,
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_ANIMATION_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1276">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1276">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1277">Den här tjänsten anger den internt definierade skärmen dra animering händelse process som en hook-procedur i en widgets standard händelse process funktion.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1277">This service sets the internally defined screen drag animation event process function as a hook procedure of a widget’s default event process function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1278">Funktionen dra animering av händelse process hanterar händelser för en skärm som drar animering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1278">The screen drag animation event process function handles events for a screen drag animation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1279">Skärmen dra hook-procedur blir standard hanterare för Penn ingångs händelser som skickas till mål-widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1279">The screen drag hook procedure becomes the default handler for pen input events sent to the target widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1280">Funktionen för händelse bearbetning i den ursprungliga widgeten anropas i en seriekopplade när du har kontrollerat skärm för att dra indata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1280">The original widget event processing function is called in a daisy-chain fashion after checking for screen drag input event types.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1281">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1281">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1282">**animering** Pekare till animerat kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1282">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1283">**widget** Pekare till kontroll block för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1283">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1284">**information** Information om animering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1284">**info** Animation information</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1285">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1285">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1286">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1286">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1287">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0X26) ogiltig status för animering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1287">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1288">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1288">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1289">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) ogiltigt värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1289">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1290">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) bild skärms listan har inte angetts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1290">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Slide screen list is not provided</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1291">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1291">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1292">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1292">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1293">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1293">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_ANIMATION_INFO info;
GX_WIDGET *animation_parent;
GX_WIDGET *screen_list[] = {
    screen_1,
    screen_2,
    screen_3,
    GX_NULL
}

memset(&info, 0, sizeof(GX_ANIMATION_INFO);
info.gx_animation_parent = animation_parent;

/* If GX_STYLE_ANIMATION_WRAP is set, the screen list will wrap itself. */
info.gx_animation_style = GX_ANIMATION_SCREEN_DRAG |
                          GX_ANIMATION_HORIZONTAL |
                          GX_STYLE_ANIMATION_WRAP;
info.gx_animation_frame_interval = 1;
info.gx_animation_slide_screen_list = screen_list;

status = gx_animation_drag_enable(&animation, animation_parent,
                                  info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen slide animinatin event
    process function has been set as a hook procedure of
    “animation_parent”. */
```


- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1313">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) ogiltig parameter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1313">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid parameter</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1315">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1315">Initialization and threads</span></span>

## <a name="gx_animation_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1326">gx_animation_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1326">gx_animation_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1327">Starta en timer-driven animering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1327">Start a timer-driven animation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1328">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1328">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_start(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    GX_ANIMATION_INFO *params);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1329">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1329">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1330">Den här tjänsten initierar en animeringssekvens med en tidigare skapad animering och en ny uppsättning med parametrar för animering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1330">This service initiates an animation sequence using a previously created animation instance and a new set of animation parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1331">Den här funktionen gör en lokal kopia av parametrarna, vilket innebär att parameter strukturen inte behöver definieras statiskt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1331">This function makes a local copy of the parameters, meaning the parameter structure does not need to be statically defined.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1332">GX_ANIMATION kontroll strukturen kan definieras statiskt av programmet, eller så kan den hämtas med hjälp av API: et för gx_system_animation_get ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1332">The GX_ANIMATION control structure can be statically defined by the application, or it can be obtained using the gx_system_animation_get() API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1333">GX_ANIMATION_INFOs strukturen definierar parametrarna för den animering som ska köras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1333">The GX_ANIMATION_INFO structure defines the parameters of the animation to be executed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1334">En fullständig beskrivning av den här strukturen och betydelsen av varje fält finns i avsnittet GUIX-animering i kapitel 3 i den här hand boken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1334">For a complete description of this structure and the meaning of each field, refer to the GUIX Animation Component section in Chapter 3 of this manual.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1335">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1335">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1336">**animering** Pekare till animerat kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1336">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1337">**parametrar** Pekare till parameter struktur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1337">**params** Pointer to parameter structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1338">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1340">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) ogiltig parameter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1340">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid parameter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1342">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) ogiltigt mål för animering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1342">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid animation target</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1343">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0X26) ogiltig status för animering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1343">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1344">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) ogiltigt animerings arbets yta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1344">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid animation canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1345">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1345">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1346">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1346">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1347">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1347">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION_INFO params;
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

/* obtain an animation control block pointer */
gx_system_animation_get(&animation);
if (animation)
{
    /* define a slide down and to the right */
    params.gx_animation_start_position.gx_point_x = 0;
    params.gx_animation_start_position.gx_point_y = 0;
    params.gx_animation_end_position.gx_point_x = 100;
    params.gx_animation_end_position.gx_point_y = 200;
    params.gx_animation_style= GX_ANIMATION_TRANSLATE;
    params.gx_animation_target = &my_window;
    params.gx_animation_parent = root_window;
    params.gx_animation_start_alpha = 255;
    params.gx_animation_end_alpha = 255;

    params.gx_animation_delay_before = 0;
    params.gx_animation_steps = 10;
    params.gx_animation_tick_rate = 2;

    status = gx_animation_start(&animation, &params);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the animation is initiated. */
```

## <a name="gx_animation_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1357">gx_animation_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1357">gx_animation_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1358">Stoppa en aktiv timer-driven animering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1358">Stop an active timer-driven animation</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1360">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1360">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1361">Stoppa en tidigare startad animering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1361">Stop a previously started animation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1362">Om kontroll Blocks pekaren för animering har allokerats med gx_system_animation_get kan programmet återanvända kontroll blocket eller återställa det till systempoolen med hjälp av gx_system_animation_free ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1362">If the animation control block pointer was allocated using gx_system_animation_get, the application can re-use the control block or return it to the system pool using gx_system_animation_free().</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1367">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1367">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1368">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0X26) ogiltig status för styrenhet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1368">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Invalid controller status</span></span>

## <a name="gx_binres_language_count_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1380">gx_binres_language_count_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1380">gx_binres_language_count_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1381">Returnera antalet språk som finns i binära resurs data</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1381">Return the number of languages present in binary resource data</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1382">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1382">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_count_get(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_VALUE *returned_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1383">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1383">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1384">Den här tjänsten tolkar ett binärt resurs data huvud för att returnera antalet språk som finns i binära data.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1384">This service parses a binary resource data header to return the number of languages contained within the binary data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1385">Detta är användbart för program som måste visa en urvals lista till användaren, så att användaren kan välja mellan olika språk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1385">This is useful for applications that must display a selection list to the user allowing the user to select from a choice of languages.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1386">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1386">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1387">**root_address** Adress till binära resurs data i minnet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1387">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1388">**return_count** Plats för att lagra returnerat språk antal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1388">**return_count** Location to store returned language count</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1389">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1389">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1390">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1390">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1391">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0X24) ogiltig binär resurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1391">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1392">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1392">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1393">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1393">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1394">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1394">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1395">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1395">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE language_count = 0;

/* Specify address that binary resource data is located. */
GX_UBYTE    *root_address = 0x60000000;

status = gx_binres_language_count_get(root_address,
    &language_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table was successfully loaded. */

```

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1397">gx_binres_language_info_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1397">gx_binres_language_info_load</span></span>

## <a name="gx_binres_language_info_load"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1398">gx_binres_language_info_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1398">gx_binres_language_info_load</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1399">Läsa in språk tabell information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1399">Load language table information</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1400">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1400">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_info_load(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_LANGUAGE_HEDAER *put_info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1401">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1401">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1402">Den här tjänsten tolkar en binär resurs data-BLOB för att fylla i en matris med GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER strukturer, som informerar programmet om språk namn och sträng tabell storlek för varje språk som ingår i binära data.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1402">This service parses a binary resource data blob to populate an array of GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures, informing the application of the language names and string table size of each language contained within the binary data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1403">Programmet bör först anropa gx_binres_language_count_get () för att fastställa antalet språk i binära data och kontrol lera att put_infos pekaren som skickades till den här funktionen pekar till en matris med language_count GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER strukturer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1403">The application should first call gx_binres_language_count_get() to determine the number of languages within the binary data, and insure that the put_info pointer passed to this function points to an array of language_count GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1404">Den här tjänsten används av programmet för att fastställa vid körning av innehållet i ett binärt resurs data segment.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1404">This service is used by application to determine at runtime the content of a binary resource data chunk.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1405">GX_LANGUAGE_HEADERs strukturen definieras som:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1405">The GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structure is defined as:</span></span>

```c
typedef struct GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER_STRUCT{
    USHORT gx_language_header_magic_number;
    USHORT gx_language_header_index;
    UCHAR gx_language_header_name[GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER_NAME_SIZE];
    ULONG  gx_language_header_data_size;
} GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER;
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1406">Fältet *magic_number* används för intern verifiering av data formatet Binary-resurs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1406">The *magic_number* field is used for internal validation of the binary resource data format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1407">I fältet *header_index* anges i vilken ordning språken definieras i binära data.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1407">The *header_index* field indicates the order in which the languages are defined in the binary data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1408">Fältet *header_name* innehåller språk namnet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1408">The *header_name* field contains the language name.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1409">Fältet *header_data_size* innehåller data storleken för språk sträng tabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1409">The *header_data_size* field contains the data size of the language string table.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1410">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1410">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1411">**root_address** Adress till binära resurs data i minnet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1411">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1412">**put_info** Pekare till matrisen med GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER strukturer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1412">**put_info** Pointer to array of GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1413">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1413">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1414">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1414">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1415">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0X24) ogiltig binär resurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1415">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1416">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1416">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1417">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1417">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1418">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1418">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1419">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1419">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER language_info[4];

/* Specify address that binary resource data is located. */
GX_UBYTE    *root_address = 0x60000000;

status = gx_binres_language_info_load(root_address,
    language_info);
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table was successfully loaded. */

```

## <a name="gx_binres_language_table_load"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1422">gx_binres_language_table_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1422">gx_binres_language_table_load</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1423">Läs in språk tabell resurs (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1423">Load language table resource (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1424">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1424">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_table_load(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_UBYTE **returned_language_table);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1425">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1425">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1426">Detta inaktuella API gör det möjligt för program att läsa in sträng tabell data från äldre (före version 5,6) av data för binärfiler för binärfiler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1426">This deprecated API allows applications to load string table data from older (prior to release 5.6) binary resource data files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1427">Nya program bör använda gx_binres_language_table_load_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1427">New applications should use gx_binres_language_table_load_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1428">Den här tjänsten bygger upp en språk tabell struktur som innehåller pekare till tabell resurser, de genererade data strukturerna pekar på resurs data "på plats" och kopierar inte resurs data.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1428">This service builds up a language table structure containing pointers to table resources, the generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1429">Resurs data måste placeras på en allmän åtkomst till minnes platsen och bas adressen för den här minnes platsen skickas till detta API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1429">The resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1430">Den här tjänsten kräver ett runtime-allokerat minnes block som är tillräckligt stort för att rymma språk tabell strukturen, och därför måste gx_system_memory_allocator_set-API: et anropas en gång innan tjänsten begärs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1430">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the language table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1431">Den returnerade språk tabellen definierar en eller flera sträng tabeller, varje sträng tabell som innehåller pekare till sträng resurser i resurs data minnet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1431">The returned language table defines one or more string table(s), each string table containing pointers to string resources in resource data memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1432">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1432">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1433">**root_address** Adress till binära resurs data i minnet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1433">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1434">**returnerade _language_table** Pekare till inläst språk tabell</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1434">**returned _language_table** Pointer to loaded language table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1435">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1435">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1437">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0X24) ogiltig binär resurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1437">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1439">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0X30) minnes uppallokerare eller kostnads fri funktion har inte definierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1439">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator or free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1440">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1440">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Specify address that binary resource data is located. */

status = gx_binres_language_table_load(root_address,
                                        &language_table);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table was successfully loaded. */

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1448">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1448">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1449">Den här tjänsten bygger upp en språk tabell struktur som innehåller pekare till tabell resurser, de genererade data strukturerna pekar på resurs data "på plats" och kopierar inte resurs data.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1449">This service builds up a language table structure containing pointers to table resources, the generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1450">Resurs data måste placeras på en allmän åtkomst till minnes platsen och bas adressen för den här minnes platsen skickas till detta API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1450">The resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1451">Den här tjänsten kräver ett runtime-allokerat minnes block som är tillräckligt stort för att rymma språk tabell strukturen, och därför måste gx_system_memory_allocator_set-API: et anropas en gång innan tjänsten begärs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1451">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the language table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1452">Den returnerade språk tabellen definierar en eller flera sträng tabeller, varje sträng tabell som innehåller pekare till sträng resurser i resurs data minnet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1452">The returned language table defines one or more string table(s), each string table containing pointers to string resources in resource data memory.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1457">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1457">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1458">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0X24) ogiltig binär resurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1458">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1459">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1459">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1460">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0X30) minnes uppallokerare eller kostnads fri funktion har inte definierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1460">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator or free function is not defined</span></span>

## <a name="gx_binres_theme_load"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1466">gx_binres_theme_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1466">gx_binres_theme_load</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1467">Läs in tema resurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1467">Load theme resource</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1468">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1468">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    INT theme_id, GX_THEME **returned_theme);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1469">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1469">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1470">Den här tjänsten bygger upp en GX_THEME-struktur som innehåller pekare till resurs tabellerna för det begärda temat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1470">This service builds up a GX_THEME structure containing pointers to the resource tables for the requested theme.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1471">De skapade data strukturerna pekar på resurs data "på plats", den kopierar inte resurs data.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1471">The generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1472">Resurs data måste placeras på en allmän åtkomst till minnes platsen och bas adressen för den här minnes platsen skickas till detta API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1472">So the resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1473">Den här tjänsten kräver ett runtime-allokerat minnes block som är tillräckligt stort för att rymma tema tabell strukturen, och därför måste gx_system_memory_allocator_set-API: et anropas en gång innan tjänsten begärs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1473">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the theme table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1474">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1474">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1475">**root_address** Adress till binära resurs data i minnet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1475">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1476">**theme_id** Identifieraren för temat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1476">**theme_id** The identifier of the theme</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1477">**returned_theme** Pekare till inläst tema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1477">**returned_theme** Pointer to loaded theme</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1478">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1478">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1480">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0X24) ogiltig binär resurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1480">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1481">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1481">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1482">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) ogiltigt tema-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1482">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid theme ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1483">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0X30) minnes uppallokerare eller kostnads fri funktion har inte definierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1483">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator or free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1484">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1484">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
GX_UBYTE *root_address = 0x60000000;

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the theme was successfully loaded. */
```

## <a name="gx_brush_default"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1489">gx_brush_default</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1489">gx_brush_default</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1490">Ange standard penseln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1490">Set the default brush</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1491">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1491">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1492">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1492">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1493">Den här tjänsten anger penseln för den aktuella kontexten till systemets standardvärde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1493">This service sets the brush for the current context to the system default value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1494">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1494">Parameters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1495">**pensel** Pekare till pensel kontroll block.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1495">**brush** Pointer to brush control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1496">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1496">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1497">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pensel definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1497">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful brush definition</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1498">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pensel pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1498">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid brush pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1499">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1499">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1500">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1500">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1501">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1501">Example</span></span>

```C
/*Reset the brush to its default value. */
status = gx_brush_default(&my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush was successfully reset to its default value. */

```

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1505">Definiera pensel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1505">Define brush</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1506">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1506">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_BRUSH *brush,

    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1507">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1507">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1508">Den här tjänsten definierar en pensel med den angivna linje färgen, fyllnings färg och format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1508">This service defines a brush with the specified line color, fill color and style.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1509">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1509">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1510">**pensel** Pekare till pensel kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1510">**brush** Pointer to brush control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1511">**line_color** Färg på pensel linje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1511">**line_color** Color of brush line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1512">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1512">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1513">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1513">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1514">**fill_color** Färg på pensel fyllning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1514">**fill_color** Color of brush fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1515">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1515">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1516">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1516">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1517">**stil** Pensel format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1517">**style** Brush style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1518">**Bilaga D** beskriver de pensel format som stöds.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1518">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1519">Pensel format kan kombineras till en variabel med hjälp av bitvis OR operation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1519">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_button_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1528">gx_button_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1528">gx_button_background_draw</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1529">Knapp bakgrund för Draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1529">Draw button background</span></span>

###<a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1530">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1530">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_button_background_draw(GX_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1531">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1531">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1532">Den här tjänsten ritar knapp bakgrunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1532">This service draws the button background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1533">Den här funktionen anropas vanligt vis internt av funktionen gx_button_draw, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med att skriva anpassade ritnings funktioner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1533">This function is normally called internally by the gx_button_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1534">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1534">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1535">**knapp** Pekare till knapp kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1535">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1536">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1536">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1537">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1537">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1538">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1538">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1539">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1539">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1540">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1540">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID custom_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Draw button background. */
    gx_button_background_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)button);
}
```
