## <a name="gx_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1555">gx_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1555">gx_button_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1556">Knappen Skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1556">Create button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1557">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1557">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_create(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1558">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1558">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1559">Den här tjänsten skapar en knapp som anges och associerar knappen med den angivna överordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1559">This service creates a button as specified and associates the button with the supplied parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1560">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1560">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1561">**knapp** Pekare till knapp kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1561">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1562">**namn** Knappens logiska namn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1562">**name** Logical name of button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1563">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget för knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1563">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1564">**stil** Knapp format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1564">**style** Button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1565">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-speciella format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1565">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1566">**button_id** Programdefinierat ID för knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1566">**button_id** Application-defined ID of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1567">**storlek** Knappens storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1567">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1568">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1568">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1569">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) knappen har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1569">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1570">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1570">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1571">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1571">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1572">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1572">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1573">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1573">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1574">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1574">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1575">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1575">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1576">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1576">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BUTTON my_top_button;

/* Create a stop button. */
status = gx_button_create(&my_stop_button, "my stop button",
                            &my_parent_window,
                            GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE,
                            MY_STOP_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the stop button was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_button_deselect"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1591">gx_button_deselect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1591">gx_button_deselect</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1592">Knappen avmarkera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1592">Deselect button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1593">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1593">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_deselect(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_BOOL gen_event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1594">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1594">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1595">Den här tjänsten avmarkerar den angivna knappen och genererar en signal händelse beroende på knapp format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1595">This service deselects the specified button and generate a signal event depending on button styles.</span></span>


| <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1596">Knapp format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1596">Button Style</span></span>              | <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1597">Signal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1597">Signal</span></span>                     |
|---------------------------|----------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1598">Inget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1598">None</span></span>                      | <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1599">GX_EVENT_CLICKED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1599">GX_EVENT_CLICKED</span></span>         |
| <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1600">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_RADIO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1600">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_RADIO</span></span>  | <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1601">GX_EVENT_RADIO_DESELECT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1601">GX_EVENT_RADIO_DESELECT</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1602">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1602">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1603">GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1603">GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFF</span></span>     |



### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1604">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1604">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1605">**knapp** Pekare till knapp kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1605">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1606">**gen_event** Om GX_TRUE skapas en GX_EVENT_CLICKED, GX_EVENT_DESELECT eller GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFFSET händelse beroende på knapp formatet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1606">**gen_event** If GX_TRUE, the button will generate a GX_EVENT_CLICKED, GX_EVENT_DESELECT, or GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFFSET event depending on the button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1607">Om GX_FALSE kommer knappen inte att generera händelser på högre nivå, även om den skulle göra det vanligt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1607">If GX_FALSE, the button will not generate any higher level event even if it would normally do so.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1608">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1608">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1609">Avmarkera knappen **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1609">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button deselect</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1610">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1610">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1612">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1612">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1613">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1613">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1614">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1614">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1615">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1615">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Deselect button. */
status = gx_button_deselect(&my_stop_button, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the stop button was successfully deselected. */
```

## <a name="gx_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1630">gx_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1630">gx_button_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1631">Knappen Rita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1631">Draw button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1632">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1632">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1633">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1633">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1634">Den här tjänsten ritar den angivna knappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1634">This service draws the specified button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1635">Den här funktionen anropas vanligt vis internt av GUIX-funktionen för arbets ytans uppdatering, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med att implementera anpassade ritnings funktioner för widgetar anpassade knappar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1635">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom button widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1636">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1636">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1637">**knapp** Pekare till knapp kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1637">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1638">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1638">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1639">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1639">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1640">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1640">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1641">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1641">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1642">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1642">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom button draw function. */
VOID custom_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Call default button draw. */
    gx_button_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}

```

## <a name="gx_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1657">gx_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1657">gx_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1658">Händelse för process knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1658">Process button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1659">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1659">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_event_process(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1660">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1660">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1661">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för den angivna knappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1661">This service processes an event for the specified button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1662">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1662">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1663">**knapp** Pekare till knapp kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1663">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1664">**event_ptr** Pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1664">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1665">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1665">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1666">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) knapp händelse process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1666">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1668">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1668">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1669">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1669">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1670">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1670">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1671">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1671">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_button_event_process(GX_BUTTON *button,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default button
            event processing */
        status = gx_button_event_process(button, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1723">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1723">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1724">Ange alfa-Blend-värde för arbets yta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1724">Set alpha-blend value for canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1725">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1725">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_alpha_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1726">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1726">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1727">Den här tjänsten anger alfa-Blend-värdet för den angivna arbets ytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1727">This service sets the alpha-blend value for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1728">Arbets ytans alfa värden kan vara mellan 0 (transparent) och 255 (helt ogenomskinlig).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1728">Canvas alpha values can range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1729">För att blanda överlägg arbets ytor krävs antingen maskinvaru-eller program varu stöd genom att skapa en sammansatt arbets yta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1729">Blending overlay canvases requires either hardware graphics layer support, or software support via the creation of a composite canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1730">Maskin varu stöd för kombination av arbets ytor är aktiverat genom att anropa API: et för gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind () innan du anger arbets ytans alfa värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1730">Hardware support for canvas blending is enabled by invoking the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API prior to setting the canvas alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1731">När en arbets yta är kopplad till ett maskin varu lager, anropar API: et för gx_canvas_alpha_set () direkt maskin varans grafik lagers blandnings tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1731">When a canvas is bound to a hardware graphics layer, calling the gx_canvas_alpha_set() API directly invokes the hardware graphics layer blending services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1732">För att kunna använda program varu stöd för arbets ytans blandning måste programmet skapa en arbets yta med GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE format där alla andra hanterade arbets ytor kombineras före den slutliga visningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1732">To utilize software support for canvas blending, the application must create a canvas with GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE style, into which all other managed canvases are composited prior to final display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1733">Program varu stöd för arbets ytans blandning tillhandahålls endast när det körs med en visnings driv rutin med 16 BPP eller högre färgdjup.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1733">Software support for canvas blending is only provided when running with a display driver of 16-bpp or higher color depth.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1734">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1734">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1735">**arbets yta** Pekare till kontroll blocket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1735">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1736">**alpha** Alfa-Blend-värde, sträcker sig från 0 (transparent) till 255 (ogenomskinligt).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1736">**alpha** Alpha-blend value, range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (opaque).</span></span>

### <a name="return--values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1737">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1737">Return  Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1738">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) godkänd alpha-Blend-värde uppsättning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1738">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful alpha-blend value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1739">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1739">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1740">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1740">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1741">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0X20) ogiltig arbets yta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1741">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1742">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1742">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1743">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1743">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1744">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1744">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the alpha-blend value of “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_alpha_set(&my_canvas, GX_ALPHA_VALUE_OPAQUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the alpha-blend value was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_arc_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1754">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1754">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1755">Rita båge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1755">Draw arc</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1756">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1756">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_arc_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r,
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1757">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1757">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1758">Den här tjänsten ritar en cirkel båge på arbets ytan med den aktuella penseln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1758">This service draws a circle arc on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1759">Cirkel bågen klipps till arbets ytans ogiltiga region.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1759">The circle arc is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1760">Den här tjänsten kräver att GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT definieras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1760">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1761">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1761">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1762">**xcenter** x-position för cirkel båge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1762">**xcenter** x-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1763">**YCenter** y-position för cirkel båge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1763">**ycenter** y-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1764">**r** -radien för cirkelns båge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1764">**r** Radius of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1765">**start_angle** Cirkel bågens start vinkel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1765">**start_angle** Starting angle of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1766">**end_angle** Cirkel bågens slut vinkel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1766">**end_angle** Ending angle of the circle arc</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1767">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1767">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1768">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ritad båge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1768">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1769">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1769">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1770">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) ogiltigt värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1770">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1771">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Det går inte att öppna rit kontexten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1771">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1772">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1772">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1773">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1773">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1774">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1774">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a circle arc from 0 degree to 90 degree in clockwise. */
status = gx_canvas_arc_draw(100, 100, 50, 0, 90);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the arc has been drawn on “my_canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1787">gx_canvas_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1787">gx_canvas_block_move</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1788">Flytta block med arbets ytans pixlar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1788">Move block of canvas pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1789">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1789">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_block_move(GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    GX_VALUE x_shift, GX_VALUE y_shift, GX_RECTANGLE *dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1790">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1790">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1791">Den här tjänsten flyttar ett block med pixel data för arbets ytor i den angivna riktningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1791">This service moves a block of canvas pixel data in the direction specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1792">Den här tjänsten används internt av GUIX för att utföra snabb rullning, men kan även användas av program varan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1792">This service is used internally by GUIX to accomplish fast scrolling, but may also be used by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1793">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1793">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1794">**blockera** Koordinater för området som ska flyttas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1794">**block** Coordinates of area to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1795">**x_shift** Antal pixlar att flytta till x-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1795">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1796">**y_shift** Antal pixlar att flytta längs y-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1796">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1797">**smutsig** Om block flyttningen lyckas returnerar den här funktionen den del av käll rektangeln som fortfarande är smutsig till anroparen i den här parametern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1797">**dirty** If the block move is successful, this function returns the portion of the source rectangle that is still dirty to the caller in this parameter.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1798">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1798">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1799">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) slutförd block flyttning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1799">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1800">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) Det gick inte att flytta blocket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1800">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Failed block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1802">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1802">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1803">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1803">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1804">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1804">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1805">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1805">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE invalid;
GX_RECTANGLE move;

/* define 100 x 100 pixel rectangle */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&move, 0, 0, 99, 99);

/* Move this rectangle 10 pixels to the right”. */
status = gx_canvas_block_move(&move, 10, 0, &invalid);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, then ‘invalid’ marks the area that needs to be redrawn after the block move. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_circle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1818">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1818">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1819">Rita cirkel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1819">Draw circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1820">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1820">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_circle_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1821">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1821">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1822">Den här tjänsten ritar en cirkel på arbets ytan med hjälp av den aktuella penseln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1822">This service draws a circle on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1823">Cirkeln klipps till arbets ytans ogiltiga region.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1823">The circle is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1824">Den här tjänsten kräver att GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT definieras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1824">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1825">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1825">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1826">**xcenter** x-Coord i mitten av cirkeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1826">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the circle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1827">**YCenter** y – Coord i mitten av cirlce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1827">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the cirlce</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1849">gx_canvas_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1849">gx_canvas_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1850">Skapa arbets yta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1850">Create canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1851">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1851">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_create(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    UINT type, 
    UINT width, 
    UINT height,
    GX_COLOR *memory_area, 
    ULONG memory_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1852">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1852">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1853">Den här tjänsten skapar arbets ytan med de angivna egenskaperna och det tillhör ande minnet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1853">This service creates the canvas with the specified properties and associated memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1854">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1854">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1855">**arbets yta** Pekare till kontroll blocket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1855">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1856">**namn** Logiskt namn för arbets ytan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1856">**name** Logical name for the canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1857">**Visa** Pekare till visning som skapats tidigare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1857">**display** Pointer to previously created display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1858">**typ** Typ av canvasThe arbets ytans typer är:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1858">**type** Type of canvasThe canvas types include:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1859">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** En minnes arbets yta som används för att rita på skärmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1859">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** A memory canvas which is used to off-screen drawing.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1860">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** En arbets yta som automatiskt töms på den aktiva visningen, antingen som en del av den sammansatta skapande processen eller som en del av växlings åtgärden för en enskild arbets yta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1860">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** A canvas which automatically flushed to the active display, either as part of the composite building process or as part of the buffer toggle operation for single-canvas architectures.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1861">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** Den här flaggan kan användas för att aktivera och inaktivera en arbets yta utan att förlora ritnings innehållet i arbets ytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1861">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** This flag can be used to turn on and off a canvas, without losing the canvas drawing contents.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1862">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Reserverad för framtida användning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1862">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Reserved for future use.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1863">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** Den här flaggan används av programmet när du konfigurerar ett system med flera arbets ytor som sammanfattar flera hanterade arbets ytor i den sammansatta arbets ytan och den sammansatta enheten är driven för maskin varu Rams bufferten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1863">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** This flag is used by the application when configuring a multiple-canvas system which will composite multiple managed canvases into the composite canvas, and the composite is the driven to the hardware frame buffer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1864">**Bredd** Bredd i bild punkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1864">**width** Width in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1865">**höjd** Höjd i bild punkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1865">**height** Height in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1866">**memory_area** Minnes område för arbets yta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1866">**memory_area** Memory area for canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1867">Det här värdet kan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1867">This value can</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1868">**GX_NULL** när arbets ytan skapas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1868">**GX_NULL** at the time of canvas creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1869">**och** senare initieras med hjälp av gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1869">**and** later initialized using gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1870">**memory_size** Storleken på minnes området i byte, eller 0 om arbets ytans minne ska definieras efter att arbets ytan har skapats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1870">**memory_size** Size of memory area in bytes, or 0 if the canvas memory will be defined after the canvas is created.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1871">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1871">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1872">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) skapa arbets yta skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1872">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1873">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1873">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1874">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1874">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1875">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1875">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1876">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0X1C) ogiltig block storlek för kontroll av arbets yta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1876">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0x1C) Invalid canvas control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1877">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0X1B) ogiltig typ av arbets yta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1877">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid canvas type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1878">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1878">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1879">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1879">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1880">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1880">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define global canvas memory area. */
GX_COLOR my_canvas_memory[272*480];

…

/* Create “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_create(&my_canvas, "my canvas", &my_display,
                    (GX_CANVAS_MANAGED | GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE),
                    272, 480,
                    my_canvas_memory,
                    sizeof(default_canvas_memory));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the 272 x 480 canvas was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1885">gx_canvas_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1885">gx_canvas_delete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1886">Ta bort arbets yta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1886">Delete canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1887">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1887">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_delete(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1888">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1888">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1889">Den här tjänsten tar bort arbets ytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1889">This service deletes the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1890">Arbets ytan tas bort från den interna länkade listan över arbets ytor som underhålls av GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1890">The canvas is removed from the internal linked list of canvas maintained by GUIX.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1891">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1891">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1892">**arbets yta** Pekare till kontroll blocket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1892">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1893">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1893">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1894">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) skapa arbets yta skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1894">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1895">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1895">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1896">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1896">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1897">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) ogiltig arbets yta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1897">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1898">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1898">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1899">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1899">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS my_canvas was deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_complete"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1908">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1908">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1909">Slutför ritning av arbets yta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1909">Complete canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1910">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1910">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_complete(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_BOOL flush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1911">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1911">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1912">Den här tjänsten gör att GUIX vet att programmets ritning på den angivna arbets ytan är klar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1912">This service lets GUIX know the application’s drawing on the specified canvas is complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1913">Programmet kan använda den här tjänsten för att tvinga fram en omedelbar ritning till en arbets yta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1913">The application can use this service to force immediate drawing to a canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1914">Detta tömmer arbets ytan till den synliga inramade bufferten och/eller utlöser en Bugger växlings åtgärd, beroende på system minnes arkitektur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1914">This flushes the canvas to the visible frame buffer and/or triggers a bugger toggle operation, depending on system memory architecture.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1915">Den här tjänsten ska endast anropas av programmet för att stänga en ritnings sekvens som påbörjades med gx_canvas_drawing_initiate ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1915">This service should only be called by the application to close a drawing sequence begun with gx_canvas_drawing_initiate().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1916">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1916">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1917">**arbets yta** Pekare till kontroll blocket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1917">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1918">**Rensa** Om **_GX_TRUE_** rensas arbets ytans ändringar till visningen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1918">**flush** If **_GX_TRUE_**, canvas changes are flushed to the display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1919">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1919">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1920">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) slutfördes ritningen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1920">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1922">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1922">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1923">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1923">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1924">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1924">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1925">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1925">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Complete drawing on “my_canvas” and flush to display. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_complete(&my_canvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully completed. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_initiate"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1932">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1932">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1933">Starta arbets ytans ritning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1933">Initiate canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1934">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1934">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_WIDGET *who, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1935">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1935">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1936">Den här tjänsten startar ritningen på den angivna arbets ytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1936">This service initiates drawing on the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1937">Den här tjänsten kallas internt som en del av den uppskjutna ritnings åtgärden som utförs automatiskt av GUIX när en arbets yta måste uppdateras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1937">This service is called internally as part of the deferred drawing operation performed automatically by GUIX when a canvas needs to be update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1938">Programmet tillåts dock inte kringgå GUIX och utföra omedelbar och direkt ritning på en arbets yta genom att först anropa gx_canvas_drawing_inititate och sedan anropa de önskade rit funktionerna och sedan anropa gx_canvas_drawing_complete ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1938">However, the application is allowed bypass the GUIX deferred drawing algorithm and perform immediate and direct drawing on a canvas by first calling gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, then calling the desired drawing functions, then calling gx_canvas_drawing_complete().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1939">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1939">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1940">**arbets yta** Pekare till kontroll blocket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1940">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1941">**vem som** Pekare till kontroll block för widgeten för anroparen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1941">**who** Pointer to widget control block of the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1942">Den här parametern används för att initiera rit urklippet och Visa parametrar för efterföljande ritnings åtgärder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1942">This parameter is used to initialize the drawing clipping and view parameters for subsequent drawing operations.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1943">**dirty_area** Yta att rita inom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1943">**dirty_area** Area to draw within.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1944">Den här parametern skickas av anroparen för att ange det utrymme som anroparen vill att alla ritnings åtgärder ska ha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1944">This parameter is passed by the caller to indicate the area to which the caller wants all drawing operations clipped.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1945">Detta är vanligt vis det områden som tidigare marker ATS som smutsig, men anroparen är kostnads fri att expandera eller dra samman det.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1945">This is usually the area previously marked as dirty, but the caller is free to expand or contract the clipping area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1946">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1946">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad ritnings initiering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing initiation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1948">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0X05) överskrider maximalt antal kapslingar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1948">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) Exceed maximum nesting count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1949">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0X03) inga visnings område för anroparen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1949">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) No viewports for the caller</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1950">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1950">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1951">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1951">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1952">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) ogiltig arbets yta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1952">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1953">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1953">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1954">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1954">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1955">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1955">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Initiate drawing on “my_canvas”, my_widget.gx_widget_size
specify the area the application wants GUIX to redraw. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(&my_canvas, &my_widget,
    &my_widget.gx_widget_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully initiated. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_ellipse_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1962">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1962">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1963">Rita ellips</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1963">Draw ellipse</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1964">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1964">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    INT a, 
    dINT b);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1965">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1965">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1966">Den här tjänsten ritar en ellips på arbets ytan med den aktuella penseln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1966">This service draws an ellipse on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1967">Ellipsen klipps till arbets ytans ogiltiga region.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1967">The ellipse is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1968">Den här tjänsten kräver att GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT definieras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1968">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1969">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1969">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1970">**xcenter** x-Coord i mitten av ellipsen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1970">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1971">**YCenter** y-Coord i mitten av ellipsen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1971">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1972">**en** längd på halv huvud axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1972">**a** Length of the semi-major axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1973">**b:s** längd på halv dels axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1973">**b** Length of the semi-minor axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1974">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1974">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) cirkel rit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circle draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1977">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) ogiltigt värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1977">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1978">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Det går inte att öppna rit kontexten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1978">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1979">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1979">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1980">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1980">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1981">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1981">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw an ellipse of semi-major radius 100, semi-minor radius 50
    and centered at (200, 200). */
status = gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(200, 200, 100, 50);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the ellipse has been drawn on
    “my_canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1994">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1994">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1995">Binda arbets ytan till maskin varu grafik lagret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1995">Bind canvas to hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1996">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1996">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    INT layer);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1997">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1997">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1998">Den här tjänsten binder en GUIX arbets yta till ett maskin varu grafik lager.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1998">This service binds a GUIX drawing canvas to a hardware graphics layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-1999">Den här tjänsten krävs bara för maskin varu enheter som stöder flera maskinvarubaserade grafik lager.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-1999">This service is only required for hardware devices supporting multiple hardware graphics layers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2000">Att binda en arbets yta till ett maskin varu grafik lager resulterar i att API: erna gx_canvas_show (), gx_canvas_hide (), gx_canvas_alpha_set () och gx_canvas_offset_set () implementeras direkt av maskin varans visnings driv rutins tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2000">Binding a canvas to a hardware graphics layer results in the gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set(), and gx_canvas_offset_set() APIs being implemented directly by hardware display driver services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2001">Om maskin varans bildskärms driv rutin inte stöder flera grafik lager kommer den här tjänsten inte att returnera GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2001">If the hardware display driver does not support multiple graphics layers, this service will fail returning GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2002">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2002">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2003">**arbets** ytans arbets yta som ska implementeras i maskin vara</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2003">**canvas** canvas to be implement in hardware</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2004">**lager** för maskin varu grafik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2004">**layer** hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2005">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2005">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) slutförd bindning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful binding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2007">Visnings skikts tjänsten för **GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) har inte definierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2007">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Display layer service is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2008">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X17) ogiltiga pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2008">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2009">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2009">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2010">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) ogiltig arbets yta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2010">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2011">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) stöds inte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2011">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2012">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2012">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2013">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2013">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2014">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2014">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Binds the canvas to the hardware graphics layer 1. */
status = gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(&my_canvas, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the drawing canvas is bound to the
    hardware graphics. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2018">gx_canvas_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2018">gx_canvas_hide</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2019">Dölja en arbets yta, vilket gör den osynlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2019">Hide a canvas, making it invisible</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2020">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2020">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hide(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2021">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2021">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2022">Den här tjänsten döljer en GUIX-arbetsyta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2022">This service hides a GUIX canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2023">Om arbets ytan har bundits till ett maskin varu grafik lager med hjälp av gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind () implementeras tjänsten med hjälp av maskin varu support.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2023">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(), this service is implemented using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2024">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2024">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2025">**arbets** ytan som ska döljas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2025">**canvas** canvas to be hidden</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2026">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2026">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2028">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) ogiltig arbets yta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2028">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_line_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2043">gx_canvas_line_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2043">gx_canvas_line_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2044">Rita linje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2044">Draw line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2045">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2045">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_line_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_VALUE x_end, 
    GX_VALUE y_end);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2046">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2046">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2047">Den här tjänsten ritar en linje på arbets ytan med hjälp av den aktuella penseln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2047">This service draws a line on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2048">Raden klipps till arbets ytans ogiltiga region.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2048">The line is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2049">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2049">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2050">**x_start** Start x – position för raden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2050">**x_start** Starting x-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2051">**y_end** Start y-position för raden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2051">**y_end** Starting y-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2052">**x_start** Slut på x-position för raden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2052">**x_start** Ending x-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2053">**y_end** Avslutande y-position för raden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2053">**y_end** Ending y-position of the line</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2055">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) linje rit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2055">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful line draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2056">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2056">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2057">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2057">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2058">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Det går inte att öppna rit kontexten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2058">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2059">**GX_INVALID_WIDTH** (0X1E) ogiltig pensel bredd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2059">**GX_INVALID_WIDTH** (0x1E) Invalid brush width</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the line has been drawn to canvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_memory_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2075">gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2075">gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2076">Definiera arbets ytans minne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2076">Define canvas memory</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2077">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2077">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_memory_define(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_COLOR *memory,
    ULONG memsize);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2078">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2078">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2079">Den här tjänsten kan användas för att tilldela arbets ytans minnes adress när arbets ytan har skapats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2079">This service can be used to assign the canvas memory address after the canvas has been created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2080">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2080">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2081">**arbets yta** Pekare till en tidigare skapad arbets yta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2081">**canvas** Pointer to previously created canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2082">**minne** Minnes adress för arbets ytan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2082">**memory** Canvas memory address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2083">**memsize** Storlek på arbets ytans minnes block i byte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2083">**memsize** Size of the canvas memory block in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2084">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2084">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2085">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) slutförd tilldelning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2085">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2086">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) ogiltigt kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2086">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2087">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2087">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2088">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2088">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2089">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2089">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2090">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2090">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign canvas memory block. */
status = gx_canvas_memory_define(canvas,
    (GX_COLOR *) DRAM_MEMORY,
    (640 * 480 * 2));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the canvas memory pointer has be
reassigned. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2094">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2094">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2095">Definiera mus markörens bild</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2095">Define the mouse cursor image</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2096">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2096">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_mouse_define(GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2097">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2097">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2098">Den här tjänsten definierar mus information för den angivna arbets ytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2098">This service defines mouse information for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2099">Den här tjänsten kräver att GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT definieras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2099">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2100">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2100">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2101">**arbets yta** Pekare till kontroll blocket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2101">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2102">**information** Pekare till mus markör information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2102">**info** Pointer to mouse cursor information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2103">**Bilaga i** innehåller en definition för GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO-strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2103">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2104">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2104">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2105">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) konfigurations information för lyckad mus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2105">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2106">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2106">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2107">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2107">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2108">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2108">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2109">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2109">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2110">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2110">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set mouse cursor info. */
GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO mouse_cursor;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_image_id = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_MOUSE;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_x = 0;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_y = 0;

status = gx_canvas_mouse_define(&my_canvas, &mouse_cursor);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse info of “my_canvas” has been
set successfully. */

```


### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2122">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2122">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2123">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) mus markören är dold</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2123">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse cursor hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2124">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) Det gick inte att dölja mus markören</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2124">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) Failed mouse cursor hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2125">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2125">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2126">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2126">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2127">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2127">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2133">gx_canvas_mouse_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2133">gx_canvas_mouse_show</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2134">Aktivera mus markören</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2134">Turn on the mouse cursor</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2135">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2135">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_mouse_show(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2136">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2136">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2137">Den här tjänsten gör mus markören synlig för den angivna arbets ytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2137">This service makes the mouse cursor visible for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2138">Den här tjänsten kräver att GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT definieras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2138">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2139">Gx_canvas_mouse_define API ska anropas för att definiera markörens bild innan den begärda tjänsten begärs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2139">The gx_canvas_mouse_define API should be invoked to define the mouse cursor image before this service is requested.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2140">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2140">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2141">**arbets yta** Pekare till kontroll blocket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2141">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2142">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2142">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2143">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) konfigurations information för lyckad mus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2143">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2144">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) Det gick inte att Visa mus markören</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2144">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) Failed mouse cursor show</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2145">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2145">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2146">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2146">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2147">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2147">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2149">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2149">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Make mouse cursor hidden ”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse of “my_canvas” has been
hidden successfully. */
```
