## <a name="gx_canvas_offset_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2153">gx_canvas_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2153">gx_canvas_offset_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2154">Tilldela arbets yta x, y Visa förskjutning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2154">Assign canvas x,y display offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2155">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2155">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_offset_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2156">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2156">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2157">Den här tjänsten tilldelar en förskjutning i x-y-skärmen för den angivna arbets ytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2157">This service assigns an x,y display offset for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2158">Detta styr den position där arbets ytan sammansatts i den synliga inramade bufferten och används ofta när arbets ytan är mindre än den fysiska visningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2158">This controls the position at which the canvas is composited into the visible frame buffer, and is often used when the canvas is smaller than the physical display.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2159">Om arbets ytan har bundits till ett maskin varu grafik lager med hjälp av API: et gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind () implementeras tjänsten gx_canvas_offset_set direkt med hjälp av maskin varu support.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2159">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_offset_set service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2160">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2160">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2161">**arbets yta** Pekare till kontroll blocket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2161">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2162">**x** x-koordinat för förskjutning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2162">**x** X coordinate of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2163">**y** y-koordinat för förskjutning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2163">**y** Y coordinate of offset</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2164">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2164">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2165">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) tilldelning av förskjutning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2165">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2166">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2166">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2167">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2167">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2168">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) ogiltig arbets yta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2168">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2169">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2169">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2170">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2170">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2171">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2171">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set display offset for “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_offset_set(&my_canvas, 20, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now offset from
position 20,30. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pie_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2181">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2181">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2182">Rita cirkel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2182">Draw pie</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2183">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2183">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pie_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter,
    UINT r, 
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2184">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2184">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2185">Den här tjänsten ritar ett cirkel diagram i arbets ytan med den aktuella rit kontextens pensel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2185">This service draws a pie into the canvas using the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2186">Cirkeln klipps till arbets ytans ogiltiga region.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2186">The pie is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2187">Den här tjänsten kräver att konfigurations alternativet GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT definieras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2187">This service requires the configuration option GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2188">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2188">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2189">**xcenter** x-position för cirkeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2189">**xcenter** x-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2190">**YCenter** y-position i cirkelns mitt punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2190">**ycenter** y-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2191">**r** -radien för cirkeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2191">**r** Radius of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2192">**start_angle** Cirkelns start vinkel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2192">**start_angle** Starting angle of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2193">**end_angle** Cirkelns slut vinkel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2193">**end_angle** Ending angle of the pie</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2194">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2194">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2195">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ritad båge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2195">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2196">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2196">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2197">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) ogiltigt värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2197">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2198">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Det går inte att öppna rit kontexten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2198">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2199">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2199">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a pie from 0 degree to 90 degree in clockwise. */
status = gx_canvas_pie_draw(100, 100, 50, 0, 90);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pie has been drawn to canvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixel_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2214">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2214">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2215">Rita bild punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2215">Draw pixel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2216">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2216">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixel_draw(GX_POINT position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2217">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2217">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2218">Den här tjänsten ritar en pixel på arbets ytan med linje färgen för den aktuella rit kontextens pensel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2218">This service draws a pixel on the canvas using the line color of the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2219">Om konfigurations alternativet GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT definierats, ska du blanda pixeln med annars ritar du pixeln som helt ogenomskinlig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2219">If configuration option GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT is defined, blend the pixel with the otherwise, draw the pixel as fully opaque.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2220">**punkt** x, y position för bild punkt att rita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2220">**point** x,y position of pixel to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2221">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2221">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2222">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades Pixelmap Draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2222">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2223">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2223">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2224">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Det går inte att öppna rit kontexten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2224">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2225">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2225">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2226">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2226">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2227">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2227">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point; /* the x,y position you want to draw to */
GX_RECTANGLE drawto; /* the rectangle bounding your drawing */
GX_CANVAS *mycanvas; /* the canvas you want to draw to */

/* calculate 1x1 pixel drawing area: */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&drawto,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y);

/* get my canvas: */
gx_widget_canvas_get(win, &mycanvas);

/* open my canvas for drawing: */
gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(mycanvas, win, &drawto);

/* setup my brush colors. Use any color ID in your resources: */
gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_ID_WINDOW_BORDER);

/* draw a pixel: */
status = gx_canvas_pixel_draw(point);

/* close the canvas: */
gx_canvas_drawing_complete(mycanvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixel was successfully drawn to mycanvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2232">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2232">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2233">Blanda Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2233">Blend pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2234">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2234">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend(
    GX_VALUE x_position,
    GX_VALUE y_position, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2235">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2235">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2236">Den här tjänsten blandar en Pixelmap med arbets ytans bakgrund.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2236">This service blends a pixelmap with the canvas background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2237">Blandnings förhållandet anges av anroparen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2237">The blending ratio is specified by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2238">Alfa värdet kan vara från 0 (helt transparent) till 255 (helt ogenomskinligt).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2238">The alpha value can range from 0 (fully transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2239">Pixelmap kan också innehålla en intern alfa kanal, som kombineras med det inkommande blandning svärdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2239">The pixelmap may also include an internal alpha channel, which is combined with the incoming blending value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2240">Den här tjänsten stöds endast av visnings driv rutiner som körs med 16-BPP färgdjup och högre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2240">This service is only supported by display drivers running at 16-bpp color depth and higher.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2241">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2241">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2242">**x_start** Starta x-position för Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2242">**x_start** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2243">**y_end** Start y-position för Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2243">**y_end** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2244">**Pixelmap** Pekare till Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2244">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2245">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2245">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2246">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades Pixelmap Draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2246">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2249">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) stöds inte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2249">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2250">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Det går inte att öppna rit kontexten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2250">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2251">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2251">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2252">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2252">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2253">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2253">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw pixelmap on active canvas */

GX_PIXELMAP *map;
gx_system_pixelmap_get(ID_MY_PIXELMAP, &map);

status = gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend(10, 20, map, 128);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap has been blended onto the current canvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2281">gx_canvas_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2281">gx_canvas_pixelmap_get</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2289">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2289">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2290">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades Pixelmap get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2290">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2299">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2299">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2300">Rita roterat Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2300">Draw rotated pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2301">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2301">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_VALUE x_position, 
    GX_VALUE y_position,
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    INT angle,
    INT rot_cx, 
    INT rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2302">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2302">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2303">Den här tjänsten roterar en Pixelmap vid den angivna vinkeln och återger Pixelmap till arbets ytan direkt när rotationen utförs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2303">This service rotates a pixelmap at the specified angle and renders the pixelmap to the canvas directly as the rotation is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2304">Den här tjänsten skiljer sig från gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate i att resultatet av rotationen direkt återges till arbets ytans minne och det roterade Pixelmap inte returneras till anroparen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2304">This service differs from gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate in that the output of the rotation is directly rendered to the canvas memory, and the rotated pixelmap is not returned to the caller.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2305">Fördelen med den här tjänsten över gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate är att det inte krävs ytterligare minne för att rymma det roterade Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2305">The advantage of this service over gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate is that no additional memory is required to hold the rotated pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2306">Nack delen är att rotations koden måste köras varje gången Pixelmap ritas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2306">The disadvantage is that the rotation code must be executed each time the pixelmap is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2307">Verifiering av Urklipp och visnings område framtvingas under åter givning av roterade Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2307">Clipping and viewport validation are enforced during rendering of the rotated pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2308">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2308">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2309">**x_position** Starta x-position för Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2309">**x_position** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2310">**y_position** Start y-position för Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2310">**y_position** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2311">**Pixelmap** Pekare till Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2311">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2312">**vinkel** Vinkel för rotation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2312">**angle** Angle to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2313">**rot_cx** X – Coord av rotations centrum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2313">**rot_cx** X-coord of center of rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2314">Om det här värdet är inställt på-1 används mitten av bilden som rotations Center.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2314">If this value is set to -1, the center of the image is used as the rotation center.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2315">**rot_cy** Y-Coord av rotations centrum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2315">**rot_cy** Y-coord of center of rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2316">Om det här värdet är inställt på-1 används mitten av bilden som rotations centrum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2316">If this value is set to -1, the center of the image is used as the center of rotation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2317">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2317">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2318">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades Pixelmap Draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2318">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2319">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2319">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2320">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2320">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2321">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Det går inte att öppna rit kontexten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2321">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2322">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2322">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2323">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2323">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2324">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2324">Example</span></span>

```C
/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction and draw in on canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(10, 20, &my_pixelmap, 30,
    -1, -1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the rotated pixelmap “my_pixelmap” has been drawn. */
```


```C
{
    { 208, 63 },
    { 274, 63 },
    { 274, 163 },
    { 208, 163 }

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2407">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2407">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2408">Rita text roterad om en mitt punkt (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2408">Draw text rotated about a center point (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2409">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2409">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(
    const GX_CHAR *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2410">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2410">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2411">Detta API har ersatts av prioriterad eller gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2411">This API has been deprecated in favor or gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2412">Även om det fortfarande stöds bör nya program inte använda detta API och bör istället använda gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2412">While still supported, new applications should not use this API and should instead use gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2413">Den här tjänsten ritar text till arbets ytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2413">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2414">Texten roteras om den begärda mitt punkten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2414">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2415">Det aktuella rit kontexts teckensnittet och den ritade kontext linje färgen används för att återge texten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2415">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2416">Den här tjänsten använder funktionen gx_utility_string_to_alphamap för att rendera text strängen till en tillfällig 8bpp-Pixelmap som bara innehåller ett alfa värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2416">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2417">Tjänsten roterar sedan AlphaMap med hjälp av funktionen gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2417">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2418">När den sista AlphaMap har Render ATS till arbets ytan, frigör tjänsten den temporära AlphaMap och det tillhör ande minnet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2418">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2419">Eftersom en tillfällig AlphaMap krävs för att återge roterad text måste programmet Konfigurera gx_system_memory_allocator av anrops gx_system_memory_allocator_set ()-API: et innan du försöker Rita roterad text.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2419">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling gx_system_memory_allocator_set() API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2420">Den här tjänsten bör endast användas för att rendera roterad text "en tid".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2420">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2421">Om samma text sträng ska ritas flera gånger på olika platser eller olika rotations vinklar, är det mer effektivt att använda-funktionen gx_utility_string_to_alphamap () för att skapa texten AlphaMap en gång, och sedan använda gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate flera gånger för att rotera den resulterande AlphaMap upprepade gånger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2421">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2422">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2422">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2423">**text** Text sträng som ska ritas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2423">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2424">**xCenter** Centrera positon runt vilken text som ska roteras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2424">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2425">**yCenter** Mitt position runt vilken text som ska roteras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2425">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2426">**vinkel** Den önskade text rotations vinkeln i grader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2426">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2427">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2427">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2428">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) text åter givning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2428">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2429">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2429">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2430">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2430">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2431">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0X30) det finns inte tillräckligt med minne tillgängligt eller så har gx_system_memory_allocator inte tilldelats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2431">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2432">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) ogiltig sträng längd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2432">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2433">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2433">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2434">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2434">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2435">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2435">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(dynamic_text, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2443">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2443">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2444">Rita text roterad om en mitt punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2444">Draw text rotated about a center point</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2445">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2445">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2446">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2446">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2447">Den här tjänsten ritar text till arbets ytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2447">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2448">Texten roteras om den begärda mitt punkten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2448">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2449">Det aktuella rit kontexts teckensnittet och den ritade kontext linje färgen används för att återge texten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2449">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2450">Den här tjänsten använder funktionen gx_utility_string_to_alphamap för att rendera text strängen till en tillfällig 8bpp-Pixelmap som bara innehåller ett alfa värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2450">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2451">Tjänsten roterar sedan AlphaMap med hjälp av funktionen gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2451">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2452">När den sista AlphaMap har Render ATS till arbets ytan, frigör tjänsten den temporära AlphaMap och det tillhör ande minnet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2452">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2453">Eftersom en tillfällig AlphaMap krävs för att återge roterad text måste programmet Konfigurera gx_system_memory_allocator av anrops ***gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** -API: et innan du försöker Rita roterad text.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2453">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling ***gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2454">Den här tjänsten bör endast användas för att rendera roterad text "en tid".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2454">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2455">Om samma text sträng ska ritas flera gånger på olika platser eller olika rotations vinklar, är det mer effektivt att använda-funktionen gx_utility_string_to_alphamap () för att skapa texten AlphaMap en gång, och sedan använda gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate flera gånger för att rotera den resulterande AlphaMap upprepade gånger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2455">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2456">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2456">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2457">**text** Text sträng som ska ritas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2457">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2458">**xCenter** Centrera positon runt vilken text som ska roteras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2458">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2459">**yCenter** Mitt position runt vilken text som ska roteras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2459">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2460">**vinkel** Den önskade text rotations vinkeln i grader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2460">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2461">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2461">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2462">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) text åter givning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2462">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2463">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2463">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2464">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2464">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2465">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) ogiltig rit kontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2465">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid draw context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2466">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0X30) det finns inte tillräckligt med minne tillgängligt eller så har gx_system_memory_allocator inte tilldelats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2466">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2467">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) ogiltig sträng längd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2467">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2468">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2468">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2469">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2469">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2470">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2470">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];
    GX_STRING string;

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    string.gx_string_ptr = dynamic_text;
    string.gx_string_length = strlen(dynamic_text);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(&string, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2478">gx_canvas_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2478">gx_canvas_shift</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2479">Shift-arbetsyta med x, y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2479">Shift canvas by x,y</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2480">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2480">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_shift(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_VALUE x, GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2481">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2481">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2482">Den här tjänsten skiftar den angivna arbets ytans förskjutning med den angivna mängden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2482">This service shifts the specified canvas offset by the specified amount.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2483">Detta påverkar den position där arbets ytan återges inom den synliga bildens buffert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2483">This affects the position at which the canvas is rendered within the visible frame buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2484">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2484">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2485">**arbets yta** Pekare till kontroll blocket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2485">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2486">**x** pixlar till skift på x-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2486">**x** Pixels to shift on the X axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2487">**y** -pixlar till skift på y-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2487">**y** Pixels to shift on the Y axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2488">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2488">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2489">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) arbets ytans Skift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2489">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2490">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2490">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2491">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2491">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2492">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) ogiltig arbets yta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2492">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2493">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2493">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2494">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2494">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2495">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2495">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Shift canvas “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_shift(&my_canvas, 10, 15);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas has been shifted by 10 pixels
    on the X axis and 15 on the Y axis. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2502">gx_canvas_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2502">gx_canvas_show</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2503">Gör en arbets yta synlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2503">Make a canvas visible</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2504">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2504">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_show(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2505">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2505">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2506">Den här tjänsten gör en arbets yta synlig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2506">This service makes a canvas visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2507">Om arbets ytan tidigare har bundits till ett maskin varu grafik lager med hjälp av API: et för gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind () implementeras tjänsten gx_canvas_show () direkt med hjälp av maskin varu support.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2507">If the canvas has been previously bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_show() service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2508">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2508">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2509">**arbets yta** Pekare till kontroll blocket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2509">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2510">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2510">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2511">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) tilldelning av förskjutning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2511">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2512">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2512">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2513">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2513">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2514">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) ogiltig arbets yta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2514">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2515">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2515">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2516">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2516">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2517">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2517">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Make this canvas visible. */
status = gx_canvas_show(&my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now visible */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2526">gx_canvas_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2526">gx_canvas_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2527">Rita text (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2527">Draw text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2528">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2528">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_text_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string, 
    INT length);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2529">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2529">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2530">Den här tjänsten ritar text på arbets ytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2530">This service draws text on the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2531">Detta API, men stöds fortfarande, är föråldrat och nya program bör istället använda gx_canvas_text_draw_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2531">This API, while still supported, is deprecated and new applications should instead use gx_canvas_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2532">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2532">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2533">**x_start** Börjar x-koordinaten för text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2533">**x_start** Starting x-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2534">**y_start** Börjar y-koordinaten för text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2534">**y_start** Starting y-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2535">**sträng** Pekare till sträng att rita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2535">**string** Pointer to string to draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2536">**längd** Om längden >= 0, begränsas antalet tecken som ritats till längd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2536">**length** If length >= 0, limits the number of characters drawn to length.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2537">Om längden < 0, ritas hela strängen fram till NULL-avslutning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2537">If length < 0, the entire string until NULL terminator is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2538">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2538">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2539">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) text rit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2539">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2540">**GX_FAILURE** (0X1E) misslyckades med att rita text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2540">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) Failed text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2543">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Det går inte att öppna rit kontexten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2543">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2544">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) ogiltig sträng längd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2544">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2545">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2545">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2546">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2546">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2547">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2547">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text “example” on current canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 20, “example”, 7);

/* Draw all of a string of unknown length on the current canvas */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 40, string_ptr, -1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text “example” has been drawn. */
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2592">gx_checkbox_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2592">gx_checkbox_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2593">Skapa kryss ruta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2593">Create checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2594">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2594">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_create(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT checkbox_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2595">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2595">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2596">Den här tjänsten skapar en CheckBox-widget med de angivna egenskaperna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2596">This service creates a checkbox widget with the specified properties.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2597">GX_CHECKBOX härleds från GX_TEXT_BUTTON och alla gx_text_button tjänster kan användas med GX_CHECKBOX widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2597">GX_CHECKBOX is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and all gx_text_button services may be used with GX_CHECKBOX widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2598">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2598">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2599">**kryss ruta** Pekare till kryss rutan kontroll block namn logiskt namn för CheckBox-widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2599">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block name Logical name of checkbox widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2600">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2600">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2601">**text_id** Resurs-ID för kryss Rute text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2601">**text_id** Resource ID of checkbox text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2602">**stil** Typ av kryss ruta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2602">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2603">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-speciella format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2603">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2604">**checkbox_id** Programdefinierat ID för kryss ruta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2604">**checkbox_id** Application-defined ID of checkbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2605">**storlek** Kryss rutans dimensioner</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2605">**size** Dimensions of checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2606">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2606">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2607">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)-slutförd kryss ruta skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2607">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2608">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2608">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2609">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2609">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2610">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2610">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2611">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2611">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2612">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2612">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2613">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2613">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2614">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2614">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_checkbox”. */
status = gx_checkbox_create(&my_checkbox, “my_checkbox”,
    &my_parent,
    MY_CHECKBOX_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_CHECKBOX_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the checkbox “my_checkbox” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2619">gx_checkbox_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2619">gx_checkbox_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2620">Rita kryss ruta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2620">Draw checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2621">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2621">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_checkbox_draw(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2622">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2622">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2623">Den här tjänsten ritar den angivna kryss rutan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2623">This service draws the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2624">Den här funktionen anropas vanligt vis internt av GUIX-funktionen för arbets ytans uppdatering, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med att implementera anpassade ritnings funktioner för widgetar anpassade kryss rutor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2624">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom checkbox widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2625">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2625">Parameters</span></span>

## <a name="gx_checkbox_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2636">gx_checkbox_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2636">gx_checkbox_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2637">Händelse för process kryss ruta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2637">Process checkbox event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2638">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2638">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_event_process(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2639">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2639">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2640">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för den angivna kryss rutan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2640">This service processes an event for the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2641">Den här tjänsten ska anropas som standard händelse hanterare med en anpassad händelse bearbetnings funktion för kryss rutor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2641">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom checkbox event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2642">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2642">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2643">**kryss ruta** Pekare för kontroll av kryss ruta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2643">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2644">**event_ptr** Pekare till händelsen att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2644">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2645">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2645">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2646">Händelse process för **GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) slutförd kryss ruta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2646">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2647">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2647">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2648">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2648">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2649">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2649">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2650">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2650">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2651">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2651">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2652">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2652">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic checkbox event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_checkbox_event_process(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default checkbox
            event processing */
        status = gx_checkbox_event_process(checkbox, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2657">gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2657">gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set</span></span>

```C
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_disabled_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_disabled_id);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2665">**unchecked_id** Pixelmap som används för avmarkerat tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2665">**unchecked_id** Pixelmap used for unchecked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2666">**checked_id** Pixelmap som används för markerat tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2666">**checked_id** Pixelmap used for checked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2667">**unchecked_disabled_id** Pixelmap som används för en inaktive rad och avmarkerad kryss ruta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2667">**unchecked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and unchecked checkbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2668">**checked_disabled_id** Pixelmap som används för en inaktive rad och markerad kryss ruta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2668">**checked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and checked checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2669">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2669">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2671">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2671">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2672">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2672">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

```C

    PIXELMAP_UNCHECKED_ID,
    PIXELMAP_CHECKED_ID, PIXELMAP_UNCHECKED_DISABLED_ID,
    PIXELMAP_CHECKED_SIABLED_ID));
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2742">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2742">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2743">Ange parametrar för animering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2743">Set animation parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2744">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2744">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    INT steps, 
    INT delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2745">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2745">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2746">Den här tjänsten anger animerings steg och fördröjnings tid för en cirkulär mätare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2746">This service sets animation steps and delay time for a circular gauge widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2747">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2747">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2748">**mätare** Pekare mot cirkulär mätar kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2748">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2749">**steg** Totalt antal steg för en rotation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2749">**steps** Total steps for one rotation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2750">**fördröjning** Fördröjnings tid för varje steg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2750">**delay** Delay time for every step</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2751">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2751">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2752">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) kryss ruta har valt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2752">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2753">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2753">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2754">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2754">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2755">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) ogiltigt värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2755">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2756">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2756">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2757">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2757">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2758">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2758">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set animation steps and delay time of circular gauge “my_gauge”
    to 30 and 1, the needle of “my_gauge” will rotate from
    current angle to target angle by 30 steps with 1 tick delay between every step. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(&my_gauge, 30, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the steps and delay time of “my_gauge” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2786">gx_circular_gauge_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2786">gx_circular_gauge_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2787">Skapa cirkulär mätare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2787">Create circular gauge</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2788">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2788">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_create(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO *info,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID background_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT circular_gauge_id,
    GX_VALUE xpos,
    GX_VALUE ypos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2789">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2789">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2790">Den här tjänsten skapar en cirkulär mätar widget med de angivna egenskaperna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2790">This service creates a circular gauge widget with the specified properties.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2791">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2791">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2792">**mätare** Pekare mot cirkulär mätar kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2792">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2793">**namn** Logiskt namn för cirkulär mätar widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2793">**name** Logical name of circular gauge widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2794">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2794">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2795">**information** Pekare till mätar informations strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2795">**info** Pointer to the gauge information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2796">**Bilaga i** innehåller definition som GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO struktur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2796">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2797">**background_id** Resurs-ID för cirkulär mätar bakgrunds Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2797">**background_id** Resource ID of circular gauge background pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2798">**stil** Format för cirkulär mätare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2798">**style** Style of circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2799">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-speciella format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2799">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2800">**circular_gauge_id** Programdefinierat ID för cirkulär mätare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2800">**circular_gauge_id** Application-defined ID of circular gauge</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2801">**Xpos** Mätar x-koordinatens position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2801">**xpos** Gauge x-coordinate position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2802">**ypos** Mätar y-koordinatens position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2802">**ypos** Gauge y-coordinate position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2803">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2803">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2804">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) kryss ruta har valt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2804">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2805">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2805">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2806">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2806">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2807">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig kontroll block storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2807">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2808">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2808">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2809">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2809">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2810">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2810">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2811">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2811">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE gauge_info;

gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_steps = 30;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_delay = 1;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_xpos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_ypos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_xcor = 20;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_ycor = 88;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_gauge”. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_create(&my_gauge, “my_gauge”,
            &my_parent,
            &gauge_info, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_NULL,
            MY_ICON_ID, 5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circular gauge “my_gauge” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2819">gx_circular_gauge_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2819">gx_circular_gauge_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2821">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2821">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_circular_gauge_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2822">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2822">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2823">Den här tjänsten ritar den angivna cirkel mätaren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2823">This service draws the specified circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2824">Den här funktionen anropas vanligt vis internt av GUIX-funktionen för arbets ytans uppdatering, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med att implementera anpassade ritnings funktioner för anpassade mätar widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2824">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom gauge widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2825">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2825">Parameters</span></span>

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2839">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2839">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2840">Bearbeta cirkulär mätar händelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2840">Process circular gauge event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2841">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2841">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_event_process(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2842">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2842">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2843">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för den angivna cirkulära mätaren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2843">This service processes an event for the specified circular gauge.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2844">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2844">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2845">**mätare** Pekare mot mätar kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2845">**gauge** Pointer to gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2846">**event_ptr** Pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2846">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2847">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2847">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) händelse process för godkänd mätare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gauge event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2851">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2851">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2852">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2852">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2853">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2853">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic circular gauge event processing as part of custom event processing function. */
UINT custom_gauge_event_process(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default circular gauge
             event processing */
        status = gx_circular_gauge_event_process(gauge, event);
        break;
}
return status;
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_default"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2861">gx_context_brush_default</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2861">gx_context_brush_default</span></span>
