```C
    GX_RESOURCE_ID line_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2891">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2891">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2892">Den här tjänsten definierar penseln för den aktuella rit kontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2892">This service defines the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2893">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2893">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2894">**line_color_id** Resurs-ID för linje färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2894">**line_color_id** Resource ID of line color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2895">**Bilaga B** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2895">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2896">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2896">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2897">**fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för fyllnings färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2897">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2898">**Bilaga B** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2898">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2899">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2899">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2900">**stil** Pensel typ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2900">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2901">**Bilaga D** beskriver de pensel format som stöds.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2901">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2902">Pensel format kan kombineras till en variabel med hjälp av bitvis OR operation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2902">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2903">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2903">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2904">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)-slutförd kontext pensel definiera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2904">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2905">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2905">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2906">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) ingen aktiv rit kontext definiera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2906">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2907">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2907">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2908">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) inget aktivt rit sammanhang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2908">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>


## <a name="gx_context_brush_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2926">gx_context_brush_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2926">gx_context_brush_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2927">Hämta pensel för aktuell ritnings kontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2927">Get brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2928">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2928">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_get(GX_BRUSH **return_brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2929">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2929">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2930">Den här tjänsten returnerar en pekare till den aktiva penseln i den aktuella rit kontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2930">This service returns a pointer to the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2931">Om det inte finns någon aktiv rit kontext, Miss lyckas tjänsten och returnerar en NULL-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2931">If there is no active drawing context, the service fails and returns a NULL pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2932">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2932">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2933">**return_brush** Pekare till målet för penseln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2933">**return_brush** Pointer to destination for brush.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2934">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2934">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2935">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har hämtat kontext penseln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2935">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved context brush</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2936">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) inget aktivt rit sammanhang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2936">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2938">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2939">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2939">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2940">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2940">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRUSH *my_brush;

/* Get the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_get(&my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_pattern_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2955">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2955">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2956">Ange pensel mönster för aktuell ritnings kontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2956">Set brush pattern of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2957">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2957">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_pattern_set(ULONG pattern);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2958">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2958">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2959">Den här tjänsten anger pensel mönstret för den aktuella rit kontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2959">This service sets the brush pattern of the current drawing context.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2960">Pensel mönstret används för att rita streckade vågräta och streckade lodräta linjer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2960">The brush pattern is used for drawing dashed horizontal and dashed vertical lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2961">När gx_canvas_line_draw () anropas och linjen är vågrät eller lodrät, och fältet brush.gx_brush_line_pattern inte är noll, ritas en mönster linje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2961">When the gx_canvas_line_draw() is called, and the line is horizontal or vertical, and the brush.gx_brush_line_pattern field is non-zero, a pattern line is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2962">Pensel mönster masken stöds för närvarande endast för vågräta och lodräta linjer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2962">The brush pattern mask is currently only supported for horizontal and vertical lines.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2963">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2963">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2964">**mönster** Mönster som ska användas för penseln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2964">**pattern** Pattern to be used for the brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2965">Detta är ett enkelt hexadecimalt mönster som används för mönster linje ritning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2965">This is a simple hexidecimal on/off pattern to be used for pattern line drawing.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2966">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2966">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2967">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) kontext pensel uppsättning har slutförts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2967">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2968">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) ogiltigt rit sammanhang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2968">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2969">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2969">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2970">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2970">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2971">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2971">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush pattern for the current contex. */
status = gx_context_brush_pattern_set(0x80808080);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush pattern of the current context
has been set to the specified pattern. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2985">gx_context_brush_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2985">gx_context_brush_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2986">Ange pensel för aktuell ritnings kontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2986">Set brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2987">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2987">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_set(GX_BRUSH *brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2988">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2988">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2989">Den här tjänsten anger penseln för den aktuella rit kontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2989">This service sets the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2990">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2990">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2991">**pensel** Pekare som används för den aktuella kontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2991">**brush** Pointer to brush to use for current context.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2992">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2992">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2993">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) kontext pensel uppsättning har slutförts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2993">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2994">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) inget aktivt rit sammanhang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2994">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2995">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2995">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2996">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2996">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2997">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2997">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-2998">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-2998">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRSUH my_brush;
GX_FONT *font;
GX_COLOR fill_color;
GX_COLOR line_color;

/* Retrieve the font that associated with the specified font ID. */
gx_context_font_get(MY_FONT_ID, &font);

/* Retrieve the color that associated with the specified color ID. */
gx_context_color_get(MY_FILL_COLOR_ID, &fill_color);
gx_context_color_get(MY_LINE_COLOR, &line_color);

my_brush.gx_brush_pixelmap = MY_PIXELMAP_ID;
my_brush.gx_brush_font = font;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_pattern = 0x80808080;
my_brush.gx_brush_pattern_mask = 0x80000000;
my_brush.gx_brush_fill_color = fill_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_color = line_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_style = GX_BRSUH_SOLID_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ALIAS |
                          GX_BRUSH_PIXELMAP_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ROUND
my_brush.gx_brush_width = 2;
my_brush.gx_brush_alpha = 255;

/* Set the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_set(my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been set. */
```


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3017">Den här tjänsten anger pensel formatet för den aktuella rit kontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3017">This service sets the brush style of the current drawing context.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3023">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) inget aktivt rit sammanhang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3023">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3024">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3024">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_brush_width_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3041">gx_context_brush_width_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3041">gx_context_brush_width_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3042">Ange pensel bredd för aktuell ritnings kontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3042">Set brush width of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3043">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3043">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_width_set(UINT width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3044">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3044">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3045">Den här tjänsten anger bredden på den aktiva penseln i den aktuella rit kontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3045">This service sets the width of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3046">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3046">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3047">**Bredd** Pensel bredd i bild punkter för aktuellt sammanhang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3047">**width** Brush width in pixels of current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3048">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3048">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3049">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) den slutförda kontext penselns bredd har angetts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3049">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush width set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3050">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) inget aktivt rit sammanhang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3050">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3051">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3051">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3052">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3052">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3053">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3053">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush width of the current context to 10 pixels. */
status = gx_context_brush_width_set(10); /*

If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush width of the current context has been set to 10. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3068">gx_context_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3068">gx_context_color_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3069">Hämta färg värde kopplat till färg-ID i den aktuella Draw-kontexten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3069">Get color value associated with color ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3070">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3070">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_color_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3071">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3072">Den här tjänsten hämtar det färg värde som är associerat med det angivna färg-ID: t.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3072">This service retrieves the color value associated with the indicated color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3073">Färgvärdet returneras i färg formatet för den aktiva Sammanhangs visningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3073">The color value is returned in the color format of the active context display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3074">Den här tjänsten ska endast anropas inifrån en aktiv ritnings åtgärd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3074">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3075">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3075">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3076">**color_id** Resurs-ID för den begärda färgen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3076">**color_id** Resource ID of color requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3077">**return_color** Adress till variabel som ska innehålla returnerat färg värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3077">**return_color** Address of variable to hold returned color value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3078">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3078">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3079">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) klart färg värdes get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3079">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color value get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3080">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3080">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3081">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) inget aktivt rit sammanhang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3081">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3082">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3082">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3083">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3083">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3084">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3084">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3085">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3085">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR color_value;

/* Get the color vaue. */
status = gx_context_color_get(MY_BLACK_COLOR_ID, &color_value);
```

## <a name="gx_context_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3100">gx_context_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3100">gx_context_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3101">Ange fyllnings färg för aktuellt rit sammanhang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3101">Set fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3102">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3102">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_fill_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3103">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3103">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3104">Den här tjänsten anger fyllnings färgen för den aktiva penseln i den aktuella rit kontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3104">This service sets the fill color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3105">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3105">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3106">**fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för fyllnings färgen för den aktuella kontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3106">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3107">**Bilaga B** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3107">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3108">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3108">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3109">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3109">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3110">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) kontext fyllnings färg uppsättning har slutförts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3110">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3111">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3111">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3112">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) inget aktivt rit sammanhang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3112">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3113">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3113">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3114">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3114">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3115">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3115">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the fill color of the current context to black. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the fill color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3130">gx_context_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3130">gx_context_font_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3131">Hämta teckensnitt som är kopplat till teckensnitts-ID i den aktuella Draw-kontexten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3131">Get font associated with font ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3132">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3132">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3133">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3133">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3134">Den här tjänsten hämtar teckensnitts pekaren som är associerad med det angivna teckensnitts-ID: t.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3134">This service retrieves the font pointer associated with the indicated font ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3135">Den här tjänsten ska endast anropas inifrån en aktiv ritnings åtgärd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3135">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3136">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3136">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3137">**font_id** Resurs-ID för begärt teckensnitt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3137">**font_id** Resource ID of font requested.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3142">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) inget aktivt rit sammanhang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3142">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3161">gx_context_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3161">gx_context_font_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3162">Ange teckensnitt för aktuell ritnings kontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3162">Set font of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3163">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3163">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3164">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3164">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3165">Den här tjänsten anger teckensnittet i den aktiva penseln i den aktuella rit kontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3165">This service sets the font in the active brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3166">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3166">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3167">**font_id** Teckensnitts resurs-ID för aktuell kontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3167">**font_id** Font resource ID of current context</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3170">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3170">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3171">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) inget aktivt rit sammanhang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3171">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3172">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3172">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Set the font of the current context to MY_FONT_ID. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font of the current context has been set. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3191">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3191">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3192">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3192">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3193">Den här tjänsten anger linje färgen för den aktiva penseln i den aktuella rit kontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3193">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3194">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3194">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3195">**line_color_id** Linje färg för aktuell kontext.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3195">**line_color_id** Line color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3196">**Bilaga B** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3196">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3197">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3197">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3200">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3200">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3201">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) inget aktivt rit sammanhang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3201">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3202">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3202">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the line color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3219">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3219">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3221">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3221">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3222">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3222">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3223">Den här tjänsten hämtar Pixelmap-pekaren som är associerad med det angivna Pixelmap-ID: t.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3223">This service retrieves the pixelmap pointer associated with the indicated pixelmap ID.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3224">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3224">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3225">**pixelmap_id** Resurs-ID för Pixelmap begärdes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3225">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3226">**return_map** Adress till variabel att lagra returnerad Pixelmap-adress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3226">**return_map** Address of variable to hold returned pixelmap address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3227">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3227">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3228">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har hämtat Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3228">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3229">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3229">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3230">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) inget aktivt rit sammanhang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3230">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3231">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig Pixelmap-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3231">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pixelmap pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3232">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3232">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3233">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3233">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3234">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3234">Example</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3249">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3249">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3250">Ange Pixelmap för den aktuella Draw-kontexten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3250">Set pixelmap of current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3251">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3251">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3252">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3252">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3253">Den här tjänsten tilldelar Pixelmap för den aktiva penseln i den aktuella rit kontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3253">This service assigns the pixelmap of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3254">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3254">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3255">**pixelmap_id** Resurs-ID för Pixelmap som ska användas för den aktuella kontexten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3255">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap resource ID to use for current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3256">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3256">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3257">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad kontext Pixelmap set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3257">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3258">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3258">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3259">**GX_INVLAID_CONTEXT** (0X06) ogiltig kontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3259">**GX_INVLAID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3260">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3260">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3261">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3261">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3262">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3262">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap of the current context to MY_PIXELMAP_ID. */
status = gx_context_pixelmap_set(MY_PIXELMAP_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3277">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3277">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3278">Definiera rå pensel för aktuell Draw-kontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3278">Define raw brush of current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3279">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3279">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_brush_define(
    GX_COLOR line_color,
    GX_COLOR fill_color, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3280">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3280">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3281">Den här tjänsten definierar den obearbetade penseln för den aktuella skärm kontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3281">This service defines the raw brush of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3282">RAW-definitioner används när 32-bitars ARGB färg värden ska överföras till penseln i stället för färg-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3282">Raw definitions are used when 32-bit ARGB color values are to be passed into the brush rather than color IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3283">Råa färg definitioner är användbara när den önskade färgen inte finns i den aktuella system färg tabellen eller när RGB-färgvärdet beräknas vid körning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3283">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3284">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3284">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3285">**line_color** Färg på linje i 32-bitars RAW ARGB färg format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3285">**line_color** Color of line in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3286">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3286">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3287">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3287">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3288">**fill_color** Färg för fyllning i 32-bitars RAW ARGB färg format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3288">**fill_color** Color of fill in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3289">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3289">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3290">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3290">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3291">**stil** Pensel typ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3291">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3292">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3292">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3293">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3293">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3294">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad kontext för RAW-pensel definiera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3294">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3295">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) inget aktivt rit sammanhang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3295">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3296">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3296">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3297">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3297">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3298">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3298">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define the raw brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_brush_define(GX_COLOR_BLACK,
    GX_COLOR_BLACK, GX_STYLE_BORDER_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw brush of the current context has been defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3313">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3313">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3314">Ange rå fyllnings färg för den aktuella rit kontexten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3314">Set raw fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3315">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3315">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_fill_color_set(GX_COLOR line_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3316">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3316">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3317">Den här tjänsten anger den råa fyllnings färgen för den aktuella skärm kontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3317">This service sets the raw fill color of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3318">Parametern line_color är ett oformaterat färg värde för 32-bitars ARGB-format i stället för ett färg-ID-värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3318">The line_color parameter is a 32-bit ARGB format raw color value, rather than a color ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3319">Råa färg definitioner är användbara när den önskade färgen inte finns i den aktuella system färg tabellen eller när RGB-färgvärdet beräknas vid körning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3319">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3320">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3320">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3321">**line_color** Färg på linje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3321">**line_color** Color of line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3322">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3322">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3323">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3323">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3324">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3324">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3325">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad kontext för oformaterad fyllnings färg uppsättning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3325">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3326">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) inget aktivt rit sammanhang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3326">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3327">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3327">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3328">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3328">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3329">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3329">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the raw fill color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_fill_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw fill color of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_line_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3344">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3344">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3345">Ange rå linje färg för den aktuella rit kontexten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3345">Set raw line color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3346">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3346">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_line_color_set(GX_COLOR line_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3347">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3347">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3348">Den här tjänsten anger linje färgen för den aktiva penseln i den aktuella rit kontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3348">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3349">Parametern line_color är ett oformaterat färg värde för 32-bitars ARGB-format i stället för ett färg-ID-värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3349">The line_color parameter is a 32-bit ARGB format raw color value, rather than a color ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3350">Råa färg definitioner är användbara när den önskade färgen inte finns i den aktuella system färg tabellen eller när RGB-färgvärdet beräknas vid körning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3350">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3351">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3351">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3352">**line_color** Färg på linje värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3352">**line_color** Color of line value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3353">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3353">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3354">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3354">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3355">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3355">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3356">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) slutförd kontext RAW linje färg uppsättning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3356">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3357">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) inget aktivt rit sammanhang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3357">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3358">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3358">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3359">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3359">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Set the raw line color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw line color of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3374">gx_context_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3374">gx_context_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3375">Hämta strängen som är associerad med sträng-ID (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3375">Retrieve string associated with String ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3376">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3376">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_string_get(GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3377">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3377">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3378">Detta föråldrade API returnerar den sträng som är associerad med angivet sträng-ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3378">This deprecated API returns the string associated with the given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3379">Nya program bör använda gx_context_string_get_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3379">New applications should use gx_context_string_get_ext().</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3381">**string_id** Sträng-ID som genereras av GUIX Studio-programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3381">**string_id** String ID generated by the GUIX Studio application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3382">**return_string** Adress till variabel att returnera sträng pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3382">**return_string** Address of variable to return string pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3383">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3383">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3384">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) slutförd kontext RAW linje färg uppsättning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3384">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3385">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3385">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3386">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3386">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3387">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) inget aktivt rit sammanhang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3387">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3388">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3388">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3389">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3389">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *text;

status = gx_context_string_get(GX_ID_ERROR, &text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string pointer has been returned. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_string_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3393">gx_context_string_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3393">gx_context_string_get_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3394">Hämta strängen som är associerad med angivet sträng-ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3394">Retrieve string associated with given string ID.</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3395">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3395">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_string_get_ext(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id, 
    GX_STRING *return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3396">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3396">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3397">Den här tjänsten returnerar strängen som är associerad med ett angivet sträng-ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3397">This service returns the string associated with a given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3398">Den här tjänsten kan bara anropas när det finns en aktiv rit kontext, dvs. inifrån ritnings funktionen i en widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3398">This service can only be invoked when there is an active drawing context, i.e. from within the drawing function of a widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3399">Den här tjänsten identifierar den aktiva arbets ytan och visar och hämtar strängen från den placerade visnings instansen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3399">This service identifies the active canvas and display and retrieves the string from the located display instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3400">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3400">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3401">**string_id** Sträng-ID som används för att identifiera strängen, som genereras av GUIX Studio i program resursens huvud fil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3401">**string_id** String ID used to identify the string, as generated by GUIX Studio in the application resource header file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3402">**return_string** Adressen till GX_STRING variabel där sträng pekaren och sträng längden ska returneras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3402">**return_string** Address of GX_STRING variable in which the string pointer and string length will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3403">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3403">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3404">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) slutförd kontext RAW linje färg uppsättning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3404">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3406">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3406">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3407">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) inget aktivt rit sammanhang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3407">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3408">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3408">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3409">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3409">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3410">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3410">Example</span></span>


```C
GX_STRING string;

/* Set the raw line color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_string_get_ext(ID_ERROR, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string.gx_string_ptr and
string.gx_string_length values have been returned. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3425">gx_display_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3425">gx_display_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3426">Tilldela visnings aktivt språk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3426">Assign the display active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3427">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3427">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_active_language_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3428">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3428">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3429">Den här tjänsten tilldelar det aktuella aktiva språket för den angivna visningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3429">This service assigns the currently active language for the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3430">Språk indexet motsvarar de språk som definierats i tabellen visnings språk och är inte en ANSI-språkidentifierare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3430">The language index corresponds to the languages defined in the display language table, and is not an ANSI language identifier.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3431">Olika skärmar i flera visnings system kan båda köra olika aktiva språk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3431">Different displays in a multi display system can each run different active languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3432">Tabellen visnings språk ska tilldelas innan detta API används.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3432">The display language table should be assigned before this API is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3433">När en visning initieras med hjälp av gx_studio_display_configure installeras språk tabellen automatiskt och programmet skickas i det aktiva språk indexet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3433">When a display is initialized using gx_studio_display_configure, the language table is automatically installed and the application passes in the active language index.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3434">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3434">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3435">**Visa** Pekare som visar kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3435">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3436">**språk** Aktivt språk index</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3436">**language** Active language index</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3437">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3437">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3438">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) slutfört språk tilldelning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3438">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful language assign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3439">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig visnings pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3439">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid display pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3440">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) ogiltigt språk index</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3440">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3441">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3441">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3442">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3442">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3443">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3443">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_active_language_set(&my_display,
    LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3447">gx_display_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3447">gx_display_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3448">Tilldela ett färg värde igen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3448">Re-assign one color value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3449">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3449">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id, 
    GX_COLOR new_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3450">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3450">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3451">Den här tjänsten tilldelar om det färg värde som är associerat med det angivna färg-ID: t.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3451">This service re-assigns the color value associated with the specified color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3452">Detta kan användas för att ändra färg tabellen för en visning utan att en helt ny färg tabell skapas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3452">This can be used to modify the color table of a display without providing an entirely new color table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3453">Det angivna färg värdet måste vara i det inbyggda formatet som stöds av visningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3453">The color value provided must be in the native format supported by the display.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3454">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3454">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3455">**Visa** Pekare som visar kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3455">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3456">**color_id** Färg-ID att omtilldela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3456">**color_id** Color ID to reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3457">**new_color** Färg värde som ska tilldelas till den här color_ids platsen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3457">**new_color** Color value to assign to this color_id slot</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3458">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3458">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3459">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)-omtilldelning av färg har slutförts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3459">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3460">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) ogiltigt färg-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3460">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid color ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3461">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3461">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3462">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0X1D) ogiltig visning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3462">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3463">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3463">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3464">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3464">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3465">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3465">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_color_set(&my_display, MY_COLOR_ID, 0x5454);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the color has been reassigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_color_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3468">gx_display_color_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3468">gx_display_color_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3469">Tilldela visnings färg tabell</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3469">Assign display color table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3470">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3470">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_COLOR *color_table, 
    INT color_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3471">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3471">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3472">Den här tjänsten tilldelar den färg tabell som ska användas av visningen igen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3472">This service re-assigns the color table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3473">Den här tjänsten anropas vanligt vis av den genererade visnings konfigurations funktionen i GUIX Studio, men kan också anropas av program varan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3473">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3474">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3474">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3475">**Visa** Pekare som visar kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3475">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3476">**color_table** Matris med färg värden i enhetligt visnings format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3476">**color_table** Array of color values in display native format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3477">**color_count** Anger antalet poster i färg tabellen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3477">**color_count** Indicates number of entries in color table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3478">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3478">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad färg tabell uppsättning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3480">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3480">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3481">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3481">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3482">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0X1D) ogiltig visning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3482">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3483">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3483">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3484">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3484">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3485">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3485">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR default_table[32] = { … };

/* Change the color table */
status = gx_display_color_table_set(&my_display, default_table, 32);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the color table has been reassigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3488">gx_display_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3488">gx_display_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3489">Skapa bildskärm</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3489">Create display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3490">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3490">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_create(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_CONST CHAR *name,
    UINT (*display_driver_setup)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3491">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3491">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3492">Den här tjänsten skapar en skärm och anropar installations funktionen för visnings driv rutin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3492">This service creates a display and calls the display driver setup function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3493">GUIX tar den här skärmen och lägger till den i den interna listan över skärmar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3493">GUIX takes this display and adds it to its internal list of displays.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3494">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3494">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3495">**Visa** Pekare som visar kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3495">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3496">**namn** Namn på visningen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3496">**name** Name of the display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3497">**display_driver_setup** Pekare för att Visa installations funktionen för driv rutiner</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3497">**display_driver_setup** Pointer to display driver setup function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3498">**optional_driver_info** Pekare till valfri driv rutins information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3498">**optional_driver_info** Pointer to optional driver information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3499">**color_format** Färg format, enligt definitionen i **bilaga C**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3499">**color_format** Color format, as defined in **Appendix C**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3500">**Bredd** Antal bild punkter på x-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3500">**width** Number of pixels on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3501">**höjd** Antal bild punkter på y-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3501">**height** Number of pixels on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3502">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3502">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3503">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades Visa skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3503">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful display create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3504">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) Det gick inte att konfigurera visning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3504">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) Fail to setup display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3505">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3505">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3506">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3506">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3507">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X23) ogiltig storlek för visnings kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3507">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x23) Invalid display control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3508">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3508">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3509">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3509">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3510">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3510">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DISPLAY my_display;

UINT my_driver_setup_callback(GX_DISPLAY *display)
{
    …
}

/* Create screen “my_display”. */
status = gx_display_create(&my_display, “my display”,
    my_driver_setup_callback, 320, 480);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the screen “my_display” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3513">gx_display_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3513">gx_display_delete</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3514">Förstör visning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3514">Destroy display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3515">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3515">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_delete(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    VOID (*display_driver_cleanup)(GX_DISPLAY *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3516">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3516">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3517">Den här tjänsten stänger av en visning och rensar allokerade resurser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3517">This service shuts down a display, and cleans up allocated resources.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3518">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3518">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3519">**Visa** Pekare som visar kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3519">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3520">**display_driver_cleanup** Pekare som visar rensnings funktionen för driv rutiner</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3520">**display_driver_cleanup** Pointer to display driver cleanup function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3521">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3521">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3522">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) visnings borttagning har slutförts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3522">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful display delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3523">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) skapade visnings listan är null</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3523">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Created display list is NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3524">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3524">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3525">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3525">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3526">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3526">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3527">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3527">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3528">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3528">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID driver_cleanup_callback(GX_DISPLAY *display)
{
    …
}

/* Delete a display “my_display”. */
status = gx_display_delete(&my_display, driver_cleanup_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen “my_display” has been destroyed. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_font_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3538">gx_display_font_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3538">gx_display_font_table_set</span></span>
