```C
UINT gx_display_font_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_FONT **font_table, 
    INT table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3541">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3541">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3542">Den här tjänsten tilldelar om teckensnitts tabellen som ska användas av visningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3542">This service re-assigns the font table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3543">Den här tjänsten anropas vanligt vis av den genererade visnings konfigurations funktionen i GUIX Studio, men kan också anropas av program varan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3543">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3544">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3544">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3545">**Visa** Pekare som visar kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3545">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3546">**font_table** Matris med GX_FONT pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3546">**font_table** Array of GX_FONT pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3547">**table_size** Antal teckensnitt i tabellen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3547">**table_size** Number of fonts in table</span></span>

```C
    GX_CHAR **table,

    UINT *string_table_size);
```

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3563">Den här tjänsten hämtar språk tabellen från den angivna visningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3563">This service retrieves the language table from the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3564">Den här tjänsten kan användas av ett program för att ändra visnings språk tabellen, vid körning, med dynamiskt definierade strängar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3564">This service can be used by an application to modify the display language table, at runtime, using dynamically defined strings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3725">Den här tjänsten hämtar den sträng tabell som är kopplad till det aktiva språket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3725">This service retrieves the string table associated with the active language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3726">Den här tjänsten används inte ofta, men den tillhandahålls för att vara fullständig för de program som kan behöva göra körnings ändringar i sträng tabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3726">This service is not frequently used, but is provided for completeness for those applications that might need to make runtime modifications to the string table.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_string_table_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3744">gx_display_string_table_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3744">gx_display_string_table_get_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3745">Hämta den aktiva sträng tabellen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3745">Retrieve the active string table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3746">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3746">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_string_table_get(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_UBYTE language, 
    GX_STRING **table, 
    UINT *table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3747">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3747">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3748">Den här tjänsten hämtar den sträng tabell som är kopplad till det aktiva språket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3748">This service retrieves the string table associated with the active language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3749">Den här tjänsten används inte ofta, men den tillhandahålls för att vara fullständig för de program som kan behöva göra körnings ändringar i sträng tabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3749">This service is not frequently used, but is provided for completeness for those applications that might need to make runtime modifications to the string table.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3750">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3750">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3751">**Visa** Pekare som visar kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3751">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3752">**språk** Tabell kolumn som ska hämtas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3752">**language** Table column to retrieve.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3753">**tabell** Adress till variabel att returnera pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3753">**table** Address of variable to return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3754">**table_size** Variabel adress att returnera tabell storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3754">**table_size** Address of variable to return table size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3755">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3755">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3756">En teckensnitts tabell uppsättning har **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3756">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3757">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3757">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3758">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0X09) ogiltigt språk index</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3758">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Invalid language index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3759">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3759">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3760">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3760">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3761">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3761">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3762">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3762">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING *string_table;
UINT table_size;

/* Retrieve string table */
status = gx_display_string_table_get_ext(&my_display,
    LANGUAGE_ENGLISH, &string_table, &table_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string table has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_theme_install"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3767">gx_display_theme_install</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3767">gx_display_theme_install</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3768">Installera teman på den angivna visningen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3768">Install themes to the specified display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3769">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3769">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_theme_install(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_THEME *theme_table);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3770">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3770">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3771">Den här tjänsten installerar teman på den angivna visningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3771">This service install themes to the specified display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3772">Den här tjänsten anropas vanligt vis av den Studio-genererade visnings konfigurations funktionen, men kan också anropas av program varan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3772">This service is normally invoked by the Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3773">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3773">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3774">**Visa** Pekare som visar kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3774">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3775">**theme_table** Tema tabell som ska installeras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3775">**theme_table** Theme table to be installed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3776">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3776">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3777">Tema tabellen har installerats för **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3777">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully installed theme table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3778">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3778">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3779">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig tema tabell pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3779">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid theme table pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3780">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0X1D) ogiltig visning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3780">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3781">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3781">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3782">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3782">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3783">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3783">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_THEME theme_1;

&theme_table[1] = {
    &theme_1,
    …
}

/* Define resource tables. */
GX_COLOR color_table[32] = {…};
GX_FONT *font_table[32] = {…};
GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap_table[32] = { … };

/* Define scroll appearance. */
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE scroll_appearance;

memset(&scroll_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
scroll appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style =
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

theme_1.theme_color_table = color_table;
theme_1.theme_font_table = font_table;
theme_1.theme_pixlemap_table = pixelmap_table;
theme_1.theme_palette = GX_NULL;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scroll_style = GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scroll_style =
    GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_color_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_font_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_pixelmap_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_palette_size = 0;

/* Install theme table. */
status = gx_display_theme_install(&my_display, theme_table);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the theme table has been installed. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3784">Se även</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3784">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_drop_list_close"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3788">gx_drop_list_close</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3788">gx_drop_list_close</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3789">Stänga en drop List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3789">Close a drop list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3790">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3790">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_close(GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3791">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3791">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3792">Den här tjänsten stänger popup-listan för den angivna Drop-listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3792">This service closes the popup list of the specified drop list.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3795">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3795">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3796">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) stängde Drop List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3796">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful closed the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3797">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3797">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3798">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3798">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3799">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3799">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3800">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3800">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3801">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3801">Example</span></span>

```C

status = gx_drop_list_close(&drop_list);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the drop list is closed. */
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3807">gx_drop_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3807">gx_drop_list_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3808">Skapa en drop List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3808">Create a drop list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3809">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3809">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_create(
    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list, 
    GX_CONST
    GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, 
    INT open_height,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *, 
    GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT drop_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3810">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3810">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3811">Den här tjänsten skapar en drop-lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3811">This service creates a drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3812">En drop List är en kombination av widgeten Drop list och en lodrät lista med popup-fönster som visas när den nedrullningsbara listan öppnas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3812">A drop list is a combination of the drop list widget, and a popup vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3813">Den lodräta List rutan skapas automatiskt när widgeten för List rutan skapas och visas eller döljs när widgeten för List menyn öppnas eller stängs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3813">The popup vertical list is created automatically when the drop-list widget is created, and displayed or hidden when the drop-list widget is opened or closed, respectively.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3814">Widgeten Drop List stöder två associerade pixelmaps.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3814">The drop list widget supports two associated pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3815">Det första, som beskrivs som "lista Skriv bords underlägg" i egenskapsvyn för Studio är det valfria Skriv bords Pixelmap som visas som bakgrund i den lodräta listan som visas när widgeten List List öppnas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3815">The first, described as “List Wallpaper” in the Studio properties view, is the optional wallpaper pixelmap that is displayed as the background of the vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3816">Den andra Pixelmap, som beskrivs som "bakgrunds bild" i vyn Studio egenskaper, är en valfri bild som visas som bakgrund i själva List listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3816">The second pixelmap, described as the “Background Image” in the Studio properties view, is an optional image displayed as the background of the drop-list itself.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3817">En widget för List List kan ha (men måste inte ha) en underordnad widget som används för att öppna och stänga Drop-listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3817">A drop-list widget can have (but is not required to have) a child widget that is used to open and close the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3818">Detta är normalt en ikon eller knapp-widget, men även en anpassad widget kan användas som öppen/Close-växel för den överordnade Drop-listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3818">This is customarily an icon or button widget, but even a custom widget could be used as the open/close toggle for the parent drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3819">Den nyckel inställning som gör att den här underordnade widgeten använder list rutan är att denna underordnade widget måste ha det fördefinierade widgets-ID: t ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3819">The key setting which makes this child widget operate the drop list is that this child widget must have the pre-defined widget id ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3820">Så här definierar du en underordnad widget som öppnar och stänger List rutan, firstadd och underordnade widgeten till den nedrullningsbara listan och placerar den underordnade i list rutan som du vill:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3820">To define a child widget which will open and close the drop-list, firstadd and child widget to the drop list, and position this child within the drop list as desired:</span></span>

![Skärm bild av den nedrullningsbara listan.](./media/guix/image6.jpg)

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3822">Använd sedan vyn Studio egenskaper för att tilldela denna underordnade widget ID-värdet ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON, vilket är ett internt definierat ID-värde som identifieras av den överordnade Drop-listan:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3822">Then use the Studio properties view to assign this child widget the ID value ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON, which is an internally defined ID value recognized by the parent drop list:</span></span>

![Skärm bild av vyn Studio-egenskaper.](./media/guix/image7.jpg)

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3824">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3824">Parameters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3825">**drop_list** Pekare till kontroll blocket för List rutan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3825">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3826">**namn** Namn på Drop List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3826">**name** Name of the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3827">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3827">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3828">**total_rows** Totalt antal rader i släpp listan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3828">**total_rows** Total number of rows in the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3829">**open_height** Höjden på den lodräta listan som visas när den nedrullningsbara listan öppnas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3829">**open_height** The height of the vertical list displayed when the drop list is opened.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3830">**motringning** Funktionen anropas av den lodräta listan när listan rullas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3830">**callback** Function called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3831">Mer information hittar du i dokumentationen för GX_VERTICAL_LIST.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3831">Refer to the documentation of GX_VERTICAL_LIST for more information.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3832">**stil** Kant linje formatet för den nedrullningsbara listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3832">**style** The drop-down list border style.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_drop_list_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3849">gx_drop_list_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3849">gx_drop_list_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3850">Händelse för process Drop List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3850">Process drop list event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3851">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3851">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_DROP_LIST *list, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3852">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3852">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3853">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för Drop-listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3853">This service processes an event for the drop list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3854">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3854">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3855">**drop_list** Släpp List widget kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3855">**drop_list** Drop list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3856">**händelse** Pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3856">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3857">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3857">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3858">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) bearbetade händelse för Drop List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3858">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed drop list event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3859">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3859">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3860">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3860">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3861">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3861">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3862">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3862">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3863">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3863">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic drop list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_drop_list_event_process(GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default drop list
            event processing */
        status = gx_drop_list_event_process(drop_list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3893">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3893">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3894">Tilldela en bakgrunds bild till den nedrullningsbara listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3894">Assign a background image to the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3895">Den här Pixelmap används som bakgrund för själva widgeten List meny, och inte för den lodräta List rutan som visas när listan öppnas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3895">This pixelmap is used as the background for the drop list widget itself, and not for the popup vertical list that is displayed when the list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3896">Om du vill tilldela en Pixelmap till popup-menyn för List rutan måste du först anropa gx_drop_list_popup_get för att hämta en pekare till popup-listan och sedan använda gx_window_wallpaper_set () för att tilldela en Pixelmap till den här popup-listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3896">To assign a pixelmap to the drop-list popup, you would need to first call gx_drop_list_popup_get to retrieve a pointer to the popup list, and then use gx_window_wallpaper_set() to assign a pixelmap to this popup list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3897">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3897">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3899">**ID-** resurs-ID till pixlemap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3899">**id** Resource ID to the pixlemap</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3901">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Drop List Pixelmap set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3901">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drop list pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3902">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3902">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3903">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3903">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3904">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) ogiltigt pixlemap-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3904">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid pixlemap ID</span></span>

## <a name="gx_drop_list_popup_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3914">gx_drop_list_popup_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3914">gx_drop_list_popup_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3915">Hämta pekare för att popup-lista lodrätt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3915">Retrieve pointer to popup vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3916">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3916">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_popup_get(
    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST **return_list);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3917">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3917">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3918">En widget för List List består av själva widgeten List List, och en lodrät lista med popup-fönster som visas när widgeten List List öppnas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3918">A drop-list widget is composed of the drop-list widget itself, and a popup vertical list that is shown when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3919">Den här tjänsten hämtar en pekare till den vertikala List komponenten i list rutan, så att programmet kan anropa API-tjänster direkt på den här lodräta listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3919">This service retrieves a pointer to the vertical list component of the drop list, allowing the application to invoke API services directly on this vertical list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3920">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3920">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3921">**drop_list** Pekare till kontroll blocket för List rutan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3921">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3922">**return_list** Pekare till den lodräta listan som lagras i den nedrullningsbara listan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3922">**return_list** Pointer to the vertical list stored in the drop list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3923">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3923">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3924">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har hämtat popup-lodrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3924">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved popup vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3925">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3925">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3926">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3926">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3927">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3927">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3928">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3928">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DROP_LIST drop_list;
GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list;

/* Retrieve the popup list of “drop_list”. */
status = gx_drop_list_popup_get(&drop_list, &vertical_list)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the popup list was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3957">gx_horizontal_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3957">gx_horizontal_list_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3958">Skapa vågrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3958">Create horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3959">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3959">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_create(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *horizontal_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_columns,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *, 
    GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT horizontal_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3960">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3960">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3961">Den här tjänsten skapar en vågrät lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3961">This service creates a horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3962">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3962">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3963">**horizontal_list** Kontroll block för widgeten vågrät List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3963">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3964">**namn** Namn på vågrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3964">**name** Name of horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3965">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3965">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3966">**total_columns** Totalt antal comumns i vågrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3966">**total_columns** Total number of comumns in horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3967">**motringning** Detta är en pekare till en callback-funktion som tillhandahålls av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3967">**callback** This is a pointer to a callback function provided by the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3968">Motringningsfunktionen anropas när den vågräta listan rullas för att skapa de objekt som visas nyligen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3968">The callback function is invoked when the horizontal list is scrolled, to create the newly visible list items.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3969">På så sätt kan den vågräta listan Visa en användardefinierad widget som List objekt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3969">In this way the horizontal list can display any user-defined widget type as the list items.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3970">**stil** Typ av widget för rullnings List.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3970">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3971">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3971">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3972">**horizontal_list_id** Programdefinierat ID för vågrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3972">**horizontal_list_id** Application-defined ID of horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3973">**storlek** Mått i horitzonal-listan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3973">**size** Dimensions of the horitzonal list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3974">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3974">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) skapade den vågräta listan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created the horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3977">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3977">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3978">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3978">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3979">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3979">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3980">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) antal kolumner som inte är giltiga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3980">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Number of columns not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3981">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3981">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3982">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3982">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3983">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3983">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create horizontal list “my_list” with 5 columns. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_create(&my_list, “my_list”, &my_parent,
    5, callback, GX_STYLE_WRAP, MY_LIST_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the horizontal list “my_list” has been created. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3994">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3994">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3995">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3995">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3996">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för den vågräta listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3996">This service processes an event for the horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3997">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3997">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3998">**lista** Kontroll block för widgeten vågrät List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3998">**list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-3999">**händelse** Pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-3999">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4000">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4000">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4002">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4002">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4003">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4003">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4004">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4004">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4005">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4005">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4006">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4006">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic horizontal list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_list_event_process(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default horizontal
        list event processing */
        status =
        gx_horizontal_list_event_process(list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4039">gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4039">gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4040">Hämta markerat indexord från vågrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4040">Get selected entry index from horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4041">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4041">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get(
    GX_horizobntal_LIST *horizontal_list,
    INT *return_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4042">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4042">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4043">Den här tjänsten returnerar den markerade List post indexet för den vågräta listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4043">This service returns the selected list entry index of the horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4044">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4044">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4045">**horizontal_list** Kontroll block för widgeten vågrät List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4045">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4047">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4047">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4048">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades hämta den vågräta List posten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4048">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful obtained the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4049">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4049">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4050">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4050">Allowed From</span></span>


## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_selected_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4061">gx_horizontal_list_selected_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4061">gx_horizontal_list_selected_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4062">Tilldela den markerade posten i en vågrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4062">Assign the selected entry in a horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4063">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4063">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_set(
    GX_HORIZONATAL_LIST *horizontal_list,
    INT index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4064">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4064">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4065">Den här tjänsten tilldelar den valda posten i en vågrät lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4065">This service assigns the selected entry in a horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4066">Om det behövs kommer den vågräta listan att rullas för att göra den markerade posten synlig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4066">If required, the horizontal list will scroll to make the selected entry visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4067">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4067">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4068">**horizontal_list** Kontroll block för widgeten vågrät List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4068">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4069">**index** Indexerad position för ny List post</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4069">**index** Index based position of new list entry</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4070">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4070">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett den vågräta List posten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4072">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) indexet är inte inom ett ogiltigt intervall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4072">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Index is not in invalid range</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4073">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4073">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4074">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4074">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4075">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4075">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4076">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4076">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4077">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4077">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4078">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4078">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the list entry of “my_list” to the child in line 12. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_selected_set(&my_list, 12);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the list entry of “my_list” has been successfully set to 12. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4087">gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4087">gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4088">Hämta vald post från vågrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4088">Get selected entry from horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4089">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4089">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get(
    GX_horizobntal_LIST *horizontal_list,
    GX_WIDGET **return_list_entry);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4090">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4090">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4091">Den här tjänsten returnerar den markerade List posten i den vågräta listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4091">This service returns the selected list entry of the horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4092">Observera att om den vågräta listan har fler rader än underordnade widgetar, och den valda posten har bläddrats från vyn, returnerar detta API GX_NULL eftersom de underordnade widgetarna används igen när List innehållet rullas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4092">Note that if the horizontal list has more rows than child widgets, and the selected entry has been scrolled from view, this API will return GX_NULL because the child widgets are re-used as the list content is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4093">Funktionen gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get returnerar tillförlitligt index för det valda objektet, även om objektet har bläddrats från vyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4093">The gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get function will reliably return the index of the selected item, even if that item has been scrolled from view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4094">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4094">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4095">**horizontal_list** Kontroll block för widgeten vågrät List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4095">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4096">**return_list_entry** Mål för widgeten Return List post</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4096">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4097">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4097">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4098">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades hämta den vågräta List posten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4098">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful obtained the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4099">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) vald widgeten har bläddrats från vyn i en lista med fler rader än klientens underordnade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4099">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Selected widget has been scrolled from view in a list with more rows than client children.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4100">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4100">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4101">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4101">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4102">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4102">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4103">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4103">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4104">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4104">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the list entry at the current index of horizontal list “my_list”. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get(&my_list, &current_list_entry);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_list_entry” contains a pointer to the currently selected widget. */

    
```

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4117">Den här tjänsten tilldelar det totala antalet kolumner som ska visas i den vågräta listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4117">This service assigns the total number of columns to be displayed by the horizontal list.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4125">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) ogiltigt Count-värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4125">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid count value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4126">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4126">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the total colums of “my_list” was successfully set to 20. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4137">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4137">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4138">Skapa vågrät rullnings List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4138">Create horizontal scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4139">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4139">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4140">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4140">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4141">Den här tjänsten skapar en vågrät rullnings List.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4141">This service creates a horizontal scrollbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4142">ID: t för en vågrät rullnings List är fördefinierat (eftersom ett fönster måste veta hur man fångar in händelser från det) och storleken är automatisk (eftersom det måste fylla det överordnade fönstrets klient bredd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4142">The ID for a horizontal scrollbar is pre-defined (because a window has to know how to catch events from it), and the size is automatic (because it has to fill the parent window’s client width).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4143">Om vi beslutar att tillåta rullnings lister för kund områden måste vi lägga till en annan Create-funktion med parametrarna ID och storlek.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4143">If we decide to allow client area scrollbars, we will need to add another create function with the id and size parameters.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4144">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4144">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4145">**rullnings List** Kontroll block för rullnings List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4145">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4146">**namn** Namn på rullnings List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4146">**name** Name of scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4147">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4147">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4148">**utseende** I utseende strukturen definieras utseendet på rullnings listen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4148">**appearance** The appearance structure defines the appearance of the scroll bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4149">Om det här värdet är GX_NULL använder rullnings listen standard rullnings listen som definieras av gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4149">If this value is GX_NULL, the scrollbar will use the default scrollbar appearance defined by gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4150">Se **bilaga i** för definitionen av GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCEs strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4150">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4151">**Stil** Typ av widget för rullnings List.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4151">**Style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4152">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4152">**Appendix D** contains pre- defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4153">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4153">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4154">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) vågrät rullnings List har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4154">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful horizontal scrollbar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4155">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4155">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4156">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4156">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4157">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4157">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4158">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4158">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4159">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4159">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4160">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4160">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4161">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4161">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */
status = gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(&my_scrollbar,
    “my_horizontal_scrollbar”, &my_parent, GX_NULL,
    GX_STYLE_SCROLLBAR_END_BUTTONS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4168">gx_icon_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4168">gx_icon_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4169">Knappen Skapa ikon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4169">Create icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4170">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4170">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_button_create(
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT icon_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4171">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4171">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4172">Den här tjänsten skapar den angivna widgeten knapp ikon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4172">This service creates the specified icon button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4173">GX_ICON_BUTTON härleds från GX_BUTTON och stöder alla gx_button API-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4173">GX_ICON_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4174">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4174">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4175">**knapp** Pekare på knapp kontroll block för ikon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4175">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4176">**namn** Logiskt namn för widgeten ikon knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4176">**name** Logical name of icon button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4177">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4177">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4178">**icon_id** Resurs-ID för ikon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4178">**icon_id** Resource ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4179">**stil** Ikon format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4179">**style** Style of icon.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4180">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4180">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4181">**icon_button_id** Programdefinierat ID för ikon knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4181">**icon_button_id** Application-defined ID of icon button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4182">**storlek** Ikon knappen dimensioner</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4182">**size** Dimensions of icon button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4183">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4183">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4184">Ikon knappen **GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4184">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created icon button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4185">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4185">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4186">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4186">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4187">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4187">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4188">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4188">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4189">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4189">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4190">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4190">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4191">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4191">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_icon_button”. */
status = gx_icon_button_create(&my_icon_button, “my_icon_button”,
    &my_parent,
    MY_ICON_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_ICON_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the icon button “my_icon_button” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4208">gx_icon_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4208">gx_icon_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4209">Knappen Rita en ikon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4209">Draw an icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4210">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4210">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_button_draw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4211">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4211">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4212">Den här tjänsten ritar ikon knappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4212">This service draws the icon button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4213">Den här funktionen kallas vanligt vis internt av GUIX som en del av en uppdaterings åtgärd på arbets ytan, men den exponeras även för det program som kanske vill tillhandahålla en anpassad ritnings funktion och anropa standard knapp ritningen som en anpassad ritnings bas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4213">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4214">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4214">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4215">**knapp** Pekare på knapp kontroll block för ikon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4215">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4216">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4216">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4217">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4217">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4218">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4218">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4219">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4219">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4220">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4220">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_icon_button_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4237">gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4237">gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4238">Ange Pixelmap till widgeten ikon knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4238">Set pixelmap to the icon button widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4239">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4239">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4240">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4240">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4241">Den här tjänsten tilldelar en ny Pixelmap till widgeten ikon knapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4241">This service assigns a new pixelmap to the icon button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4242">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4242">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4243">**knapp** Pekare på knapp kontroll block för ikon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4243">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4244">**icon_id** Resurs-ID för Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4244">**icon_id** Resource ID of pixelmap</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4249">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4249">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_icon_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4268">gx_icon_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4268">gx_icon_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4269">Rita ikon bakgrund</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4269">Draw icon background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4270">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4270">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_background_draw(GX_ICON *icon);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4271">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4271">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4272">Den här tjänsten ritar bakgrund för den angivna widgeten ikon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4272">This service draws background of the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4273">Den här tjänsten kallas vanligt vis internt av funktionen gx_icon_button_draw, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med att skriva anpassade ritnings funktioner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4273">This service is normally called internally by the gx_icon_button_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4274">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4274">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4275">**ikonen** Kontroll block för pekare till Icon-widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4275">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4276">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4276">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4277">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4277">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4278">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4278">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4279">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4279">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4280">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4280">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON *icon)
{
    /* Call icon background draw. */
    gx_icon_background_draw(icon);

    /* Add custom drawing here */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(icon);
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4286">gx_icon_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4286">gx_icon_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4287">Ikonen Skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4287">Create icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4288">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4288">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_create(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT icon_id, 
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4289">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4289">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4290">Den här tjänsten skapar den angivna widgeten ikon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4290">This service creates the specified icon widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4291">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4291">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4292">**ikonen** Pekare mot ikon kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4292">**icon** Pointer to icon control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4293">**namn** Logiskt namn på ikon för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4293">**name** Logical name of icon widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4294">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4294">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4295">**pixelmap_id** Resurs-ID för Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4295">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4296">**stil** Ikon format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4296">**style** Style of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4297">**icon_id** Programdefinierat ID för ikon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4297">**icon_id** Application-defined ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4298">**x** start x-koordinatens position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4298">**x** Starting x-coordinate position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4299">**y** start y-koordinat position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4299">**y** Starting y-coordinate position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4300">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4300">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4301">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ikon som skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4301">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful icon create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4302">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4302">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4303">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4303">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4304">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4304">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4305">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4305">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4306">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4306">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4307">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4307">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4308">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4308">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_icon”. */
status = gx_icon_create(&my_icon, “my_icon”, &my_parent,
    MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_ICON_ID,
    5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the icon “my_icon” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4313">gx_icon_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4313">gx_icon_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4314">Rita-ikonen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4314">Draw icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4315">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4315">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_draw(GX_ICON *icon);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4316">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4316">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4317">Den här tjänsten ritar den angivna widgeten ikon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4317">This service draws the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4318">Den här tjänsten kallas vanligt vis internt av GUIX som en del av en uppdaterings åtgärd på arbets ytan, men den exponeras också för programmet som kanske vill tillhandahålla en anpassad ritnings funktion och anropa standard ikon ritningen som en anpassad ritnings bas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4318">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4319">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4319">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4320">**ikonen** Kontroll block för pekare till Icon-widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4320">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4321">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4321">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4322">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4322">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4323">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4323">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4324">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4324">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4325">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4325">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon drawing function. */

VOID my_icon_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default icon draw. */
    gx_icon_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

```C
    GX_ICON *icon,

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4333">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4333">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4334">Den här tjänsten hanterar händelser som skickas till en GX_ICON widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4334">This service handles events sent to a GX_ICON widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4335">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4335">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4336">**ikonen** Kontroll block för pekare till Icon-widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4336">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

## <a name="gx_icon_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4349">gx_icon_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4349">gx_icon_pixelmap_set</span></span>
