- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4360">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4360">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4361">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4361">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_image_reader_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4369">gx_image_reader_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4369">gx_image_reader_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4370">Skapa en instans av image Reader-modul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4370">Create image reader module instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4371">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4371">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_create(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader,
    GX_CONST GX_UBYTE *data, 
    INT data_size,
    GX_UBYTE color_format, 
    GX_UBYTE mode);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4372">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4372">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4373">Den här funktionen skapar en RAW-avbildnings läsare/avkodare för körning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4373">This function creates a runtime raw image reader / decoder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4374">För närvarande stöds endast bild typerna JPEG och PNG RAW.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4374">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4375">Den här tjänsten kräver att GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT definieras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4375">This service requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4376">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4376">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4377">**image_reader** Bild läsarens kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4377">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4378">**data** Pekare till rå data i indata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4378">**data** Pointer to raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4379">**data_size** Storlek på rå indata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4379">**data_size** Size of raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4380">**color_format** Formatet för den begärda utmatnings färgen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4380">**color_format** The requested output color format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4381">**läge** Flaggorna komprimera, rastrering och alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4381">**mode** Compress, dither and alpha modes flags.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4382">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4382">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4383">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) bild läsaren har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4383">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image reader create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4384">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4384">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4385">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) ogiltig data storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4385">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid data size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4386">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4386">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4387">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4387">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4388">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4388">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;

“color format” could be set to:
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_24RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_565RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_8BIT_PALETTE

/* Create image reader “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_create(&my_image_reader, decoder_data,
    decoder_data_size,
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB,
    GX_IMAGE_READER_MODE_COMPRESS)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_image_reader” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_palette_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4392">gx_image_reader_palette_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4392">gx_image_reader_palette_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4396">Den här tjänsten ställer in paletten för bild läsar kontroll block.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4396">This service sets palette for image reader control block.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4397">Den här tjänsten kräver att GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT definieras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4397">This service requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4400">**PAL** Pekare till Palette</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4400">**pal** Pointer to palette</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4401">**palsize** Storleken på paletten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4401">**palsize** The size of the palette</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4404">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4404">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4405">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) ogiltig palett storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4405">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid palette size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4406">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4406">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_image_reader_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4412">gx_image_reader_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4412">gx_image_reader_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4413">Starta dekomprimerings-och konverterings processen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4413">Start the decompress and conversion process</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4414">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4414">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_start(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *outmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4415">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4415">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4416">Den här tjänsten avkodar en RAW-avbildning till ett angivet färg format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4416">This service decodes a raw image to a specified color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4417">För närvarande stöds endast bild typerna JPEG och PNG RAW.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4417">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4418">Detta kräver att GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT definieras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4418">This requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4419">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4420">**image_reader** Bild läsarens kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4420">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4421">**Pixelmap** Utgående Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4421">**pixelmap** Output pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4422">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4422">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4423">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) bild avkodning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4423">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image decoding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4424">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) allokerat minne har inte definierats eller så misslyckades minnes tilldelningen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4424">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4425">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) inmatnings avbildnings typ eller utmatnings färg format stöds inte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4425">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Input image type or output color format is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4428">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4428">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4429">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4429">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4430">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4430">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;
GX_PIXELMAP output_map;

/* Create my_image_reader here. */

/* Decoding a raw image according to the settings of “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_start(&my_image_reader, output_map)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “output_map” have been loaded with the requested pixelmap. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4437">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4437">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4438">Den här tjänsten ritar x-och y-axeln i ett linje diagram.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4438">This service draws the x,y axis of a line chart.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4439">Axel färgerna och linje bredds parametrarna hämtas från linje diagrammets informations struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4439">The axis colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4440">Den här tjänsten kallas vanligt vis internt av funktionen gx_line_chart_draw, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med att skriva anpassade ritnings funktioner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4440">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4442">**diagram** Linje diagram kontroll block.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4442">**chart** Line chart control block.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4447">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4447">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Draw the data line */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4457">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4457">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4458">Den här tjänsten skapar ett linje diagram fönster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4458">This service creates a line chart window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4459">Diagrammets ritnings parametrar och diagram data skickas via GX_LINE_CHART_INFO-strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4459">The chart drawing parameters and chart data are passed in via the GX_LINE_CHART_INFO structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4460">GX_LINE_CHART baseras på GX_WINDOW och stöder alla GX_WINDOW-API: er.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4460">GX_LINE_CHART is based on GX_WINDOW, and supports all of the GX_WINDOW APIs.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4461">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4461">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4462">**diagram** Pekar på GX_LINE_CHART kontroll blocket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4462">**chart** Pointer to the GX_LINE_CHART control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4463">**namn** Valfritt linje diagram namn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4463">**name** Optional line chart name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4464">**överordnad** Överordnad widget eller GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4464">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4465">**information** Struktur som definierar ritnings parametrar för linje diagrammet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4465">**info** Structure defining line chart drawing parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4466">**Bilaga i** innehåller en definition för GX_LINE_CHART_INFO-strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4466">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LINE_CHART_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4467">**stil** Format flaggor för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4467">**style** Widget style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4468">**chart_id** Diagrammets logiska ID-värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4468">**chart_id** Chart logical ID value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4469">**storlek** Rektangel för kant linje för diagram fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4469">**size** Chart window bounding rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4470">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4470">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckat linje diagram skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful line chart create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4474">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4474">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4475">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4475">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4476">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4476">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4477">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4477">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4478">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4478">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create a line chart */
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
GX_RECTANGLE chart_size;
GX_LINE_CHART_INFO gx_chart_info;
GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window;

chart_size = root_window->gx_widget_size;

/* Initialize params for the GUIX base chart. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_min_val = DATA_MIN_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_val = DATA_MAX_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_data_count = MAX_DATA_COUNT;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_active_data_count = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_line_width = AXIS_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data_line_width = DATA_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data = chart_data;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_line_color = GX_COLOR_ID_DATA_LINE;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_color = GX_COLOR_ID_AXIS_LINE;

/* Leave room for labels on bottom and right. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_left_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_top_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_right_margin = 80;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_bottom_margin = 32;

status = gx_line_chart_create(&chart, “Line Chart”, root_window,
    &gx_chart_info, GX_STYLE_NONE, &chart_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “chart” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4543">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4543">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4544">Beräkna skalnings värde för y-axel på den fasta punkten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4544">Calculate fixed-point y axis scaling value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4545">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4545">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate(
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart,
    INT *return_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4546">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4546">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4547">Den här tjänsten beräknar skalning svärdet för den fasta punkten som används för att rita data värden på diagrammets Y-axel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4547">This service calculates the fixed-point scaling value used to plot data values on the chart Y axis.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4548">Chart_info parametrar och diagram markerings ram används för att beräkna det här skalning svärdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4548">The chart_info parameters and chart bounding rectangle are used to calculate this scaling value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4549">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4549">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4550">**diagram** Linje diagram kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4550">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4551">**return_val** Adress till värdet som ska innehålla det fasta punkt returvärdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4551">**return_val** Address of value to hold fixed-point return value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4552">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4552">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4553">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) beräkning av värde för slutförd y-skalning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4553">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful y scale value calculate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4555">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4555">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
INT y_scale;

/* Caluclate y scale value of “chart”. */
status = gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate(&chart, &y_scale);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, y scale value of “chart” has been calculated. */
```

## <a name="gx_menu_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4563">gx_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4563">gx_menu_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4564">Skapa en meny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4564">Create a menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4565">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4565">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_create(
    GX_MENU *menu,GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT menu_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4566">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4566">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4567">Den här tjänsten skapar en meny som anges och associerar menyn med den angivna överordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4567">This service creates a menu as specified and associates the menu with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4568">Den accepterar alla typer av widget som underordnat meny alternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4568">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4569">Om du vill infoga en widget som ett underordnat meny objekt, anropa **gx_menu_insert**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4569">To insert a widget as a child menu item, call **gx_menu_insert**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4570">GX_MENU härleds från GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT och stöder alla gx_pixelmap_prompt API-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4570">GX_MENU is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4571">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4571">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4572">**meny** Pekare till Meny kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4572">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4573">**namn** Namnet på menyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4573">**name** Name of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4574">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4574">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4575">**text_id** Resurs-ID för text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4575">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4576">**fill_id** Resurs-ID för fyllning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4576">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4577">**stil** Widgetens format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4577">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4578">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-speciella format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4578">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4579">**menu_id** Programdefinierat ID för menyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4579">**menu_id** Application-defined ID of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4580">**storlek** Storlek på menyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4580">**size** Size of the menu</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4581">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4581">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4582">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad meny skapande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4582">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4583">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4583">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4584">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4584">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4585">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4585">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4586">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4586">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4587">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4587">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4588">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4588">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4589">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4589">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MENU my_menu;

/* Create “my_menu”. */
status = gx_menu_create(&my_menu, “my_menu”, parent, MY_TEXT_ID,
    MY_FILL_ID, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, MY_MENU_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the menu was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_menu_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4601">gx_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4601">gx_menu_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4602">Rita-menyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4602">Draw menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4603">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4603">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4604">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4604">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4605">Den här tjänsten ritar den angivna menyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4605">This service draws the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4606">Den här funktionen anropas vanligt vis internt av GUIX-funktionen för arbets ytans uppdatering, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med att implementera anpassade ritnings funktioner för anpassade meny-widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4606">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4607">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4607">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4608">**meny** Pekare till Meny kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4608">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4609">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4609">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4610">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4610">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4611">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4611">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4612">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4612">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4613">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4613">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu draw. */
    gx_menu_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4626">Händelse för process-menyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4626">Process menu event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4627">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4627">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4628">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4628">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4629">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för den angivna menyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4629">This service processes an event for the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4630">Den här tjänsten ska anropas som standard händelse hanterare av en anpassad meny händelse bearbetnings funktioner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4630">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom menu event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4631">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4631">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4632">**meny** Pekare till Meny kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4632">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4633">**event_ptr** Pekare till händelsen att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4633">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4634">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4634">Return Values</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4639">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4639">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4640">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4640">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4641">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4641">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_menu_event_process(GX_MENU *menu, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */

        /* Call default event process if this is a system event such as GX_EVENT_SHOW. */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default menu
           event processing */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```

## <a name="gx_menu_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4701">gx_menu_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4701">gx_menu_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4702">Text i Draw-menyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4702">Draw menu text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4703">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4703">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_menu_text_draw(GX_MENU *menu);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4704">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4705">Den här tjänsten ritar texten på en meny.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4705">This service draws the text of a menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4706">Den här funktionen anropas vanligt vis internt av GUIX-funktionen för arbets ytans uppdatering, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med att implementera anpassade ritnings funktioner för anpassade meny-widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4706">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4707">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4708">**meny** Pekare till Meny kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4708">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4709">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4709">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4710">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4710">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4711">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4711">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4712">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4712">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4713">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4713">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu background draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_background_draw(
                            (GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *)menu);

    /* Draw menu text. */
    gx_menu_text_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4752">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4752">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4753">Text knappen Skapa flerradig linje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4753">Create multi line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4754">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4754">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4755">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4755">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4756">Den här tjänsten skapar en widget för text knappar med flera rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4756">This service creates a multi-line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4757">En flerradig text knapp visar knapp texten över 1-n rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4757">A multi-line text button displays the button text over 1-n lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4758">Det maximala antalet rader definieras av konstant GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, vilket är standardvärdet 4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4758">The maximum number of lines is defined by the constant GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, which defaults to 4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4759">Rad brytningarna anges genom vagn retur och/eller vagn retur + rad matpar i text strängen som har tilldelats till text-knappen med flera rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4759">The line breaks are set by carriage return and/or carriage return + line feed pairs within the text string assigned to the multi-line text button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4760">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON härleds från GX_TEXT_BUTTON och stöder alla gx_text_button API-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4760">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON and supports all gx_text_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4761">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4761">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4762">**text_button** Pekare till kontroll block för text knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4762">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4763">**namn** Text knappens logiska namn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4763">**name** Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4764">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget för knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4764">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4765">**text_id** Resurs-ID för text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4765">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4766">**stil** Text knapp format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4766">**style** Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4767">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4767">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4768">**text_button_id** Programdefinierat ID för text knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4768">**text_button_id** Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4769">**storlek** Knappens storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4769">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4770">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4770">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) text knappen har skapats med flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4774">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4774">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4775">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4775">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4776">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4776">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4777">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4777">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4778">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4778">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi-line text button “my_text_button” was created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4786">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4786">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4787">Knapp för att rita flerradig text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4787">Draw multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4788">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4788">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4789">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4789">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4790">Den här tjänsten ritar text knappen med flera rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4790">This service draws the multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4791">Den här funktionen kallas vanligt vis internt av GUIX som en del av en uppdaterings åtgärd på arbets ytan, men den exponeras även för det program som kanske vill tillhandahålla en anpassad ritnings funktion och anropa standardvärdet för multi-line text-knappen som en anpassad ritnings bas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4791">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default multi-line text button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4792">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4792">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4793">**knapp** Pekare till kontroll block för text knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4793">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4794">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4794">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4795">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4795">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4796">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4796">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4797">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4797">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4798">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4798">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw the text button “my_text_button”. */
void MyButtonDraw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(&my_text_button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4806">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4806">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4807">Standard händelse hantering för text knappar med flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4807">Default event handling for multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4808">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4808">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4809">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4809">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4810">Den här tjänsten är standard funktionen för händelse hantering för widgeten text knapp i flera rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4810">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4811">Den här funktionen görs tillgänglig för program som vill tillhandahålla anpassad händelse hantering för widgeten text knapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4811">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a text button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4812">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4812">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4813">**knapp** Pekare till kontroll block för text knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4813">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4814">**event_ptr** Händelse som ska bearbetas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4814">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4815">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4815">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4816">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har hanterat händelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4816">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4817">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4817">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4818">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4818">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4819">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4819">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4820">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4820">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4821">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4821">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        /* add custom actions here */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4829">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4829">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4830">Stöd för ritnings funktion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4830">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4831">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4831">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4832">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4832">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4833">Den här stöd funktionen ritar text delen av en flerradig text-knapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4833">This support function draws the text portion of a multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4834">Den här funktionen anropas internt av gx_multi_line_text_button_draw (), och tillhandahålls som en separat API som bekvämlighet för program som definierar en anpassad ritnings funktion för flerradig text.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4834">This function is called internally by gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom multi-line text button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4835">Program som vill anpassa knappens bakgrunds ritning kan ge sin anpassade ritnings funktion och anropa multi_line_text_button_text_draw-tjänsten som en del av den anpassade ritningen för att rita knapp texten över bakgrunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4835">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the multi_line_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4836">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4836">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4837">**text_button** Pekare till kontroll block för text knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4837">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4839">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4839">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4842">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4842">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* insert code here to draw button background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4853">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4853">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4854">Den här tjänsten anger angivet sträng resurs-ID till text knappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4854">This service sets the specified string resource ID to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4855">Strängen får innehålla tecken för ny rad som fungerar för att visa texten på flera rader i knapp fältet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4855">The string may contain newline characters which act to display the text on multiple lines within the button area.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4857">**text_button** Pekare till kontroll block för text knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4857">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4858">**string_id** Resurs-ID för strängen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4858">**string_id** Resource ID of the string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4859">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4859">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4861">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4861">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4862">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4862">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4863">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4863">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4873">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4873">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4874">Tilldela text knappen text (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4874">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4875">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4875">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_button_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4876">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4876">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4877">Den här tjänsten är föråldrad till förmån för gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4877">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4878">Den här tjänsten tilldelar den angivna strängen till text knappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4878">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4879">Om widgeten text_button skapades med Style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY skapar widgeten en privat kopia av den tilldelade text strängen och därför måste gx_system_memmory_allocate_set-API: et anropas en gång innan tjänsten begärs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4879">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4880">Om GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY inte är aktivt gör widgeten ingen privat kopia av den inkommande strängen, och därför måste strängen vara statiskt eller globalt allokerad, dvs. det får inte vara en automatisk eller tillfällig variabel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4880">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4881">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4881">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4882">**text_button** Pekare till kontroll block för text knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4882">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4883">**text** pekare till den null-avslutade strängen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4883">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4884">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4884">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4885">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett texten till knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4885">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4887">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4887">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4888">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) allokerat minne har inte definierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4888">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4889">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) ogiltig sträng längd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4889">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4890">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4890">Allowed From</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4903">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4903">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4904">Den här tjänsten tilldelar den angivna strängen till text knappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4904">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4905">Om widgeten text_button skapades med Style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY skapar widgeten en privat kopia av den tilldelade text strängen och därför måste gx_system_memmory_allocate_set-API: et anropas en gång innan tjänsten begärs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4905">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4906">Om GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY inte är aktivt gör widgeten ingen privat kopia av den inkommande strängen, och därför måste strängen vara statiskt eller globalt allokerad, dvs. det får inte vara en automatisk eller tillfällig variabel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4906">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4907">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4907">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4913">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4913">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4914">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) allokerat minne har inte definierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4914">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4915">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) ogiltig sträng längd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4915">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4916">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4916">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4924">gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4924">gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4926">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4926">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4927">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4927">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4928">Den här tjänsten tar bort det här meddelandet innan text markörens position i flera rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4928">This service deletes the character before multi line text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4929">Den här tjänsten kallas internt när en nyckel för Backsteg-händelsen tas emot, men kan också anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4929">This service is called internally when a backspace key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-4930">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-4930">Parameters</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5017">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5017">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5018">Hämtar information om buffer för text indata-widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5018">Retrieves buffer information of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5019">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5019">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    GX_CHAR **buffer_address,
    UINT *content_size, 
    UINT *buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5020">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5020">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5021">Den här tjänsten hämtar buffertstorleken för en widget för text indata i flera rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5021">This service retrieves buffer information of a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5022">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5022">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5023">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för textinspelning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5023">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5024">**buffer_address** Adressen för indatabufferten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5024">**buffer_address** The address of the input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5025">**content_size** Antalet byte för indata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5025">**content_size** The byte count of the input data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5026">**buffer_size** Storleken på indatabufferten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5026">**buffer_size** The size of the input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5027">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5027">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5028">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad text hämtning med flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5028">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5030">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5030">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *buffer_address;
UINT context_size;
UINT buffer_size;

/* Retrieves buffer information of “my_text_input” widget. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get(&my_text_input,
    &buffer_address, &string_size,
    &buffer_size);

```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5065">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5065">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5066">Infoga en tecken sträng vid aktuell markör position för text i flera rader (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5066">Insert a character string at current multi line text input cursor position (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5067">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5067">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5068">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5068">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5069">Detta API är föråldrat och ersätts av gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5069">This API is deprecated and replaced by gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5070">Den här tjänsten infogar en tecken sträng i bufferten för text indata i flera rader vid den aktuella pekar positionen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5070">This service inserts a character string into the multi line text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5071">Den här tjänsten kallas internt när en specifik nyckel händelsen tas emot, men kan också anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5071">This service is called internally when specific key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5072">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5072">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5073">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för textinspelning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5073">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5074">**insert_str** Tecken sträng i UTF-8-format som ska infogas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5074">**insert_str** UTF-8 format character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5075">**insert_size** Antal byte som ska infogas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5075">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5076">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5076">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5077">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har infogat tecken strängen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5077">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5078">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5078">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5079">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5079">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5080">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5080">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5081">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) ogiltig sträng storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5081">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid string size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5082">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) ogiltigt tecken eller är i storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5082">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or out of buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5083">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5083">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5084">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5084">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5085">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5085">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */
GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(&my_text_input,
    insert_text,
    GX_STRLEN(insert_text));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input widget has successfully insert the string. */
```

```C
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5100">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5100">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5101">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5101">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

```C

GX_STRING string;

string.gx_string_ptr = insert_text;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(insert_text);

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext(&my_text_input, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input widget has successfully inserted the string. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5139">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5139">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5140">Skapa text indata från flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5140">Create multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5141">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5141">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    ULONG style, USHORT text_input_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5142">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5142">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5143">Den här tjänsten skapar en widget för text indata i flera rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5143">This service creates a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5144">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT härleds från GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW och stöder alla gx_multi_line_text_view-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5144">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW and supports all gx_multi_line_text_view services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5145">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5145">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5146">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för textinspelning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5146">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5147">**namn** Namn på widgeten text inspelning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5147">**name** Name of text input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5148">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5148">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5149">**input_buffer** Pekare till text-indatabufferten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5149">**input_buffer** Pointer to text input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5150">**buffer_size** Storlek på buffert för text ingång i byte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5150">**buffer_size** Size of text input buffer in bytes</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5151">**stil** Typ av widget för text inflöde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5151">**style** Style of text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5152">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5152">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5153">**text_input_id** Programdefinierat ID för text inmatare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5153">**text_input_id** Application-defined ID of text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5154">**storlek** Mått för widgeten text inflöde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5154">**size** Dimensions of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5155">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5155">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5156">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) data skapande av multi-line text har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5156">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5157">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5157">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5158">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5158">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5159">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5159">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5160">Den överordnade widgeten **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5160">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5161">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5161">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5162">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5162">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5163">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5163">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5164">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5164">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
GX_CHAR my_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 100, 200);

/* Create multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
    “my_text_input”, &my_parent,
    my_buffer, 100, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_INPUT_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input “my_text_input” has been created. */
```
