## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5196">gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5196">gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5197">Hämta text markör position för flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5197">Retrieve multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5198">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5198">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_POINT cursor_pos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5199">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5199">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5200">Den här tjänsten hämtar markörens position för mult text.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5200">This service retrieves the mult-line text input cursor position.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5201">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5201">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5202">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för textinspelning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5202">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5203">**cursor_pos** Markör position har hämtats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5203">**cursor_pos** Retrieved cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5204">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5204">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5205">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har hämtat markörens position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5205">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved cursor position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5206">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5206">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5207">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5207">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5208">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5208">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5209">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5209">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5210">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5210">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve the cursor position of “my_text_input”. */
GX_POINT cursor_pos;
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get(&my_text_input,
    &cursor_pos);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor position has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5243">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5243">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5244">Ta bort specialtecknet i text markörens position med flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5244">Delete the character at the multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5245">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5245">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_delete(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5246">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5246">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5247">Den här tjänsten tar bort specialtecknet efter text markörens position i flera rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5247">This service deletes the character after the multi line text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5248">Den här tjänsten anropas internt när händelsen ta bort nyckel tas emot, men kan också anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5248">This service is called internally when a delete key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5249">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5249">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5250">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för textinspelning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5250">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5251">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5251">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5252">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) tog bort ett blank steg efter markören</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5252">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully delete a character after the cursor</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5253">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5253">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5254">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5254">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5255">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5255">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5256">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) ogiltigt teckensnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5256">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5257">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5257">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5258">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5258">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5259">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5259">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Delete the character after the cursor of “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_delete(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the character after the cursor has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5291">gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5291">gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5292">Flytta markören för text indata från flera rader till nästa rad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5292">Move the multi line text input cursor to the next line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5293">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5293">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5294">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5294">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5295">Den här tjänsten placerar markören för text indata i flera rader till nästa rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5295">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the next line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5296">Den här tjänsten anropas internt när en NEDPIL-händelse tas emot, men kan också anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5296">This service is called internally when a down arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5297">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5297">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5298">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för textinspelning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5298">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5299">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5299">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5300">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har flyttat text ingångs markören till nästa rad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5300">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved text input cursor to the next line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5301">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5301">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5302">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5302">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5303">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5303">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5304">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) ogiltig tecken-eller radhöjd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5304">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or line height</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5305">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5305">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5306">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5306">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5307">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5307">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to the next line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, text text input cursor has been moved to the next line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_end"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5339">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5339">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5340">Flytta text indata-markören för flera rader till slutet av den aktuella raden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5340">Move the multi line text input cursor to the end of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5341">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5341">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_end(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5342">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5342">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5343">Den här tjänsten placerar widgeten text för text indata i slutet av den aktuella sträng raden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5343">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the end of the current string line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5344">Den här tjänsten anropas internt när en end Key Down-händelse tas emot, men kan också anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5344">This service is called internally when an end key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5345">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5345">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5346">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för textinspelning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5346">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5347">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5347">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5348">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har flyttat text ingångs markören till slutet av den aktuella raden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5348">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved text input cursor to end of the current line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5349">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5349">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5350">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5350">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5351">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5351">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5352">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5352">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5353">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5353">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5354">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5354">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to the end of current line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_end(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi line text input cursor has been moved to the end of the current line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5386">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5386">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5387">Standard händelse hantering för text indata från flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5387">Default event handling for multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5388">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5388">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5389">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5389">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5390">Den här tjänsten är standard funktionen för händelse hantering för widgeten text indata i flera rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5390">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5391">Den här funktionen är tillgänglig för program som vill tillhandahålla anpassad händelse hantering för widgeten text indata i flera rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5391">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a multi line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5392">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5392">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5393">**knapp** Pekare till kontroll block för text indata i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5393">**button** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5394">**event_ptr** Händelse som ska bearbetas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5394">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5395">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5395">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5396">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har hanterat händelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5396">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5397">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5397">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5398">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5398">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5399">Den överordnade widgeten **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5399">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5400">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5400">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5401">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5401">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5402">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5402">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic multi line text
            input event processing */
        gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(input, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5434">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5434">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5435">Ange bakgrunds färg för text i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5435">Set multi line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5436">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5436">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5437">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5437">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5438">Den här tjänsten tilldelar fyllnings färger för widgeten text indata i flera rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5438">This service assigns fill colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5439">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5439">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5440">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för textinspelning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5440">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5441">**normal_fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för den normala fyllnings färgen som används i normalt läge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5441">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal fill color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5442">**selected_fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för den valda fyllnings färgen som användes när widgeten får fokus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5442">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the selected fill color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5443">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för den inaktiverade fyllnings färgen som användes när GX_STYLE_ENABLED inte är aktiv</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5443">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled fill color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5444">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för den skrivskyddade fyllnings färgen som användes när både GX_STYLE_ENABLED och GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY är aktiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5444">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the read only fill color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY are active.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5445">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5445">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5446">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett färger för multi-line text-indata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5446">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5447">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5447">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5448">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5448">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5449">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5449">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5450">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5450">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5451">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5451">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5483">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5483">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5484">Flytta text inmatade markören till början av den aktuella raden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5484">Move the text input cursor to the start of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5485">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5485">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_home(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5486">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5486">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5487">Den här tjänsten flyttar markörens position för text insättning till början av den aktuella raden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5487">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the current line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5488">Den här tjänsten anropas internt när en händelse för start nyckel tas emot, men kan också anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5488">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5489">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5489">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5490">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för textinspelning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5490">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5491">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5491">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5492">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har flyttat markören till början av den aktuella raden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5492">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to start of the current line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5493">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5493">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5495">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5495">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5496">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5496">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5497">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5497">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5498">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5498">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor to the start of the current line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_home(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor has been moved to the start of the current line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5530">gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5530">gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5531">Flytta text indata från flera rader ett tecken till vänster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5531">Move multi line text input cursor one character to the left</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5532">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5532">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5533">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5533">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5534">Med den här tjänsten flyttas text indata för flera rader ett tecken till vänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5534">This service moves the multi line text input cursor one character to the left.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5535">Den här tjänsten anropas internt när en vänster Key Down-händelse tas emot, men kan också anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5535">This service is called internally when a left key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5536">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5536">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5537">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för text insignal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5537">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5538">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5538">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5539">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har flyttat markören till vänster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5539">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the left</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5540">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5540">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5541">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5541">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5542">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5542">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5543">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) ogiltigt teckensnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5543">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5544">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5544">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5545">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5545">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5546">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5546">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move the cursor one character to the left. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input cursor has been moved one character to the left. */

```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5625">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5625">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5626">Lägg till text ingångs format med flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5626">Add multi line text input styles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5627">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5627">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5628">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5628">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5629">Den här tjänsten lägger till format i en widget för text indata i flera rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5629">This service adds styles to a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5630">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5630">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5631">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för textinspelning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5631">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5632">**stil** Format som ska läggas till.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5632">**style** Styles to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5633">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5633">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5634">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5634">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5635">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) text med text ingångs format Lägg till</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5635">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input style add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5636">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5636">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5637">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5637">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5638">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5638">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5639">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5639">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5640">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5640">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add style GX_STYTLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS to multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add(&my_text_input,
    GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the style GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS has been successfully added. */
```

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_remove(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    ULONG style);
```

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5676">Den här tjänsten tar bort de angivna formaten från widgeten multi-line text-indata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5676">This service removes the specified styles from the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5679">**stil** Format som ska tas bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5679">**style** Styles to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5680">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5680">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5719">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5719">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5720">Ange text ingångs format för flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5720">Set multi line text input styles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5721">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5721">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5722">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5722">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5723">Den här tjänsten anger format för en widget för text indata i flera rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5723">This service sets styles for a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5724">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5724">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5725">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för textinspelning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5725">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5726">**stil** Format som ska anges.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5726">**style** Styles to set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5727">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5727">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5728">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5728">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5729">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) formaterad text format uppsättning med flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5729">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5730">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5730">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5731">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5731">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5732">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5733">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5733">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5734">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5734">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set style GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS for text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input style has been set */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5766">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5766">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5767">Ange text färg för text i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5767">Set multi line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5768">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5768">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5769">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5769">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5770">Den här tjänsten tilldelar text färger för widgeten multi-line text-indata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5770">This service assigns text colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5771">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5771">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5772">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för textinspelning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5772">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5773">**normal_fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för normal text färg som används i normalt tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5773">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5774">**selected_text_color_id** Resurs-ID för den valda text färgen som användes när widgeten får fokus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5774">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5775">**disabled_text_color_id** Resurs-ID för den inaktiverade text färgen som användes när GX_STYLE_ENABLED inte är aktiv</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5775">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5776">**readonly_text_color_id** Resurs-ID för den skrivskyddade text färgen som användes när både GX_STYLE_ENABLED och GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY är aktiva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5776">**readonly_text_color_id** Resource ID of the read only text color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY are active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5777">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5777">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5778">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett färger för multi-line text-indata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5778">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5779">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5779">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5780">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5780">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5781">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5781">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5782">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5782">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5783">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5783">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill colors of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5815">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5815">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5816">Markera text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5816">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5817">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5817">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5818">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5818">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5819">Den här tjänsten markerar text text med text med det angivna start-och slut markerings indexet och markerar den markerade texten med de valda fyllnings-och text färgerna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5819">This service selects multi line text input text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5820">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5820">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5821">**text_input** Pekare till kontroll block för text indata i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5821">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5822">**start_index** Index för det första markerade specialtecknet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5822">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5823">**end_index** Index för det senast markerade specialtecknet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5823">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5824">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5824">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5825">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) text markering för text markering med text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5825">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5826">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5826">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5827">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5827">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5828">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5828">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5829">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) index värde är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5829">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5832">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5832">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select text between index [0, 9]. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(&my_text_input,
    0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between 
    index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5864">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5864">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5865">Tilldela text till text ingången (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5865">Assign text to the text input (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5866">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5866">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_input_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5867">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5867">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5868">Detta API är inaktuellt och ersätts av gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5868">This API is deprecated and replace by gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5869">Den här tjänsten tilldelar den angivna strängen till text indata för flera rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5869">This service assigns the specified string to the multi line text input.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5870">Om den multi_line_text_input widgetens buffertstorlek är mindre än sträng längden kommer strängen att trunkeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5870">If the multi_line_text_input widget’s input buffer size is smaller than string length, the string will be truncated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5871">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5871">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5872">**text_input** Pekare till kontroll block för text indata i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5872">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5873">**text** pekare till den null-avslutade strängen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5873">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5874">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5874">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5875">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett texten till text indata för flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5875">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the multi line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5876">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5876">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5877">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5877">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5878">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) ogiltig sträng längd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5878">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5879">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5879">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5880">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5880">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5881">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5881">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string “my string” to the text button “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set(&my_text_input,
    “myrstring”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the content of “my_text_input” bas been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5884">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5884">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5885">Tilldela text till text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5885">Assign text to the text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5886">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5886">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_input_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5887">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5887">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5888">Den här tjänsten tilldelar den angivna strängen till text indata för flera rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5888">This service assigns the specified string to the multi line text input.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5889">Om den multi_line_text_input widgetens buffertstorlek är mindre än sträng längden kommer strängen att trunkeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5889">If the multi_line_text_input widget’s input buffer size is smaller than string length, the string will be truncated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5890">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5890">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5891">**text_input** Pekare till kontroll block för text indata i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5891">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5892">**sträng** pekare till GX_STRING som ska tilldelas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5892">**string** pointer to GX_STRING to assign</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5893">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5893">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5894">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett texten till text indata för flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5894">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the multi line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5895">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5895">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5896">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5896">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5897">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) ogiltig sträng längd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5897">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5898">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5898">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5899">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5899">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5900">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5900">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string “my string” to the text button “my_text_input”. */
GX_STRING string;
string.gx_string_ptr = “myrstring”;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(string.gx_string_ptr);

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext(&my_text_input,
    &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the content of “my_text_input” bas been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5932">gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5932">gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5933">Flytta text insättnings markören i flera rader till föregående rad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5933">Move multi line text input cursor to the previous line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5934">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5934">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5935">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5935">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5936">Den här tjänsten flyttar markören för text indata i flera rader till föregående textrad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5936">This service moves the multi line text input cursor to the previous line of text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5937">Den här tjänsten anropas internt när en Uppil Key Down-händelse tas emot, men kan också anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5937">This service is called internally when an up arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5938">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5938">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5939">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för text insignal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5939">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5940">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5940">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5941">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har flyttat markören till föregående rad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5941">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the previous line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5942">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5942">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5943">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5943">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5944">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5944">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5945">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5945">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5946">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5946">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5947">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5947">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move the cursor to the previous line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input cursor has been moved to the previous line. */

```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5979">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5979">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5980">Skapa flerradig text-vy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5980">Create multi-line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5981">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5981">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WINDOW *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT text_view_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5982">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5982">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5983">Den här tjänsten skapar en GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW-widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5983">This service creates a GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5984">Den här widgeten är härledd från GX_WINDOW, och därför kan alla gx_window API-tjänster också användas med den här typen av widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5984">This widget type is derived from GX_WINDOW, and therefore all gx_window API services may also be utilized with this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5985">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5985">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5986">**text_view** Kontroll block för widgeten text visning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5986">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5987">**namn** Namn på widgeten text visning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5987">**name** Name of the text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5988">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5988">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5989">**text_id** Resurs-ID för text strängen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5989">**text_id** Resource ID of the text string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5990">**stil** Typ av widget för textvyer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5990">**style** Style of text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5991">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5991">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5992">**text_view_id** Programdefinierat ID för text visning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5992">**text_view_id** Application-defined ID of text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5993">**storlek** Mått för widgeten textvyer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5993">**size** Dimensions of text view widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5994">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5994">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5995">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har skapat widgeten text visning med flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5995">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created multi-line text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5996">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5996">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5997">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5997">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5998">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5998">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-5999">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-5999">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6000">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6000">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6001">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6001">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6002">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6002">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_create(&my_text_view,
    “my_text_view”, &my_parent,
    TEXT_STRING_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text view “my_text_view” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6034">gx_multi_line_text_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6034">gx_multi_line_text_view_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6035">Rita en widget för text visning med flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6035">Draw a multi line text view widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6036">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6036">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_view_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW * text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6037">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6037">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6038">Den här tjänsten ritar en widget för text visning med flera rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6038">This service draws a multi line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6039">Den här tjänsten anropas vanligt vis internt under uppdatering av arbets ytan, men kan också anropas från anpassade ritnings funktioner för flerradig text visning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6039">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom multi line text view drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6040">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6040">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6041">**text_view** Kontroll block för widgeten text visning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6041">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6042">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6042">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6043">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6043">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6044">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6044">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6045">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6045">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6046">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6046">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom multi line text view drawing function. */

VOID my_multi_line_text_view_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *view)
{
    /* Call default multi line text view draw. */
    gx_multi_line_text_view_draw(view);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6078">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6078">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6079">Bearbeta händelse för text visning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6079">Process multi-line text view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6080">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6080">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6081">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6081">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6082">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för en widget för textvyer med flera rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6082">This service processes an event for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6083">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6083">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6084">**text_view** Kontroll block för widgeten text visning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6084">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6085">**händelse** Pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6085">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6086">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6086">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6087">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) händelse process för text visning med flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6087">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text view event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6088">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6088">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6089">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6089">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6090">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6090">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6091">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6091">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6092">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6092">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6093">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6093">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event handler. */
UINT my_event_handler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *view, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(view, event_ptr);
        /* Add custom actions here. */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process (view, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6125">gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6125">gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6126">Ange teckensnitt som används i multi-line text-vy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6126">Set font used in multi-line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6127">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6127">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6128">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6128">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6129">Den här tjänsten anger teckensnittet för en widget för text visning med flera rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6129">This service sets the font of a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6130">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6130">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6131">**text_view** Kontroll block för widgeten text visning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6131">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6132">**font_id** Resurs-ID för teckensnittet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6132">**font_id** Resource ID for the font</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6133">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6133">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett teckensnitt för text visning med flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set font for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6135">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6135">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6136">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6136">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6137">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6137">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6138">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6138">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6139">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6139">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set font ID FONT_ID to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set(&my_text_view, FONT_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text view “my_text_view” will use the specified font to display its text. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6171">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6171">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6172">Ange rad avstånd för flerradig text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6172">Set multi-line text view line space</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6173">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6173">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_BYTE line_space);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6174">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6174">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6175">Den här tjänsten anger avståndet mellan text rader för widgeten flerradig text visning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6175">This service sets the spacing between lines of text for the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6176">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6176">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6177">**Visa** Kontroll block för widgeten text visning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6177">**view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6178">**line_space** Värde att ange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6178">**line_space** Value to set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6179">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6179">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6180">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett rad utrymme svärdet för vyn med flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6180">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set line space value for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6181">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6181">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6182">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6182">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6183">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6183">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6184">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6184">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Set line space of “my_text_view” to 2. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(&my_text_view, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the line space of “my_text_view” has been successfully set to 2. */
```
