## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6216">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6216">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6217">Hämta text rullnings information i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6217">Get multi-line text view scroll info</span></span>


### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6218">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6218">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6219">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6219">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6220">Den här tjänsten hämtar rullnings informationen för flera rader i textvisningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6220">This service gets the multi-line text view scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6221">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6221">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6222">**text_view** Kontroll block för widgeten text visning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6222">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6223">**Stil** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL eller GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6223">**Style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6224">**Information** Pekare till mål för rullnings information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6224">**Info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6225">**Bilaga i** innehåller en definition för GX_SCROLL_INFO-strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6225">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6226">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6226">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6227">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) kunde inte hämta rullnings information för text visning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6227">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved text view scroll info</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6228">Widgeten **GX_FAILURE** (0x10) är inte synlig eller teckensnitts-ID: t för textvy är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6228">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget is not visible or text view font id is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6229">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6229">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6230">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6230">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6231">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6231">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6232">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6232">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(&my_text_view,
    &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6264">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6264">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6265">Ange text färgen för text visning med flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6265">Set the text color for the multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6266">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6266">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCe_ID disabled_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6267">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6268">Den här tjänsten tilldelar text färgen till widgeten flerradig text visning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6268">This service assigns text color to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6269">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6269">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6270">**text_view** Kontroll block för widgeten text visning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6270">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6271">**normal_text_color_id** Resurs-ID för normal text färg som används i normalt tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6271">**normal_text_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6272">**selected_text_color_id** Resurs-ID för den valda text färgen som användes när widgeten får fokus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6272">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6273">**disabled_text_color_id** Resurs-ID för den inaktiverade text färgen som användes GX_STYLE_ENABLED är inte aktiv</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6273">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6274">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6274">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6275">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett färger för vyn med flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6275">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6276">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6276">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6277">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6277">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6278">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6278">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6279">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6279">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6280">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6280">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(&my_text_view,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6312">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6312">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6313">Ange system text sträng i text visning med flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6313">Set system text string in multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6314">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6314">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6315">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6315">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6316">Den här tjänsten anger resurs-ID för en sträng till widgeten flerradig text visning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6316">This service sets the resource ID of a string to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6317">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6317">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6318">**text_view** Kontroll block för widgeten text visning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6318">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6319">**text_id** Resurs-ID för text strängen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6319">**text_id** Resource ID for the text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6320">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6320">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6321">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett sträng-ID för vyn med flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6321">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string id for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6323">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6323">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6324">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6324">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6325">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6325">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6326">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6326">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6327">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6327">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set string ID STRING_ID to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(&my_text_view, STRING_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text id of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6359">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6359">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6360">Ange användardefinierad sträng i text visning med flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6360">Set user-defined string in multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6361">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6361">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6362">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6362">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6363">Den här tjänsten tilldelar en text sträng till widgeten flerradig text visning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6363">This service assigns a text string to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6364">Om widgeten text_view skapades med Style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY skapar widgeten en privat kopia av den tilldelade text strängen och därför måste gx_system_memory_allocate_set-API: et anropas en gång innan tjänsten begärs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6364">If the text_view widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6365">Om GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY inte är aktivt gör widgeten ingen privat kopia av den inkommande strängen, och därför måste den tilldelade strängen vara statiskt eller globalt allokerad, dvs. det får inte vara en automatisk eller tillfällig variabel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6365">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the assigned string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6366">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6366">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6367">**text_view** Kontroll block för widgeten text visning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6367">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6368">**text** NULL-terminerad text sträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6368">**text** NULL-terminated text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6369">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6369">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6370">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett en sträng för vyn med flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6370">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6371">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) allokerat minne har inte definierats eller så misslyckades minnes tilldelningen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6371">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6373">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6373">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6374">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6374">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6375">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6375">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6376">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6376">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set string “my string” to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set(&my_text_view, “my string”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6408">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6408">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6409">Ange blank steg för text visning på flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6409">Set multi-line text view whitespace</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6410">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6410">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_UBYTE whitespace);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6411">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6411">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6412">Den här tjänsten anger avståndet mellan widgetar och klient områden för en flerradig widget för text visning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6412">This service sets spacing between widget outlines and client area for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6413">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6413">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6414">**text_view** Kontroll block för widgeten text visning i flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6414">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6415">**blank steg** Marginal bredden mellan text_view widgeten och den visade texten, i bild punkter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6415">**whitespace** Width of margin between text_view widget and the displayed text, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6416">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6416">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett tomt utrymme för vyn med flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set whitespace for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6419">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6419">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6420">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6420">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6421">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6421">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6422">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6422">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set whitespace of “my_text_view” to 2. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set(&my_text_view, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the whitespace of “my_text_view” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6454">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6454">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6455">Skapa numerisk Pixelmap-prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6455">Create numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6456">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6456">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create(
    GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id,
    ULONG style, USHORT pixelmap_prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6457">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6457">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6458">Den här tjänsten skapar en numerisk Pixelmap prompt-widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6458">This service creates a numeric pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6459">En numeric_pixelmap_prompt är bara en pixelmap_prompt som har en egen buffert och tillhandahåller ett gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_value_set (INT) API, buffertstorleken definieras av konstant GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, som är standardvärdet 16.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6459">A numeric_pixelmap_prompt is just a pixelmap_prompt that keeps its own buffer and provides a gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_value_set(INT) API, the buffer size is defined by the constant GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, which defaults to 16.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6460">GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT härleds från GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT och stöder alla gx_pixelmap_prompt API-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6460">GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6461">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6461">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6462">**prompt** Numeriskt Pixelmap-prompt, kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6462">**prompt** Numeric pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6463">**namn** Namn på prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6463">**name** Name of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6464">**överordnad** Kontroll block för överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6464">**parent** Parent widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6465">**text_id** ID för resurs sträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6465">**text_id** Resource string id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6466">**fill_id** Pixelmap-ID för fyllnads områden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6466">**fill_id** Pixelmap id for fill area</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6467">**stil** Typ av numerisk Pixelmap-prompt, **bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6467">**style** Style of numeric pixelmap prompt, **Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6468">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Programdefinierat ID för prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6468">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Application-defined ID of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6469">**storlek** Mått för numerisk Pixelmap-prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6469">**size** Dimensions of numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6470">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6470">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) skapade en numerisk pixlemap-prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully create numeric pixlemap prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6474">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6474">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6475">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6475">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6476">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6476">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6477">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6477">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6478">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6478">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_numeric_pix_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create(&my_numeric_pix_prompt,
    “my_numeric_pix_prompt”, &my_parent,
    MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, MY_FEEL_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the numeric pixelmap prompt “my_numeric_pix_prompt” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6482">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6482">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6483">Åsidosätt format funktion för numerisk Pixelmap-prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6483">Override format function of numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6484">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6484">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_pixelmap_format_function_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    OID (*format_func)(GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *, INT));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6485">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6485">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6486">Den här tjänsten åsidosätter standardformat-funktionen för widgeten numerisk pixlemap-prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6486">This service overrides the default format function of the numeric pixlemap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6487">Funktionen standardformat konverterar det numeriska Pixelmap-prompt svärdet till en sträng och lagrar det i widgetens privata buffert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6487">The default format function converts the numeric pixelmap prompt value to a string and stores it in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6488">Med den här tjänsten kan programmet definiera sin egen format funktion för att formatera och lagra det numeriska Pixelmap-prompt svärdet i widgetens privata buffert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6488">This service allows the application to define its own format function to format and store the numeric pixelmap prompt value in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6489">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6489">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6490">**prompt** Numeriskt Pixelmap-prompt, kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6490">**prompt** Numeric pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6491">**format_func** Funktionen format ska anges</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6491">**format_func** Format function to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6492">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6492">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6493">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett numerisk pixlemap prompt format funktion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6493">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric pixlemap prompt format function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6495">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6495">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6496">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6496">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6497">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6497">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define my numeric pixelmap format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override default format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set(
    &my_numeric_pix_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt” has been override. */
```

```C
/* Define my numeric format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt, INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100, prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override the default format function of “my_numeric_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set(&my_numeric_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the format function of “my_numeric_prompt” has been override. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6587">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6587">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6588">Den här tjänsten skapar en numerisk widget för rullnings hjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6588">This service creates a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6589">Ett numeriskt rullnings hjul är en typ av widget för rullnings hjul som används särskilt för att visa ett intervall med tal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6589">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6590">Andra typer av widgetar rullnings hjul är också tillgängliga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6590">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6591">Mer information om rullnings listens widget för rullnings hjul, widgetar och widget för widget finns i API för gx_scroll_wheel_create ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6591">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6592">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL härleds från GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL och har stöd för alla gx_text_scroll_wheel-och gx_scroll_wheel-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6592">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL and supports all gx_text_scroll_wheel and gx_scroll_wheel services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6593">Alla typer av rullnings hjul genererar GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT händelser till deras överordnade när rullnings hjulet rullas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6593">All scroll wheel types generate GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT events to their parent when the scroll wheel is scrolled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6594">Ett numeriskt rullnings hjul kommer som standard att ha ABS (end_val – start_val) + 1 rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6594">A numeric scroll wheel will default to having abs(end_val – start_val) + 1 rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6595">Med andra ord kommer rullnings hjulet att visa varje värde mellan start_val och end_val, öka eller decrementing med 1 med varje rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6595">In other words, the scroll wheel will display every value between start_val and end_val, incrementing or decrementing by 1 with each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6596">Observera att start_val kan vara större eller mindre än end_val, beroende på vilket sätt programmet vill att intervallet ska visas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6596">Note that start_val can be greater or less than end_val, depending on which way the application wants the range to appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6597">Om programmet vill ändra radens ökning kan det göra detta genom att anropa gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set () efter att det numeriska rullnings hjulet har skapats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6597">If the application wants to change the row increment, it can do this by calling gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() after creating the numeric scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6598">Till exempel kan ett program som vill skapa ett rullnings hjul som visar värdena år 1980 till 2020, öka med 5, göra detta:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6598">For example, an application wanting to create a scroll wheel that displays the values years 1980 to 2020, incrementing by 5, might do this:</span></span>

```C
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, GX_NULL, parent, 1980,
    2020, style, id, &size);

/* the years 1980 through 2020, inclusive, incrementing by 5 years,
yields 9 total rows */

gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(&wheel, 9);
```

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6599">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6599">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6600">**hjul** Pekare till numeriskt kontroll block för rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6600">**wheel** Pointer to numeric scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6601">**namn** Logiskt namn på Pixelmap knapp-widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6601">**name** Logical name of pixelmap button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6602">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6602">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6603">**start_val** Start av numeriskt värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6603">**start_val** Starting numeric value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6604">**end_val** Avslutande numeriskt värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6604">**end_val** Ending numeric value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6605">**stil** Typ av kryss ruta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6605">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6606">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6606">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6607">**wheel_id** Programdefinierat ID för rullnings hjulet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6607">**wheel_id** Application-defined ID of scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6608">**storlek** Mått för widgeten rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6608">**size** Dimensions of scroll wheel widget</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har skapat ett numeriskt rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created numeric scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6611">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6611">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6612">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6612">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6613">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6613">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6614">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6614">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6615">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6615">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6616">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6616">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6617">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6617">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “year_wheel”. */
status = gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create(&year_wheel,
    “year_selector””, &parent,
    1980, 2040,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER |
    GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT | GX_STYLE_WRAP |
    GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND,
    YEAR_WHEEL_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel “year_wheel” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6635">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6635">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6636">Tilldela ett värde intervall för ett numeriskt rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6636">Assign value range of numeric scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6637">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6637">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT start_val, INT end_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6638">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6638">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6639">Den här tjänsten ändrar värde intervallet som tillåts och visas med en numerisk widget för rullnings hjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6639">This service modifies the range of values allowed and displayed by a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6640">Ett numeriskt rullnings hjul är en typ av widget för rullnings hjul som används särskilt för att visa ett intervall med tal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6640">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6641">Andra typer av widgetar rullnings hjul är också tillgängliga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6641">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6642">Mer information om rullnings listens widget för rullnings hjul, widgetar och widget för widget finns i API för gx_scroll_wheel_create ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6642">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6643">Om detta API anropas återställs rullnings hjulets sammanlagda rader till ABS (end_val – start_val) + 1, vilket innebär att rullnings hjulet ökar med 1 för varje rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6643">Invoking this API resets the scroll wheel total rows to abs(end_val – start_val) + 1, meaning the scroll wheel will increment by 1 for each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6644">Om du vill ändra detta kan programmet anropa gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set () för att ändra det totala antalet rader, vilket i praktiken ändrar värdets ökning mellan rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6644">To change this, the application can call gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() to change the total number of row, effectively changing the value increment between rows.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6645">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6645">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6646">**hjul** Pekare till numeriskt kontroll block för rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6646">**wheel** Pointer to numeric scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6647">**start_val** Start av numeriskt värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6647">**start_val** Starting numeric value</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6648">**end_val** Avslutande numeriskt värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6648">**end_val** Ending numeric value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6649">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6649">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6650">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett ett numeriskt rullnings hjuls intervall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6650">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric scroll wheel range</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6651">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6651">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6652">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6652">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6653">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6653">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6654">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6654">Initialization and threads</span></span> 

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6655">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6655">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change range of “rate” scroll wheel. */

status = gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set(&year_wheel, 0, 200);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel range has been modified. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6674">gx_pixelmap_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6674">gx_pixelmap_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6675">Knappen Skapa Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6675">Create pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6676">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6676">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6677">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6677">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6678">Den här tjänsten skapar en Pixelmap knapp-widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6678">This service creates a pixelmap button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6679">GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON härleds från GX_BUTTON och stöder alla gx_button-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6679">GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6680">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6680">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6681">**knapp** Pekare till Pixelmap knapp kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6681">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_button_create(&my_pixelmap_button,
    “my_pixelmap_button”, &my_parent,
    MY_NORMAL_RESOURCE_ID, MY_SELECTED_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_DESELECTED_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_PIXELMAP_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap button “my_pixelmap_button” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6721">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6721">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6722">Knappen Rita Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6722">Draw pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6723">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6723">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6724">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6724">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6725">Den här tjänsten ritar en widget för Pixelmap knapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6725">This service draws a pixelmap button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6726">Den här funktionen anropas vanligt vis internt av GUIX-funktionen för arbets ytans uppdatering, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med att implementera anpassade ritnings funktioner för anpassade Pixelmap knapp-widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6726">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap button widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6727">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6727">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6728">**knapp** Pekare till Pixelmap knapp kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6728">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6729">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6729">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6730">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6730">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6731">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6731">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6732">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6732">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6733">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6733">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap button drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap button draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_button_draw(button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

```C
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6791">gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6791">gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6792">Knappen tilldela pixelmaps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6792">Assign pixelmaps to button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6793">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6793">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6794">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6794">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6795">Den här tjänsten anger pixelmaps till knappen Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6795">This service sets pixelmaps to the pixelmap button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6796">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6796">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6797">**knapp** Pekare till Pixelmap knapp kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6797">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6798">**normal_id** Resurs-ID för Pixelmap som ska användas som normalt tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6798">**normal_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6799">**selected_id** Resurs-ID för den Pixelmap som ska användas när knappen är markerad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6799">**selected_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is selected</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6800">**disabled_id** Resurs-ID för den Pixelmap som ska användas när knappen är inaktive rad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6800">**disabled_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is disabled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6801">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6801">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6802">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) slutförde anger Pixelmap till knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6802">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6803">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6803">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6804">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6804">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6805">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6805">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6807">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6807">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set (&my_pixelmap_button,
    NORMAL_ID, SELECTED_ID,
    DISABLED_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap button is properly configured with the specified pixelmaps. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6829">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6829">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6830">Skapa Pixelmap-prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6830">Create pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6831">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6831">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_pixelmap_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6832">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6832">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6833">Den här tjänsten skapar en Pixelmap-prompt-widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6833">This service creates a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6834">En Pixelmap-prompt skiljer sig från en standard GX_PROMPT i så att den målar bakgrunden i prompten med hjälp av pixelmaps.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6834">A pixelmap prompt differs from a standard GX_PROMPT in that it paints the background of the prompt using pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6835">Funktionen Create accepterar ett Pixelmap-ID, den normala tillstånds fyllnings Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6835">The create function accepts one pixelmap id, the normal state fill pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6836">Upp till sex pixelmaps kan tilldelas Pixelmap-prompten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6836">Up to six pixelmaps may be assigned to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6837">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6838">**prompt** Pekare till Pixelmap-promptens kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6838">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6839">**namn** Logiskt namn på Pixelmap prompt-widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6839">**name** Logical name of pixelmap prompt widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6840">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6840">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6841">**text_id** Resurs-ID för text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6841">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6842">**fill_id** Resurs-ID för fyllning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6842">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6843">**stil** Typ av kryss ruta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6843">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6844">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6844">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6845">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Programdefinierat ID för Pixelmap-prompten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6845">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6846">**storlek** Pixelmap-promptens dimensioner</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6846">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6847">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6847">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pixelmap-prompten har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6851">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6851">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6852">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6852">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6853">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6853">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6854">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6854">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6855">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6855">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_pixelmap_prompt”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(&my_pixelmap_prompt,
    “my_pixelmap_prompt”, &my_parent,
    MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, MY_LEFT_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_FILL_RESOURCE_ID, MY_RIGHT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_PIXELMAP_PROMPT_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap prompt “my_pixelmap_prompt” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6871">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6871">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6872">Prompten Draw Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6872">Draw pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6873">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6873">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6874">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6874">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6875">Den här tjänsten ritar en widget för Pixelmap-prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6875">This service draws a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6876">Den här funktionen anropas vanligt vis internt av GUIX-funktionen för arbets ytans uppdatering, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med att implementera anpassade ritnings funktioner för anpassade Pixelmap-prompt-widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6876">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap prompt widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6877">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6877">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6878">**prompt** Pekare till Pixelmap-promptens kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6878">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6879">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6879">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6880">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6880">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6881">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6881">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6882">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6882">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6883">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6883">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap prompt drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap prompt draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw(prompt);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6899">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6899">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6900">Koppla pixelmaps till prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6900">Assign pixelmaps to prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6901">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6901">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_right_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_right_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6902">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6903">Den här tjänsten tilldelar Pixelmap-ID: n till Pixelmap-prompten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6903">This service assigns pixelmap ids to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6904">De vänstra, ifyllda och högra Pixelmap-ID: na används för att tillåta att programmet använder en uppsättning pixelmaps för att fråga efter olika bredder, men en gemensam höjd för att spara på lagrings kraven.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6904">The left, fill, and right pixelmap ids are used to allow the application to use one set of pixelmaps for prompts of various widths but a common height to save on storage requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6905">Om vänster och höger ID inte används, ska de anges till 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6905">If the left and right IDs are not used, they should be set to 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6906">Om frågan ska rita på egen hand när den får fokus, används de valda Pixelmap-ID: na för detta ändamål.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6906">If the prompt should draw itself differently when it gains input focus, the selected pixelmap ids are used for that purpose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6907">Om de valda ID: na inte används eller är samma som de normala ID: na, anger du dem till 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6907">If the selected ids are not used or are the same as the normal ids, set them to 0.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6908">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6908">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6909">**prompt** Pekare till Pixelmap-promptens kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6909">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6910">**normal_left_id** Resurs-ID för Pixelmap som ska användas på vänster sida i normalt läge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6910">**normal_left_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the left side in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6911">**normal_fill_id** Resurs-ID för den Pixelmap som ska användas vid sidan av normal status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6911">**normal_fill_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as a tiled fill in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6912">**normal_right_id** Resurs-ID för Pixelmap som ska användas på höger sida i läget normal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6912">**normal_right_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the right side in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6913">**selected_left_id** Resurs-ID för Pixelmap som ska användas på vänster sida i det valda läget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6913">**selected_left_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the left side in the selected state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6914">**selected_fill_id** Resurs-ID för den Pixelmap som ska användas för att fylla i det valda läget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6914">**selected_fill_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as a tiled fill in the selected state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6915">**selected_right_id** Resurs-ID för Pixelmap som ska användas på höger sida i det valda läget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6915">**selected_right_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the right side in the selected state</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6916">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6916">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6917">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) har angett Pixelmap till prompten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6917">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6918">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6918">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6919">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6919">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6920">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) resurs-ID är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6920">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Resource ID not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6921">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6921">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6922">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6922">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6923">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6923">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign pixelmap IDs to “my_prompt”. Only the normal state pixelmaps are used in this case */
status = gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set (&my_prompt,
    normal_left_id, normal_fill_id,
    normal_right_id, 0, 0, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap prompt is properly configured with pixelmaps. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6945">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6945">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6946">Skapa Pixelmap-skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6946">Create pixelmap slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6947">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6947">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO *pixelmap_info, ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6948">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6948">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6949">Den här tjänsten skapar en Pixelmap Slider-widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6949">This service creates a pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6950">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6950">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6951">**skjutreglage** Pekare till kontroll block för Pixelmap-skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6951">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6952">**namn** Logiskt namn på Pixelmap Slider-widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6952">**name** Logical name of pixelmap slider widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6953">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6953">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6954">**information** Pekare till en GX_SLIDER_INFO-struktur som innehåller värden som definierar minimi värdet för skjutreglage, högsta värde, aktuellt värde och barr gränser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6954">**info** Pointer to a GX_SLIDER_INFO structure which contains values defining the slider minimum value, maximum value, current value, and needle limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6955">**Bilaga I** innehåller en definition för GX_SLIDER_INFO-strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6955">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6956">**pixelmap_info** Pekar till en GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO struktur som definierar pixelmaps som används för att rita skjutreglagets bakgrund och barr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6956">**pixelmap_info** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6957">**Bilaga I** innehåller en definition för GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO-strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6957">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6958">Skjutreglagets bakgrund kan använda en eller två pixelmaps.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6958">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6959">Om en, så ändras inte bakgrunden när nålventil flyttas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6959">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6960">Om två bakgrunder definieras används bakgrunden före den första bakgrunds Pixelmap och bakgrunden efter den andra bakgrunds Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6960">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6961">**stil** Typ av skjutreglage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6961">**style** Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6962">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6962">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6963">**pixelmap_slider_id** Programdefinierat ID för Pixelmap-skjutreglaget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6963">**pixelmap_slider_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6964">**storlek** Pixelmap-promptens dimensioner</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6964">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6965">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6965">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6966">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har skapat Pixelmap-skjutreglaget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6966">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created pixelmap slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6967">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6967">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6968">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6968">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6969">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6969">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6970">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6970">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6971">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6971">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6972">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6972">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6973">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6973">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate slider information structure. */
info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_max_tralvel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_pixelmap_slider”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider_create(&my_pixelmap_slider,
                            “my_pixelmap_slider”, &my_parent,
                            &info, &pixelmap_info,
                            GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                            MY_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider “my_pixelmap_slider” has been created. */
```
