## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6993">gx_pixelmap_slider_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6993">gx_pixelmap_slider_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6994">Skjutreglage för Drawing Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6994">Draw pixelmap slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6995">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6995">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_slider_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6996">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6996">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6997">Den här tjänsten ritar en Pixelmap Slider-widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6997">This service draws a pixelmap slider widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6998">Den här funktionen anropas vanligt vis internt av GUIX-funktionen för arbets ytans uppdatering, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med att implementera anpassade ritnings funktioner för anpassade widgetar för skjutreglage med Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6998">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap slider widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-6999">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-6999">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7000">**skjutreglage** Pekare till kontroll block för Pixelmap-skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7000">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7001">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7001">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7002">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7002">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7003">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7003">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7004">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7004">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7005">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7005">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap slider drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_slider_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *pixelmap_slider)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap slider draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_slider_draw(pixelmap_slider);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7026">gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7026">gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7027">Process Pixelmap Slider-händelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7027">Process pixelmap slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7028">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7028">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7029">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7029">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7030">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för den angivna widgeten för Pixelmap skjutreglage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7030">This service processes an event for the specified pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7031">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7031">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7032">**skjutreglage** Pekare till Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7032">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7033">**skjutreglaget** kontroll block händelse pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7033">**slider** control block event Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7034">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7034">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7035">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pixelmap för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7035">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7036">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7036">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7037">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7037">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7038">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7038">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7039">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7039">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7040">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7040">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7041">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7041">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */
UINT my_event_hanlder(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *pixelmap_slider, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                    event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                  event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7062">gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7062">gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7063">Tilldela pixelmaps till skjutreglaget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7063">Assign pixelmaps to slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7064">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7064">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO *pixinfo);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7065">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7065">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7066">Den här tjänsten anger pixelmaps till Pixelmap-skjutreglaget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7066">This service sets pixelmaps to the pixelmap slider.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7067">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7067">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7068">**skjutreglage** Pekare till kontroll block för Pixelmap-skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7068">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7069">**pixinfo** Pekar till en GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO struktur som definierar pixelmaps som används för att rita skjutreglagets bakgrund och barr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7069">**pixinfo** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7070">**Bilaga I** innehåller en definition för GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO-strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7070">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7071">Skjutreglagets bakgrund kan använda en eller två pixelmaps.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7071">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7072">Om en, så ändras inte bakgrunden när nålventil flyttas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7072">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7073">Om två bakgrunder definieras används bakgrunden före den första bakgrunds Pixelmap och bakgrunden efter den andra bakgrunds Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7073">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7074">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7074">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7075">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) anger Pixelmap till skjutreglaget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7075">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7076">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7076">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7077">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7077">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7078">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7078">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7079">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7079">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7080">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7080">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Draw “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider _pixelmap_set (&my_pixelmap_slider,
                                &pixelmap_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider is properly configured with “pixelmap_info”. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7102">gx_progress_bar_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7102">gx_progress_bar_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7103">Rita förlopps indikatorns bakgrund</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7103">Draw progress bar background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7104">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7104">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_background_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7105">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7105">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7106">Den här tjänsten ritar bakgrunden för den angivna förlopps indikatorn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7106">This service draws the background of the specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7107">Den här funktionen anropas internt som en del av gx_progress_bar_draw (), men exponeras för programmet för att stödja de fall där programmet definierar en anpassad ritnings funktion för förlopps indikatorn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7107">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7108">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7108">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7109">**förlopps indikator** Pekare till förlopps indikatorns kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7109">**progress bar** Pointer to progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7110">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7110">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7111">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7111">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7112">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7112">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7113">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7113">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7114">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7114">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_text_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7125">gx_progress_bar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7125">gx_progress_bar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7126">Skapa en förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7126">Create a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7127">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7127">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_create(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *progress_bar_info,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT progress_bar_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7128">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7128">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7129">Den här tjänsten skapar en widget för förlopps indikatorn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7129">This service creates a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7130">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7130">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7131">**progress_bar** Förlopps indikatorns kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7131">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7132">**namn** Logiskt namn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7132">**name** Logical name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7133">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7133">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7134">**progress_bar_info** Pekare till en GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO-struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7134">**progress_bar_info** Pointer to a GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7135">**Bilaga I** innehåller en definition för GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO-strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7135">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7136">**stil** Typ av förlopps indikator.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7136">**style** Style of progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7137">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7137">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7138">**progress_bar_id** Programdefinierat ID för förlopps indikatorn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7138">**progress_bar_id** Application-defined ID of progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7139">**storlek** Mått för förlopps indikatorn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7139">**size** Dimensions of progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7140">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7140">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7141">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) slutförd förlopps indikator skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7141">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful progress bar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7142">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7142">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7143">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7143">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7144">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7144">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7145">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7145">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7146">Den överordnade widgeten **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7146">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7147">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7147">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7148">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7148">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7149">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7149">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

size.gx_rectangle_left = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_top = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_right = 110;
size.gx_rectangle_bottom = 140;

/* Create a progress bar with the specified information. */
status = gx_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar, GX_NULL, GX_NULL,
                        &info, GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN,
                        0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCSESS the progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7160">gx_progress_bar_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7160">gx_progress_bar_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7161">Rita en förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7161">Draw a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7162">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7162">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7163">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7163">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7164">Den här tjänsten ritar en widget för förlopps indikatorn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7164">This service draws a progress bar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7165">Den här funktionen anropas vanligt vis internt av GUIX-funktionen för arbets ytans uppdatering, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med att implementera anpassade ritnings funktioner för anpassade widgetar för förlopps indikator.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7165">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom progress bar widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7166">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7166">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7167">**progress_bar** Förlopps indikatorns kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7167">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7168">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7168">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7169">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7169">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7170">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7170">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7171">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7171">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7172">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7172">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7183">gx_progress_bar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7183">gx_progress_bar_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7184">Förlopp i förlopps indikator händelsen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7184">Progress a progress bar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7185">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7185">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_event_process(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7186">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7186">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7187">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse i förlopps indikatorn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7187">This service processes a progress bar event.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7188">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7188">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7191">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7191">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7194">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7194">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7195">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7195">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7196">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7196">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7197">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7197">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7198">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7198">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7249">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7249">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

status = gx_progress_bar_info_set(&progress_bar, &info);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the progress bar info was re-assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7311">gx_progress_bar_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7311">gx_progress_bar_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7312">Ange text färgen för en förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7312">Set the text color of a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7313">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7313">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_text_color_set(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7314">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7314">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7315">Den här tjänsten anger text färgen för en förlopps indikator-widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7315">This service sets the text color of a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7316">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7316">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7317">**progress_bar** Förlopps indikatorns kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7317">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7318">**normal_text_color** Resurs-ID för normal text färg som används i normalt tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7318">**normal_text_color** Resource ID of normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7319">**selected_text_color** Resurs-ID för den valda text färgen som användes när widgeten får fokus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7319">**selected_text_color** Resource ID of selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7320">**disabled_text_color** Resurs-ID för inaktive rad textfärg som används när GX_STYLE_ENABLED inte är aktiv</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7320">**disabled_text_color** Resource ID of disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

```C
                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7338">gx_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7338">gx_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7339">Rita förlopps indikator text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7339">Draw progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7340">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7340">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7341">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7341">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7342">Den här tjänsten ritar texten i den angivna förlopps indikatorn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7342">This service draws the text of specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7343">Den här funktionen anropas internt som en del av gx_progress_bar_draw (), men exponeras för programmet för att stödja de fall där programmet definierar en anpassad ritnings funktion för förlopps indikatorn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7343">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7344">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7344">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7345">**förlopps indikator** Pekare till förlopps indikatorns kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7345">**progress bar** Pointer to progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7346">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7346">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7347">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7347">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7348">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7348">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7349">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7349">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7350">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7350">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_text_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7365">Den här tjänsten tilldelar förlopps indikatorns aktuella värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7365">This service assigns the progress bar current value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7366">Widgeten förlopps indikator inaktive ras automatiskt och ritas om automatiskt när förlopps indikatorns värde ändras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7366">The progress bar widget will automatically invalidate and redraw itself when the progress bar value is changed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7373">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7373">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7390">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7390">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7391">Den här tjänsten skapar en prompt-widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7391">This service creates a prompt widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7392">GX_PROMPT härleds från GX_WIDGET och stöder alla gx_widget-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7392">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7393">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7393">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7394">**Pekare** till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7394">**Pointer** to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7395">**text_id** Resurs-ID för prompt-text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7395">**text_id** Resource ID of prompt text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7396">**stil** Typ av prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7396">**style** Style of prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7397">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7397">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7398">**prompt_id** Programdefinierat ID för prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7398">**prompt_id** Application-defined ID of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7399">**storlek** Varnings mått</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7399">**size** Dimensions of prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7400">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7400">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7401">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) slutförd prompt skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7401">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7402">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7402">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7403">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7403">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7404">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7404">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7405">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7405">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7406">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7406">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7407">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7407">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7408">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7408">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_create(&my_prompt, “my_promPt”, &my_parent,
                    MY_PROMPT_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_PROPMT_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the prompt “my_prompt” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7420">gx_prompt_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7420">gx_prompt_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7421">Draw-prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7421">Draw prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7422">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7422">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7423">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7423">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7424">Den här tjänsten ritar en prompt-widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7424">This service draws a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7425">Den här tjänsten anropas internt av GUIX under uppdatering av arbets ytan, men kan också anropas av anpassade ritnings funktioner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7425">This service is called internally by GUIX during canvas refresh, but can also be called by custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7426">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7426">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7427">**prompt** Pekare mot varnings kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7427">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7428">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7428">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7429">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7429">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7430">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7430">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7431">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7431">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7432">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7432">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom prompt drawing function. */

VOID my_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* Call default prompt draw. */
    gx_prompt_draw(prompt);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7444">gx_prompt_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7444">gx_prompt_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7445">Process-prompt-händelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7445">Process prompt event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7446">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7446">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7447">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7447">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7448">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för den angivna prompten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7448">This service processes an event for the specified prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7449">Den här tjänsten ska anropas som standard händelse hanterare av eventuella anpassade händelse bearbetnings funktioner i prompten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7449">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom prompt event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7450">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7450">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7451">**prompt** Pekare mot kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7451">**prompt** Pointer to prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7452">**event_ptr** Pekare till händelsen att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7452">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7453">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7453">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7454">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) händelse process för lyckad prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7454">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7455">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7455">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7456">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7456">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7457">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7457">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7458">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7458">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7459">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7459">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7460">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7460">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic prompt event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default prompt event processing */
        status = gx_prompt_event_process(prompt, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7499">gx_prompt_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7499">gx_prompt_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7500">Ange text färg för prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7500">Set prompt text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7501">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7501">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_color_set(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7502">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7502">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7503">Den här tjänsten anger text färgen för en prompt-widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7503">This service sets the text color of a prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7504">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7504">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7505">**prompt** Pekare mot varnings kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7505">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7506">**normal_color** Resurs-ID för färg för normal text.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7506">**normal_color** Resource ID of color for normal text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7507">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7507">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7508">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7508">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7509">**selected_color** Resurs-ID för den valda texten som används när widgeten får fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7509">**selected_color** Resource ID of color for selected text, used when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7510">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7510">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7511">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7511">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7512">**disabled_color** Resurs-ID för färg inaktive rad text som används när GX_STYLE_ENABLED inte är aktiv.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7512">**disabled_color** Resource ID of color for disabled text, used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7513">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7513">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7514">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7514">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7515">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7515">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7516">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) text färgs uppsättning för lyckad prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7516">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7519">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET_SIZE** (0X14) ogiltig widgets storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7519">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET_SIZE** (0x14) Invalid widget size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7520">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7520">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7521">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7521">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7522">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7522">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the text color of “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_color_set(&my_prompt,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_BLACK,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_LIGHTGRAY,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color for prompt “my_prompt” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7534">gx_prompt_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7534">gx_prompt_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7535">Stöd för ritnings funktion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7535">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7536">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7536">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_prompt_text_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7537">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7537">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7538">Den här stöd funktionen ritar text delen av en prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7538">This support function draws the text portion of a prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7539">Den här funktionen anropas internt av gx_prompt_draw () och tillhandahålls som en separat API som en bekvämlighet för program som definierar en anpassad prompt-funktion.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7539">This function is called internally by gx_prompt_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom prompt drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7540">Program som vill anpassa bakgrunds ritningen kan ge sin anpassade ritnings funktion och anropa den gx_prompt_text_draw tjänsten som en del av den anpassade ritningen för att rita uppslags texten över bakgrunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7540">Applications that want to customize the prompt background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_prompt_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the prompt text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7541">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7541">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7542">**prompt** Pekare till varnings kontroll blocket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7542">**prompt** Pointer to the prompt control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7543">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7543">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7544">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7544">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7545">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7545">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7546">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7546">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7547">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7547">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* insert code here to draw prompt background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_prompt_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) prompt);
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7560">Hämta prompt-text (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7560">Get prompt text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7561">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7561">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_get(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR **return_text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7562">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7562">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7563">Den här tjänsten är föråldrad till förmån för gx_prompt_text_get_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7563">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7564">Den här tjänsten hämtar texten i en prompt-widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7564">This service gets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7565">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7565">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7566">**prompt** Pekare mot varnings kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7566">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7567">**return_text** Pekare till mål för text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7567">**return_text** Pointer to destination for text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7568">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7568">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7569">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) framgångs text Hämta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7569">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7570">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7570">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7571">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7571">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7572">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7572">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7573">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7573">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7574">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7574">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROMPT my_prompt;
GX_CHAR *my_prompt_text;

/* Get the text of “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_get(&my_prompt, &my_prompt_text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pointer “my_prompt_text” points to the text displayed by “my_prompt”. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7586">gx_prompt_text_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7586">gx_prompt_text_get_ext</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_get(

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7589">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7589">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7593">**return_string** Pekare till mål för sträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7593">**return_string** Pointer to destination for string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7594">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7594">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7595">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) framgångs text Hämta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7595">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7596">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7596">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7598">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7598">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7599">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7599">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7600">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7600">Example</span></span>

```C

GX_STRING my_prompt_string;

/* Get the text of “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_get_ext(&my_prompt, &my_prompt_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS then my_prompt_string has been initialize to hold a copy of the prompt string. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7640">Ange frågetext (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7640">Set prompt text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7641">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7641">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_set(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7642">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7642">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7643">Den här tjänsten har ersatts av gx_prompt_text_set_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7643">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7644">Den här tjänsten anger texten i en prompt-widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7644">This service sets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7645">Om widgeten prompt skapades med format GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY skapar widgeten en privat kopia av den tilldelade text strängen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7645">If the prompt widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7646">Om GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY inte är aktivt gör widgeten ingen privat kopia av den inkommande strängen, och därför måste strängen vara statiskt eller globalt allokerad, dvs. det får inte vara en automatisk eller tillfällig variabel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7646">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7647">GX_PROMPT härleds från GX_WIDGET, och därför kan alla gx_widget API-tjänster användas med GX_PROMPT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7647">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_PROMPT.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7648">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7648">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7649">**prompt** Pekare mot varnings kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7649">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7650">**text** Pekare till text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7650">**text** Pointer to text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7651">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7651">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7652">Text uppsättning för **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) har angetts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7652">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7655">Minnes tilldelnings funktionen för **GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) har inte definierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7655">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocate function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7656">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) ogiltig sträng längd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7656">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7657">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7657">Allowed From</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7674">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7674">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7675">Den här tjänsten anger texten i en prompt-widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7675">This service sets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7676">Om widgeten prompt skapades med format GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY skapar widgeten en privat kopia av den tilldelade text strängen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7676">If the prompt widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7677">Om GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY inte är aktivt gör widgeten ingen privat kopia av den inkommande strängen, och därför måste strängen vara statiskt eller globalt allokerad, dvs. det får inte vara en automatisk eller tillfällig variabel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7677">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7678">GX_PROMPT härleds från GX_WIDGET, och därför kan alla gx_widget API-tjänster användas med GX_PROMPT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7678">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_PROMPT.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7728">gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7728">gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7729">Rita bakgrund</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7729">Draw background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7730">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7730">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7731">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7731">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7732">Den här tjänsten ritar en bakgrund för en radiell förlopps indikator.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7732">This service draws a radial progress bar background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7733">Den här tjänsten refereras internt av gx_radial_progress_bar_draw funktionen, men exponeras för användning av programmet i de fall där programmet definierar en anpassad ritnings funktion för radiell förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7733">This service is internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress bar drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7734">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7734">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7735">**förlopps indikator** Pekare till kontroll block för radiellt förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7735">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7736">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7736">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7737">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7737">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7738">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7738">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7739">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7739">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7740">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7740">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Call default radial progress bar background draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7751">gx_radial_progress_bar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7751">gx_radial_progress_bar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7752">Skapa radiell förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7752">Create radial progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7753">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7753">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_create(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *info,
    ULONG style
    USHORT id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7754">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7754">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7755">Den här tjänsten skapar en radiell förlopps indikator.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7755">This service creates a radial progress bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7756">Om widgeten format GX_STYLE_ENABLED används i förlopps indikatorn, accepterar förlopps indikatorn pen_down, pen_drag och pen_up inmatade för att ändra förlopps indikatorns aktuella värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7756">If the widget style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is applied to the progress bar, the progress bar will accept pen_down, pen_drag, and pen_up input to modify the progress bar current value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7757">Widgets formatet GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW kan användas för att rita förlopps indikatorns värde som text inom förlopps indikator området.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7757">The widget style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW can be used to enable drawing the progress bar value as text within the progress bar area.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7758">Om det här formatet används i kombination med formatet GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT visas förlopps indikatorns värde i procent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7758">If this style is used in combination with the style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT, the progress bar value is displayed as a percentage.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7759">Annars visas förlopps indikatorns värde som det aktuella vinkel värdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7759">Otherwise the progress bar value is displayed as the current angular value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7760">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7760">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7761">**förlopps indikator** Kontroll av pekare till radiellt förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7761">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7762">**förlopps** indikator pekare till kontroll block för radiellt förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7762">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7763">**namn** Namn på radiell förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7763">**name** Name of radial progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7764">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7764">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7765">**information** Pekare till en GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR-struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7765">**info** Pointer to a GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7766">**Bilaga I** innehåller en definition för GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR-strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7766">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7767">**stil** Typ av radiell förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7767">**style** Style of radial progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7768">**ID** -Programdefinierat ID för förlopps indikatorn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7768">**id** Application-defined ID of progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7769">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7769">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7770">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) skapa radiell förlopps indikator skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7770">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7771">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7771">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7772">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7772">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7773">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7773">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7774">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) ogiltig överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7774">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7775">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7775">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7776">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7776">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7777">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7777">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Create a radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar,
                    “my_progress_bar”, parent, &info,
                    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT |
                    GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW,
                    ID_MY_RADIAL_PROGRESS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been created. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7791">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7791">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7792">Den här tjänsten ritar en radiell förlopps indikator.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7792">This service draws a radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7793">Den här tjänsten används internt som den gx_radial_progress_bar_create funktionen refererar till, men exponeras för användning av programmet i de fall där programmet definierar en anpassad ritnings funktion för radiell förlopps indikator.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7793">This service is used internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7794">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7794">Parameters</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
```
