## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7812">gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7812">gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7813">Händelse för process radiell förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7813">Process radial progress bar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7814">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7814">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7815">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7815">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7816">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för en radiell förlopps indikator.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7816">This service processes a radial progress bar event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7817">Den här funktionen refereras internt av funktionen gx_radial_progress_bar_create, men exponeras för användning av programmet i de fall där programmet definierar en anpassad funktion för radiell förlopps händelse bearbetning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7817">This function is internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7818">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7818">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7819">**förlopps** indikator pekare till kontroll block för radiellt förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7819">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7820">**event_ptr** Pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7820">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7821">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7821">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7822">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) händelse process för radiell förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7822">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7823">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7823">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7824">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7824">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7825">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7825">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7826">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7826">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7827">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7827">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7828">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7828">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
        case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7871">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7871">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7872">**förlopps** indikator pekare till kontroll block för radiellt förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7872">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7875">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7875">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7877">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7877">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7879">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7879">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7880">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7880">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7881">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7881">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7882">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7882">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Set appearance information for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set(&my_progress_bar, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the appearance information of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7893">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7893">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7894">Ange textfärg för radiellt förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7894">Set radial progress bar text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7895">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7895">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7896">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7896">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7897">Den här tjänsten anger text färgen för den radiella förlopps indikatorn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7897">This service sets the text color of radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7898">Det här värdet används endast om formatet GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7898">This value is only used if the style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW is set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7899">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7899">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7900">**förlopps** indikator pekare till kontroll block för radiellt förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7900">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7901">**normal_color** Resurs-ID för text färgen i normalt läge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7901">**normal_color** Resource ID of text color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7902">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7902">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7903">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7903">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7904">**selected_color** Resurs-ID för textfärg när widgeten får fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7904">**selected_color** Resource ID of text color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7905">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7905">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7906">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7906">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7907">**disabled_color** Resurs-ID för text färgen om format GX_STYLE_ENABLED inte har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7907">**disabled_color** Resource ID of text color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7908">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7908">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7909">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7909">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7910">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7910">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) text färgs uppsättning för radiellt förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7913">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7913">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7914">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) ogiltig widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7914">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget check</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7915">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7915">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7916">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7916">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7917">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7917">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text color for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set(&my_progress_bar,
                            GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                            GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                            GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7928">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7928">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7929">Text för att rita radiell förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7929">Draw radial progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7930">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7930">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7931">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7931">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7932">Den här tjänsten ritar texten i den angivna radiella förlopps indikatorn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7932">This service draws the text of specified radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7933">Den här funktionen anropas internt som en del av gx_radial_progress_bar_draw (), men exponeras för programmet för att stödja de fall där programmet definierar en anpassad ritnings funktion för förlopps indikatorn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7933">This function is called internally as part of the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7934">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7934">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7935">**förlopps indikator** Pekare till kontroll block för radiellt förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7935">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7936">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7936">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7937">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7937">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7938">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7939">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7939">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7940">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7940">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw (&my_progress_bar);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_progress_bar” has been drawn. */

/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */
VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default radial progress bar text draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7951">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7951">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7952">Ange värde för radiell förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7952">Set radial progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7953">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7953">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, 
    GX_VALUE value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7954">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7954">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7955">Den här tjänsten anger värdet för radiell förlopps indikator.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7955">This service sets radial progress bar value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7956">Det tilldelade värdet är begränsat till intervallet [-360, 360], vilket definierar det möjliga intervallet med vinkel värden för den aktuella platsen för förlopps indikatorn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7956">The assigned value is limited to the range [-360, 360], defining the possible range of angular values for the progress bar current location.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7957">Programmet måste skala det verkliga värdet som anges för att tilldela ett vinkel värde till widgeten för förlopps indikatorn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7957">The application must scale the real-world value being indicated to assign an angular value to the progress bar widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7958">Förlopps indikatorn ritas så att det aktuella värdet anger vinkeln delta mellan ankar punkten och slut punkten för den övre bågen. Negativa värden gör att bågen ritas i en medsols riktning med början vid ankar positionen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7958">The progress bar is drawn such that the current value indicates the angular delta between the anchor position and the end point of the upper arc. Negative values cause the arc to be drawn in a clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7959">Positivt aktuellt värde gör att bågen ritas in i riktningen medurs som börjar vid fäst punkten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7959">Positive current value causes the arc to be drawn in a counter-clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7960">Om du till exempel vill rita en båge som börjar överst i bågen (12 klockan) och slutar till höger (tre klockan), tilldelar du ett ankar värde på 90 grader och ett aktuellt värde på-90 grader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7960">For example, to draw an arc starting at the top of the arc (12 o’clock position) and ending at the right (three o’clock position), assign an anchor value of 90 degrees and a current value of -90 degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7961">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7961">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7962">**förlopps** indikator pekare till kontroll block för radiellt förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7962">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7963">**värde** Nytt förlopps indikator värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7963">**value** New progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7964">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7964">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7965">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) värde uppsättning för radiell förlopps indikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7965">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7966">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7966">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7967">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltiga pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7967">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7968">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7968">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7969">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7969">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7970">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7970">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7971">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7971">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE new_value = 180;

/* Set value for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(&my_progress_bar,
                                        new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7982">gx_radio_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7982">gx_radio_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7983">Knappen Skapa alternativ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7983">Create radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7984">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7984">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_create(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, ULONG style,
    USHORT radio_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7985">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7985">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7986">Den här tjänsten skapar en alternativ knapp-widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7986">This service creates a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7987">GX_RADIO_BUTTON härleds från GX_TEXT_BUTTON och därför stöds alla gx_text_button tjänster också av den här widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7987">GX_RADIO_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and therefore all gx_text_button services are also supported by this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7988">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7988">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7989">**knapp** Pekare till kontroll block för radio knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7989">**button** Pointer to radio button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7990">**namn** Logiskt namn för widgeten alternativ knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7990">**name** Logical name of radio button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7991">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7991">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7992">**text_id** Resurs-ID för alternativ knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7992">**text_id** Resource ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7993">**stil** Typ av alternativ knapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7993">**style** Style of radio button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7994">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7994">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7995">**radio_button_id** Programdefinierat ID för alternativ knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7995">**radio_button_id** Application-defined ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7996">**storlek** Alternativ knappens mått</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7996">**size** Dimensions of radio button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7997">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7997">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7998">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) alternativ knapp har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7998">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-7999">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-7999">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8000">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8000">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8001">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8001">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8002">**GX_INVALID_** STORLEK (0x19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8002">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8003">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8003">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8004">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8004">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8005">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8005">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8006">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8006">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8007">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8007">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_radio_button”. */
status = gx_radio_button_create(&my_radio_button, “my_radio_button”, &my_parent,
                    MY_RADIO_BUTTON_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_RADIO_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radio button “my_radio_button” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8022">gx_radio_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8022">gx_radio_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8023">Knappen Rita alternativ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8023">Draw radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8024">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8024">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8025">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8025">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8026">Den här tjänsten ritar en alternativ knapp-widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8026">This service draws a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8027">Den här tjänsten anropas internt av GUIX-arbetsytans uppdatering, men kan också anropas av åsidosatta ritnings funktioner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8027">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8028">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8028">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8029">**knapp** Kontroll block för widgeten alternativ knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8029">**button** Pointer to radio button widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8030">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8030">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8031">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8031">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8032">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8032">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8033">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8033">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8034">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8034">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radio button drawing function. */

VOID my_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *radio_button)
{
    /* Call default radio button draw. */
    gx_radio_button_draw(radio_button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radio_button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8049">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8049">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8050">Ange pixelmaps för alternativ knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8050">Set pixelmaps for radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8051">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8051">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_disabled_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8052">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8052">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8053">Den här tjänsten tilldelar pixelmaps som ska visas med den angivna alternativ knappen för varje knapp läge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8053">This service assigns the pixelmaps to be displayed by the specified radio button for each button state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8054">Resurs-ID: n kan dupliceras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8054">The resource IDs can be duplicated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8055">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8055">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8056">**off_id** Pixelmap som används för alternativ knappens av tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8056">**off_id** Pixelmap used for radio button off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8057">**on_id** Pixelmap används för radio knapps läge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8057">**on_id** Pixelmap used for radio button on state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8058">**off_disabled_id** Pixelmap används för alternativ knappen inaktiverat och inaktiverat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8058">**off_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8059">**on_disabled_id** Pixelmap som används för alternativ knappen inaktiverat och på status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8059">**on_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and on state</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8060">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8060">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8061">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) alternativ knapp pixelmaps inställd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8061">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button pixelmaps set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8062">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8062">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8063">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8063">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8064">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8064">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8065">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8065">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8066">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8066">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8067">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8067">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap for “my_radio_button”. */
status = gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(&my_radio_button,
                                MY_OFF_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_OFF_DISABLED_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_DISABLED_PIXELMAP);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmaps for radio button “my_radio_button” has been set. */
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8099">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8099">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE anchor_angles[]={0, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180};
USHORT anchor_count = 7;

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                anchor_angles, anchor_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been set for “my_radial_slider”. */

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                GX_NULL, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been removed from “my_radial_slider”. */
```

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8182">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8182">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8183">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8183">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8184">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8184">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID animation_callback(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* This function will be called after each animation step,
    add custom code here. */
}

/* Set animation info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 15, 2,
                                GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT,
                                animation_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move with specified animation. */

/* Disable animation for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 0, 0,
                                        0, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move without animation. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8221">gx_radial_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8221">gx_radial_slider_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8222">Skapa radiellt skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8222">Create radial slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8223">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8223">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_create(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT slider_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8224">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8224">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8225">Den här tjänsten skapar en widget för radiellt skjutreglage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8225">This service creates a radial slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8226">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8226">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8227">**skjutreglage** Kontroll block för pekare till radiellt skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8227">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8228">**namn** Widgeten logiskt namn på radiell Slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8228">**name** Logical name of radial slider widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8229">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8229">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8230">**information** Definition av utseende för radiellt skjutreglage, **bilaga i** innehåller definition för GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8230">**info** Radial slider appearance definition, **Appendix I** contains definition to GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8231">**stil** Typ av alternativ knapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8231">**style** Style of radio button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8232">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8232">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8233">**radio_button_id** Programdefinierat ID för radiellt skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8233">**radio_button_id** Application-defined ID of radial slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8234">**storlek** Mått för radiellt skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8234">**size** Dimensions of radial slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8235">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8235">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8236">Skapa **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) radiellt skjutreglaget skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8236">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8237">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8237">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8238">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8238">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8239">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8239">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8240">**GX_INVALID_** STORLEK (0x19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8240">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8241">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) ogiltig överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8241">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8242">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8243">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8243">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8244">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8244">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 200, 200);

/* Create “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_create(&my_radial_slider,
                                “my_radial_slider”, &my_parent,
                                &info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                MY_RADIAL_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider “my_radial_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8279">gx_radial_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8279">gx_radial_slider_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8280">Process radiellt Slider-händelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8280">Process radial slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8281">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8281">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8287">**event_ptr** Pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8287">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8293">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8293">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8294">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8294">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8295">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8295">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
                    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8346">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8346">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Reset radial slider info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_info_set(&my_radial_slider, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider info of “my_radial_slider” has been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8384">gx_rich_text_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8384">gx_rich_text_view_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8385">Skapa en RTF-vy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8385">Create a rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8386">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8386">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_rich_text_view_create(
    GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS *fonts,
    USHORT id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8387">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8387">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8388">Den här tjänsten skapar en RTF-vy som anges.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8388">This service creates a rich text view as specified.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8389">**Formateringsmarkeringar används för att visa särskilda typer för text:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8389">**Formatting tags are used to display special types for text:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8390">**\<b>\</b>** Ange teckensnitt för text med användare angivet fetstilt teckensnitts-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8390">**\<b>\</b>** Set text font with user specified bold font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8391">**\<i>\</i>** Ange teckensnitt med användarens angivna kursiva teckensnitts-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8391">**\<i>\</i>** Set text font with user specified italic font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8392">**\<u>\</u>** Aktivera understrykning av text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8392">**\<u>\</u>** Enable text underline</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8393">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** Ange text teckensnitt med angivet teckensnitts-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8393">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** Set text font with specified font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8394">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** Ange text teckensnitt med angivet färg-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8394">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** Set text font with specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8395">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** Ange färg-ID för text markerings färg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8395">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** Set text highlight color specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8396">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** Ange text justering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8396">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** Set text alignment</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8397">**Exempel på användning av Taggar:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8397">**Examples of formatting tag usage:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8398">\<b>Detta är fet text< \b></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8398">\<b>This is bold text<\b></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8399">\<i>Detta är en kursiv text< \i></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8399">\<i>This is italic text<\i></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8400">\<u>Detta är text med understrykning< \u></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8400">\<u>This is text with underline<\u></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8401">\<f 0>Detta text teckensnitts-ID är inställt på 0< \f></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8401">\<f 0>This text font id is set to 0<\f></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8402">\<c 1>Detta text färg-ID är inställt på 1< \c></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8402">\<c 1>This text color id is set to 1<\c></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8403">\<hc 2>Det här text markerings färgs-ID: t är 2< \hc></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8403">\<hc 2>This text highlight color id is set to 2<\hc></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8404">\<align left> Den här texten är vänsterjusterad< \align></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8404">\<align left> This text is left aligned<\align></span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8405">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8405">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8406">**text_view** Pekare till RTF-visnings kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8406">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8407">**namn** Namn på Rich Text-vyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8407">**name** Name of the rich text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8408">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8408">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8409">**text_id** Resurs-ID för text strängen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8409">**text_id** Resource ID of the text string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8410">**teckensnitt** Visar teckensnitts information för Rich Text-vyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8410">**fonts** Pointer to the rich text view font information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8411">**Bilaga jag** innehåller en definition för GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS-strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8411">**Apendix I** contains definition to GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8412">**stil** Widgetens format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8412">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8413">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-speciella format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8413">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8414">**ID** -Programdefinierat ID för Rich Text-vyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8414">**id** Application-defined ID of the rich text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8415">**storlek** Storlek på Rich Text-vyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8415">**size** Size of the rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8416">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8416">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) framgångs rik text visning skapas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful rich text view creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8419">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8419">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8420">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8420">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8421">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8421">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8422">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8422">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8423">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8423">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8424">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8424">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW rich_view;
GX_RCIH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Defined widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 100, 100, 300, 150);

/* Define font information. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

/* Create rich text view widget. */
status = gx_rich_text_view_create(&rich_view, “my_rich_view”,
                                  parent, GX_STRING_ID_TEST_STRING,
                                  &fonts,
                                  GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                  MY_RICH_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the rich text view was successfully created. */

```

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8425">Demo programmet demo_guix_widget_types, som ingår i GUIX Studio-installationen, innehåller ett komplett exempel på hur du använder widgeten RTF-visning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8425">The demo application demo_guix_widget_types, provided as part of the GUIX Studio installation, provides a complete example of using the rich text view widget.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8430">gx_rich_text_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8430">gx_rich_text_view_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8431">Rita RTF-vy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8431">Draw rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8432">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8432">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8433">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8433">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8434">Den här tjänsten ritar den angivna RTF-widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8434">This service draws the specified rich text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8435">Den här tjänsten kallas vanligt vis internt av GUIX som en del av en uppdaterings åtgärd på arbets ytan, men den exponeras även för det program som kanske vill tillhandahålla en anpassad ritnings funktion och anropa standard bilden för RTF-visning som en anpassad ritnings bas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8435">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default rich text view drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8436">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8436">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8437">**text_view** Pekare till RTF-widget för widget av textvyer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8437">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8438">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8438">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8439">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8439">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8440">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8441">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8441">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8442">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8442">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Call default rich text view draw. */
    gx_rich_text_view_draw(text_view);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8447">gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8447">gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8448">Ange teckensnitt för Rich text-vy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8448">Set rich text view fonts</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8449">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8449">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS *fonts);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8450">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8450">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8451">Den här tjänsten anger teckensnitt för en RTF-widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8451">This service sets the fonts of a rich text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8452">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8452">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8453">**text_view** Pekare till RTF-widget för widget av textvyer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8453">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8454">**teckensnitt** Visar information om teckensnitts information i RTF-format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8454">**fonts** Pointer to rich text view font information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8455">**Bilaga jag** innehåller definitioner för att GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS-strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8455">**Apendix I** contains definitions to GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8456">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8456">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8457">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) RTF-teckensnitt har angetts för text visning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8457">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful rich text view fonts set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8458">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8458">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8459">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8459">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8460">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8460">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8461">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8461">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8462">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8462">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8463">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8463">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;

/* Replace the font ids as needed. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

/* Set the font of “my_rich_view”. */
status = gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set(&my_rich_view, &fonts);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font for rich text view “my_rich_view” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8468">gx_rich_text_view_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8468">gx_rich_text_view_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8469">Rita RTF-text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8469">Draw rich text view text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8470">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8470">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_rich_text_view_text_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8471">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8471">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8472">Den här stöd funktionen ritar text delen av en RTF-vy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8472">This support function draws the text portion of a rich text view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8473">Den här funktionen anropas internt av gx_rich_text_view_draw () och tillhandahålls som en separat API som bekvämlighet för program som definierar en anpassad ritnings funktion för RTF-visning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8473">This function is called internally by gx_rich_text_view_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom rich text view drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8474">Program som vill anpassa bakgrunds ritningen för RTF-vyer kan ge sin anpassade ritnings funktion och anropa gx_rich_text_view_text_draw-tjänsten som en del av den anpassade ritningen för att rita RTF-texten över bakgrunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8474">Applications that want to customize the rich text view background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_rich_text_view_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the rich text view text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8475">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8475">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8476">**text_view** Pekare till RTF-widget för widget av textvyer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8476">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8477">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8477">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8478">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8478">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8479">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8479">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8480">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8480">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8481">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8481">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw rich text view background. */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing. */
    gx_rich_text_view_text_draw();

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) rich_text_view);
}
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8486">gx_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8486">gx_screen_stack_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8487">Initiera en skärms tack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8487">Initialize a screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8488">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8488">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_create(
    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET **memory_buffer, 
    INT buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8489">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8489">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8490">Den här tjänsten initierar en skärms tack.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8490">This service initializes a screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8491">Programmet måste definiera det minnes block och den buffertstorlek som används för att implementera skärms tack funktionen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8491">The application must define the memory block and buffer size used to implement the screen stack feature.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8492">*Detta API är föråldrat och ersätts med gx_system_screen_stack_create (). Den här versionen tillhandahålls endast för bakåtkompatibilitet med tidigare biblioteks versioner..*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8492">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_create(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8493">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8493">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8494">**kontroll** Skärm bilds kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8494">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8495">**memory_buffer** Pekare till en minnesbuffert som används som en skärms tack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8495">**memory_buffer** Pointer to a memory buffer that used as a screen stack</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8496">**buffer_size** Minnes storlek i byte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8496">**buffer_size** Memory size in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8497">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8497">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8498">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades skapa skärm stack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8498">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8499">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8499">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8500">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) ogiltig buffertstorlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8500">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8501">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8501">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8502">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8502">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8503">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8503">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_SIZE 10

GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL my_stack_control;
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_SIZE];

/* Initialize “my_stack_control”. */
status = gx_screen_stack_create(&my_stack_control, screen_stack,
                        SCREEN_STACK_SIZE * sizeof(GX_WIDGET *));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen control block “my_stack control” has been initialized. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8504">Se även</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8504">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8505">gx_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8505">gx_screen_stack_push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8506">gx_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8506">gx_screen_stack_pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8507">gx_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8507">gx_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8508">gx_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8508">gx_screen_stack_pop</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8509">Ta bort den översta posten från skärm bilden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8509">Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8510">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8510">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_pop(GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8511">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8511">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8512">Den här tjänsten tar bort den översta posten från skärm bilden och kopplar den till den tidigare överordnade skärmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8512">This service removes the topmost entry from the screen stack, and attaches the popped screen to its previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8513">Detta API kopplar också bort alla befintliga underordnade från den överordnade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8513">This API also detaches any existing children from the parent.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8514">*Detta API är föråldrat och ersätts med gx_system_screen_stack_pop (). Den här versionen tillhandahålls endast för bakåtkompatibilitet med tidigare biblioteks versioner..*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8514">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8515">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8515">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8516">**kontroll** Skärm bilds kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8516">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8517">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8517">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) popup för skärms tack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8519">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8519">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8521">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8521">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8522">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8522">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8523">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8523">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack. */
status = gx_screen_stack_pop(&my_stack_control);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the topmost entry has been removed from the screen stack, 
    and the popped screen has been attached to its parent. */
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8528">gx_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8528">gx_screen_stack_push</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8529">Push-skärm och dess överordnade för stack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8529">Push screen and its parents to stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8530">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8530">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_push(
    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET *screen,
    GX_WIDGET *new_screen);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8531">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8531">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8532">Den här tjänsten kopplar bort skärmen från den överordnade och skickar skärm pekaren och den överordnade pekaren till skärm bilden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8532">This service detaches screen from its parent, and pushes the screen pointer and the parent pointer onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8533">Den nya skärm pekaren kopplas sedan till den överordnade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8533">The new screen pointer is then attached to the parent.</span></span>


> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8534">*Detta API är föråldrat och ersätts med gx_system_screen_stack_pop (). Den här versionen tillhandahålls endast för bakåtkompatibilitet med tidigare biblioteks versioner..*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8534">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8535">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8535">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8536">**kontroll** Skärm bilds kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8536">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8537">**skärm** Skärm pekare för att skicka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8537">**screen** Screen pointer to push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8538">**new_screen** Pekare på den nya skärmen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8538">**new_screen** Pointer of the new screen</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8539">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8539">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8540">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad skärm Stacks-push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8540">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8543">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8543">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8544">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8544">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8545">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8545">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Push “screen” and its parent to screen stack, Dettach “screen” from its parent, and attach “new screen” to the parent. */
status = gx_screen_stack_push(&my_stack_control,
                                screen, new_screen);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “screen” and its parent have been pushed to screen stack, “screen” has been detached from its parent, “new_screen” has been attached to the parent. */
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8550">gx_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8550">gx_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

