Den här versionen tillhandahålls endast för bakåtkompatibilitet med tidigare biblioteks versioner..*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8555">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8561">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8561">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8568">gx_scroll_thumb_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8568">gx_scroll_thumb_create</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8570">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8570">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_thumb_create(
    GX_SCROLL_THUMB *scroll_thumb,
    GX_SCROLLBAR *parent, ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8571">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8571">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8572">Den här tjänsten skapar en rullnings-och miniatyr List.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8572">This service creates a scroll thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8573">Den här tjänsten kallas vanligt vis internt när en GX_SCROLLBAR skapas, men görs offentlig för att tillåta anpassade SCROLLBAR-implementeringar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8573">This service is normally called internally when a GX_SCROLLBAR is created, but is made public in order to allow custom scrollbar implementations.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8574">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8574">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8575">**scroll_thumb** Kontroll block för rullnings knapp i widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8575">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8576">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad rullnings List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8576">**parent** Pointer to parent scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8577">**stil** Typ av widget för rullnings List.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8577">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8578">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8578">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8579">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8579">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8580">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) slutför rullnings knapp skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8580">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8581">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8581">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8582">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8582">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8583">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8583">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8584">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8584">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8585">Den överordnade widgeten **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8585">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8586">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8586">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8587">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8587">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_THUMB my_scroll_thumb;

/* Create scroll thumb “my_scroll_thumb”. */
status = gx_scroll_thumb_create(&my_scroll_thumb, &my_scrollbar,
                                GX_STYLE_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll thumb “my_scroll_thumb” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8592">gx_scroll_thumb_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8592">gx_scroll_thumb_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8594">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8594">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_scroll_thumb_draw(GX_SCROLL_THUMB *scroll_thumb);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8595">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8595">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8596">Den här tjänsten ritar en rullnings-och miniatyr List.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8596">This service draws a scroll thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8597">Den här tjänsten anropas internt av GUIX-arbetsytans uppdatering, men kan också anropas av åsidosatta ritnings funktioner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8597">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8599">**scroll_thumb** Kontroll block för rullnings knapp i widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8599">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8600">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8600">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8601">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8601">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8602">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8602">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom scroll thumb drawing function. */

VOID my_scroll_thumb_draw(GX_SCROLL_THUMB *thumb)

    /* Call default scroll thumb draw. */

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8608">gx_scroll_thumb_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8608">gx_scroll_thumb_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8609">Händelse för process rullnings knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8609">Process scroll thumb event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8610">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8610">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(
    GX_SCROLL_THUMB *scroll_thumb,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8611">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8611">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8612">Den här tjänsten hanterar händelser som skickas till en rullnings list för rullnings List.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8612">This service handles events sent to a scrollbar thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8613">Den här tjänsten används vanligt vis internt av GUIX, men har gjorts offentlig för att hjälpa till med att implementera anpassade rullnings beteenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8613">This service is normally used internally by GUIX, but is made public to assist with implementing custom scrollbar behaviors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8614">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8614">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8615">**scroll_thumb** Kontroll block för rullnings knapp i widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8615">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8616">**händelse** Pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8616">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8617">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8617">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) händelse process för rullnings knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8621">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8621">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8622">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8622">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8623">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8623">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8624">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8624">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_SCROLL_THUMB *thumb, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8628">gx_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8628">gx_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8629">Skapa en widget för bas rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8629">Create a base scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8630">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8630">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_create( 
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8631">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8631">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8632">Den här tjänsten skapar en allmän widget för rullnings hjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8632">This service creates a generic scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8633">Ett generiskt rullnings hjul är den grundläggande widgeten för alla typer av rullnings hjul, inklusive *gx_text_scroll_wheel*\* \* som är grunden för *gx_numeric_scroll_wheel*\* \* och *gx_string_ scroll_wheel*\* \* widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8633">A generic scroll wheel is the base widget for all scroll wheel widget types, including the *gx_text_scroll_wheel*\*\* which is the base for *gx_numeric_scroll_wheel*\*\* and *gx_string_ scroll_wheel*\*\* widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8634">Widgeten bas rullnings hjul innehåller händelse hantering, rullnings bar animering och vald rad beräkning för alla typer av rullnings hjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8634">The base scroll wheel widget provides event handling, scrolling animation, and selected row calculation for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8635">Program skapar vanligt vis inte en instans av en generisk widget för rullnings hjul, eftersom den här widgeten-typen inte ger någon ritnings funktion.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8635">Applications would not normally create an instance of a generic scroll wheel widget, since this widget type provides no drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8636">Åtkomst till det här API: et är dock avsedd att hjälpa program som behöver skapa en anpassad widget för rullnings hjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8636">However access to this API is provided to assist applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8637">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL baseras på GX_WINDOW och därför kan alla GX_WINDOW-API: er användas med GX_SCROLL_WHEEL och widgetar som härletts från GX_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8637">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL is based on GX_WINDOW, and therefore all GX_WINDOW APIs may be used with GX_SCROLL_WHEEL and widgets derived from GX_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8638">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8638">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8639">**hjul** Pekare till generiskt kontroll block för rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8639">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8640">**namn** Namn på programtilldelad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8640">**name** Application assigned widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8641">**överordnad** Överordnad widget eller GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8641">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8642">**total_rows** Totalt antal tillgängliga rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8642">**total_rows** Total available rows</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8643">**stil** Format flaggor för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8643">**style** Widget style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8644">**ID** för tilldelad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8644">**id** Application assigned widget ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8645">**storlek** Rektangel som definierar den inledande widgetens storlek.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8645">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8646">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8646">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8647">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) rullnings hjul har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8647">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8648">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8648">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8649">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8649">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8650">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig kontroll block storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8650">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8651">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8651">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8652">Den överordnade widgeten **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8652">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8653">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8653">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8654">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8654">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8655">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8655">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic create function during custom widget createl. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_create(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
                    GX_WIDGET *parent,
                    INT total_rows, ULONG style,
                    USHORT id,
                    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* create base widget as part of custom create */
    status = gx_scroll_wheel_create(wheel, name, parent,
                            total_rows, style, id, size);

    /* If status is GX_SUCCESS the base scroll wheel has been created. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8675">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8675">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8676">Händelse bearbetnings funktion för widgeten allmän rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8676">Event processing function for generic scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8677">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8677">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8678">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8678">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8679">Den här tjänsten tillhandahåller grundläggande hantering av ingångs händelser för alla widgetar av typen rullnings hjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8679">This service provides the basic input event handling for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8680">Den här funktionen exponeras för program varan för att hjälpa till med program som behöver skapa en anpassad widget för rullnings hjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8680">This function is exposed to the application software to assist with applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8681">Program skulle ofta tillhandahålla sin egen händelse bearbetnings funktion, men anropar den allmänna händelse bearbetningen för hjul-widgetar för händelser som de inte behöver anpassa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8681">Applications would often provide their own event processing function, but invoke the generic event processing for wheel widgets for events that they do not need to customize.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8682">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8682">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8683">**hjul** Pekare till generiskt kontroll block för rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8683">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8684">**händelse** GX_EVENT pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8684">**event** GX_EVENT pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8685">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8685">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8686">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har rullat hjul händelse process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8686">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8687">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8687">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8688">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8688">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8689">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8689">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8690">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8690">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8691">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8691">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8692">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8692">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic scroll wheel event processing 
    as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_event_process(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scroll wheel
            event processing */
        gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8712">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8712">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8713">Tilldela tonings-alpha-värden för valfri överläggs toning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8713">Assign gradient alpha values for optional overlay gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8714">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8714">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha,
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8715">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8715">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8716">Den här tjänsten definierar de första och sista alfa värdena för ett valfritt övertonings överlägg av widgeten rullnings hjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8716">This service defines the starting and ending alpha values for an optional gradient overlay of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8717">Alla widgetar för rullnings hjul stöder en "tona"-påverkan av rullnings hjulets rader som rader närmast den övre och nedre kanten av widgeten rullnings hjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8717">All scroll wheel widgets support a “fade” effect of the scroll wheel rows as the rows near the top and bottom edge of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8718">Den här toningen utförs genom att rita en övertonings Pixelmap över rullnings hjulets rader, vilket gör att raderna visas för att tona ut när raderna ritas längst upp och längst ned i widgeten rullnings hjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8718">This fade effect is accomplished by drawing a gradient pixelmap over the scroll wheel rows, which make the rows appear to fade out as the rows are drawn near the top and bottom of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8719">Med den här API-tjänsten kan programmet ändra tonings effekterna eller inaktivera den här inställningen helt genom att ange värdena för start och slut till 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8719">This API service allows the application to modify the fading effect intensity, or disable this effect entirely by setting the start and end alpha values to 0.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8720">Gradient-Pixelmap skapas vid körning när rullnings hjulet ursprungligen blir synligt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8720">The gradient pixelmap is created at runtime when the scroll wheel initially becomes visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8721">Detta kräver att en Memory Allocation service Runtime har definierats med hjälp av _gx_system_memory_allocator_set ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8721">This requires that a runtime memory allocation service has been defined using _gx_system_memory_allocator_set().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8722">Om ingen funktion för allokering av minne har definierats skapas inte tonings avbildningen och ingen tonings påverkan blir tillgänglig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8722">If no memory allocator function has been defined, the gradient image will not be created and no fade effect will be available.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8723">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8723">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8724">**hjul** Pekare till generiskt kontroll block för rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8724">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8725">**start_alpha** Överläggets toning startar alpha-värdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8725">**start_alpha** The overlay gradient starting alpha value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8726">**end_alpha** Överläggets slut för and lutande alfa värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8726">**end_alpha** The overlay gradient ending alpha value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8727">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8727">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8728">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har ställt in musens tonings alfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8728">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the scroll wheel gradient alpha</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8729">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8729">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8730">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8730">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8731">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8731">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8732">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8733">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8733">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8734">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8734">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set(&wheel, 240, 0);
/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the wheel gradient alpha values were
Successfully assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8754">gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8754">gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8755">Tilldela rad höjden för varje hjul rad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8755">Assign the row height for each wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8756">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8756">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_VALUE row_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8757">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8757">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8758">Den här tjänsten tilldelar rad höjden för varje rad i rullnings hjulet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8758">This service assigns the row height for each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8759">Observera att om rullnings hjulet har format GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND passerar rad höjden genom en transformering som i praktiken minskar rad höjden som raden närmast den övre eller nedre kanten på hjulet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8759">Note that if the scroll wheel has style GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND, the row height passes through a transform which effectively reduces the row height as the row nears the top or bottom edge of the wheel.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8760">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8760">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8761">**hjul** Pekare till generiskt kontroll block för rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8761">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8762">**row_height** Värdet radhöjd i bild punkter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8762">**row_height** Row height value, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8763">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8763">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8764">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett rullnings hjulets höjd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8764">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8765">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8765">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8766">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8766">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8767">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8767">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8768">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8768">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8769">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8769">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8770">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8770">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set(&wheel, 40);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the wheel row height has been set to 40
pixels. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8790">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8790">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8791">Tilldela en bakgrunds bild för vald Wheel-rad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8791">Assign background image for wheel selected row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8792">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8792">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL*wheel, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID image_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8793">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8793">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8794">Den här tjänsten tilldelar ett valfritt Pixelmap-ID som ritas bakom den valda raden av rullnings hjulet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8794">This service assigns an optional pixelmap ID that is drawn behind the selected row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8795">Detta kan användas för att markera den markerade raden så att användaren enkelt kan särskilja den rad i rullnings hjulet som är markerad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8795">This can be used to highlight the selected row so that the user can easily distinguish which row of the scroll wheel is selected.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8796">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8796">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8797">**hjul** Pekare till generiskt kontroll block för rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8797">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8798">**image_id** Pixelmap-ID som ska användas som den valda rad bakgrunds bilden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8798">**image_id** Pixelmap ID to use as the selected row background image.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8799">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8799">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8800">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett rullnings hjulets bakgrund</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8800">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel background</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8802">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8802">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8803">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8803">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8804">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8804">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8805">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8805">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8806">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8806">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(&wheel,
GX_PIXELMAP_ID_SELECTED_ROW);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the background image has been
assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8826">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8826">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8827">Hämta den markerade hjul raden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8827">Retrieve the currently selected wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8828">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8828">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT *row);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8829">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8829">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8830">Den här tjänsten kommer att fråga rullnings hjulet för att hämta den markerade raden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8830">This service will query the scroll wheel to retrieve the currently selected row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8831">Anroparen måste skicka platsen för att returnera det valda rad indexet som den andra parametern till den här funktionen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8831">The caller must pass the location to return the selected row index as the second parameter to this function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8832">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8832">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8833">**hjul** Pekare till generiskt kontroll block för rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8833">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8834">**rad** Den plats där det valda rad värdet kommer att returneras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8834">**row** Location in which selected row value will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8835">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8835">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har hämtat den valda hjul raden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved selected wheel row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8837">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8837">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8838">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8838">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8839">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x19)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8839">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x19) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8840">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8840">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8841">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8841">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8842">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8842">Example</span></span>

```C
INT row;
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get(&wheel, &row);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the selected row has been returned in
the row variable. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8862">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8862">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8863">Tilldela den markerade rullnings hjuls raden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8863">Assign selected scroll wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8864">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8864">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT row);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8865">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8865">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8866">Den här tjänsten tilldelar den markerade rullnings hjul raden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8866">This service assigns the currently selected scroll wheel row.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8867">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8867">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8868">**hjul** Pekare till generiskt kontroll block för rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8868">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8869">**rad** Raden för rullnings hjulet som ska markeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8869">**row** Row of the scroll wheel to be selected.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8870">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8870">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8871">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har ställt in den valda hjul raden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8871">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the selected wheel row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8872">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8872">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8873">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8873">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8874">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8874">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8875">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8875">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8876">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8876">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8877">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8877">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set(&wheel, 20);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel has been set to select
row 20 */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8897">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8897">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8898">Tilldela rullnings hastighet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8898">Assign scrolling speed</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8899">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8899">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_FIXED_VAL start_speed_rate,
    GX_FIXED_VAL end_speed_rate,
    GX_VALUE max_steps,
    GX_VALUE delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8900">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8900">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8901">Den här tjänsten tilldelar rullnings hastigheten för widgeten rullnings hjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8901">This service assigns the scrolling speed for the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8902">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8902">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8903">**hjul** Pekare till generiskt kontroll block för rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8903">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8904">**start_speed_rate** Frekvensen för rullnings start hastigheten till Snärtningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8904">**start_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling start speed to flick speed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8905">**end_speed_rate** Frekvensen för rullnings slut hastigheten till Snärtningen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8905">**end_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling end speed to flick speed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8906">**max_steps** Max steg för rullning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8906">**max_steps** Max steps for scrolling.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8907">**fördröjning** Fördröjnings tid för varje steg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8907">**delay** Delay time of each step.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8908">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8908">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8909">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett hjul hastighet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8909">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set wheel speed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8910">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8910">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8911">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8911">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8912">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8912">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8913">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) ogiltigt värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8913">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8914">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8914">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8915">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8915">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8916">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8916">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set(&wheel, GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(2),
                                GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2, 10, 2);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel speed has been
successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8936">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8936">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8937">Tilldela det totala antalet rullnings hjuls rader tillgängliga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8937">Assign the total scroll wheel rows available</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8938">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8938">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT total_rows);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8939">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8939">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8940">Den här tjänsten tilldelar antalet rader som är tillgängliga i det angivna rullnings hjulet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8940">This service assigns the number of rows available in the indicated scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8941">Widgeten rullnings hjul tar vanligt vis emot rad innehållet från programmet i form av en sträng mat ris eller en sträng data som anges av användaren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8941">The scroll wheel widget usually receives the row content from the application in the form of an array of strings or user supplied string data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8942">Detta API informerar rullnings hjulet för det totala antalet rader som ska visas för användaren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8942">This API informs the scroll wheel of the total number of rows that should be presented to the user.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8943">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8943">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8944">**hjul** Pekare till generiskt kontroll block för rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8944">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8945">**total_rows** Totalt antal hjul rader att presentera för användaren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8945">**total_rows** Total number of wheel rows to present to the user.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8946">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8946">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har ställt in total rad för rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel total row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8948">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8948">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8949">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8949">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8950">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8950">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8951">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) ogiltigt värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8951">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8952">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8952">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8953">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8953">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8954">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8954">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(&wheel, 100);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel has been changed to
display 100 total rows */
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8973">gx_scrollbar_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8973">gx_scrollbar_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8974">Rita rullnings List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8974">Draw scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8975">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8975">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8976">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8976">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8977">Den här tjänsten ritar en rullnings List.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8977">This service draws a scrollbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8978">En gemensam ritnings funktion används för widgetar både lodräta och vågräta rullnings lister.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8978">A common drawing function is used for both vertical and horizontal scrollbar widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8979">Den här tjänsten anropas internt av GUIX-arbetsytans uppdatering, men kan också anropas av åsidosatta ritnings funktioner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8979">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8980">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8980">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8981">**rullnings List** Widgeten rullnings list för att rita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8981">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8982">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8982">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8983">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8983">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8984">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8984">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8985">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8985">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8986">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8986">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom scrollbar drawing function. */

VOID my_scrollbar_draw(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar)
{
    /* Call default scrollbar draw. */
    gx_scrollbar_draw(thumb);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8993">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8993">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8994">Process rullnings händelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8994">Process scrollbar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8995">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8995">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_event_process(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8996">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8996">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8997">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en rullnings händelse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8997">This service processes a scrollbar event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8998">En vanlig händelse hanterings funktion som används för widgetar både lodräta och vågräta rullnings lister.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8998">A common event handling function used for both vertical and horizontal scrollbar widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-8999">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-8999">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9000">**rullnings List** Kontroll block för rullnings List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9000">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9001">**händelse** Pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9001">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9002">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9002">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9003">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) händelse process för lyckad rullnings List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9003">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9004">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9004">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9005">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9005">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9006">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9006">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9007">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9007">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9008">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9008">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9009">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9009">Example</span></span>

```C
Call generic scrollbar event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scrollbar_event_process(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
                                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scrollbar
            event processing */
        gx_scrollbar_event_process(scrollbar, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9037">gx_scrollbar_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9037">gx_scrollbar_reset</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9038">Återställ rullnings List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9038">Reset scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9039">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9039">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_reset(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9040">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9040">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9041">Den här tjänsten återställer rullnings listen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9041">This service resets the scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9042">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9042">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9043">**rullnings List** Kontroll block för rullnings List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9043">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9044">**information** Pekare till GX_SCROLL_INFO-strukturen som definierar rullnings gränsen, det aktuella värdet och steget eller ökningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9044">**info** Pointer to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure that defines the scrollbar limits, current value, and step or increment.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9045">**Bilaga i** innehåller en definition för GX_SCROLL_INFO-strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9045">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9046">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9046">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9047">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) återställning av lyckad rullnings List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9047">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar reset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9048">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9048">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9049">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9049">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9050">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9050">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9051">Rullnings informationen för **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9051">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9052">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9052">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9053">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9053">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9054">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9054">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Reset scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */

GX_SCROLL_INFO my_info;

my_info.gx_scroll_value = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_minimum = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_maximum = 100;
my_info.gx_scroll_visible = 10;
my_info.gx_scroll_increment = 1;

status = gx_scrollbar_reset(&my_scrollbar, &my_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9061">gx_scrollbar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9061">gx_scrollbar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9062">Tilldela ScrollBar-värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9062">Assign scrollbar value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9063">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9063">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    INT value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9064">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9064">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9065">Den här tjänsten tilldelar den aktuella ScrollBar-värdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9065">This service assigns the current scrollbar value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9066">En GX_EVENT_VERTICAL_SCROLL-eller GX_EVENT_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL-händelse kommer att genereras till det överordnade fönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9066">A GX_EVENT_VERTICAL_SCROLL or GX_EVENT_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL event will be generated to the parent window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9067">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9067">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9068">**rullnings List** Kontroll block för rullnings List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9068">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9069">**värde** Nytt rullnings värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9069">**value** New scrollbar value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9070">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9070">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) händelse process för lyckad rullnings List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9072">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9072">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9073">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9073">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9074">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9074">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9075">Rullning svärdet för **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9075">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll value is not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_backspace"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9085">gx_single_line_text_input_backspace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9085">gx_single_line_text_input_backspace</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9087">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9087">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_backspace(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9089">Den här tjänsten tar bort tecknen innan markörens position för text.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9089">This service deletes the character before text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9090">Den här tjänsten kallas internt när en nyckel för Backsteg-händelsen tas emot, men kan också anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9090">This service is called internally when a backspace key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9096">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9096">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9097">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9097">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9098">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9098">Allowed From</span></span>


## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_character_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9196">gx_single_line_text_input_character_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9196">gx_single_line_text_input_character_delete</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9197">Ta bort specialtecknet vid den aktuella markörens position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9197">Delete the character at the current cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9198">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9198">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_character_delete(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9199">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9199">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9200">Den här tjänsten tar bort specialtecknet efter markörens position för text ingång.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9200">This service deletes the character after the text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9201">Den här tjänsten anropas internt när händelsen ta bort nyckel tas emot, men kan också anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9201">This service is called internally when a delete key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9202">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9202">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9203">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för text insignal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9203">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9204">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9204">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9205">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) tog bort ett blank steg efter markören</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9205">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully delete a character after the cursor</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9206">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9206">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9207">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9207">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9208">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9208">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9209">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9209">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9210">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9210">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9211">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9211">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Delete the character after the cursor of “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_character_delete(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the character after the cursor has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9234">gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9234">gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9235">Infoga en tecken sträng vid aktuell markör position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9235">Insert a character string at current cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9236">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9236">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9237">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9237">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9238">Den här tjänsten infogar en tecken sträng i bufferten för text ingångs sträng vid den aktuella pekar positionen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9238">This service inserts a character string into the text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9239">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9239">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9240">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för text insignal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9240">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9241">**insert_str** Tecken sträng som ska infogas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9241">**insert_str** Character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9242">**insert_size** Antal byte som ska infogas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9242">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9243">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9243">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har infogat tecknen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9247">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9247">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9248">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9248">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9249">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9249">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9250">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9250">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */

GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert(&my_text_input,
                                            insert_text,
                                            GX_STRLEN(insert_text));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget has successfully insert the string. */
```
