## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9272">gx_single_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9272">gx_single_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9273">Skapa en widget för text inflöde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9273">Create a text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9274">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9274">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_create(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    UINT style, USHORT text_input_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9275">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9275">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9276">Den här tjänsten skapar en widget för text inflöde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9276">This service creates a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9277">Anroparen måste tillhandahålla lagring för Indatasträngen och ange den maximala längden för strängen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9277">The caller must provide storage for the input string and indicate the maximum length of the string.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9278">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT härleds från GX_PROMPT och därför kan alla gx_prompt tjänster användas med GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9278">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_PROMPT and therefore all gx_prompt services may be used with GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9279">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9279">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9280">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för text insignal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9280">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9281">**namn** Logiskt namn för valfri widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9281">**name** Optional widget logical name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9282">**överordnad** Valfri överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9282">**parent** Optional parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9283">**input_buffer** Lagring för Indatasträngen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9283">**input_buffer** Storage for input string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9284">**buffer_size** Storlek på lagrings plats för inkommande sträng, i byte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9284">**buffer_size** Size of input string storage area, in bytes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9285">**stil** Stil flaggor för text inspelning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9285">**style** Text input style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9286">**text_input_id** Valfritt ID för widgeten indatamängd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9286">**text_input_id** Optional ID of the input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9287">**storlek** Rektangel som definierar ursprunglig widgets storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9287">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9288">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9288">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad text inmatare skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9290">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9290">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9292">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9292">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9293">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9293">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9294">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9294">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9295">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9295">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9296">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9296">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9297">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9297">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
static GX_CHAR           text_input_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE             size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 110, 40);

/* Create single-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
                        “text_input”, GX_NULL, text_input_buffer, 100,
                        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, 0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input widget has been created. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9321">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9321">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_single_line_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9322">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9322">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9323">Den här tjänsten ritar en widget för text inmatare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9323">This service draws a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9324">Den här tjänsten kallas vanligt vis internt under uppdatering av arbets ytan, men kan också anropas från funktioner för anpassad text indragnings funktion.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9324">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom text input drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9325">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9325">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9326">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för text insignal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9326">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9327">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9327">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9328">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9328">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9329">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9329">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9330">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9330">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9331">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9331">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
    /* Call default single line text input draw. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw(input);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9353">gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9353">gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9354">Hämta start position för text ritning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9354">Retrieve text draw start position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9355">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9355">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_VALUE *xpos, GX_VALUE *ypos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9356">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9356">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9357">Den här tjänsten hämtar start positionen för text inmatnings text.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9357">This service retrieves the draw start position of text input text.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9358">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9358">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9359">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för text insignal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9359">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9360">**Xpos** Start position för hämtat rit objekt i x-koordinat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9360">**xpos** Retrieved draw start position in x coordinate</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
GX_VALUE xpos;
GX_VALUE ypos;

    /* Draw background. */
    gx_widget_border_draw(input, border_color, upper_fill_color,
                          lower_fill_color, GX_TRUE);

    /* Retrieve text draw start position. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(input, xpos,
                                                ypos);

    /* Add your text drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_end"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9389">gx_single_line_text_input_end</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9389">gx_single_line_text_input_end</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9391">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9391">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_end(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9392">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9392">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9393">Den här tjänsten placerar widgeten för text inmatade markör i slutet av Indatasträngen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9393">This service positions the text input widget cursor at the end of the input string.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9394">Den här tjänsten anropas internt när en end Key Down-händelse tas emot, men kan också anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9394">This service is called internally when an end key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9400">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9400">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9401">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9401">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9426">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9426">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9427">Händelse bearbetnings funktion för widget för text indata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9427">Text input widget event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9428">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9428">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9429">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9429">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9430">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en enskild text ingångs händelse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9430">This service processes a single line text input event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9431">Den här funktionen refereras internt av funktionen gx_single_line_text_input_create, men exponeras för användning av programmet i de fall där programmet definierar en anpassad händelse bearbetnings funktion för text i en enskild rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9431">This function is internally referenced by the gx_single_line_text_input_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom single line text input event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9432">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9432">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9433">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för text insignal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9433">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9434">**event_ptr** Pekare till GX_EVENT-struktur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9434">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9435">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9435">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) text inmatad händelse har bearbetats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed text input event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9437">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9437">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9439">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9439">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9440">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9441">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9441">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9442">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9442">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic single line text input event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_sl_text_input_event_process(
                                GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
                                GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default single line
            text input event processing */
        status =
        gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(input, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9464">gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9464">gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9465">Ange bakgrunds färg för text i en linje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9465">Set single line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9466">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9466">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9467">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9467">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9468">Den här tjänsten anger fyllnings färgen för text ingången i en rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9468">This service sets the fill color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9469">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9469">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9470">**text_input** Pekare till text ingångs kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9470">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9471">**normal_fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för widgetens fyllnings färg i normalt läge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9471">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9472">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9472">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9473">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9473">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9474">**selected_fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för widgetens fyllnings färg när widgeten får fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9474">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9475">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9475">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9476">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9476">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9477">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för widgetens fyllnings färg när formatet GX_STYLE_ENABLED inte har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9477">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9478">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9478">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9479">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9479">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9480">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för widgetens fyllnings färg när båda formaten GX_STYLE_ENABLED och GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9480">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when both style GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY are set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9481">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9481">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9482">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9482">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9483">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9483">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9484">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) text med fyllnings färg uppsättning för enkel linje text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9484">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9485">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9485">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9486">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9486">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9487">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9487">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9488">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9488">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9489">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9489">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9490">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9490">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” was
set. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9512">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9512">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9513">Flytta text inmatade markören till Start positionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9513">Move the text input cursor to the home position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9514">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9514">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_home(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9515">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9515">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9516">Den här tjänsten flyttar markörens position för text insättning till början av Indatasträngen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9516">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the input string.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9517">Den här tjänsten anropas internt när en händelse för start nyckel tas emot, men kan också anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9517">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9518">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9518">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9519">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för text insignal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9519">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9520">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9520">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9521">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har flyttat markören till Start positionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9521">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the home position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9522">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9522">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9523">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9523">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9524">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9524">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9525">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9525">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9526">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9526">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9527">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9527">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor to the start of the input text. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_home(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor has been moved to the home position */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9549">gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9549">gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9550">Flytta insättnings punkten ett steg till vänster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9550">Move input cursor one character to the left</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9551">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9551">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9552">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9552">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9553">Den här tjänsten flyttar text ingångs markören ett tecken till vänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9553">This service moves the text input cursor one character to the left.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9554">Den här tjänsten anropas internt när en vänster Key Down-händelse tas emot, men kan också anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9554">This service is called internally when a left key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9586">gx_single_line_text_input_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9586">gx_single_line_text_input_position_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9587">Flytta markören till pixel position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9587">Move cursor to pixel position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9588">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9588">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_position_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    INT pixel_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9589">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9589">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9590">Den här tjänsten placerar text ingångs markören baserat på den begärda pixel positionen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9590">This service positions the text input cursor based on the requested pixel position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9591">Markörens index för text indatamängd beräknas baserat på x-värdet för pixel positionen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9591">The text input cursor index will be calculated based on the x value of the pixel position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9592">Den här tjänsten kallas internt när en Penn händelse tas emot, men kan också anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9592">This service is called internally when a pen down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9593">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9593">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9594">**text_input** Kontroll block för widget för text insignal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9594">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9595">**pixel_position** X-värde för pixel position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9595">**pixel_position** X value of pixel position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9596">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9596">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9597">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett markören till begärd position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9597">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the cursor to requested position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9598">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9598">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9599">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9599">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9600">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9600">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9601">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9601">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9602">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9602">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C

                                                100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget cursor has been positioned */
```

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_style_add(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9665">Den här tjänsten lägger till den eller de angivna stilarna i widgeten för text indatamängden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9665">This service adds the specified style(s) to the single line text input widget.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9673">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9673">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_style_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9769">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9769">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9770">Ange textfärg för texttext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9770">Set single line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9771">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9771">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9772">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9772">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9773">Den här tjänsten anger text färgen för text ingången i en rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9773">This service sets the text color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9774">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9774">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9775">**text_input** Pekare till text ingångs kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9775">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9776">**normal_text_color_id** Resurs-ID för text färgen i normalt läge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9776">**normal_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9777">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9777">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9778">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9778">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9779">**selected_text_color_id** Resurs-ID för text färgen när widgeten får fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9779">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9780">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9780">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9781">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9781">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9782">**disabled_text_color_id** Resurs-ID för text färgen när formatet GX_STYLE_ENABLED inte har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9782">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9783">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9783">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9784">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9784">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9785">**readonly_text_color_id** Resurs-ID för text färgen när båda formaten GX_STYLE_ENABLED och GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9785">**readonly_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when both style GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY are set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9786">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9786">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9787">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9787">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9788">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9788">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9789">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) text med text färg uppsättning med texttext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9789">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9790">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9790">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9791">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9791">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9792">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9792">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9793">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9793">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9794">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9794">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9795">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9795">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text color “my_text_input” was set. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9817">gx_single_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9817">gx_single_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9818">Markera text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9818">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9819">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9819">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9820">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9820">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9821">Den här tjänsten väljer text med det angivna start-och slut markerings indexet och markerar den markerade texten med de valda fyllnings-och text färgerna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9821">This service selects text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9822">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9822">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9823">**text_input** Pekare till text ingångs kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9823">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9824">**start_index** Index för det första markerade specialtecknet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9824">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9825">**end_index** Index för det senast markerade specialtecknet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9825">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9826">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9826">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9827">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) text markerings text för text markering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9827">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9828">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9828">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9829">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9829">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9830">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9830">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9831">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) index värde är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9831">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9832">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9832">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9833">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9833">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9834">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9834">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select text between index [0, 9]. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_select(&my_text_input,
                                                0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```


## <a name="gx_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9912">gx_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9912">gx_slider_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9913">Skapa skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9913">Create slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9914">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9914">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_create(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, INT tick_count,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *slider_info,
    ULONG style, USHORT slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9915">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9915">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9916">Den här tjänsten skapar en widget för skjutreglage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9916">This service creates a slider widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9917">GX_SLIDER härleds från GX_WIDGET, och därför kan alla gx_widget API-tjänster användas med GX_SLIDER typ widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9917">GX_SLIDER is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_SLIDER type widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9918">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9918">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9919">**skjutreglage**: kontroll block för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9919">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9920">**namn**: namnet på skjutreglaget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9920">**name**: Name of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9921">**överordnad**: pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9921">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9922">**tick_count**: antal Tick för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9922">**tick_count**: Number of slider ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9923">**slider_info**: pekar på Slider-information som är en struktur som används för att skicka skjutreglagets värde gränser, nålventil och placering och andra skjutreglagets parametrar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9923">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider info which is a structure used to pass the slider value limits, slider needle size and position, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9924">**Bilaga i** innehåller en definition för GX_SLIDER_INFO-strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9924">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9925">**format**: skjutreglagets typ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9925">**style**: Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9926">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9926">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9927">**slider_id**: Programdefinierat ID för skjutreglaget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9927">**slider_id**: Application-defined ID of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9928">**storlek**: dimensioner för skjutreglaget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9928">**size**: Dimensions of slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9929">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9929">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9930">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) klart skjutreglaget har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9930">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9931">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9931">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9932">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9932">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9933">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0X13) widgeten har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9933">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9934">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9934">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9935">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: 0x12 överordnade widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9935">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9936">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9936">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9937">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9937">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9938">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9938">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create slider “my_slider”. */

GX_SLIDER my_slider;
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;

info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

status = gx_slider_create(&my_slider, “my_slider”,
    &my_parent, 10, info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SLIDER, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider “my_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9953">gx_slider_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9953">gx_slider_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9954">Skjutreglage för rit objekt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9954">Draw slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9955">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9955">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9956">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9956">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9957">Den här tjänsten ritar ett skjutreglage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9957">This service draws a slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9958">Den här tjänsten används internt av funktionen gx_slider_create, men exponeras också för användning av programmet i dessa instanser när en anpassad ritnings funktion för skjutreglage har definierats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9958">This service is used internally by the gx_slider_create function, but is also exposed for use by the application in those instances when a custom slider drawing function is defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9959">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9959">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9960">**skjutreglage**: kontroll block för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9960">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9961">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9961">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9962">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9962">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9963">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9963">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9964">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9964">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9965">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9965">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Call default slider draw. */
    gx_slider_draw(slider);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9980">gx_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9980">gx_slider_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9981">Händelse för process Slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9981">Process slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9982">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9982">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_event_process(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9983">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9983">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9984">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en Slider-händelse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9984">This service processes a slider event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9985">Den här funktionen refereras internt av funktionen gx_slider_create, men exponeras för användning av programmet i de fall där programmet definierar en anpassad bearbetnings funktion för Slider-händelsen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9985">This function is internally referenced by the gx_slider_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom slider event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9986">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9986">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9987">**skjutreglage**: kontroll block för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9987">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9988">**händelse**: pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9988">**event**: Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9989">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9989">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9990">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) slutfört skjutreglage händelse process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9990">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9991">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9991">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9992">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9992">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9993">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9993">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9994">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9994">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9995">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9995">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-9996">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-9996">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic slider event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_slider_event_process(GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default slider event processing */
            status = gx_slider_event_process(slider, event);
            break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10011">gx_slider_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10011">gx_slider_info_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10012">Ange block för Slider-information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10012">Set slider information block</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10013">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10013">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_info_set(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10014">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10014">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10015">Den här tjänsten tilldelar angiven Slider-information, till exempel skjutreglaget minimum, skjutreglaget maximalt och aktuellt värde för skjutreglaget till det angivna skjutreglaget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10015">This service assigns the specified slider information such as slider minimum, slider maximum, and slider current value to the indicated slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10016">Skjutreglaget uppdaterar nål och ritar om baserat på den nya Slider-informationen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10016">The slider will update the needle position and redraw based on the new slider information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10017">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10017">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10018">**skjutreglage**: kontroll block för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10018">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10019">**info**: pekar på informations strukturen för skjutreglaget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10019">**info**: Pointer to the slider information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10020">**Bilaga i** innehåller en definition för GX_SLIDER_INFO-strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10020">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10021">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10022">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har angett information om skjutreglaget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10022">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set slider information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10024">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10024">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10026">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10026">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10027">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10027">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10028">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10028">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO my_slider_info;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;

my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

/* Set slider information for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_info_set (&my_slider, &my_slider_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_slider” is configured with my_slider_info. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_needle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10043">gx_slider_needle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10043">gx_slider_needle_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10044">Nål för Rita-skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10044">Draw slider needle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10045">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10045">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10046">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10046">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10047">Den här tjänsten ritar ett Barr för skjutreglaget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10047">This service draws a slider needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10048">Den här tjänsten anropas automatiskt av funktionen gx_slider_draw, men kan också anropas av programmet som en del av en anpassad ritnings funktion för skjutreglage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10048">This service is automatically called by the gx_slider_draw function, but may also be invoked by the application as part of a customized slider drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10049">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10049">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10050">**skjutreglage**: kontroll block för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10050">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10051">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10051">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10052">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10052">**None**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10054">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10054">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10055">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10055">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default tickmarks draw. */
    gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(slider);

    /* Call default slider needle draw. */
    gx_slider_needle_draw(slider);
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_needle_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10070">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10070">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10071">Hämta Slider-position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10071">Get slider needle position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10072">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10072">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_needle_position_get(
    GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *slider_info,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10073">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10073">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10074">Den här tjänsten beräknar skjutreglagets nålventil baserat på det aktuella Slider-värdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10074">This service computes the slider needle position based on the current slider value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10075">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10075">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10076">**skjutreglage**: kontroll block för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10076">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10077">**slider_info**: pekar på informations strukturen för Slider som definierar skjutreglagets gränser, nålans storlek och förskjutning och andra Slider-parametrar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10077">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider information structure defining the slider limits, needle size and offset, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10078">**Bilaga i** innehåller en definition för GX_SLIDER_INFO-strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10078">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10079">**return_position**: pekare till målet för barr position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10079">**return_position**: Pointer to destination for needle position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10080">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10080">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10081">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckat skjutreglaget positions position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10081">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider needle position get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10082">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10082">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10083">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10083">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10084">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10084">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10085">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0X22) skjutreglaget är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10085">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10086">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10086">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10087">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10087">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10088">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10088">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE needle_position;

/* Get the needle position for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_needle_posistion_get(&my_slider, &slider_info,
    &needle_position);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the needle position for slider “my_slider” has been retrieved. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10105">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10105">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10106">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10107">Den här tjänsten ritar skjutreglaget kal streck.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10107">This service draws the slider tickmarks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10108">Den här funktionen anropas internt av funktionen gx_slider_draw, men exponeras för användning av program som kan implementera en anpassad ritnings funktion för skjutreglage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10108">This function is called internally by the gx_slider_draw function, but is exposed for use by applications that might implement a custom slider drawing function.</span></span>

```C
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_travel_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10130">gx_slider_travel_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10130">gx_slider_travel_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10131">Hämta skjutreglaget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10131">Get slider travel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10132">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10132">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_travel_get(
    GX_SLIDER *widget,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    INT *return_min_travel, 
    INT *return_max_travel);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10133">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10133">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10134">Den här tjänsten hämtar skjutreglaget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10134">This service gets the slider travel.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10135">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10135">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10136">**skjutreglage**: kontroll block för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10136">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10137">**info**: pekar på informations struktur för Slider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10137">**info**: Pointer to slider info structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10138">**Bilaga i** innehåller en definition för GX_SLIDER_INFO-strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10138">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10139">**return_min_travel**: pekare till målet för minsta res värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10139">**return_min_travel**: Pointer to destination for minimum travel value</span></span></td>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10140">**return_max_travell**: pekare till mål för maximalt res värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10140">**return_max_travell**: Pointer to destination for maximum travel value</span></span></td>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10141">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10141">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10142">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) slutfört skjutreglaget Hämta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10142">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider travel get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10143">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10143">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10144">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10144">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10145">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10145">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10146">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0X22) skjutreglaget är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10146">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10147">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10147">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10148">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10148">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10149">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10149">Example</span></span>

```C

    &my_min_travel, &my_max_travel);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the travel max/min values for slider “my_slider” have been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_value_calculate"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10164">gx_slider_value_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10164">gx_slider_value_calculate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10165">Beräkna Slider-värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10165">Calculate slider value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10166">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10166">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_value_calculate(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    INT new_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10167">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10167">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10168">Den här tjänsten beräknar skjutreglagets värde baserat på den nål positionen för skjutreglaget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10168">This service calculates the slider value based on the slider needle position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10169">Den här funktionen anropas internt av GUIX när användaren flyttar skjutreglaget, men kan också anropas av programmet vid implementering av en widget för anpassade skjutreglage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10169">This function is called internally by GUIX when the user moves the slider needle, but can also be invoked by the application when implementing a custom slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10170">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10170">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10171">**skjutreglage**: kontroll block för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10171">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10172">**info**: pekar mot Slider-information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10172">**info**: Pointer to slider info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10173">**Bilaga i** innehåller en definition för GX_LISDER_INFO-strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10173">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LISDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10174">**new_position**: ny Slider-placering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10174">**new_position**: New slider position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10175">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10175">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10176">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) slutfört skjutreglaget värde beräkna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10176">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider value calculate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10178">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10178">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10180">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0X22) skjutreglaget är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10180">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10181">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10181">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10182">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10182">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10183">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10183">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Calculate new value for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_value_calculate(&my_slider,
    &my_slider.gx_slider_info, new_slider_position);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider value of “my_slider” has been calculated. */

```
