## <a name="gx_slider_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10198">gx_slider_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10198">gx_slider_value_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10199">Ange skjutreglagets värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10199">Set slider value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10200">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10200">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_value_set(
    GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info, 
    INT new_value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10201">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10201">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10202">Den här tjänsten anger skjutreglagets värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10202">This service sets the slider value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10203">Detta API kan anropas av programmet för att flytta ett skjutreglage under program kontroll, vilket kringgår behovet av användarindata för att dra reglaget till Barr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10203">This API can be called by the application to move a slider needle under program control, bypassing the need for user input to drag the slider needle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10204">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10204">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10205">**skjutreglage**: kontroll block för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10205">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10206">**info**: pekar på informations struktur för Slider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10206">**info**: Pointer to slider info structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10207">**Bilaga i** innehåller definition som GX_SLIDER_INFO struktur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10207">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10208">**new_value**: nytt Slider-värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10208">**new_value**: New slider value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10209">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10209">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10210">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckades skjutreglagets värde uppsättning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10210">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10211">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10211">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10212">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10212">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10213">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10213">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10214">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10214">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10215">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10215">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10216">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10216">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set new value for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_value_set(&my_slider,
    &my_slider.gx_slider_info, new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new value has been set for slider “my_slider”. */
```

##  <a name="gx_sprite_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10231">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10231">gx_sprite_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10232">Skapa en sprite-widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10232">Create a sprite widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10233">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_create(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_SPRITE_FRAME *frame_list,
    USHORT frame_count,
    ULONG style, USHORT sprite_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10234">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10235">Den här tjänsten skapar en GX_SPRITE-widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10235">This service creates a GX_SPRITE widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10236">En sprite används för att visa en sekvens med pixelmaps som i en animering, eller så kan den användas som en Pixelmap för flera tillstånds skärmar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10236">A sprite is used to display a sequence of pixelmaps as in an animation, or can be used as a multi-state pixelmap display widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10237">GX_SPRITE härleds från GX_WIDGET och stöder alla gx_widget API-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10237">GX_SPRITE is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10238">Widgeten GX_SPRITE kräver en matris med GX_SPRITE_FRAME strukturer för att definiera Sprite-animeringen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10238">The GX_SPRITE widget requires an array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures to define the sprite animation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10239">**Bilaga i** innehåller en definition för GX_PRITE_FRAME-strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10239">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_PRITE_FRAME structure.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10240">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10240">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10241">**Sprite**: kontroll block för Sprite-widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10241">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10242">**namn**: valfritt Sprite-namn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10242">**name**: Optional sprite name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10243">**överordnad**: pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10243">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10244">**frame_list**: en matris med GX_SPRITE_FRAME strukturer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10244">**frame_list**: An array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10245">**frame_count**: anger antalet poster i list rutans matris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10245">**frame_count**: specifies the number of entries in the frame list array</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10246">**format**: typ av Sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10246">**style**: Style of sprite.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10247">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10247">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10248">**sprite_id**: Programdefinierat ID för Sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10248">**sprite_id**: Application-defined ID of sprite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10249">**storlek**: mått för Sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10249">**size**: Dimensions of sprite</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10250">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10250">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10251">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckad Sprite-skapande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10251">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful sprite create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10252">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10252">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10253">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10253">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10254">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0X13) widgeten har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10254">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10255">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: 0x12 överordnade widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10255">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10256">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10256">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10257">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10257">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10258">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10258">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create sprite “my_sprite”. */

status = gx_sprite_create(&my_sprite, “my_sprite”,
    &my_parent,
    sprite_frame_list, frame_count,
    GX_STYLE_SPRITE_AUTO|GX_STYLE_SPRITE_LOOP,
    ID_MY_SPRITE, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_sprite_current_frame_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10264">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10264">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10265">Tilldela Sprite-ram</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10265">Assign sprite frame</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10266">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10266">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_current_frame_set(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, 
    USHORT frame);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10267">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10268">Den här tjänsten tilldelar den aktuella Sprite-ramen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10268">This service assigns the current sprite frame.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10269">Om en GX_SPRITE-widget inte körs automatiskt, kan den användas som en kontrollerad tillstånds lampa för att visa den kommando rads Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10269">If a GX_SPRITE widget is not auto-running, it can be used as a program controlled state light, displaying the commanded frame pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10270">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10270">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10271">**Sprite**: kontroll block för Sprite-widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10271">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10272">**ram**: Sprite-ram som ska visas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10272">**frame**: Sprite frame to display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10273">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10273">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10274">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10274">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10275">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10275">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10276">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10276">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10277">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10277">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10278">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10278">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10279">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10279">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10280">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10280">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign frame number 3 as the current sprite frame */
status = gx_sprite_current_frame_set(&my_sprite, 3);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” will display frame index 3. */
```

## <a name="gx_sprite_frame_list_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10286">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10286">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10287">Tilldela eller ändra en sprite-bildruta-lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10287">Assign or alter a sprite frame list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10288">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10288">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_frame_list_set(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite,
    GX_SPRITE_FRAME *frame_list,
    USHORT frame_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10289">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10289">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10290">Den här tjänsten kan användas för att tilldela eller tilldela om List rutan som används av en sprite-widget efter att widgeten Sprite har skapats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10290">This service can be used to assign or re-assign the frame list used by a sprite widget after the sprite widget has been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10291">Information om innehållet i en sprite-Rams lista finns i gx_sprite_create API-dokumentationen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10291">For information about the contents of a sprite frame list, refer to the gx_sprite_create API documentation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10292">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10292">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10293">**Sprite**: kontroll block för Sprite-widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10293">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10294">**frame_list**: matris med GX_SPRITE_FRAME strukturer eller GX_NULL om det inte visas någon ram.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10294">**frame_list**: Array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures or GX_NULL if no frame list.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10295">**frame_count**: antal ramar i list rutans matris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10295">**frame_count**: Number of frames in frame list array</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10296">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10296">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10297">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) bild Rute uppsättning för bild listan har slutförts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10297">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful sprite frame list set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10298">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10298">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10299">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10299">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10300">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10300">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10301">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10301">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10302">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10302">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10303">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10303">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign framelist_1, which has 10 frames, to my_sprite */
status = gx_sprite_frame_list_set(&my_sprite, framelist_1, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new frame list is now associated with this sprite */
```

## <a name="gx_sprite_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10309">gx_sprite_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10309">gx_sprite_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10310">Starta en sprite-körnings ordning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10310">Start a sprite run sequence</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10311">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10311">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_start(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, 
    USHORT frame);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10312">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10312">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10313">Den här tjänsten startar en sprite-sekvens för automatisk körning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10313">This service starts a sprite auto-run sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10314">Widgeten Sprite kommer att gå igenom Sprite-bild rutorna tills den sista ramen har nåtts, eller köras kontinuerligt om GX_SPRITE_LOOP formatet har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10314">The sprite widget will cycle through the sprite frames until the last frame is reached, or will run continuously if the GX_SPRITE_LOOP style is set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10315">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10315">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10316">**Sprite**: kontroll block för Sprite-widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10316">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10317">**ram**: inledande Sprite-ram som ska visas, vanligt vis bild ruta 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10317">**frame**: Initial sprite frame to display, usually frame 0</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10318">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10318">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10319">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) startade Sprite-körning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10319">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully started sprite run</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10320">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10320">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10321">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10321">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10322">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10322">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10323">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10323">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10324">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10324">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10325">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10325">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start the sprite “my_sprite” */
status = gx_sprite_start(&my_sprite, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” will start running */
```

## <a name="gx_sprite_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10331">gx_sprite_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10331">gx_sprite_stop</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10334">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10334">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10335">Den här tjänsten stoppar en sprite-sekvens för automatisk körning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10335">This service stops a sprite auto-run sequence.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10336">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10336">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10338">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10339">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) körning av Sprite har stoppats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10339">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully stopped sprite run</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10341">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10341">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10342">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10342">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10343">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10343">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10344">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10344">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10345">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10345">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Stop the sprite sequence */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” is stopped. */
```

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10351">gx_string_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10351">gx_string_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10352">Skapa en rullnings hjul för sträng typ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10352">Create a string type scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10353">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10353">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string_list, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT Id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10354">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10354">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10355">Den här tjänsten skapar en rullnings hjul för sträng typ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10355">This service creates a string type scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10356">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL härleds från GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL, och därför kan alla gx_text_scroll_wheel API-funktioner användas med GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10356">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL, and therefore all gx_text_scroll_wheel API functions maybe be used with GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL widgets.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10357">Programmet kan skicka i en enkel sträng mat ris till funktionen Create som definierar de strängar som ska visas av rullnings hjulet, eller så kan programmet skicka GX_NULL som string_list parameter och anropa `gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set()` API: et för att tillhandahålla en matris med sträng-ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10357">The application can pass in a simple string array to the create function which defines the strings that will be displayed by the scroll wheel, or the application can pass GX_NULL as the string_list parameter and call the `gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set()` API to provide an array of String IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10358">Om den sistnämnda metoden används, växlar sträng rullnings hjul automatiskt de visade strängarna om det aktiva programmets språk ändras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10358">If the latter method is used the string scroll wheel will automatically switch the displayed strings if the active application language is modified.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10359">Alternativt, om strängarna som ska visas inte är statiskt definierade eller inte vet när rullnings hjulet skapas, kan programmet skicka GX_NULL som parameter för sträng listan och anropa API-funktionen gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set () för att definiera en callback-funktion som innehåller de strängar som ska visas i real tid som krävs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10359">As an alternative, if the strings to be displayed are not statically defined or not know at the time the scroll wheel is created, the application can pass GX_NULL as the string list parameter, and call the API function gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set() to define a callback function which will provide the strings to be displayed in a real-time as-needed basis..</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10360">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10360">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10361">**hjul**: kontroll block adress för sträng rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10361">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10362">**namn**: Programdefinierat widgets namn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10362">**name**: Application defined widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10363">**överordnad**: överordnad hjul eller GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10363">**parent**: Wheel parent or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10364">**total_rows**: totalt antal rader som ska visas för användaren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10364">**total_rows**: Total rows to be presented to user</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10365">**string_list**: statiskt definierad sträng mat ris eller GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10365">**string_list**: Statically defined string array, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10366">**format**: önskade stil flaggor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10366">**style**: Desired style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10367">**ID**: programdefinierade hjul stils flaggor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10367">**Id**: Application defined wheel style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10368">**storlek**: inledande rullnings hjul storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10368">**size**: Initial scroll wheel size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10369">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10369">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10370">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) skapade sträng rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10370">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully created string scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10371">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10371">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10372">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10372">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10373">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0X13) widgeten har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10373">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10374">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10374">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10375">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10375">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10376">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10376">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10377">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10377">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *days[] = {
    “Sunday”,
    “Monday”,
    “Tuesday”,
    “Wednesday”,
    “Thursday”,
    “Friday”,
    “Saturday”
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Create the string scroll wheel. */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “Day Wheel”,
    root, 7, days,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND,
    ID_SCROLL_WHEEL_DAY, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string scroll wheel has been created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10399">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10399">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10400">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för det angivna sträng rullnings hjulet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10400">This service processes an event for the specified string scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10401">Den här tjänsten ska anropas som standard händelse hanterare av eventuella anpassade händelse bearbetnings funktioner för String-hjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10401">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom string scroll wheel event processing functions.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10407">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10407">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10408">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10408">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10409">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10409">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10410">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10410">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10411">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10411">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10412">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10412">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic string scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_string_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default string scroll wheel event processing */
        status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10431">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10431">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10434">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10434">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10435">Den här tjänsten tilldelar en matris med sträng-ID: n till en widget för String-rullnings hjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10435">This service assigns an array of string IDs to a string scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10436">Den här metoden för att tilldela strängar till ett sträng rullnings hjul rekommenderas om strängarna definieras statiskt och widgeten måste köras på flera språk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10436">This method of assigning strings to a string scroll wheel is recommended if the strings are statically defined and the widget must operate in multiple languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10437">Om detta API ska användas bör du först skapa widgeten rullnings hjul med en GX_NULL sträng lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10437">If this API is to be used, the scroll wheel widget should first be created with a GX_NULL string list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10438">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10438">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10439">**hjul**: kontroll block adress för sträng rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10439">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10440">**string_id_list**: matris med sträng-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10440">**string_id_list**: Array of String IDs</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10441">**id_count**: ID-listans storlek.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10441">**id_count**: Size of the ID list.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10442">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10442">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10443">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har angett sträng-ID-matris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10443">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set string ID array</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10444">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10444">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10445">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10445">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10446">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10446">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10447">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: 0X22) ogiltig storlek på ID-lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10447">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: 0x22) Invalid ID list size</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST RESOURCE_ID wheel_ids[] = {
    GX_STRING_ID_SUNDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_MONDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_TUESDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_WEDNESDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_THURSDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_FRIDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_SATURDAY
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the ID list has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10469">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10469">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10470">Tilldela sträng mat ris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10470">Assign array of strings</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10471">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10471">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string_list, 
    INT string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10472">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10472">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10473">Detta tilldelar en matris med strängar till en widget för att rulla med en String-hjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10473">This assigns an array of strings to a string scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10474">Detta kan användas för att ändra de strängar som visas när widgeten ursprungligen har skapats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10474">This can be used to modify the strings displayed after the widget has initially been created.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10475">Observera att string_scroll_wheel inte stöder GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, och därför bör matrisen med strängar som överförs till den här funktionen definieras statiskt av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10475">Note that string_scroll_wheel does not support GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, and therefore the array of strings passed into this function should be statically defined by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10476">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10476">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10477">**hjul**: kontroll block adress för sträng rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10477">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10478">**string_list**: matris med sträng pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10478">**string_list**: Array of string pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10479">**string_count**: sträng mat ris storlek.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10479">**string_count**: Size of the string array.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10480">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10480">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10481">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har ändrat strängar för rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10481">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully changed strings for scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10482">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10482">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10483">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10483">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10484">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10484">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10485">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0X22) ogiltig storlek på sträng lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10485">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Invalid string list size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10486">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10486">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10487">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10487">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10488">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10488">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *days[] = {
    “Sunday”,
    “Monday”,
    “Tuesday”,
    “Wednesday”,
    “Thursday”,
    “Friday”,
    “Saturday”
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Set the array of strings to the scroll wheel. */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set(&wheel, days, 7);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string array has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_studio_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10507">gx_studio_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10507">gx_studio_widget_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10508">Skapa widget som definierats i filen med skapade specifikationer för Studio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10508">Create widget defined in Studio generated specifications file</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10509">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10509">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *gx_studio_widget_create(
    GX_BYTE *control,
    GX_CONST GX_STUDIO_WIDGET *definition, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10510">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10510">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10511">Den här tjänsten skapar en widget och widgetens underordnade med en widget som definieras i filen GUIX Studio Generated Specifications.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10511">This service creates a widget and the widget’s children using a widget specification defined within the GUIX Studio generated specifications file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10512">Med den här funktionen undviks "efter namn"-sökningen av den liknande funktionen `gx_studio_named_widget_create()` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10512">This function avoids the “by name” lookup of the similar function `gx_studio_named_widget_create()`.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10513">GX_STUDIO_WIDGETs strukturen definieras i huvud filen för programspecifikationer som genererades av GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10513">The GX_STUDIO_WIDGET structure is defined in the application specifications header file generated by GUIX Studio.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10514">För statiskt allokerade widgetar definieras widgetens kontroll block i den genererade specifikationer. c-filen och angivet widgets namn som definierats i GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10514">For statically allocated widgets, the widget control block is defined in the generated specifications.c file, and given the widget name defined within GUIX Studio.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10515">För dynamiskt allokerade widgetar ska programmet pass GX_NULL som kontroll block adressen för widgeten och funktionen försöker dynamiskt allokera widgets kontroll blocket med hjälp av `gx_system_memory_allocate()` funktionen, som också definieras av och tillhandahålls av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10515">For dynamically allocated widgets, the application should pass GX_NULL as the widget control block address and the function will attempt to dynamically allocate the widget control block using the `gx_system_memory_allocate()` function, which is also defined by and provided by the application.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10516">För att ett program ska referera direkt till widgeten GUIX Studio i den genererade filen med specifikationer, är det nödvändigt att följa namngivnings konventionen som används av kod generatorn för GUI Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10516">For an application to directly reference the GUIX Studio widget definition within the generated specifications file, it is necessary to follow the naming convention utilized by the GUI Studio code generator.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10517">GX_STUDIO_WIDGETs strukturen som genererades i filen Specifications. c namnges alltid enligt denna konvention: <widget_name>_define, där fältet <widget_name> kan upprepas flera gånger om widgeten är underordnad en underordnad widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10517">The GX_STUDIO_WIDGET structure generated within the specifications.c file is always named according to this convention: <widget_name>_define, where the <widget_name> field may be repeated multiple times if the widget is child of a child widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10518">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10518">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10519">**kontroll** Pekar mot widgeten kontroll block, eller GX_NULL om dynamiskt allokeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10519">**control** Pointer to widget control block, or GX_NULL if dynamically allocated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10520">**definition** Definitions struktur för skapade Studio-widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10520">**definition** Studio generated widget definition structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10521">**överordnad** pekare till den överordnade widgeten, om det finns</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10521">**parent** pointer to the widget parent, if any</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10522">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10522">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10523">Pekar på det skapade kontroll blocket för widgeten eller GX_NULL om skapandet misslyckades.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10523">Pointer to the created widget control block, or GX_NULL if the creation was not successful.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10524">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10524">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10525">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10525">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10526">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10526">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget “playlist_screen”, which is statically allocated. */

widget = gx_studio_widget_create(&playlist_screen,
    &playlist_screen_define,
    root_window);

/* If widget != GX_NULL the widget was created. */

/* create the widget “songs_screen”, which is dynamically allocated */

widget = gx_studio_widget_create(GX_NULL,
    &songs_screen_define, root_window);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10528">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10528">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_studio_named_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10529">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10529">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10530">Skapa widget som definierats i filen med skapade specifikationer för Studio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10530">Create widget defined in Studio generated specifications file</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10531">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10531">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT *gx_studio_named_widget_create(
    char *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **new_widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10532">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10532">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10533">Den här tjänsten skapar en widget och widgetens underordnade med en widget som definieras i filen GUIX Studio Generated Specifications.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10533">This service creates a widget and the widget’s children using a widget specification defined within the GUIX Studio generated specifications file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10534">Den här API-funktionen används för att skapa skärmar på den översta nivån med det skärm namn som anges i GUIX Studio-programmet som definitions identifierare för widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10534">This API function is used to create top-level screens using the screen name specified within the GUIX Studio application as the widget definition identifier.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10535">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10535">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10536">**namn**: skärm namnet enligt definitionen i GUIX Studio-programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10536">**name**: Screen name as defined within GUIX Studio application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10537">**överordnad**: pekar mot överordnad widget, om det finns</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10537">**parent**: pointer to the widget parent, if any</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10538">**new_widget**: widgeten plats för att returnera skapade widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10538">**new_widget**: location to return created widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10539">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10539">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10540">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10540">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10541">Det gick inte att hitta **GX_FAILURE**: (0X11) med namngiven widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10541">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Named widget could not be found</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10542">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10542">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10543">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10543">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10544">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10544">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget named “child_popup”,
   which is a child of the top-level screen “main_screen”. */

GX_WIDGET *menu_screen;

status = gx_studio_named_widget_create(“main_menu”,
    &root_window, &menu_screen);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the screen was created
   and linked to the root window. */
```

## <a name="gx_studio_display_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10547">gx_studio_display_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10547">gx_studio_display_configure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10548">Konfigurera bildskärm som definierats i GUIX Studio-projekt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10548">Configure display defined in GUIX Studio project</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10549">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10549">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT *gx_studio_display_configure(
    USHORT display,
    UINT (*driver)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    USHORT language, 
    USHORT theme,
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT **return_root);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10550">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10550">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10551">Den här tjänsten initierar en GX_DISPLAY så att den är redo att användas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10551">This service initializes a GX_DISPLAY so that it is ready for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10552">Den här funktionen konsoliderar funktionerna för att initiera ett GX_DISPLAY kontroll block, skapar en arbets yta för att anpassa visningen och skapar ett rot fönster för arbets ytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10552">This function consolidates the functions to initialize a GX_DISPLAY control block, create a canvas to fit the display, and create a root window for the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10553">Den här funktionen installerar även det språk-och resurs tema som begärs när visningen har initierats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10553">This function also installs the language and resource theme requested after the display has been initialized.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10554">Den här funktionen konsoliderar den programmerings ansträngning som oftast krävs för att förbereda en visning för användning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10554">This function consolidates the programming effort most commonly required to prepare a display for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10555">Funktionen anropar gx_display_create (), gx_display_color_table_set, gx_display_font_table_set, gx_display_pixelmap_table_set, gx_system_language_table_set, gx_system_active_language_set, gx_system_scroll_appearance_set, gx_canvas_create och gx_window_root_create funktioner, som i annat fall skulle krävas av program programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10555">The function invokes the gx_display_create(), gx_display_color_table_set, gx_display_font_table_set, gx_display_pixelmap_table_set, gx_system_language_table_set, gx_system_active_language_set, gx_system_scroll_appearance_set, gx_canvas_create, and gx_window_root_create functions, all or some of which would otherwise be required by the application program.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10556">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10556">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10557">**Display**: index i visnings tabellen, som motsvarar visnings definitionerna i Studio-projektfilen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10557">**display**: Index into the display table, which corresponds to the display definitions in the Studio project file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10558">**driv rutin**: pekare för att Visa initierings funktionen för driv rutinen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10558">**driver**: pointer to display driver initialization function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10559">Den här funktionen anropas för att initiera de indirekta funktions punkterna i GX_DISPLAY kontroll blocket, samt utföra eventuella nödvändiga maskin varu installationer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10559">This function is invoked to initialize the indirect function pointers of the GX_DISPLAY control block, as well as perform any required hardware setup.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10560">**språk**: index för ursprungligt språk tabell</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10560">**language**: initial language table index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10561">**språk**: inledande tema index</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10561">**language**: initial theme index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10562">**root**: pekare till variabel i vilken du vill returnera rot fönster adressen eller GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10562">**root**: pointer to variable in which to return root window address, or GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10563">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10563">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10564">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10564">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10565">Det gick inte att initiera visning av **GX_FAILURE**: (0x11)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10565">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Display could not be initialized</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10566">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10566">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10567">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10567">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10568">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10568">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget named “child_popup”, which is a child of the
   top-level screen “main_screen”. */

GX_WIDGET *menu_screen;

status = gx_studio_display_configure(MAIN_DISPLAY,
    my_driver_setup, LANGUAGE_ENGLISH, DEFAULT_THEME, GX_NULL);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the display was initialized, a canvas was
created for the display, a root window was created for the canvas, and
the requested language and theme have been installed.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_system_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10579">gx_system_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10579">gx_system_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10580">Ange aktivt språk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10580">Set active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10581">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10581">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_active_language_set(GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10582">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10582">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10583">Den här tjänsten anger det aktuella språket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10583">This service set the current language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10584">Språk indexet måste vara mindre än antalet kolumner i program Strängs tabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10584">The language index must be less than the number of columns in the application string table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10585">Den här funktionen har ersatts av gx_display_active_language_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10585">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_active_language_set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10586">Alla nya program bör använda gx_display_active_langauge_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10586">All new applications should use gx_display_active_langauge_set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10587">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10587">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10588">**språk**: språk index, definierat i resurs huvud filen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10588">**language**: Language index, defined in resource header file.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10589">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10589">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10590">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har angett ett aktivt språk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10590">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set active language</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10591">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: \* \* (0X11) ogiltig anropare av den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10591">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: \*\* (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10592">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: \* \* (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10592">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: \*\* (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10593">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: \* \* (0X22) ogiltigt språk index</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10593">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: \*\* (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10594">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10594">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10595">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10595">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10596">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10596">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set active language and mark widget canvas as dirty. */
status = gx_system_active_language_set(ID_LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_animation_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10601">gx_system_animation_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10601">gx_system_animation_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10602">Hämta kontroll block för animering från poolen system</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10602">Obtain animation control block from system pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10603">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10603">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_animation_get(GX_ANIMATION **animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10604">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10604">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10605">Den här tjänsten kan användas för att hämta ett kontroll block för animering från en pool av sådana kontroll block som underhålls av gx_system-komponenten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10605">This service can be used to obtain an animation control block from a pool of such control blocks maintained by the gx_system component.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10606">Animeringssekvensen för animeringssekvenser och relaterade API-tjänster anges bara om konstanten GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE definieras med värdet 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10606">The animation control block pool and related API services are only provided if the constant GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE is defined with a value 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10607">Standardinställningen för det här värdet är 6, vilket innebär att systemanimeringens Control Block-pool innehåller storlek GX_ANIMATION kontroll block.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10607">The default setting for this value is 6, meaning that the system animation control block pool contains size GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10608">Ett animerat kontroll block som tilldelas med detta API returneras automatiskt till den kostnads fria poolen om animeringen körs för slut för ande.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10608">An animation control block allocated using this API is automatically returned to the free pool if the animation runs to completion.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10609">Om animeringen stoppas med hjälp av gx_animation_stop eller inte kan startas på grund av ett returnerat fel, ska kontroll blocket för animeringen returneras till den kostnads fria poolen av programmet med hjälp av gx_system_animation_free.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10609">If the animation is stopped using gx_animation_stop, or fails to be started due to some returned error, the animation control block should be returned to the free pool by the application using gx_system_animation_free.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10610">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10611">**animering**: adress för den pekare som ska ta emot GX_ANIMATION pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10611">**animation**: Address of pointer to receive GX_ANIMATION pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10612">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10612">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10613">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) hämtade kontroll block för animering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10613">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully obtained animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10614">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10614">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10615">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig animeringseffekt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10615">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid animation pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10616">**GX_OUT_OF_ANIMATIONS**: (0X31) systemets animeringssekvens har tömts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10616">**GX_OUT_OF_ANIMATIONS**: (0x31) System animation pool exhausted</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10617">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10617">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10618">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10618">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10619">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10619">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

UINT status = gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    gx_animation_start(animation, animation_info);
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10620">Se även</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10620">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10621">gx_animation_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10621">gx_animation_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10622">gx_animation_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10622">gx_animation_start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10623">gx_animation_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10623">gx_animation_stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10624">gx_system_animation_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10624">gx_system_animation_free</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_animation_free"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10625">gx_system_animation_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10625">gx_system_animation_free</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10626">Returnera ett kontroll block för animering till mediepoolen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10626">Return an animation control block to the system pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10627">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10627">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_animation_free(GX_ANIMATION *animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10628">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10628">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10629">Den här tjänsten kan användas för att returnera ett kontroll block för animering till mediepoolen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10629">This service can be used to return an animation control block to the system pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10630">Animeringssekvensen för animeringssekvenser och relaterade API-tjänster anges bara om konstanten GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE definieras med värdet 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10630">The animation control block pool and related API services are only provided if the constant GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE is defined with a value 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10631">Standardinställningen för det här värdet är 6, vilket innebär att systemanimeringens Control Block-pool innehåller storlek GX_ANIMATION kontroll block.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10631">The default setting for this value is 6, meaning that the system animation control block pool contains size GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10632">Ett animerat kontroll block som tilldelas med gx_system_animation_get () returneras automatiskt till den kostnads fria poolen om animeringen körs för slut för ande.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10632">An animation control block allocated using gx_system_animation_get() is automatically returned to the free pool if the animation runs to completion.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10633">Försök att returnera ett kontroll block för animering till den lediga poolen som redan har returnerats till den kostnads fria poolen har ingen påverkan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10633">Attempting to return an animation control block to the free pool that has already been returned to the free pool has no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10634">Om animeringen stoppas med hjälp av gx_animation_stop, eller om det inte går att starta på grund av ett returnerat fel, ska det animerings block som har hämtats med gx_system_animation_get () returneras till den kostnads fria poolen av programmet med hjälp av gx_system_animation_free ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10634">If the animation is stopped using gx_animation_stop, or fails to be started due to some returned error, the animation control block that has been obtained using gx_system_animation_get() should be returned to the free pool by the application using gx_system_animation_free().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10635">En animering måste vara i inaktivt läge innan den kan returneras till den kostnads fria poolen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10635">An animation must be in IDLE state before it can be returned to the free pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10636">En animering är i inaktivt läge när den inte har startats, när den stoppas eller när den körs för slut för ande.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10636">An animation is in the IDLE state when it has not been started, when it is stopped, or when it runs to completion.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10637">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10637">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10638">**animering**: pekar mot GX_ANIMATION kontroll blocket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10638">**animation**: Pointer to the GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10639">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10639">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10640">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) uccessfully-publicerat animation block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10640">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) uccessfully released animation block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10641">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10641">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10642">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig animeringseffekt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10642">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid animation pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10643">**GX_INVALID_ANIMATION**: (0x32) animeringen är inte inaktiv eller har inte allokerats från mediepoolen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10643">**GX_INVALID_ANIMATION**: (0x32) The animation is not IDLE, or it has not been allocated from the system pool</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10644">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10644">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10645">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10645">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10646">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10646">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

UINT status = gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    status = gx_animation_start(animation, animation_info);

    if (status != GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* animation did not start, return it to the free pool */
        gx_system_animation_free(animation);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_system_bidi_text_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10652">gx_system_bidi_text_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10652">gx_system_bidi_text_disable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10653">Inaktivera stöd för dynamisk dubbelriktad text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10653">Disable dynamic bi-directional text support</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10654">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10654">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_bidi_text_disable(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10655">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10655">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10656">Tjänsten inaktiverar stöd för dynamisk dubbelriktad text.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10656">This service disables dynamic bi-directional text support.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10657">Den här tjänsten kräver att GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT definieras när GUIX-biblioteket skapas och krävs endast om körningen av dubbelriktade sträng data krävs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10657">This service requires GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT to be defined when building the GUIX library, and is only required if runtime reordering of BiDi string data is needed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10658">De flesta program använder GUIX Studio för att skapa korrekt omordning dubbelriktade text strängar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10658">Most applications utilize GUIX Studio to produce correctly reorderd BiDi text strings.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10659">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10659">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10660">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10660">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10661">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10661">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10662">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) stöd för dubbelriktad dubbelriktad text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10662">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully disabled bidi text support</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10663">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10663">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10664">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10664">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10665">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10665">Example</span></span>

```C
/* GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT is defined. */

/* Diable bidi text support. */
status = gx_system_bidi_text_disable();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, bidi text support was disabled. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_bidi_text_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10668">gx_system_bidi_text_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10668">gx_system_bidi_text_enable</span></span>
