### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10671">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10671">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10672">Den här tjänsten möjliggör dynamisk dubbelriktad text support.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10672">This service enables dynamic bi-directional text support.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10673">Den här tjänsten kräver att GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT definieras när GUIX-biblioteket skapas och krävs endast om körningen av dubbelriktade sträng data krävs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10673">This service requires GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT to be defined when building the GUIX library, and is only required if runtime reordering of BiDi string data is needed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10674">De flesta program använder GUIX Studio för att skapa korrekt omordning dubbelriktade text strängar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10674">Most applications utilize GUIX Studio to produce correctly reordered BiDi text strings.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10678">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har aktiverat stöd för dubbelriktad text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10678">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully enabled bidi text support</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10679">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10679">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_canvas_refresh"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10684">gx_system_canvas_refresh</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10684">gx_system_canvas_refresh</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10686">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10686">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10687">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10687">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10688">Den här tjänsten tvingar fram en omedelbar omritning av alla skadade widgetar och arbets ytor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10688">This service forces an immediate redrawing of all dirty widgets and canvases.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10689">Den här tjänsten anropas vanligt vis internt av GUIX-systemkomponenten, men kan anropas av programmet för att tvinga fram en omedelbar omritning av systemet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10689">This service is normally invoked internally by the GUIX system component, but can be called by the application to force an immediate system redrawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10690">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10690">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10691">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10691">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10692">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10692">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10693">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har publicerat ett Animations block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10693">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully released animation block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10694">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**: (0X20) ingen arbets yta har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10694">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**: (0x20) No canvas created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10695">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10695">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10696">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10696">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, canvas has been redraw. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_dirty_mark"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10723">gx_system_dirty_mark</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10723">gx_system_dirty_mark</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10724">Felaktigt markerat fält</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10724">Mark area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10725">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10725">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_mark(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10726">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10726">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10727">Den här tjänsten markerar det här fältet i widgeten som smutsig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10727">This service marks the area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10728">Detta gör att widgeten kan ställas in på ett effektivt sätt när system händelse bearbetningen har slutförts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10728">This effectively queues the widget for redrawing when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10729">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10729">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10730">**widget**: pekare mot widget kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10730">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10731">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10731">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10732">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har marker ATS som felaktig i widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10732">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully marked widget dirty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10733">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10733">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10734">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10734">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10735">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10735">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10736">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10736">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10737">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10737">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10738">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10738">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” as dirty. */
status = gx_system_dirty_mark(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the area associated
   with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_dirty_partial_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10763">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10763">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10764">Markera ofullständigt arean som felaktig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10764">Mark partial area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10765">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10765">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_partial_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10766">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10766">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10767">Den här tjänsten markerar del fältet i widgeten som smutsig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10767">This service marks the partial area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10768">Detta köar widgeten för att rita om av GUIX-arbetsytans uppdaterings åtgärd när system händelse bearbetningen har slutförts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10768">This queues the widget for redrawing by the GUIX canvas refresh operation when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10769">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10769">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10770">**widget**: pekare mot widget kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10770">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10771">**dirty_area**: smutsig yta i widgeten för att markera smutsig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10771">**dirty_area**: Dirty area of widget to mark dirty</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10772">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10772">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10773">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) slutfört partiellt felaktigt ytdiagram</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10773">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful partial dirty area mark</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10774">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10774">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10775">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10775">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10776">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10776">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10777">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0X19) ogiltig storlek på smutsig yta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10777">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid size of dirty area</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10778">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10778">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10779">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10779">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10780">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10780">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” partial area as dirty. */

status = gx_system_dirty_partial_add(&my_widget,
    &partial_area);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the partial area “partial_area”
associated with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_draw_context_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10805">gx_system_draw_context_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10805">gx_system_draw_context_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10806">Hämta rit kontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10806">Get drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10807">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10807">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_draw_context_get(GX_DRAW_CONTEXT **current_context);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10808">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10808">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10809">Den här tjänsten returnerar en pekare till den aktuella rit kontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10809">This service returns a pointer to the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10810">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10810">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10811">**current_context**: pekare till mål för aktuell rit kontext pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10811">**current_context**: Pointer to destination for current drawing context pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10812">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10812">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10813">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckad aktuell kontext Hämta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10813">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful current context get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10814">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: 0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10814">**GX_PTR_ERROR**:0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10815">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10815">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10816">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10816">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10817">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10817">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DRAW_CONTEXT *current_context;

/* Get current drawing context. */

status = gx_system_draw_context_get(&current_context);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the current drawing context
   is contained in “current_context”. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_fold"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10842">gx_system_event_fold</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10842">gx_system_event_fold</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10843">Skicka händelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10843">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10844">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10844">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_fold(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10845">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10845">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10846">Den här tjänsten söker efter en händelse av samma typ i GUIX-händelse kön.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10846">This service searches the GUIX event queue for an event of the same type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10847">Om en händelse av samma typ finns, uppdateras händelse nytto lasten så att den matchar den nya händelsen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10847">If an event of the same type exists, the event payload is updated to match the new event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10848">Om det inte finns någon matchande händelse anropas funktionen gx_system_event_send för att lägga till den nya händelsen i slutet av händelse kön.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10848">If no matching event is found, the gx_system_event_send function is called to add the new event to the end of the event queue.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10849">Den här funktionen används ofta av driv rutiner för snabb touch-inmatning för att förhindra att händelse kön fylls med flera PEN_DRAG händelser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10849">This function is commonly used by fast touch input drivers to prevent filling the event queue with multiple PEN_DRAG events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10850">Den här funktionen kan också anropas av programmet för att förhindra att flera händelser av samma typ läggs till i händelse kön GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10850">This function can also be called by the application to prevent multiple events of the same type from being added to the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10851">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10851">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10852">**händelse**: pekare till händelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10852">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10853">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10853">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10854">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckad händelse sändning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10854">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful event send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10855">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10855">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10856">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10856">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10857">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10857">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10858">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10858">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10859">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10859">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_EVENT my_event;

memset(&my_event, 0, sizeof(GX_EVENT));

my_event.gx_event_type = GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN;

my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_x = 100;
my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_y = 200;

/* Send “my_event” for processing. */
status = gx_system_event_fold(&my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10884">gx_system_event_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10884">gx_system_event_send</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10885">Skicka händelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10885">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10886">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10886">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_send(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10887">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10887">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10888">Den här tjänsten skickar den angivna händelsen till GUIX system Event Queue.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10888">This service sends the specified event into the GUIX system event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10889">Den nya händelsen placeras i slutet av kön.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10889">The new event is placed at the end of the queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10890">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10890">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10891">**händelse**: pekare till händelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10891">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10892">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10892">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10893">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckad händelse sändning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10893">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful event send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10894">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10894">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10895">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10895">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10896">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10896">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10897">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10897">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10898">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10898">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Send “new_event” for processing. */

GX_EVENT new_event;

new_event.gx_event_target = widget ->gx_widget_parent;
new_event.gx_event_type = MY_EVENT_TYPE;

/* Set optional param. */
new_event.gx_event_payload.xxxx = yyyy
new_event.gx_event_sender = widget->gx_widget_id;

/* Push the event to event pool. */
status = gx_system_event_send(&new_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_focus_claim"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10923">gx_system_focus_claim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10923">gx_system_focus_claim</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10924">Fokusera på anspråk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10924">Claim focus</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10925">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10925">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_focus_claim(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10926">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10926">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10927">Den här tjänsten hävdar fokus för den angivna widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10927">This service claims the focus for the specified widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10928">Om widgeten inte tidigare har fokus får den en GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED-händelse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10928">If the widget did no previously have focus, it will receive a GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED event.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10929">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10929">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10930">**widget**: pekar mot widget kontroll block till anspråk fokus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10930">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block to claim focus</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10931">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10931">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10932">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ett lyckat fokus krav</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10932">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful focus claim</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10933">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10933">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10934">**GX_NO_CHANGE**: (0X08) widgeten redan äger fokus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10934">**GX_NO_CHANGE**: (0x08) Widget already owns focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10935">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10935">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10936">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12-widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10936">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12 Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10937">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10937">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10938">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10938">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10939">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10939">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Claim focus for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_claim_focus(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the focus has been claimed for
   “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_initialize"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10964">gx_system_initialize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10964">gx_system_initialize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10965">Initiera GUIX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10965">Initialize GUIX</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10966">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10966">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_initialize(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10967">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10967">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10968">Den här tjänsten initierar GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10968">This service initializes GUIX.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10969">Tjänsten måste anropas före någon annan GUIX-API-tjänst och bör bara anropas en gång vid system start.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10969">This service must be invoked before any other GUIX API service, and should only be invoked once at system startup.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10970">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10970">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10971">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10971">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10972">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10972">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10973">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckad system initiering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10973">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system initialize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10974">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR**: (0XFE) ogiltig GX_EVENT kontroll block storlek eller händelse kön/mutex/tråden Create misslyckades.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10974">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR**: (0xFE) Invalid GX_EVENT control block size or event queue/mutex/thread create failed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10975">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10975">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10976">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10976">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10977">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10977">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-10978">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-10978">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Initialize GUIX. */
status = gx_system_initialize();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, GUIX has been initialized. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_language_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11003">gx_system_language_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11003">gx_system_language_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11004">Hämta aktiv språk tabell</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11004">Retrieve active language table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11005">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11005">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_language_table_get( 
    GX_CHAR ****language_table,
    GX_UBYTE *languages_count, 
    UINT *string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11006">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11006">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11007">Den här tjänsten hämtar den aktiva språk tabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11007">This service retrieves the active language table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11008">Den här funktionen har ersatts av gx_display_language_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11008">This function is deprecated in favor of gx_display_language_table_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11009">Alla nya program bör använda gx_display_language_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11009">All new applications should use gx_display_language_table_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11010">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11010">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11011">**language_table**: adress för den pekare som ska returnera språk tabell.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11011">**language_table**: Address of pointer to return language table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11012">**languages_count**: adress till variabel att returnera tabell kolumner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11012">**languages_count**: Address of variable to return table columns.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11013">**string_count**: adress till den pekare som returnerar tabell rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11013">**string_count**: Address of pointer to return table rows.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11014">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11014">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11015">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) den aktiva språk tabellen har hämtats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11015">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieved active language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11016">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11016">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11017">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11017">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11018">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11018">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11019">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11019">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11020">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11020">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR ***language_table;

GX_UBYTE language_count;

UINT string_count;

/* Retrieve the language table */

status = gx_system_language_table_get(&language_table,
    &language_count, &string_count);
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11021">Se även</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11021">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_language_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11024">gx_system_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11024">gx_system_language_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11025">Tilldela aktiv språk tabell</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11025">Assign active language table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11026">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11026">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_language_table_set(
    GX_CHAR ***language_table,
    GX_UBYTE languages_count, 
    UINT string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11027">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11027">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11028">Den här tjänsten installerar den aktiva språk tabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11028">This service installs the active language table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11029">Den här funktionen har ersatts av gx_display_language_table_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11029">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_language_table_set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11030">Alla nya program bör använda gx_display_language_table_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11030">All new applications should use gx_display_language_table_set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11031">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11031">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11032">**language_table**: pekare till språk tabell.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11032">**language_table**: Pointer to language table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11033">**languages_count**: antalet språk i tabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11033">**languages_count**: Number of languages in table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11034">**string_count**: antalet sträng tabell rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11034">**string_count**: Number of string table rows.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11035">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11035">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11036">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har angett språk tabell</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11036">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11037">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11037">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11038">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11038">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11039">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11039">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11040">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11040">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11041">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11041">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve the language table */

status = gx_system_language_table_set(language_table,
    language_count, string_count);
```

## <a name="gx_system_memory_allocator_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11046">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11046">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11047">Tilldela funktioner för minnesallokering, fördelningen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11047">Assign functions for memory allocation, de-allocation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11048">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11048">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_memory_allocator_set(VOID *(allocate)(ULONG size),
    VOID(*release)(VOID *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11049">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11049">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11050">Den här tjänsten tilldelar programmet angiven motringning för dynamisk minnesallokering och avallokering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11050">This service assigns the application supplied callback function for dynamic memory allocation and de-allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11051">Om ingen GUIX-tjänst som använder dynamisk minnesallokering krävs av programmet behöver inte den här tjänsten anropas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11051">If no GUIX service that uses dynamic memory allocation is needed by the application, this service does not need to be called.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11052">Om den används ska den här tjänsten anropas efter gx_system_initialize () som rensar GUIX service pekare och före eventuell GUIX-tjänst som kräver användning av dynamisk minnesallokering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11052">If used, this service should be called after gx_system_initialize() which clears the GUIX service pointers, and before any GUIX service that requires use of dynamical memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11053">GUIX Services som kräver en minnesallokering för körning och tjänsten för resursallokering är:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11053">GUIX services which require a runtime memory allocation and de-allocation service include:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11054">Läser in binära resurser från extern lagring till GUIX Runtime Environment.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11054">Loading binary resources from external storage into the GUIX runtime environment.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11055">Bild avkodaren för program körnings-JPEG.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11055">The software runtime jpeg image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11056">Bild avkodaren för program körnings png.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11056">The software runtime png image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11057">Använda text-widgetar med GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11057">Using text widgets with GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11058">Körnings pixemap funktioner för att ändra storlek och rotation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11058">Runtime pixemap resize and rotation utility functions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11059">Körnings-och widgets kontroll block tilldelning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11059">Runtime screen and widget control block allocation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11060">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11060">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11061">**allokerare**: funktion för allokering av minne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11061">**allocator**: Memory allocator function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11062">**version**: minnes fri funktion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11062">**release**: Memory free function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11063">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11063">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11064">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) tilldelade funktionen för att allokera minne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11064">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully assigned memory allocate function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11065">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11065">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11066">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11066">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11067">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11067">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11068">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11068">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11069">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11069">Example</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11070">I följande exempel används en ThreadX byte-pool för att implementera en threadsafe-dynamisk minnesallokering och minnes tilldelnings tjänst.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11070">The following example utilizes a ThreadX byte pool to implement a threadsafe dynamic memory allocation and memory de-allocation service.</span></span>

```C
TX_BYTE_POOL memory_pool;

#define SCRATCHPAD_SIZE (1024 * 4)

ULONG scratchpad[SCRATCHPAD_SIZE];

/* define memory allocation service */

VOID *memory_allocate(ULONG size)
{
    VOID *memptr;

    if (tx_byte_allocate(&memory_pool, &memptr, size, TX_NO_WAIT) == TX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return memptr;
    }
    return NULL;
}

/* define memory de-allocation service */
void memory_free(VOID *mem)
{
    tx_byte_release(mem);
}

/* create byte pool and install our dynamic memory services with GUIX
*/

VOID tx_application_define(void *first_unused_memory)
{
    /* create byte pool for GUIX to use */
    tx_byte_pool_create(&memory_pool, "scratchpad", scratchpad,
        SCRATCHPAD_SIZE * sizeof(ULONG));

    guix_setup();

    /* install our memory allocator and de-allocator */
    gx_system_memory_allocator_set(memory_allocate, memory_free);
}
```

## <a name="gx_system_pen_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11095">gx_system_pen_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11095">gx_system_pen_configure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11096">Ange Pen-konfiguration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11096">Set pen configuration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11097">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11097">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_pen_configure(GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION *pen_configuration);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11098">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11098">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11099">Den här tjänsten anger Penn konfigurationen för att styra hastigheten och avstånds parametrarna som används för att utlösa genereringen av GX_EVENT_FLICK händelse typer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11099">This service sets pen configuration to control the pen speed and distance parameters used to trigger the generation of GX_EVENT_FLICK event types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11100">Gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist medlem i GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION är en fast punkt data typ och du bör använda GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (värde) för att konvertera från INT till GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11100">The gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION is a fixed point data type, and you should use GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(value) to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11101">Om du till exempel vill ange minsta avstånd för dra till 0,5 bild punkt per Tick måste du ange gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist till `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11101">For example, if you want to set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel per tick, you have to set the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist to `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2`.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11102">I GUIX frigör 5.4.0 och äldre gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist medlem i GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION av (INT << 8) i stället för GX_FIXED_VAL typ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11102">In GUIX releases 5.4.0 and older, the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION was of (INT << 8) type rather than GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11103">Om ditt projekt med 5.4.0 version GUIX library använder detta API måste du ändra min_drag_dist parameter eller #define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY när du skapar GUIX-biblioteket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11103">If your project with 5.4.0 version GUIX library is using this API, you will need to modify the min_drag_dist parameter or #define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY when building the GUIX library.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11104">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11104">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11105">**pen_configuration** Pekare till Penn konfigurations struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11105">**pen_configuration** Pointer to pen configuration structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11106">**Bilaga i** innehåller definition som GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION struktur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11106">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11107">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11107">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11108">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har angett Pen-konfigurationen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11108">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set pen configuration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11109">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11109">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11110">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11110">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11111">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11111">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11112">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11112">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define pen configuration, set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel
per tick, maximum pen speed to 10 ticks. That means GUIX will trigger
a vertical or horizontal flick event if the drag time is smaller than
10 ticks and the drag distance is bigger than 0.5 * drag_ticks. */

GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION pen_configuration;

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
Pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = (1 << 8)/ 2;
#else
pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_max_pen_speed_ticks = 10;

/* Set the pen configuration. */
status = gx_system_pen_configure(&pen_configuration);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the touch configure has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11113">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11113">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11114">Skapa och initiera system skärms stacken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11114">Create and initialize the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11115">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11115">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_create(
    GX_WIDGET **memory, 
    INT size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11116">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11116">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11117">Den här tjänsten definierar en minnesbuffert som ska användas för systemets skärm.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11117">This service defines a memory pool to be used for the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11118">System skärms stacken är en valfri funktion som kan användas av programmet för att hantera utseendet på program skärms flödet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11118">The system screen stack is an optional feature that can be used by the application to manage application screen flow appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11119">Om programmet avser att använda skärmarna på skärmarna måste gx_system_screen_stack_create funktionen först anropas för att konfigurera skärm stackens minnes region.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11119">If the application intends to utilize the screen stack services, the gx_system_screen_stack_create function must first be called to setup the screen stack memory region.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11120">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11120">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11121">**minne**: pekar på det reserverade minnes blocket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11121">**memory**: Pointer to the reserved memory block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11122">**storlek**: storlek, i byte, för det reserverade minnes blocket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11122">**size**: Size, in bytes, of the reserved memory block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11123">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11123">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11124">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11124">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11125">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11125">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11126">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11126">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11127">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11127">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11128">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11128">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11129">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11129">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH 8
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2];

UINT status;

/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */

status = gx_system_screen_stack_create(screen_stack,
    sizeof(GX_WIDGET *) * SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the system screen stack is initialized
and ready for use. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11138">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11138">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11139">Den här funktionen visar de översta skärm punkterna i stacken och returnerar dessa pekare till anroparen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11139">This function pops the topmost screen stack pointers and returns those pointers to the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11140">Den här funktionen skiljer sig från gx_system_screen_stack_pop () i att den sida som visas inte automatiskt är kopplad till föregående överordnade objekt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11140">This function differs from gx_system_screen_stack_pop() in that the popped screen is not automatically reattached to the previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11141">I stället visas pekarna från stacken och returneras till anroparen, så att anroparen kan koppla eller ta bort den returnerade skärmen som du vill.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11141">Instead, the pointers are popped from the stack and returned to the caller, allowing the caller to attach the or discard the returned screen as desired.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11142">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11142">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11143">**popped_parent**: platsen där den överordnade widgeten ska lagras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11143">**popped_parent**: Location to store the parent widget pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11144">**popped_screen**: plats för att lagra den välpekade skärmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11144">**popped_screen**: Location to store the popped screen pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11145">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11145">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11146">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) hämtning av skärms stack pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11146">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11147">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11147">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11148">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11148">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11149">**GX_FAILURE**: (0X10) ogiltig eller tom skärm bild</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11149">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11150">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11150">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11151">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11151">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11152">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11152">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_WIDGET *parent_screen;

GX_WIDGET *popped_screen;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_get(&parent_screen, &popped_screen);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, parent_screen and
popped_screen hold the topmost screen stack pointers. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11156">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11156">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11157">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11157">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11158">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11158">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11159">Plocka den översta posten från system skärms stacken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11159">Pop the topmost entry from the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11160">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11160">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_pop();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11161">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11161">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11162">Den här funktionen kan användas för att skriva över den översta posten i skärm bilden och automatiskt koppla den utskrivna skärmen till den underordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11162">This function pops the topmost entry fo the screen stack and automatically attaches the popped screen to the popped parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11163">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11163">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11164">**inget**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11164">**none**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11165">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11165">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11166">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckad hämtning av skärmande stack pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11166">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfull retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11167">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11167">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11168">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11168">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11169">**GX_FAILURE**: (0X10) ogiltig eller tom skärm bild</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11169">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11170">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11170">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11171">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11171">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11172">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11172">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_pop();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the topmost screen stack entry has been
popped from the stack and re-attached to the previous parent. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11177">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11177">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11178">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11178">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11179">Skicka en widget och en överordnad pekare till skärm bilden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11179">Push a widget and parent pointer to the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11180">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11180">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_push(GX_WIDGET *screen)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11181">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11181">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11182">Den här tjänsten placerar en pekare till angiven widget, som vanligt vis är en skärm på den översta nivån, i skärm bilden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11182">This service places a pointer to the indicated widget, which is usually a top-level screen, onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11183">Om widgeten har en överordnad tas den bort från den överordnade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11183">If the widget has a parent it is detached from the parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11184">Den överordnade widgeten pekar också på skärmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11184">The parent widget pointer is also pushed to the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11185">Den överordnade widgeten kan vara NULL, vilket innebär att en skärm som inte är synlig eller kopplad till någon överordnad kan flyttas till skärm bilden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11185">The parent widget may be NULL, meaning a screen that is not visible or attached to any parent may be pushed onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11186">Om en widget som inte har någon överordnad skickas till skärm bilden, ska API: et för screen_stack_get () användas för att hämta den nedladdade skärmen, i stället för screen_stack_pop att använda API: et (), som försöker återansluta till den tidigare överordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11186">If a widget with no parent is pushed to the screen stack, the screen_stack_get() API should be used to retrieve the pushed screen pointer, rather than using the screen_stack_pop() API, which attempts to reattached the popped widget to its previous parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11187">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11187">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11188">**skärm**: pekar mot widgeten som ska flyttas till skärm bilden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11188">**screen**: Pointer to the widget to be pushed to the screen stack.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11189">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11189">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11190">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) får rullnings listens utseende</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11190">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11191">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11191">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11192">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11192">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11193">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11193">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11194">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11194">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11195">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11195">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_push(window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget pointed to by “window” has
been pushed to the screen stack, along with the widget’s parent
ponter. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11196">Se även</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11196">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11197">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11197">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11198">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11198">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11199">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11199">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11200">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11200">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11201">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11201">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11202">Återställa system skärms stacken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11202">Reset the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11203">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11203">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_reset();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11204">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11204">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11205">Den här funktionen tar bort alla poster från system skärms stacken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11205">This function removes all entries from the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11206">Om skärmarna som visas från stacken har dynamiskt allokerade kontroll block tilldelade av GUIX Studio frigörs minnet för dessa kontroll block.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11206">If the screens popped from the stack have dynamically allocated control blocks allocated by GUIX Studio, the memory for those control blocks is freed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11207">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11207">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11208">**inget**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11208">**none**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11209">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11209">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11210">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) får rullnings listens utseende</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11210">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11211">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11211">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11212">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11212">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11213">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11213">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11214">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11214">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11215">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11215">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_reset();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the system screen stack has been cleared
of entries. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11219">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11219">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11220">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11220">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_scroll_appearance_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11221">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11221">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11222">Hämta rullnings utseende</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11222">Get scroll appearance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11223">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11223">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_scroll_appearance_get(
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *return_appearance);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11224">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11224">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11225">Den här tjänsten får rullnings listens utseende.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11225">This service gets the scrollbar appearance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11226">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11226">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11227">**format**: rullnings List format: `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` eller `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11227">**style**: Scrollbar style: `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` or `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11228">**return_appearance**: pekar mot målets utseende.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11228">**return_appearance**: Pointer to destination for appearance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11229">**Bilaga i** innehåller en definition som GX_SCROLLBAR_APPERANCE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11229">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLLBAR_APPERANCE</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11230">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11230">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11231">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) får rullnings listens utseende</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11231">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11232">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11232">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11233">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11233">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11234">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11234">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11235">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11235">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11236">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11236">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE my_appearance;

/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */

status = gx_system_scroll_appearance_get(style, &my_appearance);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “my_appearance” now contains the scroll
appearance. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_scroll_appearance_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11261">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11261">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11262">Ange rullnings utseende</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11262">Set scroll appearance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11263">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11263">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11264">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11264">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11265">Den här tjänsten anger standard rullnings utseende.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11265">This service sets the default scroll appearance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11266">När en rullning skapas, används den här utseende strukturen om inte programmet tillhandahåller en anpassad version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11266">When a scroll is created, this appearance structure is used unless the application provides a custom version.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11267">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11267">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11268">**format**: rullnings format `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` eller `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11268">**style**: Scroll style `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` or `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11269">**utseende**: pekare till utseende-strukturen initierad med olika visnings egenskaper för rullnings listen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11269">**appearance**: Pointer to appearance structure initialized with various scrollbar appearance attributes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11270">Se **bilaga i** för definitionen av GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCEs strukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11270">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11271">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11271">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11272">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har angett rullnings utseende uppsättning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11272">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set scroll appearance set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11273">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11273">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11274">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11274">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11275">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11275">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11276">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11276">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11277">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11277">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE my_appearance;

memset(&my_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

my_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;

my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style = GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

/* Set the scroll appearance. */

status = gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL, &my_appearance);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll appearance has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11301">gx_system_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11301">gx_system_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11302">Starta GUIX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11302">Start GUIX</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11303">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11303">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_start(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11304">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11304">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11305">Den här tjänsten startar GUIX-bearbetning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11305">This service starts GUIX processing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11306">Under normala omständigheter returnerar den här funktionen aldrig, utan börjar i stället att bearbeta GUIX-händelse kön.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11306">Under normal circumstances this function never returns, but instead begins processing the GUIX event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11307">När händelse kön för GUIX är tom stoppas den anropande tråden tills nya händelser tas emot i händelse kön för GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11307">When the GUIX event queue is empty, this service suspends the calling thread until new events arrive in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11308">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11308">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11309">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11309">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11310">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11310">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11311">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckad system start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11311">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11312">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11312">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11313">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11313">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11314">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11314">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11315">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11315">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start GUIX. */
status = gx_system_start();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . GUIX has been started. */
```
