## <a name="gx_system_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11340">gx_system_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11340">gx_system_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11341">Hämta sträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11341">Get string</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11342">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11342">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11343">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11343">Description</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_string_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11362">gx_system_string_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11362">gx_system_string_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11363">Hämtar sträng tabellen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11363">Retrieves the string table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11364">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11364">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_table_get(
    GX_UBYTE language,
    GX_CHAR ***string_table,
    UINT *get_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11365">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11365">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11366">Den här tjänsten hämtar sträng tabellen för det begärda språket från den första visningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11366">This service retrieves the string table for the requested language from the first display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11367">Den här funktionen har ersatts av gx_display_string_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11367">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_table_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11368">Alla nya program bör använda gx_display_string_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11368">All new applications should use gx_display_string_table_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11369">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11369">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11370">**språk**: språk index</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11370">**language**: Language index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11371">**string_table**: pekar på lagrings utrymmet för sträng tabell PEKAREN eller null om anroparen inte behöver hämta pekaren till sträng tabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11371">**string_table**: Pointer to storage space of the string table pointer, or NULL if the caller does not need to get the pointer to the string table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11372">**get_size**: pekar på lagrings utrymmet för antalet strängar i sträng tabellen, eller null om anroparen inte behöver hämta antalet strängar i sträng tabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11372">**get_size**: Pointer to the storage for the number of strings in string table, or NULL if the caller does not need to get the number of strings in the string table.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11373">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11373">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11374">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckad sträng tabell Hämta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11374">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string table get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11375">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11375">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11376">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11376">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11377">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11377">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11378">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11378">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string table. */

CHAR **my_string_table; UINT table_size;

status = gx_system_string_table_get(LANGUAGE_ID_ENGLISH,
    &my_string_table, &table_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the pointer to the string table has
been obtained. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11384">gx_system_string_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11384">gx_system_string_width_get</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_width_get(
    GX_FONT *font, GX_CHAR *string,
    INT string_length,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11387">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11387">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11388">Den här tjänsten är föråldrad till förmån för gx_system_string_width_get_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11388">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_system_string_width_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11389">Den här tjänsten beräknar visnings bredden för den angivna strängen i bild punkter med det angivna teckensnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11389">This service computes the display width of the supplied string in pixels using the specified font.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11390">Om parametern string_length är >= 0 inkluderas bara antalet tecken för begäran i beräkningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11390">If the string_length parameter is >= 0, only the request count of characters are included in the calculation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11391">Om parametern string_length är-1 används hela strängen upp till NULL-avgränsaren i beräkningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11391">If the string_length parameter is -1, the entire string up to the NULL terminator is used in the calculation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11392">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11392">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11393">**teckensnitt**: pekar mot strängens teckensnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11393">**font**: Pointer to string’s font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11394">**sträng**: pekar mot sträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11394">**string**: Pointer to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11395">**string_length**: sträng längd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11395">**string_length**: Length of string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11396">**return_width**: målet för bredden på strängen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11396">**return_width**: Destination for width of string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11397">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11397">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11398">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckad sträng bredd get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11398">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11399">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11399">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11400">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11400">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11401">**GX_INVALID_FONT**: (0X16) ogiltigt teckensnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11401">**GX_INVALID_FONT**: (0x16) Invalid font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11402">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0X34) ogiltig sträng längd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11402">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11403">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11403">Allowed From</span></span>

    strlen(my_string), &my_width);

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11445">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11445">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_timer_start(
    GX_WIDGET *owner, 
    UINT timer_id,
    UINT initial_ticks,
    UINT reschedule_ticks);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11446">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11446">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11447">Den här tjänsten startar en timer för den angivna widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11447">This service starts a timer for the specified widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11448">Konstanten GX_MAX_ACTIVE_TIMERS definierat det högsta antalet aktiva timers som stöds.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11448">The constant GX_MAX_ACTIVE_TIMERS defined the maximum active timers supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11449">Standardvärdet för det här värdet är 32.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11449">The default setting for this value is 32.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11450">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11450">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11451">**Owner**: pekare mot widget kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11451">**owner**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11452">**timer_id**: ID för timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11452">**timer_id**: ID of timer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11453">**initial_ticks**: inledande förfallo datum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11453">**initial_ticks**: initial expiration ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11454">**reschedule_ticks**: periodiska förfallo Tick</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11454">**reschedule_ticks**: Periodic expiration ticks</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11455">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11455">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11456">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckad timer-start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11456">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful timer start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11457">**GX_OUT_OF_TIMERS**: (0X04) inga fler timers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11457">**GX_OUT_OF_TIMERS**: (0x04) No more timers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11458">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11458">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11459">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11459">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11460">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11460">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11461">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0X22) timer (er) är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11461">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Timer value(s) not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11462">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11462">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11463">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11463">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11464">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11464">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start a periodic timer for the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_timer_start(&my_widget, MY_TIMER_ID, 10, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the timer for “my_widget” has been
started. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_timer_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11482">gx_system_timer_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11482">gx_system_timer_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11483">Stoppa timer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11483">Stop timer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11484">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11484">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_timer_stop(
    GW_WIDGET *owner, 
    UINT timer_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11485">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11485">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11486">Den här tjänsten stoppar timern med den angivna timer_id associerad med den anropande widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11486">This service stops the timer with the specified timer_id associated with the calling widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11487">Om du vill stoppa alla timers som är länkade till en viss widget kan programmet skicka timer_id värdet 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11487">To stop all timers linked to a particular widget, the application can pass the timer_id value of 0.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11488">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11488">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11489">**Owner**: pekare mot widget kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11489">**owner**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11490">**timer_id**: ID för timer eller 0 för alla timers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11490">**timer_id**: ID of timer, or 0 for all timers</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11491">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11491">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11492">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) slutfört timer-stopp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11492">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful timer stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11493">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0X09) timer-ID hittades inte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11493">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Timer ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11494">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11494">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11495">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11495">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11496">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11496">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11497">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11497">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11498">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11498">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11499">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11499">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Stop the periodic timer for the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_timer_stop(&my_widget, MY_TIMER_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the timer for “my_widget” has been
stopped. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11571">gx_system_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11571">gx_system_widget_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11572">Hitta widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11572">Find widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11573">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11573">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_widget_find(
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_level, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_search_result);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11574">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11574">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11575">Den här tjänsten söker efter angivet widgets-ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11575">This service searches for the specified widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11576">Till skillnad från gx_widget_find () genomsöker den här funktionen underordnade till alla rot fönster som definieras i systemet, vilket innebär att det här är en uttömmande sökning av alla synliga widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11576">Unlike gx_widget_find(), this function searches the children of all root windows defined in the system, meaning this is an exhaustive search of all visible widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11577">Om du känner till den överordnade widgeten som du söker efter, använder du gx_widget_find () i stället.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11577">If you know the parent of the widget you are searching for, use gx_widget_find() instead.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11578">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11578">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11579">**widget_id**: widgets-ID att söka efter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11579">**widget_id**: Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11580">**search_level**: definierar den rekursiva kapslings nivån som underordnade widgetar genomsöks till.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11580">**search_level**: Defines the recursive nesting level into which child widgets are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11581">Om värdet är 0 genomsöks bara omedelbara underordnade objekt för varje rot fönster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11581">If this value is 0, only immediate children of each root window are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11582">Om det här värdet är GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE kapslar funktionen in i alla underordnade sökningar efter begärt widgets-ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11582">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, the function nests down into all children searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11583">För andra värden > 0 definierar Sök nivån hur djupt kapslad den här funktionen kommer att söka efter begärd widgets-ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11583">For any other value > 0, the search level defines how deeply nested this function will go searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11584">**return_search_result**: pekare till målet för widgeten hittades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11584">**return_search_result**: Pointer to destination for widget found</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11585">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11585">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11586">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckad widgets sökning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11586">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful widget search</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11587">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0X09) widgets-ID hittades inte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11587">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Widget ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11588">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11588">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11589">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11589">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11590">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11590">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11591">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11591">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Search recursively from the top level widget for the widget with
ID of MY_WIDGET_ID. */

status = gx_system_widget_find(MY_WIDGET_ID,
    GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE,
    &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the search was successful and
“my_widget” contains the pointer to the widget. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11616">gx_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11616">gx_text_button_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11617">Knappen Skapa text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11617">Create text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11618">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11618">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_create(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11619">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11619">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11620">Den här tjänsten skapar en widget för text knappar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11620">This service creates a text button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11621">GX_TEXT_BUTTON härleds från GX_BUTTON och stöder alla gx_button API-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11621">GX_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11622">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11622">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11623">**text_button**: pekare mot text knapp kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11623">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11624">**namn**: knappens logiska namn för text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11624">**name**: Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11625">**överordnad**: pekare till överordnad widget för knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11625">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11626">**text_id**: resurs-ID för text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11626">**text_id**: Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11627">**format**: text knapp format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11627">**style**: Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11628">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11628">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11629">**text_button_id**: Programdefinierat ID för text knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11629">**text_button_id**: Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11630">**storlek**: knappens storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11630">**size**: Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11631">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11631">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11632">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckad text knapp skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11632">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11634">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11634">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11635">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0X13) widgeten har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11635">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11636">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11636">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11637">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: 0x12 överordnade widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11637">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11638">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11638">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11639">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11639">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11640">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11640">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_BUTTON my_text_button;

GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Create text button “my_text_button”. */

status = gx_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text button “my_text_button” was
created. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11658">gx_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11658">gx_text_button_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11659">Knapp för att rita text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11659">Draw text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11660">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11660">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11661">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11661">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11662">Den här tjänsten ritar text knappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11662">This service draws the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11663">Den här tjänsten kallas vanligt vis internt under uppdatering av arbets ytan, men kan också anropas från ritnings funktioner för anpassad text.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11663">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom text button drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11664">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11664">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11665">**knapp**: pekare mot text knapp kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11665">**button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11666">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11666">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11667">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11667">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11668">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11668">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11669">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11669">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11670">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11670">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom text button draw function. */

VOID my_text_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button)
{
    /* Call default text button draw. */
    gx_text_button_draw(text_button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11688">gx_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11688">gx_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11689">Händelse för process text knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11689">Process text button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11690">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11690">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11691">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11691">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11692">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för den angivna text knappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11692">This service processes an event for the specified text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11693">Den här tjänsten ska anropas som standard händelse hanterare av eventuella funktioner för händelse bearbetning i en anpassad text knapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11693">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text button event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11694">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11694">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11695">**text_button** Pekare till kontroll block för text knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11695">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11696">**event_ptr** Pekare till händelsen att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11696">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11697">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11697">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11698">Händelse process för **GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) slutförd text knapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11698">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11699">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11699">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11700">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11700">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11701">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11701">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11702">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11702">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11703">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11703">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11704">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11704">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text button event processing */
        status = gx_text_button_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11722">gx_text_button_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11722">gx_text_button_font_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11723">Ange tecken till text-knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11723">Set the font to text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11724">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11724">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_font_set(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11725">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11725">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11726">Den här tjänsten tilldelar ett teckensnitt till den angivna knappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11726">This service assigns a font to the specified button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11727">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11727">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11728">**knapp**: pekare mot text knapp kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11728">**button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11729">**font_id**: resurs-ID är teckensnittet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11729">**font_id**: Resource ID fo the font</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11730">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11730">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11731">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har angett teckensnittet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11731">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11732">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11732">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11733">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11733">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11734">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11734">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11735">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11735">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11736">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11736">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11737">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11737">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the text button with the font ID MY_FONT. */
status = gx_text_button_font_set(&my_text_button, MY_FONT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font of the text button
“my_text_button” was set to MY_FONT. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11795">gx_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11795">gx_text_button_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11796">Stöd funktion för att rita knapp text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11796">Support function to draw button text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11797">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11797">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_text_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11798">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11798">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11799">Den här stöd funktionen ritar text delen av en text-knapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11799">This support function draws the text portion of a text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11800">Den här funktionen anropas internt av gx_text_button_draw och tillhandahålls som en separat API som bekvämlighet för program som definierar en anpassad knapp ritnings funktion.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11800">This function is called internally by gx_text_button_draw, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11801">Program som vill anpassa knappens bakgrunds ritning kan ge sin anpassade ritnings funktion och anropa gx_text_button_text_draw-tjänsten som en del av den anpassade ritningen för att rita knapp texten över bakgrunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11801">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11802">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11802">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11803">**text_button**: pekare mot text knapp kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11803">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11804">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11804">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11805">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11805">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11806">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11806">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11807">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11807">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11808">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11808">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */

VOID my_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw button background */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_text_button_text_draw(button);

    /* Draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11825">gx_text_button_text_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11825">gx_text_button_text_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11826">Hämta text från text knappen (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11826">Get text from the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11827">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11827">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_get(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR **return_text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11828">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11828">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11829">Den här tjänsten är föråldrad till förmån för gx_text_button_text_get_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11829">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_button_text_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11830">Den här tjänsten hämtar den angivna strängen från text knappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11830">This service retrieves the specified string from the text button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11831">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11831">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11832">**text_button**: pekare mot text knapp kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11832">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11833">**return_text**: pekar mot den sträng som hämtats från text knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11833">**return_text**: Pointer to the string retrieved from the text button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11834">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11834">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11835">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) hämtar texten från knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11835">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get the text from the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11837">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11837">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11839">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11839">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11840">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11840">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11841">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11841">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *string;

/* Get the string from the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_text_button_text_get(&my_text_button, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string pointer from
“my_text_button” is retrieved and stored in string. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_id_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11876">gx_text_button_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11876">gx_text_button_text_id_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11877">Ange text resurs-ID: t för text knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11877">Set text resource ID to the text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11878">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11878">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_id_set(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    RESOURCE_ID string_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11879">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11879">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11880">Den här tjänsten anger angivet sträng resurs-ID till text knappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11880">This service sets the specified string resource ID to the text button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11881">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11881">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11882">**text_button**: pekare mot text knapp kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11882">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11883">**string_id**: resurs-ID för strängen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11883">**string_id**: Resource ID of the string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11884">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11884">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11885">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har angett sträng resurs-ID till text knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11885">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the string resource ID to the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11887">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11887">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11888">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11888">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11889">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: sträng-ID för 0x33 är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11889">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: (0x33) String ID not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11890">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11890">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11891">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11891">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11892">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11892">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string ID ”MY_STRING_ID” to the text button
“my_text_button”. */

status = gx_text_button_text_id_set(&my_text_button,
    MY_STRING_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string ID MY_STRING_ID was set to
“my_text_button”. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11908">gx_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11908">gx_text_button_text_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11909">Tilldela text knappen text (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11909">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11910">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11910">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_set(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11911">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11911">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11912">Den här tjänsten är föråldrad till förmån för gx_text_button_text_set_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11912">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11913">Den här tjänsten tilldelar den angivna strängen till text knappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11913">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11914">Om widgeten text_button skapades med format GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY skapar widgeten en privat kopia av den tilldelade text strängen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11914">If the text_button widget was created with style  GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11915">Om GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY inte är aktivt gör widgeten ingen privat kopia av den inkommande strängen, och därför måste strängen vara statiskt eller globalt allokerad, dvs. det får inte vara en automatisk eller tillfällig variabel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11915">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11916">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11916">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11917">**text_button**: pekare mot text knapp kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11917">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11918">**text**: pekar mot den null-avslutade strängen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11918">**text**: pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11919">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11919">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11920">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har angett texten till knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11920">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11922">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11922">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11923">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11923">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11924">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0X30) minnes allokeraren är inte definierad eller minnes tilldelningen misslyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11924">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11925">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0X34) ogiltig sträng längd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11925">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11926">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11926">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11927">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11927">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11928">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11928">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string “my string” to the text button “my_text_button”.
*/

status = gx_text_button_text_set(&my_text_button, “my string”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string “my_text_button” was set.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11933">gx_text_button_text_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11933">gx_text_button_text_set_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11934">Tilldela text knappen text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11934">Assign text to the text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11935">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11935">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_set_ext(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11936">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11936">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11937">Den här tjänsten tilldelar den angivna strängen till text knappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11937">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11938">Om widgeten text_button skapades med format GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY skapar widgeten en privat kopia av den tilldelade text strängen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11938">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11939">Om GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY inte är aktivt gör widgeten ingen privat kopia av den inkommande strängen, och därför måste strängen vara statiskt eller globalt allokerad, dvs. det får inte vara en automatisk eller tillfällig variabel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11939">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11940">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11940">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11941">**text_button**: pekare mot text knapp kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11941">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11942">**sträng**: pekar mot variabeln GX_STRING</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11942">**string**: pointer to the GX_STRING variable</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11943">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11943">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11944">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har angett texten till knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11944">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11945">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11945">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11946">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11946">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11947">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11947">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11948">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0X30) minnes allokeraren är inte definierad eller minnes tilldelningen misslyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11948">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11949">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0X34) ogiltig sträng längd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11949">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11950">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11950">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11951">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11951">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11952">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11952">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING new_string; new_string.gx_string_ptr = “Monday”;

new_string.gx_string_length = strlen(new_string.gx_string_ptr);

/* Assign the string “new_string” to the text button
“my_text_button”. */

status = gx_text_button_text_set_ext(&my_text_button, &new_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string “my_text_button” was set.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11969">gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11969">gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11970">Ange blinknings intervall för markör</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11970">Set cursor blink interval</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11971">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11971">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set(
    GX_TEXT_INPUT_CURSOR *cursor_input,
    GX_UBYTE blink_interval);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11972">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11972">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11973">Den här tjänsten anger blinknings intervall svärdet för markören.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11973">This service sets blink interval value of the cursor.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11974">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11974">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11975">**cursor_input** Markör kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11975">**cursor_input** Cursor control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11976">**blink_interval** Värde som ska anges</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11976">**blink_interval** Value to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11977">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11977">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11978">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har angett markörens blinknings intervall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11978">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the cursor blink interval</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11979">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11979">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11980">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0X22) blinkande intervall värde är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11980">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Blink interval value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11981">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11981">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-11983">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-11983">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_INPUT_CURSOR *input_cursor;

/* Pointer the input cursor to the cursor instance of single/multi
line text input widget. */

input_cursor = &sl_input.gx_single_line_text_input_cursor_instance;

/* Set the blink interval value of “input_cursor” to 2. */
status = gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set(input_cursor, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the blink interval value of
“input_cursor” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12023">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12023">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12024">Tilldela motringningsfunktionen för text typen rulla hjul (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12024">Assign the callback function of text type scroll wheel (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12025">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12025">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *(*callback)(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *, int));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12026">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12026">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12027">Den här tjänsten är föråldrad till förmån för gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12027">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12028">Den här tjänsten tilldelar callback-funktionen som en text typs rullnings hjul anropar för att fastställa vilken text sträng som ska visas på varje rad i rullnings hjulet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12028">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12029">För GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL och GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL anges standardfunktionen för motringning och programmet behöver inte göra några ändringar för att använda dessa standard implementeringar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12029">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12030">Detta API tillhandahålls för att tillåta att programmet anpassar formateringen eller andra parametrar för den sträng som visas på varje rad i widgeten rullnings hjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12030">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12031">Motringningsfunktionen får som inmatad som en pekare till kontroll blocket Scroll Wheel och det rad nummer som visas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12031">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12032">Funktionen ska returnera en pekare till en text sträng.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12032">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12033">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12033">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12034">**hjul** Sträng rullnings kontroll block adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12034">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12035">**motringning** Pekare till motringnings funktion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12035">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12036">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12036">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12037">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har angett återanrop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12037">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12038">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12038">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12039">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12039">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12040">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12040">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12041">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12041">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12042">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12042">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

GX_CHAR *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
    }
    else
    {
        return(“Invalid”);
    }
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12058">gx_text_scroll_wheel_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12058">gx_text_scroll_wheel_text_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12059">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12059">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12060">Tilldela motringningsfunktionen för text typen rulla hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12060">Assign the callback function of text type scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12061">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12061">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    UINT *(*callback)(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *, int, GX_STRING *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12062">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12062">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12063">Den här tjänsten tilldelar callback-funktionen som en text typs rullnings hjul anropar för att fastställa vilken text sträng som ska visas på varje rad i rullnings hjulet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12063">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12064">För GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL och GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL anges standardfunktionen för motringning och programmet behöver inte göra några ändringar för att använda dessa standard implementeringar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12064">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12065">Detta API tillhandahålls för att tillåta att programmet anpassar formateringen eller andra parametrar för den sträng som visas på varje rad i widgeten rullnings hjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12065">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12066">Motringningsfunktionen får som inmatad som en pekare till kontroll blocket Scroll Wheel och det rad nummer som visas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12066">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12067">Funktionen ska returnera en pekare till en text sträng.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12067">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12068">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12068">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12069">**hjul** Sträng rullnings kontroll block adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12069">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12070">**motringning** Pekare till motringnings funktion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12070">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12071">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12071">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12072">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har angett återanrop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12072">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12073">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12073">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12074">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12074">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12075">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12075">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12076">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12076">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12077">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12077">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

UINT *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row,
    GX_STRING *return_string)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = string_buffer;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(string_buffer);
    }
    else
    {
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = “Invalid”;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(“Invalid”);
    }

    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12094">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12094">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12095">Skapa ett hjul för text rullning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12095">Create a text scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12096">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12096">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT Id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12097">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12097">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12098">Den här tjänsten skapar ett text rullnings hjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12098">This service creates a text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12099">Text rullnings hjulet är en grundläggande widget för GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL och GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL typ av widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12099">The text scroll wheel is a base widget for the GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL type widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12100">Den här funktionen anropas internt av gx_string_scroll_wheel_create och gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create och tillhandahålls som en separat API som bekvämlighet för program som definierar en anpassad widget för rullnings hjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12100">This function is called internally by gx_string_scroll_wheel_create and gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12101">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12101">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12102">**hjul**: kontroll block adress för text rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12102">**wheel**: Text scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12103">**namn**: Programdefinierat widgets namn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12103">**name**: Application defined widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12104">**överordnad**: överordnad hjul eller GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12104">**parent**: Wheel parent or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12105">**total_rows**: totalt antal rader som ska visas för användaren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12105">**total_rows**: Total rows to be presented to user</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12106">**format**: önskade stil flaggor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12106">**style**: Desired style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12107">**ID**: programdefinierade hjul stils flaggor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12107">**Id**: Application defined wheel style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12108">**storlek**: inledande rullnings hjul storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12108">**size**: Initial scroll wheel size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12109">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12109">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12110">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) text rullnings hjulet har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12110">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully created text scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12111">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12111">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12112">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12112">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12113">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0X13) widgeten har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12113">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12115">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12115">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12116">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12116">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12117">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12117">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom scroll wheel widget. */
typedef MY_SCROLL_WHEEL_STRUCT
{
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL text_scroll_wheel;

    /* Add custom members here. */

} MY_SCROLL_WHEEL;

MY_SCROLL_WHEEL my_scroll_wheel;

UINT my_scroll_wheel_create(MY_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, ULONG style, USHORT Id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* Call base creation. */
    status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
        &wheel.text_scroll_wheel,
        ”my_text_scroll_wheel”, GX_NULL, 7,
        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SCROLL_WHEEL, &size);

    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Add custom initialization here. */
        if(parent)
        {
            gx_widget_link(parent, (GX_WIDGET *)wheel);
        }
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12136">gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12136">gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw</span></span>
