
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12139">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12139">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12140">Detta är standard ritnings funktionen för alla typer av hjul baserat på GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12140">This is the default drawing function for all wheel types based on GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12141">Den här funktionen kan åsidosättas av program som kräver anpassning av text rullnings hjulets utseende.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12141">This function can be overridden by applications that require customization of the text scroll wheel drawing appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12142">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL och GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL är båda baserade på eller härleds från GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12142">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL are both based on or derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12143">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12143">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12144">**hjul**: kontroll block adress för sträng rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12144">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12145">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12145">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12146">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12146">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12147">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12147">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12148">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12148">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12149">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12149">Example</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12166">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12166">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12167">Process text rullnings hjul, händelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12167">Process text scroll wheel event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12168">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12168">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12169">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12169">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12170">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för det angivna text rullnings hjulet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12170">This service processes an event for the specified text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12171">Den här tjänsten ska anropas som standard händelse hanterare med ett anpassat text rullnings hjul händelse bearbetnings funktioner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12171">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text scroll wheel event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12172">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12172">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12173">**hjul** Pekare mot kontroll block för text rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12173">**wheel** Pointer to text scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12174">**event_ptr** Pekare till händelsen att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12174">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12175">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12175">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12176">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) händelse process för text rullnings hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12176">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12178">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12178">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12179">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12180">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12180">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12181">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12181">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12182">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12182">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text scroll wheel event processing */
        status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12264">gx_tree_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12264">gx_tree_view_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12265">Skapa en trädvy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12265">Create a tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12266">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12266">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_create(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT tree_view_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12267">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12268">Den här tjänsten skapar en trädvy som anges och associerar trädvyn med den angivna överordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12268">This service creates a tree view as specified and associates the tree view with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12269">Den accepterar alla typer av widget som underordnat meny alternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12269">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12270">Vi rekommenderar att du använder GX_MENU typ widget som dess underordnade meny alternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12270">It’s recommended to use GX_MENU type widget as its child menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12271">GX_TREE_VIEW härleds från GX_WINDOW och stöder alla gx_window API-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12271">GX_TREE_VIEW is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12272">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12272">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12273">**träd**: pekare mot trädvyn kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12273">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12274">**namn**: namnet på trädvyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12274">**name**: Name of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12275">**överordnad**: pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12275">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12276">**format**: widgetens format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12276">**style**: Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12277">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-speciella format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12277">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12278">**menu_id**: Programdefinierat ID för trädvyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12278">**menu_id**: Application-defined ID of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12279">**storlek**: träd visningens storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12279">**size**: Size of the tree view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12280">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12280">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12281">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckad trädvy skapas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12281">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful tree view creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12282">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12282">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12283">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12283">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12284">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0X13) widgeten har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12284">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12285">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12285">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12286">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12286">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12287">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12287">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12288">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12288">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12289">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12289">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_tree_view_create(&my_tree_view,
    “my_tree_view”, parent,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED, MY_TREE_VIEW_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the tree view was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12304">gx_tree_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12304">gx_tree_view_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12305">Rita trädvy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12305">Draw tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12306">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12306">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12307">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12307">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12308">Den här tjänsten ritar den angivna trädvyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12308">This service draws the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12309">Den här funktionen anropas vanligt vis internt av GUIX-funktionen för arbets ytans uppdatering, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med att implementera anpassade ritnings funktioner för widgetar anpassade träd visning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12309">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom tree view widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12310">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12310">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12311">**träd** Pekare till trädvy, kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12311">**tree** Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12312">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12312">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12313">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12313">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12314">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12314">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12315">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12315">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12316">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12316">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom tree view draw function. */
UINT my_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view)
{
    /* Perform default drawing */
    gx_tree_view_draw(tree_view);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12331">gx_tree_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12331">gx_tree_view_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12332">Händelse för process träds visning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12332">Process tree view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12333">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12333">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_event_process(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree, 
    GX_EVENT event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12334">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12334">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12335">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för den angivna trädvyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12335">This service processes an event for the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12336">Den här tjänsten ska anropas som standard händelse hanterare av eventuella anpassade händelse bearbetnings funktioner i trädvyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12336">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom tree view event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12337">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12337">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12338">**träd**: pekare mot trädvyn kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12338">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12339">**event_ptr**: pekar på händelsen som ska bearbetas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12339">**event_ptr**: Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12340">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12340">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12341">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckad process träds händelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12341">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful process tree view event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12342">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12342">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12343">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12343">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12344">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12344">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12345">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12345">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12346">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12346">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12347">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12347">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic tree view event processing as part of custom event
    processing function. */

UINT custom_tree_view_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
                event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
    }
}
return status;
```

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_indentation_set(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree,
    GX_VALUE indentation);
```

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12366">Den här tjänsten anger indrag för trädvyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12366">This service sets indentation for the tree view.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12368">**träd**: pekare mot trädvyn kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12368">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12369">**indrag**: indrag för att ange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12369">**indentation**: Indentation to set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12373">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12373">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12540">gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12540">gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12541">Konvertera arbets ytans Memort till bitmapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12541">Convert canvas memort to bitmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12542">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12542">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *rect,
    UINT (*write_data)(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12543">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12543">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12544">Den här tjänsten konverterar arbets ytans minne till bitmappsfilen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12544">This service converts canvas memory to bitmap file.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12545">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12545">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12546">**arbets yta**: kontroll block för arbets yta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12546">**canvas**: Canvas control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12547">**rect**: rektangel att konvertera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12547">**rect**: Rectangle to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12548">**write_data**: motringnings funktion pekare för att skriva data till</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12548">**write_data**: Callback function pointer to write data to</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12549">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12549">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12550">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har konverterat heltals värde till sträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12550">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12551">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare för returnerad buffert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12551">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12552">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0X19) ogiltig storlek på retursekvens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12552">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid return buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12553">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12553">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12554">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12554">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12555">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12555">Example</span></span>

```C
FILE *fp = GX_NULL;

/* define call back function of how to write the data read from
canvas memory. */

UINT write_data_callback(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count)
{
    if (fp)
    {
        fwrite(byte_data, 1, data_count, fp);
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

VOID scroll_wheel_screen_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{
    UINT status;

    GX_RECTANGLE size = {31,31,610,450};
    gx_window_draw(window);
    if (screenshot)
    {
        fp = fopen("../screenshot.bmp", "wb");
        /* Convert canvas memory to bitmap format.
           Status GX_SUCCESS means operation succeed. */
        status = gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(root->gx_window_root_canvas,
            &size, write_data_callback);

        fclose(fp);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_circle_point_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12571">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12571">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12572">Beräkna punkt på en cirkel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12572">Calculate point on a circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12573">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12573">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_circle_point_get(
    INT xCenter, 
    INT yCenter,
    UINT radius, 
    INT angle, 
    GX_POINT *point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12574">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12574">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12575">Den här tjänsten beräknar punkten på en cirkel med cirkelns mitt punkt, radie och vinkel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12575">This service calculates point on a circle given the circle center, radius, and angle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12576">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12576">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12577">**xCenter**: x-koordinat för cirkel Center</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12577">**xCenter**: x coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12578">**yCenter**: y-koordinat för cirkelns mitt punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12578">**yCenter**: y coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12579">**RADIUS**: cirkel-radie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12579">**radius**: Circle radius</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12580">**vinkel**: vinkel för att beräkna cirkelns perimeter punkt i grader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12580">**angle**: Angle at which to calculate circle perimeter point, in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12581">**punkt**: adressen till GX_POINT-variabeln där den beräknade x, y-koordinaten ska lagras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12581">**point**: Address of GX_POINT variable at which to store calculated x,y coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12582">**end_alpha**: slut på Alfa värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12582">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12583">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12583">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12584">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) toningen skapades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12584">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12585">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig avsändar punkts adress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12585">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return point address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12586">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0X22) ogiltig RADIUS-parameter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12586">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Invalid radius parameter</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12587">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12587">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12588">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12588">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12589">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12589">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point;
    UINT status;

        status = gx_utility_circle_point_get(100, 100,
20, 45,
&point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of point is the x,y coordinate of a point on the circle perimeter at an angle of 45 degrees, where the circle is centered at (100, 100), has a radius of 20 pixels */

```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12607">gx_utility_gradient_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12607">gx_utility_gradient_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12608">Skapa en tonings Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12608">Create a gradient pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12609">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12609">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_create(
    GX_GRADIENT *gradient,
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height,
    UCHAR type, 
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha, 
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12610">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12610">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12611">Den här tjänsten skapar en övertonings-Pixelmap vid körning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12611">This service creates a gradient pixelmap at runtime.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12612">En övertonings bild kan användas för att utföra tonings effekter och andra intressanta visuella ändringar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12612">A gradient image can be used to accomplish fade effects and other interesting visual changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12613">Den begärda Toningens bredd och höjd får inte vara mindre än 2x2 bild punkter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12613">The width and height of the requested gradient can be no less than 2x2 pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12614">GUIX innehåller en lista över skapade övertoningar internt, och den här funktionen söker först i listan över övertoningar för att hitta matchande övertonings-Pixelmap innan du skapar en ny Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12614">GUIX internally maintains a list of created gradients, and this function will first search the gradient list to find a matching gradient pixelmap before creating a new pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12615">Samma tonings Pixelmap krävs flera gånger, bara en Pixelmap skapas, och varje övertoning som kräver den här Pixelmap delar den skapade Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12615">In other words,  the same gradient pixelmap is needed multiple times, only one pixelmap is actually created, and each gradient that requires this pixelmap shares the created pixelmap.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12616">Detta API kräver att gx_system_memory_allocator-funktionen definieras för att tillåta minnes tilldelning för körning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12616">This API requires the gx_system_memory_allocator function be defined to allow runtime memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12617">Tonings typ flaggorna är GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA och GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12617">The gradient type flags include GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA and GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12618">Endast GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA typ toningar stöds för närvarande (dvs. den här typen flagga måste anges).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12618">Only  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA type gradients are currently supported (i.e. this type flag must be set).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12619">Flaggan GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR är valfri och när den anges instruerar skapande logiken för toning att skapa en toning som ändras från start_alpha till end_alpha och tillbaka till start_alpha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12619">The  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR flag is optional, and when set  instructs the gradient creation logic to create a gradient that changes from start_alpha to end_alpha and back to start_alpha.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12620">Annars skapas en linjär övertoning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12620">Otherwise a linear gradient is created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12621">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12621">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12622">**toning**: pekare till tonings kontroll block struktur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12622">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12623">**Bredd**: begärd Pixelmap bredd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12623">**width**: Requested pixelmap width</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12624">**höjd**: begärd Pixelmap-höjd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12624">**height**: Requested pixelmap height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12625">**typ**: begärd tonings typ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12625">**type**: Requested gradient type</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12626">**start_alpha**: startar alpha-värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12626">**start_alpha**: Starting alpha value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12627">**end_alpha**: slut på Alfa värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12627">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12628">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12628">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12629">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) toningen skapades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12629">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12630">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0X19) toningen är inte minst 2x2 bild punkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12630">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Gradient is not at least 2x2 pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12631">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0X28) toningen är inte av typen GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12631">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Gradient is not type GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12632">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) allokerat minne har inte definierats eller så misslyckades minnes tilldelningen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12632">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12634">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) tonings pekare är inte giltig<</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12634">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer not valid<</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12635">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0X22) bredd och höjd-värdet är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12635">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width and height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12636">**GX_INVALID_TYPE**: (0X1B) tonings typen är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12636">**GX_INVALID_TYPE**: (0x1B) Gradient type not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12637">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12637">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12638">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12638">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12639">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12639">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_GRADIENT gradient;

UINT status;

status = gx_utiity_gradient_create(&gradient, 3, 40,
    GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA, 240, 0);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the gradient pixelmap has been created */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12657">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12657">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12658">Ta bort en tidigare skapad toning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12658">Delete a previously created gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12659">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12659">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_delete(GX_GRADIENT *gradient);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12660">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12660">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12661">Den här tjänsten tar bort en tidigare skapad övertoning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12661">This service deletes a previously created gradient.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12662">Om Pixelmap som är associerade med den här övertoningen inte används av några andra övertoningar, tas även Pixelmap-data bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12662">If the pixelmap associated with this gradient is not in use by any other gradients, the pixelmap data will also be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12663">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12663">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12664">**toning**: pekare mot tonings kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12664">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12665">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12665">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12666">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) toningen togs bort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12666">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12668">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) tonings pekaren är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12668">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer is not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12669">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12669">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12670">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12670">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12671">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12671">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_GRADIENT gradient;

UINT status;

/* Delete previously created gradient. */
status = gx_utility_gradient_delete(&gradient);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS, the gradient has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_ltoa"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12689">gx_utility_ltoa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12689">gx_utility_ltoa</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12690">Konvertera långt heltal till ASCII</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12690">Convert long integer to ASCII</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12691">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12691">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_itoa(
    LONG value, 
    GX_CHAR *return_buffer,
    UINT seturn_buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12692">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12692">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12693">Den här tjänsten konverterar ett långt heltals värde till en ASCII-sträng.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12693">This service converts a long integer value into an ASCII string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12694">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12694">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12695">**värde**: det långa heltal svärdet som ska konverteras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12695">**value**: Long integer value to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12696">**return_buffer**: MÅLCACHEN för ASCII-sträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12696">**return_buffer**: Destination buffer for ASCII string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12697">**return_buffer_size**: storleken på måldomänkontrollanten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12697">**return_buffer_size**: Size of destination buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12698">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12698">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12699">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har konverterat heltals värde till sträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12699">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12700">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare för returnerad buffert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12700">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12701">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0X19) ogiltig storlek på retursekvens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12701">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid return buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12702">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12702">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12703">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12703">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12704">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12704">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_value = 200;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[10];

UINT status;

/* Convert “my_value” into an ASCII string. */
status = gx_utility_ltoa(my_value, string_buffer, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “string_buffer” contains the ASCII
representation of “my_value”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_acos"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12720">gx_utility_math_acos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12720">gx_utility_math_acos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12721">Beräkna arcus cosinus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12721">Compute arc cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12722">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12722">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_acos(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12723">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12723">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12724">Den här tjänsten beräknar vinkel värdet för arcus cosinus x.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12724">This service computes the angle value of the arc cosine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12725">Indatavärdet är en data typ med fast punkt, anropa GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE för att konvertera från INT till GX_FIXED_VAL typ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12725">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12726">Om du till exempel vill beräkna Arc-cosinus för 0,5, gör du inmatad som GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (1)/2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12726">For example, if you want to calculate the arc cosine of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12727">I 5.4.0 eller lägre version GUIX är indatatypen för den här funktionen INT och värdet är begränsat till intervallet [-256, 256].</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12727">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12728">Programmet måste skala värdet från intervallet [-1, 1] till intervallet [-256, 256] innan du anropar den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12728">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12729">Om ditt projekt med GUIX version är lika med eller lägre än 5.4.0 har en referens till detta API och du vill uppgradera projektet till det senaste GUIX-biblioteket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12729">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0 has reference to this API, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12730">Du har två alternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12730">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12731">Korrigera indatavärdet för det här API-anropet för att använda GX_FIXED_VAL data typ värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12731">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12732">Definiera GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12732">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12733">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12733">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12734">**x**: värdet vars Arc-cosinus beräknas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12734">**x**: Value whose arc cosine is computed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12735">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12735">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12736">**vinkel**: vinkel värde för arcus cosinus x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12736">**angle**: Angle value of arc cosine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12737">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12737">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12738">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12738">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12739">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12739">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc cosine of “0.5”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    x = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_acos(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc cosine “x”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_asin"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12757">gx_utility_math_asin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12757">gx_utility_math_asin</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12758">Beräkna arcus sinus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12758">Compute arc sine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12759">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12759">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_asin(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12760">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12760">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12761">Den här tjänsten beräknar vinkel värdet för arcus sinus x.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12761">This service computes the angle value of the arc sine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12762">Indatavärdet är en data typ med fast punkt, anropa GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE för att konvertera från INT till GX_FIXED_VAL typ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12762">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL  type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12763">Om du till exempel vill beräkna bågen sin of 0,5, gör du inmatad som GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (1)/2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12763">For example, if you want to calculate the arc sin of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12764">I 5.4.0 eller lägre version GUIX är indatatypen för den här funktionen INT och värdet är begränsat till intervallet [-256, 256].</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12764">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12765">Programmet måste skala värdet från intervallet [-1, 1] till intervallet [-256, 256] innan du anropar den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12765">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12766">Om projektet med GUIX version är lika med eller lägre än 5.4.0 och du vill uppgradera projektet till det senaste GUIX-biblioteket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12766">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12767">Du har två alternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12767">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12768">Korrigera indatavärdet för det här API-anropet för att använda GX_FIXED_VAL data typ värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12768">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12769">Definiera GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12769">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12772">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12772">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12773">**vinkel**: vinkel värde för arcus sinus x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12773">**angle**: Angle value of arc sine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12774">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12774">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12776">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12776">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc sine of “x”. */

#if defined GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    X = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_asin(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc sine “x”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_cos"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12794">gx_utility_math_cos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12794">gx_utility_math_cos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12795">Beräknings-cosinus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12795">Compute cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12796">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12796">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_FIXED_VAL gx_utility_math_cos(GX_FIXED_VAL angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12797">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12797">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12798">Den här tjänsten beräknar cosinus för den angivna vinkeln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12798">This service computes the cosine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12799">Indatavärdet är en data typ med fast punkt, anropa GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE för att konvertera från INT till GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12799">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12800">Om du till exempel vill beräkna cosinus för 90 grad, gör du inmatad som GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (90).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12800">For example, if you want to calculate the cosine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12801">Returvärdet är en data typ med fast punkt, anropa GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT för att konvertera från GX_FIXED_VAL till INT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12801">The return value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12802">I 5.4.0 eller lägre version av GUIX-versionen är indatavärdet och returvärdet för den här tjänsten INT, indatavärdet och returvärdet för storas med 256.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12802">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX version, the input value and return value type of this service is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12803">Programmet måste därför skala vinkel värdet med 256 innan du anropar den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12803">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12804">Om projektet med GUIX version är lika med eller lägre än 5.4.0 och du vill uppgradera projektet till det senaste GUIX-biblioteket, har du två alternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12804">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12805">Korrigera indatavärdet och hanteringen till returvärdet för det här API-anropet för att använda GX_FIXED_VAL värde för datum typ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12805">Fix the input value and the handling to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL date type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12806">Definiera GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12806">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12807">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12807">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12808">**vinkel**: vinkel till beräkning av cosinus av</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12808">**angle**: Angle to compute cosine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12809">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12809">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12810">**cosinus**: cosinus för den angivna vinkeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12810">**cosine**: Cosine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12811">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12811">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12812">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12812">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12813">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12813">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute cosine of 90 degree. */

INT angle = 90;

#if defined (GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL scaled_angle = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(angle);
#endif

my_angle_cosine = gx_utility_math_cos(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_cosine” contains the cosine of “my_angle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12831">gx_utility_math_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12831">gx_utility_math_sin</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12832">Compute-sinus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12832">Compute sine</span></span>

```C
GX_FIXED_VAL gx_utility_math_sin(GX_FIXED_VAL angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12834">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12834">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12835">Den här tjänsten beräknar sinus för den angivna vinkeln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12835">This service computes the sine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12836">Indatavärdet är en data typ med fast punkt, anropa GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE för att konvertera från INT till GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12836">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12837">Om du till exempel vill beräkna sinus för 90 grad, gör du inmatad som GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (90).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12837">For example, if you want to calculate the sine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12838">Returvärdet är en data typ med fast punkt, anropa GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT för att konvertera från GX_FIXED_VAL till INT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12838">The return value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12839">I 5.4.0 eller lägre version GUIX är indatavärdet och retur värdes typen INT, och indatavärdet och returvärdet för storas med 256.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12839">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value and return value type is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12840">Programmet måste därför skala vinkel värdet med 256 innan du anropar den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12840">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12841">Om projektet med GUIX version är lika med eller lägre än 5.4.0 och du vill uppgradera projektet till det senaste GUIX-biblioteket, har du två alternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12841">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12842">Korrigera indatavärdet och lämna värdet till returvärdet för det här API-anropet för att använda GX_FIXED_VAL data typs värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12842">Fix the input value and the handing to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12843">Definiera GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12843">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12844">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12844">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12845">**vinkel**: vinkel för att beräkna sinus av</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12845">**angle**: Angle to compute sine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12846">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12846">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12847">**sinus**: sinus för den angivna vinkeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12847">**sine**: Sine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12848">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12848">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12849">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12849">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12850">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12850">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_angle = 80;

/* Compute sine of “my_angle”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = my_angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(my_angle);
#endif

my_angle_sine = gx_utility_math_sin(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_sine” contains the sine of “my_angle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12895">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12895">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12896">Ändra ordning på dubbelriktad text till visnings ordningen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12896">Reorder BiDi text into its display order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12897">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12897">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO *input_info, 
                                       GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO **resolved_info_head)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12898">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12898">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12899">Den här tjänsten ordnar om dubbelriktad text i visnings ordningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12899">This service reorders BiDi text into its display order.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12900">Om text ritnings teckensnittet och visnings bredden anges, används rad brytning först, och sorterings processen tillämpas baserat på varje rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12900">If text draw font and display width are provided, line breaking will be applied first, reordering process will be applied based on each line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12901">Om den tillhandahållna texten innehåller mer än ett stycke kommer tjänsten att dela upp texten i stycken, och rad brytningen och omordnings resultatet för varje stycke länkas som en lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12901">If the provided text contains more than one paragraph, the service will break the text into paragraphs, the line breaking and reordering result of each paragraph will be linked as a list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12902">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12902">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12903">**input_info**: pekar mot information för rad brytning och text sortering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12903">**input_info**: Pointer to the information for line breaking and text reordering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12904">**resolved_info_head**: pekar mot den länkade listan som innehåller rad brytningar och ordnar om resultatet av varje stycke i den angivna texten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12904">**resolved_info_head**: Pointer to the linked list that contains line breaking and reordering results of each paragraph of the the provided text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12905">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12905">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12906">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckad dubbelriktad text ändra ordning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12906">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful bidi text reorder</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12907">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltiga inmatade pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12907">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12908">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) allokerat minne har inte definierats eller så misslyckades minnes tilldelningen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12908">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12909">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12909">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12910">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12910">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12911">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12911">Example</span></span>
#### <a name="draw-single-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12912">Rita enkel linje dubbelriktad text till arbets ytan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12912">Draw single line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Single Line String";
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = GX_NULL;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = -1;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_left,
                                widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_top,
                                resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text);

        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```
#### <a name="draw-multi-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12913">Rita multi line dubbelriktad text till arbets ytan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12913">Draw multi line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Line BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        for(index = 0; index < resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
        {
            gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
        
            ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

#### <a name="draw-multi-paragraph-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12914">Rita multi-stycken dubbelriktad text till arbets ytan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12914">Draw multi paragraph bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *next;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Paragraph\r BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        next = resolved_info;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        while(next)
        {
            for(index = 0; index < next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
            {
                gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
            
                ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
            }
            
            next = next->gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_next;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12933">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12933">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12934">Ändra storlek på Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12934">Resize pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12935">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12935">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_resize(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination, 
    INT width, 
    INT height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12936">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12936">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12937">Den här tjänsten ändrar storlek på en Pixelmap och returnerar en pekare till en ny Pixelmap, vilket är resultatet av storleken på Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12937">This service resizes a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap resize.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12938">Den här tjänsten kräver den tidigare användningen av gx_system_memory_allocator_set, för att tillåta allokering av minne för att lagra de ändrade storlekarna på Pixelmap data.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12938">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the resized pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12939">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12939">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12940">**src**: pekare till Pixelmap för att ändra storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12940">**src**: Pointer to the pixelmap to resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12941">**mål**: måldomänkontrollanten för den resulterande Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12941">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12942">**width**: bredden på den resulterande Pixelmap i bild punkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12942">**width**: Width of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12943">**height**: hieght för den resulterande Pixelmap i bild punkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12943">**height**: Hieght of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12944">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12944">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12945">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Pixelmap ändra storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12945">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12946">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltigt käll-eller mål Pixelmap-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12946">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12947">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0X22) bredd eller höjd-värde är ogiltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12947">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width or height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12948">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0X28) Källa Pixelmap är komprimerat format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12948">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12949">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) allokerat minne har inte definierats eller så misslyckades minnes tilldelningen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12949">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12950">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12950">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12951">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12951">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12952">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12952">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXLEMAP *des_pixelmap;

/* Resize “src_pixelmap” with specifiy width and height. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_resize(src_pixelmap,
    &des_pixelmap, 100, 200);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of resize. */
```
