## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12969">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12969">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12970">Rotera Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12970">Rotate pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12971">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12971">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src, INT angle,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination,
    UINT *rot_cx, 
    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12972">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12972">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12973">Den här tjänsten roterar en Pixelmap och returnerar en pekare till en ny Pixelmap, vilket är resultatet av Pixelmap-rotationen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12973">This service rotates a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12974">Använd gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate () om du vill rotera en Pixelmap direkt till arbets ytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12974">To rotate a pixelmap directly to the canvas, use gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12975">Den här tjänsten kräver att gx_system_memory_allocator_set används tidigare för att tillåta allokering av minne för att lagra de roterade Pixelmap-data.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12975">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the rotated pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12976">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12976">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12977">**src**: den Pixelmap som ska roteras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12977">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12978">**vinkel**: rotations vinkel i grader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12978">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12979">**mål**: måldomänkontrollanten för den resulterande Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12979">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12980">**rot_cx**: x-koordinaten för rotations Center har hämtats med avseende på mål Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12980">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12981">Bör initieras med x-koordinaten för rotations Center med avseende på Source Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12981">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12982">Om rot_cx är GX_NULL kommer värdet inte att hämtas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12982">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12983">**rot_cy**: y-koordinaten för rotations centrum har hämtats med avseende på mål Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12983">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12984">Bör initieras med y-koordinaten för rotations centrum med avseende på käll Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12984">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12985">Om rot_cy är GX_NULL kommer värdet inte att hämtas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12985">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12986">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12986">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12987">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckad Pixelmap rotation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12987">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12988">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltigt käll-eller mål Pixelmap-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12988">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12989">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0X22) vinkel värde är 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12989">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12990">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Pixelmap är komprimerat format, vilket inte stöds</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12990">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12991">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) allokerat minne har inte definierats eller så misslyckades minnes tilldelningen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12991">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12992">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12992">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12993">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12993">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-12994">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-12994">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(src_pixelmap, 30,
    &des_pixelmap, &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13011">gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13011">gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13012">Rotera Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13012">Rotate pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13013">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13013">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src,
    INT angle,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination,
    UINT *rot_cx,
    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13014">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13014">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13015">Den här tjänsten roterar en Pixelmap med 90 grad, 180 grad eller 270-grad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13015">This service rotates a pixelmap by 90 degree, 180 degree or 270 degree.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13016">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13016">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13017">**src**: den Pixelmap som ska roteras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13017">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13018">**vinkel**: rotations vinkel i grader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13018">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13019">**mål**: måldomänkontrollanten för den resulterande Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13019">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13020">**rot_cx**: x-koordinaten för rotations Center har hämtats med avseende på mål Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13020">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13021">Bör initieras med x-koordinaten för rotations Center med avseende på Source Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13021">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13022">Om rot_cx är GX_NULL kommer värdet inte att hämtas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13022">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13023">**rot_cy**: y-koordinaten för rotations centrum har hämtats med avseende på mål Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13023">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13024">Bör initieras med y-koordinaten för rotations centrum med avseende på käll Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13024">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13025">Om rot_cy är GX_NULL kommer värdet inte att hämtas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13025">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13026">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13026">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13027">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) lyckad Pixelmap rotation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13027">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13028">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltigt käll-eller mål Pixelmap-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13028">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13029">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0X22) vinkel värde är 0 eller inte en enkel vinkel som 90, 180, 270</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13029">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0 or not a simple angle like 90, 180, 270</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13030">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Pixelmap är komprimerat format, vilket inte stöds</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13030">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13031">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) allokerat minne har inte definierats eller så misslyckades minnes tilldelningen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13031">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**:  (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13032">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13032">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13033">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13033">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13034">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13034">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 90 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate(src_pixelmap, 90,
    &des_pixelmap,
    &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13050">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13050">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13051">Centrera rektangeln i en annan rektangel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13051">Center rectangle within another rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13052">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13052">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *within_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13053">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13053">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13054">Den här tjänsten centrerar rektangeln i en annan rektangel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13054">This service centers the rectangle within another rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13055">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13055">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13056">**rektangel**: rektangel till mitten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13056">**rectangle**: Rectangle to center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13057">**within_rectangle**: rektangel som ska centreras i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13057">**within_rectangle**: Rectangle to center within</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13058">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13058">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13059">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) centrerade rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13059">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully centered the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13060">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare för indatakälla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13060">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13061">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0X19) ogiltig Rectangle-storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13061">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13062">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13062">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13063">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13063">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13064">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13064">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Center “my_inner_rectangle” inside of “my_outer_rectangle”.*/
status = gx_utility_rectangle_center(&my_inner_rectangle,
    &my_outer_rectangle);

/* Is status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_inner_rectangle” is centered
within “my_other_rectangle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13080">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13080">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13081">Hitta mitten av rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13081">Find center of rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13082">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13082">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT *return_center);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13083">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13083">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13084">Den här tjänsten hittar rektangelns centrum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13084">This service finds the center of the rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13085">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13085">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13086">**rektangel**: rektangel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13086">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13087">**return_center**: pekar mot mitt punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13087">**return_center**: Pointer to center point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13088">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13088">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13089">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har hittat mitten av rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13089">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully found the center of the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13090">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig inmatare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13090">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13091">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0X19) ogiltig Rectangle-storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13091">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13092">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13092">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13093">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13093">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13094">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13094">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_center_point;

gx_utility_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Find center of “my_rectangle””. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(&my_rectangle,
    &my_center_point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_center_point” is the center point
of “my_rectangle” (50, 50). */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_combine"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13110">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13110">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13111">Kombinera två rektanglar till första</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13111">Combine two rectangles into first</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13112">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13112">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_combine(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13113">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13113">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13114">Den här tjänsten kombinerar den första och andra rektangeln till den första rektangeln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13114">This service combines the first and second rectangle into the first rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13115">Den första rektangeln expanderas för att inkludera den andra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13115">The first rectangle is expanded to include the second.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13116">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13116">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13117">**first_rectangle**: första rektangeln och kombinerad rektangel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13117">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle and combined rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13118">**second_rectangle**: andra rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13118">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13119">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13119">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13120">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har kombinerat två rektanglar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13120">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully combined two rectangles</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13121">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig inmatare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13121">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13122">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13122">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13123">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13123">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13124">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13124">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_a;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_b;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_a, 0, 0, 100, 100);
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_b, 50, 50, 200, 200);

/* Combine “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_combine(&rect_a, &rect_b);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “rect_a” is (0, 0, 200, 200) the merger
of the original “rect_a” and “rect_b”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_compare"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13140">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13140">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13141">Jämför två rektanglar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13141">Compare two rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13142">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13142">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_compare( 
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13143">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13143">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13144">Den här tjänsten jämför den första och andra rektangeln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13144">This service compares the first and second rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13145">Om de är lika returneras ett värde för GX_TRUE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13145">If they are equal, a value of GX_TRUE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13146">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13146">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13147">**first_rectangle**: första rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13147">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13148">**second_rectangle**: andra rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13148">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13149">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13149">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13150">**resultat**: GX_TRUE om rektanglar är identiska, annars returneras GX_FALSE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13150">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles are equal, otherwise GX_FALSE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13151">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13151">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13152">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13152">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13153">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13153">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compare “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_compare(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, the two rectangles are equal. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13169">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13169">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13170">Definiera en rektangel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13170">Define a rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13171">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13171">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_define(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE left,
    GX_VALUE top, 
    GX_VALUE right, 
    GX_VALUE bottom);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13172">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13172">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13173">Den här tjänsten definierar en rektangel som anges.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13173">This service defines a rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13174">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13174">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13175">**rektangel**: kontroll block-rektangel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13175">**rectangle**: Rectangle control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13176">**vänster**: den mest vänstra koordinaten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13176">**left**: Left most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13177">**överkant**: mest översta koordinaten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13177">**top**: Top most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13178">**höger**: den bästa koordinaten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13178">**right**: Right most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13179">**nederkant**: flest koordinater</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13179">**bottom**: Bottom most coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13180">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13180">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13181">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har definierat en rektangel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13181">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully defined a rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13182">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig Rectangle-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13182">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13183">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13183">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13184">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13184">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13185">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13185">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rect;

/* Define “my_rect”. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rect, 10, 5, 200, 100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rect” is defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13201">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13201">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13202">Identifiera överlappande av rektanglar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13202">Detect overlap of rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13203">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13203">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_overlap_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13204">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13204">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13205">Den här tjänsten identifierar överlappande av de angivna rektanglarna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13205">This service detects any overlap of the supplied rectangles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13206">Om överlappande hittas returnerar tjänsten GX_TRUE och den överlappande rektangeln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13206">If overlap is found, the service returns GX_TRUE and the overlapping rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13207">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13207">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13208">**first_rectangle**: första rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13208">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13209">**second_rectangle**: andra rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13209">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13210">**return_overlap_area**: överlappande Rectangle-område</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13210">**return_overlap_area**: Overlapping rectangle area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13211">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13211">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13212">**resultat**: GX_TRUE om rektanglar överlappar, annars GX_FALSE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13212">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles overlap, otherwise GX_FALSE.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13213">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13213">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13214">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13214">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13215">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13215">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Detect overlap of “my_rectangle_a” and “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b,
    &my_overlap_area);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_overlap_area” specifies the area the
rectangles overlap. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13231">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13231">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13232">Identifiera om punkten finns i rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13232">Detect if point resides in rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13233">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13234">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13235">Den här tjänsten identifierar om den angivna punkten finns i rektangeln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13235">This service detects if the specified point resides in the rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13236">Om punkten finns i rektangeln returnerar tjänsten GX_TRUE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13236">If the point does reside in the rectangle, the service returns  GX_TRUE.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13237">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13237">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13238">**rektangel**: rektangel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13238">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13239">**punkt**: punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13239">**point**: Point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13240">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13240">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13241">**resultat**: GX_TRUE om punkten finns i rektangeln, annars GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13241">**result**: GX_TRUE if point resides in rectangle, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13242">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13243">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13243">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13244">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13244">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_point;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

my_point.gx_point_x = 20; my_point.gx_point_y = 20;

/* Detect if point “my_point” is within “my_rectangle””. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(&my_rectangle,
    &my_point);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_point” resides in the rectangle. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13260">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13260">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13261">Utöka rektangel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13261">Grow rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13262">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13262">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_resize(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE adjust);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13263">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13263">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13264">Den här tjänsten ökar storleken på rektangeln enligt vad som anges.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13264">This service increases the size of the rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13265">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13266">**rektangel**: pekare till rektangel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13266">**rectangle**: Pointer to rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13267">**Justera**: belopp för att justera rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13267">**adjust**: Amount to adjust the rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13268">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13268">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13269">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ändrade storlek på rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13269">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully resized the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13270">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare för indatakälla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13270">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13271">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13271">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13272">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13272">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13273">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13273">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Adjust “my_rectangle” by increasing 20 pixels on four sides */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_resize(&my_rectangle, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rectangle” is 20 pixels larger. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13289">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13289">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13290">Shift-rektangel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13290">Shift rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13291">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13291">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_shift(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13292">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13292">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13293">Den här tjänsten byter till rektangeln med de angivna värdena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13293">This service shifts the rectangle by the specified values.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13294">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13294">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13295">**rektangel**: rektangel till Skift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13295">**rectangle**: Rectangle to shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13296">**x_shif**: antalet pixlar som ska flyttas till x-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13296">**x_shif**: Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13297">**y_shift**: antal pixlar som ska flyttas på y-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13297">**y_shift**: Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13298">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13298">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13299">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) har växlat till rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13299">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully shifted the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13300">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig pekare för indatakälla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13300">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13301">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13301">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13302">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13302">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13303">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13303">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Shift “my_rectangle”. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_shift(&my_rectangle, 10, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rectangle” has been shifted. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_string_to_alphamap"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13319">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13319">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13320">Rendera strängen till en 8bpp AlphaMap-typ Pixelmap (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13320">Render string to an 8bpp alphamap type pixelmap (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13321">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13321">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(
    const GX_CHAR *text, const
    GX_FONT *font, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13322">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13322">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13323">Den här tjänsten har ersatts av gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13323">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13324">Den här tjänsten återger en text sträng till en AlphaMap, vilket är en särskild form av 8bpp-Pixelmap som bara innehåller alpha-värden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13324">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13325">Den här tjänsten används vanligt vis tillsammans med gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate och gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw för att rita roterad text till arbets ytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13325">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13326">Den här tjänsten beräknar den minnes storlek som krävs för den resulterande AlphaMap och anropar funktionen gx_system_memory_allocator () som definieras av programmet för att dynamiskt allokera minne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13326">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13327">Programmet måste anropa gx_system_memory_allocator_set () vid en viss tidpunkt, vanligt vis när programmet startas, innan du använder den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13327">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13328">Om en text sträng ska roteras och ritas till arbets ytan bara en gång, anges tjänsten gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw () som ett alternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13328">If a text string is to be rotated and drawn to the canvas just once, the service gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() is provided as an alternate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13329">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw () anropar gx_utility_string_to_alphamap (), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate () och gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw () för att återge roterad text i en åtgärd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13329">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() will call gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() to render the rotated text in one operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13330">Men om samma text kommer att ritas flera gånger i olika vinklar, är det mer effektivt att skapa AlphaMap en gång med hjälp av gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, och sedan rotera den resulterande AlphaMap flera gånger efter behov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13330">However if the same text will be drawn multiple times rotated at various angles, it is more efficient to create the alphamap once using the gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, then rotate the resulting alphamap multiple times as needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13331">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13331">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13332">**text**: text sträng att rendera till AlphaMap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13332">**text**: Text string to render to alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13333">**teckensnitt**: det teckensnitt som ska återges texten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13333">**font**: The font to be to render the text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13334">**return_map**: pekar på den GX_PIXELMAP som ska returneras till anroparen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13334">**return_map**: Pointer to the GX_PIXELMAP to be returned to the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13335">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13335">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13336">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) en text sträng har Render ATS till en AlphaMap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13336">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully rendered a text string to an alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13337">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig inmatare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13337">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13338">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0X30) minnes tilldelning/kostnads fri funktion har inte definierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13338">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocation/free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13339">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0X34) ogiltig sträng längd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13339">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13340">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13340">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13341">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13341">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13342">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13342">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

/* render string to alphamap once */

gx_utility_string_to_alphamap("Hello World", font, &alphamap);

/* rotate and render the alphmap at multiple angles */

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13344">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13344">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13345">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13345">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13346">Rendera strängen till en 8bpp AlphaMap-typ Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13346">Render string to an 8bpp alphamap type pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13347">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13347">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext(
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string,
    GX_CONST GX_FONT *font, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13348">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13348">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13349">Den här tjänsten återger en text sträng till en AlphaMap, vilket är en särskild form av 8bpp-Pixelmap som bara innehåller alpha-värden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13349">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13350">Den här tjänsten används vanligt vis tillsammans med gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate och gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw för att rita roterad text till arbets ytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13350">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13351">Den här tjänsten beräknar den minnes storlek som krävs för den resulterande AlphaMap och anropar funktionen gx_system_memory_allocator () som definieras av programmet för att dynamiskt allokera minne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13351">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13352">Programmet måste anropa gx_system_memory_allocator_set () vid en viss tidpunkt, vanligt vis när programmet startas, innan du använder den här tjänsten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13352">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13353">Om en text sträng ska roteras och ritas till arbets ytan bara en gång, anges tjänsten gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw () som ett alternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13353">If a text string is to be rotated and drawn to the canvas just once, the service gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() is provided as an alternate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13354">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw () anropar gx_utility_string_to_alphamap (), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate () och gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw () för att återge roterad text i en åtgärd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13354">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() will call gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() to render the rotated text in one operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13355">Men om samma text kommer att ritas flera gånger i olika vinklar, är det mer effektivt att skapa AlphaMap en gång med hjälp av gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, och sedan rotera den resulterande AlphaMap flera gånger efter behov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13355">However if the same text will be drawn multiple times rotated at various angles, it is more efficient to create the alphamap once using the gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, then rotate the resulting alphamap multiple times as needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13356">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13356">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13357">**sträng**: text sträng att rendera till AlphaMap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13357">**string**: Text string to render to alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13358">**teckensnitt**: det teckensnitt som ska återges texten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13358">**font**: The font to be to render the text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13359">**return_map**: pekar på den GX_PIXELMAP som ska returneras till anroparen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13359">**return_map**: Pointer to the GX_PIXELMAP to be returned to the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13360">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13360">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13361">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) en text sträng har Render ATS till en AlphaMap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13361">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully rendered a text string to an alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13362">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) ogiltig inmatare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13362">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13363">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0X30) minnes tilldelning/kostnads fri funktion har inte definierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13363">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocation/free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13364">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0X34) ogiltig sträng längd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13364">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13367">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13367">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING string;

GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

string.gx_string_ptr = “Hello World”;

string.gx_string_length = strlen(string.gx_string_ptr);

/* render string to alphamap once */
gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext(&string, font, &alphamap);

/* rotate and render the alphmap at multiple angles */
gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13407">gx_vertical_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13407">gx_vertical_list_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13408">Skapa lodrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13408">Create vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13409">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13409">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_create(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *, GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, USHORT vertical_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13410">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13410">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13411">Den här tjänsten skapar en lodrät lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13411">This service creates a vertical list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13412">GX_VERTICAL_LIST härleds från GX_WINDOW och stöder alla gx_window API-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13412">GX_VERTICAL_LIST is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13413">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13413">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13414">**vertical_list** Kontroll block för widgeten lodrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13414">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13415">**namn** Namn på lodrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13415">**name** Name of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13416">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13416">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13417">**total_rows** Totalt antal rader i lodrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13417">**total_rows** Total number of rows in vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13418">**motringning** En funktion som kommer att anropas av den lodräta listan när listan rullas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13418">**callback** A function that will be called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13419">Anroparen måste börja med att skapa tillräckligt med GX_WIDGET underordnade underordnade för att fylla de synliga List raderna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13419">The caller should initially create enough GX_WIDGET based children to fill the visible list rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13420">När listan är rullad anropas den här funktionen för att återskapa de List objekt som motsvarar det angivna List indexet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13420">As the list is scrolled, this function is called to re-create the list children corresponding to the supplied list index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13421">**stil** Typ av widget för rullnings List.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13421">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13422">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13422">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13542">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13542">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-selected-widget-from-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13543">Hämta vald widget från lodrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13543">Get selected widget from vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13544">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13544">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_WIDGET **return_list_entry);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13545">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13545">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13546">Den här tjänsten returnerar den markerade widgeten för den lodräta listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13546">This service returns the selected widget of the vertical list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13547">Observera att om listan innehåller fler rader än underordnade widgetar och den valda underordnade widgeten har rullats från vyn, returnerar den här funktionen GX_NULL som GX_WIDGET visare, eftersom widgeten har återanvänts för att visa en ny post i listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13547">Note that if the list contains more rows than child widgets, and the selected child widget has been scrolled from view, this function will return GX_NULL as the GX_WIDGET pointer, since the widget has been reused to display a new list entry.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13548">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13548">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13549">**vertical_list** Kontroll block för widgeten lodrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13549">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13550">**return_list_entry** Mål för widgeten Return List post</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13550">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13551">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13551">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13552">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har hämta den lodräta List posten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13552">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully get the vertical list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13553">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) den valda widgeten har rullats från vyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13553">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) The selected widget has been scrolled from view.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13555">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13555">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13556">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13556">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13557">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13557">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13558">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13558">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *current_selected_widget;

/* Get the list entry at the current index of vertical list “my_list”. */
status = gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(&my_list, &current_selected_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_list_entry” contains a pointer to the currently selected widget. */
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_scrollbar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13592">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13592">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13594">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13594">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance,
    ULONG style);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13595">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13595">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13596">Den här tjänsten skapar en lodrät rullnings List.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13596">This service creates a vertical scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13597">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13597">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13598">**rullnings List** Kontroll block för rullnings List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13598">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13599">**namn** Namn på rullnings List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13599">**name** Name of scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13600">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13600">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13601">**utseende** Utseende på widgeten lodrät rullnings List.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13601">**appearance** Appearance of vertical scrollbar widget.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13602">**stil** Rullnings listens format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13602">**style** Style of the scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13603">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13603">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13604">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) vågrät rullnings List har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13604">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful vertical scrollbar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13605">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13605">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13606">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13606">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13607">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13607">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13608">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13608">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13609">Den överordnade widgeten **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13609">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13610">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13610">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13611">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13611">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13612">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13612">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create vertical scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */
status = gx_vertical_scrollbar_create(&my_scrollbar,
                          “my_vertical_scrollbar”,
                          &my_parent, &scrollbar_appearance,
                          GX_STYLE_ENABLED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the vertical scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13622">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13622">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13623">Den här tjänsten allokerar dynamiskt ett widgets kontroll block genom att anropa funktionen programdefinierad minnesallokering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13623">This service dynamically allocates a widget control block, by calling the application defined memory allocation function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13624">Den här tjänsten används främst av de funktioner som genereras av GUIX Studio för att dynamiskt allokera kontroll block när egenskapen "dynamisk allokering" är markerad i vyn GUIX Studio-egenskaper.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13624">This service is primarily used by the functions generated by GUIX Studio to dynamically allocate control block when the “Dynamic Allocation” property is selected in the GUIX Studio properties view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13625">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13625">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13626">**control_block** Pekare som visar pekare för kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13626">**control_block** Pointer to returned control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13627">**memsize** Kontroll block storlek, i byte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13627">**memsize** Control block size, in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13628">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13628">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13629">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) allokering av slutförd widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13629">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget allocate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13630">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) allokerat minne har inte definierats eller så misslyckades minnes tilldelningen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13630">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13631">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13631">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13632">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0X29) minnes storleken är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13632">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) Memory size not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13633">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13633">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13634">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13634">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13635">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13635">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button;

/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_allocate(&button, sizeof(GX_TEXT_BUTTON));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the button widget control block is allocated. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13673">gx_widget_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13673">gx_widget_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13674">Bifoga widgeten till dess överordnade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13674">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13675">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13675">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13676">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13676">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13677">Den här tjänsten kopplar widgeten till den angivna överordnade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13677">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13678">Om widgeten redan är kopplad till en annan överordnad, kopplas den först från.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13678">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13679">Om widgeten redan är kopplad till samma överordnade funktion händer ingenting.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13679">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13680">Widgeten blir den översta underordnade för dess överordnade objekt i form av z-ordning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13680">The widget becomes the front-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13681">Om widgeten på samma nivå överlappar, ritas denna widget ovanpå objekt på samma nivå.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13681">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn on top of siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13682">Använd gx_widget_back_attach eller gx_widget_back_move för att ställa in den nya widgeten på bak sidan av z-ordningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13682">To put the new widget in the back of the z-order, use gx_widget_back_attach or gx_widget_back_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13683">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13683">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13684">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13684">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13685">**widget** Widgeten pekare till underordnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13685">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13686">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13686">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13687">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)-slutförd widget-koppling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13687">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget attach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13688">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13688">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13689">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13689">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13690">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) överordnad eller widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13690">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13691">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13691">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13692">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13692">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13693">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13693">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_attach(&my_parent, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is attached to “my_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13731">gx_widget_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13731">gx_widget_background_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-a-widget-background"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13732">Rita en bakgrund för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13732">Draw a widget background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13733">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13733">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_background_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13734">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13734">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13735">Den här tjänsten utför en solid färg fyllning för en widgets bakgrund.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13735">This service performs a solid color fill of a widget background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13736">Den här tjänsten anropas automatiskt av gx_widget_draw-funktionen, men kan också anropas av programmet som en del av en anpassad widgets ritnings funktion.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13736">This service is automatically called by the gx_widget_draw function, but may also be invoked by the application as part of a customized widget drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13737">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13737">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13738">**widget** Pekare till widget som ska ritas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13738">**widget** Pointer to widget to be drawn</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13739">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13739">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13740">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13740">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13741">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13741">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13742">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13742">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13743">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13743">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
    /* Call default widget background draw. */
    gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```
