## <a name="gx_widget_back_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13781">gx_widget_back_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13781">gx_widget_back_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13782">Bifoga widgeten till dess överordnade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13782">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13783">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13783">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13784">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13784">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13785">Den här tjänsten kopplar widgeten till den angivna överordnade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13785">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13786">Om widgeten redan är kopplad till en annan överordnad, kopplas den först från.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13786">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13787">Om widgeten redan är kopplad till samma överordnade funktion händer ingenting.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13787">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13788">Widgeten blir det överordnade objektets överordnade objekt vad gäller z-ordning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13788">The widget becomes the back-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13789">Om widgeten på samma nivå överlappar, ritas denna widgeten bakom dessa objekt på samma nivå.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13789">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn behind those siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13790">Använd gx_widget_attach eller gx_widget_front_move för att lägga den nya widgeten överst i z-ordningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13790">To put the new widget in the front of the z-order, use gx_widget_attach or gx_widget_front_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13791">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13791">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13792">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13792">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13793">**widget** Widgeten pekare till underordnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13793">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13794">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13794">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13795">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)-slutförd widget-koppling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13795">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget attach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13796">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13796">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13797">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13797">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13798">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) överordnad eller widgeten är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13798">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13799">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13799">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13800">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13800">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13801">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13801">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_back_attach(&my_parent, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is attached to “my_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_back_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13839">gx_widget_back_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13839">gx_widget_back_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-back"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13840">Flytta widgeten bakåt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13840">Move widget to back</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13841">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13841">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_BOOL *return_widget_moved);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13842">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13842">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13843">Den här tjänsten flyttar widgeten längst upp i den överordnade objektens Z-ordning efter underordnade widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13843">This service moves the widget to the back in the parent's Z-order of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13844">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13844">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13845">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13845">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13846">**return_widget_moved** Pekare till mål för flagga som anger att widgeten har flyttats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13846">**return_widget_moved** Pointer to destination for flag indicating the widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13847">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13847">Return Values</span></span>


## <a name="gx_widget_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13892">gx_widget_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13892">gx_widget_block_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-a-rectangular-block-of-pixels"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13893">Flytta ett rektangulärt block med pixlar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13893">Move a rectangular block of pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13894">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13894">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_block_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    INT xshift, INT yshift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13895">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13895">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13896">Den här tjänsten flyttar ett rektangulärt block av pixlar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13896">This service moves a rectangular block of pixels.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13897">Den här tjänsten används oftast för att implementera snabb rullning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13897">This service is most often used to implement fast scrolling.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13898">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13898">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13899">**widget** Pekare mot widget som begär block flyttning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13899">**widget** Pointer to widget requesting block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13900">**blockera** Rektangulärt avgränsnings block att flytta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13900">**block** Rectangle bounding block to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13901">**xshift** X-Shift-mängden i bild punkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13901">**xshift** The x shift amount in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13902">**yshift** Y-shiftnas storlek i bild punkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13902">**yshift** The y shift amount in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13903">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13903">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13904">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) en lyckad widget flyttas till bak Sidan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13904">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to the back</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13905">Det gick inte att hitta **GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) widgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13905">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13906">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13906">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13907">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13907">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13908">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13908">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13909">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13909">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13910">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13910">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13911">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13911">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move a block of pixels 20 pixels to the right. */
status = gx_widget_block_move(&my_widget, &size, 20, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the block of pixels was moved. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13948">gx_widget_border_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13948">gx_widget_border_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-border"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13949">Rita widget-kantlinje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13949">Draw widget border</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13950">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13950">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_border_draw(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_COLOR border_color,
    GX_COLOR upper_fill, 
    GX_COLOR lower_fill, 
    GX_BOOL fill);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13951">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13951">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13952">Den här tjänsten ritar widgetens kant linje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13952">This service draws the widget border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13953">Den här tjänsten anropas vanligt vis som en del av en widgets ritnings funktion.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13953">This service is normally invoked as part of a widget drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13954">Den här tjänsten tolkar widgetens kant linje format flaggor för att rita ingen kant linje, en tunn kant linje, en upphöjd kant linje, en försänkt kant linje eller en tjock kant linje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13954">This service interprets the widget border style flags to draw no border, a thin border, a raised border, a recessed border, or a thick border.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13955">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13955">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13956">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13956">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13957">**border_color** Kant linje färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13957">**border_color** Color of border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13958">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13958">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13959">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13959">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13960">**upper_fill** Färg för den övre fyllningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13960">**upper_fill** Color of upper fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13961">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13961">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13962">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13962">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13963">**lower_fill** Färg för nedre fyllning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13963">**lower_fill** Color of lower fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13964">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13964">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13965">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13965">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13966">**Fyll** Den här booleska flaggan visar om widgetområdet ska fyllas i med angivna fyllnings färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13966">**fill** This boolean flag indicates whether or not the widget area should be filled with the supplied fill colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13967">Om det här värdet är GX_FALSE ritas bara widgetens kant linje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13967">If this value is GX_FALSE, only the widget border is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13971">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13971">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-13972">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-13972">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
      /* Call widget border draw. */
      gx_widget_border_draw(widget, GX_COLOR_BLACK,
                            GX_COLOR_GREEN, GX_COLOR_BLUE,
                            GX_TRUE);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */

      /* Draw child widgets. */
      Gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14009">gx_widget_border_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14009">gx_widget_border_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-border-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14010">Ange kant linje format för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14010">Set widget border style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14011">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14011">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_border_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14012">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14012">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14013">Den här tjänsten anger widgetens kant linje format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14013">This service sets the widget border style.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14014">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14014">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14015">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14015">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14016">**stil** Kant linje format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14016">**style** Style of border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14017">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14017">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14018">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14018">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14019">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) kant linje format uppsättningen har slutförts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14019">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget border style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14020">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14020">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14021">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14021">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14022">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14022">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14023">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14023">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14024">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14024">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14025">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14025">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set border style of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_border_style_set(&my_widget,
                                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” border style has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14062">gx_widget_border_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14062">gx_widget_border_width_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-border-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14063">Hämta kant linje bredd för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14063">Get widget border width</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14064">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14064">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_border_width_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14065">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14065">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14066">Den här tjänsten hämtar widgetens kant linje bredd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14066">This service gets the widget border width.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14067">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14067">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14068">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14068">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14069">**return_width** Pekare till målet för widgetens kant linje bredd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14069">**return_width** Pointer to destination for widget border width</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14070">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14070">Return Values</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_canvas_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14113">gx_widget_canvas_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14113">gx_widget_canvas_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14114">Hämta arbets ytan för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14114">Get widget canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14115">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14115">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_canvas_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_CANVAS **return_canvas)
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14116">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14116">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14117">Den här tjänsten returnerar en pekare till den arbets yta som widgeten återges på.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14117">This service returns a pointer to the canvas onto which this widget is rendered.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14118">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14118">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14119">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14119">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14120">**return_canvas** Pekare till målet för widgetens arbets yta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14120">**return_canvas** Pointer to destination for widget’s canvas</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14121">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14122">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad widgets arbets yta Hämta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14122">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget canvas get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14123">Det gick inte att hitta **GX_FAILURE** (0X10) widgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14123">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget canvas not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14124">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14124">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14125">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14125">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14126">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14126">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14127">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14127">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14128">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14128">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get canvas associated with “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_canvas_get(&my_widget, &my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_canvas” contains the canvas of the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_child_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14166">gx_widget_child_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14166">gx_widget_child_detect</span></span>
### <a name="detect-widget-child"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14167">Identifiera underordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14167">Detect widget child</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14168">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14168">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_child_detect(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *child,
    GX_BOOL *return_detect);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14169">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14169">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14170">Den här tjänsten identifierar om widgeten är underordnad den överordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14170">This service detects if the widget is a child of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14171">Den här tjänsten kapslar in för att söka efter underordnade objekt och returnerar TRUE om den överordnade widgeten är på en nivå som är överordnad den underordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14171">This service nests to search children of children, and returns TRUE if the parent widget is at any level an ancestor of the child widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14172">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14172">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14173">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14173">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14174">**underordnade** Widgeten pekare till underordnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14174">**child** Pointer to child widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14175">**return_detect** Pekare till målet för identifiering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14175">**return_detect** Pointer to destination for detection</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14176">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14176">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14177">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) underordnad widget, underordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14177">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget child detection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14178">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14178">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14179">Ogiltig **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) för överordnad eller underordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or child widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14180">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14180">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14181">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14181">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14182">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14182">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL detected;

/* Determine if “my_child” is a child of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_child_detect(&my_widget, &my_child, &detected);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “detected” is GX_TRUE, “my_child” is a child of widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_children_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14219">gx_widget_children_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14219">gx_widget_children_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-children"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14220">Rita widget underordnade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14220">Draw widget children</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14221">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14221">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_children_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14222">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14222">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14223">Den här tjänsten ritar alla underordnade objekt till den överordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14223">This service draws all children of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14224">Den här tjänsten anropas vanligt vis av alla standard ritnings funktioner i widgeten för att rita alla befintliga underordnade widgetar, och ska anropas av anpassade rit funktioner som gör att underordnade widgetar kan kopplas till din anpassade typ av widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14224">This service is normally invoked by all standard widget drawing functions to draw any existing child widgets, and should be invoked by any custom drawing functions to allow child widgets to be attached to your custom parent widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14225">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14225">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14226">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14226">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14227">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14227">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14228">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14228">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14229">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14229">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14230">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14230">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14231">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14231">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
        /* Call default widget background draw. */
        gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

        /* Add your own drawing here. */

        /* Draw child widgets. */
        gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_client_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14268">gx_widget_client_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14268">gx_widget_client_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-client-area"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14269">Hämta widgets klient områden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14269">Get widget client area</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14270">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14270">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_client_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE border_width,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_client_area);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14271">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14271">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14272">Den här tjänsten beräknar klient delen av widgeten genom att dra ifrån widgetens kant linje bredd från den övergripande widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14272">This service computes the client area of widget by subtracting the widget border width from the overall widget size.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14273">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14273">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14274">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14274">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14275">**border_width** Bredd på widgetens kant linje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14275">**border_width** Width of widget border</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14276">**return_client_area** Mål för retur av klient områden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14276">**return_client_area** Destination for returning client area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14277">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14277">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14278">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad widgets klient områden Hämta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14278">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget client area get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14279">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14279">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14280">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14280">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14281">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) ogiltig widgets kant linje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14281">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Widget border not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14282">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14282">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14283">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14283">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14284">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14284">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE client_area
/* Get client area of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_client_get(&my_widget, my_widget_width,
                              &client_area);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “client_area” is the client area of “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14321">gx_widget_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14321">gx_widget_color_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14322">Hämta färg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14322">Get color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14323">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14323">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_color_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14324">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14324">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14325">Den här tjänsten hämtar färgen som är kopplad till det tillhandahållna resurs-ID: t.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14325">This service gets the color associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14326">Den här tjänsten ska endast anropas av synliga widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14326">This service should only be called by visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14327">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14327">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14328">**widget** Pekare till kontroll block för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14328">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14329">**resource_id** Resurs-ID för färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14329">**resource_id** Resource ID of color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14330">**Bilaga B** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14330">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14331">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14331">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14332">**return_color** Pekare till mål för färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14332">**return_color** Pointer to destination for color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14333">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14333">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14334">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14334">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14335">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14335">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14336">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad färg hämtning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14336">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14337">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14337">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14338">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) widgeten är ogiltig eller så är widgeten osynlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14338">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14339">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14339">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14340">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14340">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14341">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14341">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14342">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14342">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14343">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14343">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR actual_color;

/* Get color for resource ID MY_FIRST_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_widget_color_get(my_widget, MY_FIRST_COLOR_RESOURCE_ID,
                            &actual_color);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the actual color is contained in “actual_color”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14347">gx_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14347">gx_widget_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14348">Skapa widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14348">Create widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14349">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14349">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_create(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14350">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14350">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14351">Den här tjänsten skapar en widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14351">This service creates a widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14352">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14352">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14353">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14353">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14354">**namn** Logiskt namn på widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14354">**name** Logical name of widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14355">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14355">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14356">**stil** ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14356">**style** Style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14357">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14357">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14358">**widget_id** Programdefinierat ID för widgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14358">**widget_id** Application-defined ID of the widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14359">**storlek** Storlek på widgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14359">**size** Size of the widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14360">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14360">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad widgeten skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14364">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14364">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14365">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14365">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14366">Den överordnade widgeten **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14366">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14367">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14367">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14368">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14368">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14369">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14369">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET my_widget;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Get client area of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_create(&my_widget, "my widget",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_WIDGET_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14408">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14408">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_created_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14409">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14409">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14410">Den här tjänsten testar för att avgöra om widgeten redan har skapats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14410">This service tests to determine if the widget has previously been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14411">Om inga fel uppstår returnerar den här funktionen GX_SUCCESS, oavsett om widgeten har skapats eller inte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14411">If no errors are encountered, this function return GX_SUCCESS, regardless if the widget is created yet or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14412">Resultatet av testet finns i return_test-pekaren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14412">The result of the test is in the return_test pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14413">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14413">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14414">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14414">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14415">**return_test** Mål för test resultat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14415">**return_test** Destination for test result</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14416">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14416">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) slutförd test slut för ande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful test completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14418">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14418">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14419">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14419">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14420">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14420">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14421">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14421">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL was_created;

/* Test to see if widget “my_widget” is created. */
status = gx_widget_created_test(&my_widget, &was_created);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, no error occurred. If “was_created” is
GX_TRUE, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14458">gx_widget_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14458">gx_widget_delete</span></span>
### <a name="delete-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14459">Ta bort widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14459">Delete widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14460">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14460">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_delete(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14461">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14461">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14462">Den här tjänsten tar bort widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14462">This service deletes the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14463">Om widgeten kontroll block tilldelas dynamiskt, anropas tjänsten gx_system_memory_free för att frigöra dynamiskt allokerat lagrings utrymme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14463">If the widget control block is dynamically allocated, the gx_system_memory_free service is invoked to free dynamically allocated storage.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14464">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14464">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14465">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14465">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14466">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14466">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14467">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) klar widgeten ta bort GX_CALLER_ERROR (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14467">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget delete GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14468">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14468">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14469">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14469">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14470">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0X30) minnes fri funktion har inte definierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14470">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14471">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14471">Allowed From</span></span>


## <a name="gx_widget_detach"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14510">gx_widget_detach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14510">gx_widget_detach</span></span>
### <a name="detach-widget-from-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14511">Koppla från widget från överordnad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14511">Detach widget from parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14512">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14512">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_detach(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14513">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14513">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14514">Den här tjänsten kopplar bort widgeten från dess överordnade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14514">This service detaches the widget from its parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14515">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14515">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14516">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14516">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14517">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14517">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad widget koppla GX_CALLER_ERROR (0X11) ogiltig anropare av den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget detach GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14519">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14519">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14520">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14520">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14521">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14521">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14522">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14522">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14523">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14523">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Detach widget “my_widget” from its parent. */
status = gx_widget_detach(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been detached. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14560">gx_widget_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14560">gx_widget_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14561">Rita widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14561">Draw widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14562">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14562">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14563">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14563">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14564">Den här tjänsten ritar widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14564">This service draws the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14565">Den här funktionen anropas vanligt vis internt av GUIX-funktionen för uppdatering av arbets ytan, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med implementeringen av anpassade ritnings funktioner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14565">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14566">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14566">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14567">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14567">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14568">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14568">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14569">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14569">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14570">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14570">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14571">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14571">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14572">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14572">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Call default widget draw. */
      gx_widget_draw(widget);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14609">gx_widget_draw_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14609">gx_widget_draw_set</span></span>
### <a name="assign-the-widget-drawing-function"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14610">Tilldela ritnings funktionen för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14610">Assign the widget drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14611">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14611">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_draw_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    VOID (*drawing_function) (GX_WIDGET *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14612">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14612">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14613">Den här tjänsten åsidosätter standard ritnings funktionen i widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14613">This service overrides the default drawing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14614">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14614">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14615">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14615">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14616">**drawing_function** Pekare till ritnings funktion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14616">**drawing_function** Pointer to drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14617">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14617">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14618">Åsidosätta **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) widgeten ritnings funktion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget drawing function override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14621">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14621">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14622">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14622">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14623">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14623">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14624">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14624">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function. */
VOID my_drawing_function(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}

/* Set the drawing function of widget “my_widget” to “my_drawing_function”. */
status = gx_widget_draw_set(&my_widget, my_drawing_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has the drawning function “my_drawing_function”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_generate"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14661">gx_widget_event_generate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14661">gx_widget_event_generate</span></span>
### <a name="generate-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14662">Skapa widgets händelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14662">Generate widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14663">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14663">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_generate(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    USHORT event_type, LONG value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14664">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14665">Den här tjänsten genererar en GX_SIGNAL typ av händelse, som är en viss typ eller klass för GX_EVENT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14665">This service generates a GX_SIGNAL type of event, which is a particular type or class of GX_EVENT.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14666">gx_widget_event_generate () kodar ID för 16-bitars widget, tillsammans med den överförda event_type, till ett enda 32-bitars GX_EVENT. gx_event_type-värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14666">gx_widget_event_generate() encodes the 16 bit widget ID, along with the passed in event_type, into a single 32 bit GX_EVENT.gx_event_type value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14667">Parametern Value kodas till den genererade gx_event.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14667">The value parameter is encoded into the generated gx_event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14668">gx_event_payload gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdatas fält.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14668">gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata field.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14669">Det genererade event.gx_event_target-fältet läses alltid in med den anropande widgetens överordnade objekt, vilket innebär att den genererade händelsen alltid skickas först till den överordnade för widgeten generera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14669">The generated event.gx_event_target field is always loaded with the calling widget’s parent, meaning the generated event is always sent first to the parent of the generating widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14670">Observera att gx_widget_event_generate endast ska användas för att skicka GX_SIGNAL intervall händelse typer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14670">Note that gx_widget_event_generate should only be used to send GX_SIGNAL range event types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14671">För alla andra händelse typer, inklusive användardefinierade händelse typer, använder du API: et gx_system_event_send (), som ger fullständig kontroll över alla fält i händelsen som skickas i händelse kön för GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14671">For all  other event types, including user defined event types, use the gx_system_event_send() API, which grants full control over every field of the event pushed in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14672">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14672">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14673">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14673">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14674">**event_type** Typ av händelse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14674">**event_type** Type of event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14675">**Bilaga E** innehåller fördefinierade GUIX-händelser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14675">**Appendix E** contains pre-defined GUIX events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14676">Ytterligare händelser kan läggas till av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14676">Additional events may be added by the application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14677">**värde** Ytterligare händelse information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14677">**value** Additional event information</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14678">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14678">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14679">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) generering av händelse för klarande widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14679">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event generation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14680">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14680">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14681">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14681">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14682">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14682">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14683">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14683">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14684">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14684">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14685">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14685">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Generate a redraw event for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_event_generate(&my_widget, GX_EVENT_REDRAW, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the redraw event for widget “my_widget” has been generated. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14723">gx_widget_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14723">gx_widget_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14724">Händelse för process-widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14724">Process widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14725">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14725">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14726">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14726">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14727">Det här är standard funktionen för händelse bearbetning för alla widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14727">This is the default event processing function for all widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14728">När en anpassad händelse bearbetnings funktion skrivs bör standard åtgärden för alla händelse typer alltid vara att skicka händelsen till den widget som widgeten baseras på.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14728">When a custom event processing function is written, the default action for any event type should always be to pass the event to the widget type upon which a widget is based.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14729">Widgetar som baseras på de mest grundläggande GX_WIDGET typen skicka använder gx_widget_event_process som standard funktion för händelse bearbetning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14729">Widgets that are based on the most basic GX_WIDGET type pass use gx_widget_event_process as their default event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14730">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14730">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14731">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14731">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14732">**händelse** Pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14732">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14733">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14733">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14734">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad widget av händelse bearbetning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14734">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14735">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14735">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14736">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14736">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14737">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14737">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14738">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14738">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14739">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14739">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14740">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14740">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Process event “my_event” for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process(&my_widget, &my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event “my_event” for widget “my_widget” has been processed. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14777">gx_widget_event_process_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14777">gx_widget_event_process_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-event-processing-function-of-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14778">Ställ in händelse bearbetnings funktion i widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14778">Set event processing function of widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14779">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14779">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT (*event_processing) (GX_WIDGET *, GX_EVENT *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14780">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14780">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14781">Den här tjänsten åsidosätter funktionen för händelse bearbetning i widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14781">This service overrides the event processing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14782">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14782">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14783">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14783">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14784">**event_processing** Pekare till ny händelse bearbetnings funktion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14784">**event_processing** Pointer to new event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14785">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14785">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14786">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) åsidosättning av händelse bearbetning för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14786">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14787">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14787">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14788">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14788">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14789">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14789">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14790">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14790">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14791">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14791">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT my_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
      UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

      switch(event->gx_event_type)
      {
      case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;

      default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
               event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
      }
      return status;
}

/* Use “my_event_process” to process events for widget “my_tree_view”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process_set((GX_WIDGET *)&my_tree_view,
                    (VOID (*)(GX_WIDGET *))my_event_process);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS all event processing for widget “my_tree_view” is handled by “my_event_process”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_to_parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14828">gx_widget_event_to_parent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14828">gx_widget_event_to_parent</span></span>
### <a name="send-event-to-widgets-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14829">Skicka händelse till widgetens överordnade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14829">Send event to widget’s parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14830">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14830">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_to_parent(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14831">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14831">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14832">Den här tjänsten skickar en händelse till widgetens överordnade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14832">This service sends an event to the widget’s parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14833">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14833">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14834">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14834">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14835">**händelse** Pekare till händelsen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14835">**event** Pointer to the event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14836">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14836">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14837">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har skickat händelsen till widgetens överordnade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14837">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully sent event to widget’s parent</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14838">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14838">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14839">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14839">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14840">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14840">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14841">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14841">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14842">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14842">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Send my_event to the widget’s parent */
status = gx_widget_event_to_parent(&my_widget, my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been delivered to the parent of my_widget. */
```
