## <a name="gx_widget_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14879">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14879">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-background-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14880">Ange bakgrunds färg för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14880">Set widget background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14881">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14881">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_fill_color_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color_id);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14882">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14882">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14883">Den här tjänsten anger bakgrunds färgerna i widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14883">This service sets the widget background colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14884">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14884">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14885">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14885">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14886">**normal_color_id** Resurs-ID för fyllnings färgen i normalt läge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14886">**normal_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14887">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14887">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14888">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14888">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14889">**selected_color_id** Resurs-ID för fyllnings färgen när widgeten får fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14889">**selected_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14890">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14890">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14891">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14891">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14892">**disabled_color_id** Resurs-ID för fyllnings färgen när format GX_STYLE_ENABLED inte har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14892">**disabled_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14893">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14893">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14894">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade färg resurs-ID: n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14894">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14895">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14895">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14896">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har angett en fyllnings färg för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14896">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set widget fill color</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14897">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14897">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14898">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14898">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14899">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14899">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14900">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14900">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14901">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14901">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14902">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14902">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set background of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_fill_color_set(&my_widget,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” background has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14939">gx_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14939">gx_widget_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-child-widget-of-parent-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14940">Sök efter underordnad widget för överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14940">Find child widget of parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14941">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14941">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_find(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_depth, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14942">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14942">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14943">Den här tjänsten söker igenom de underordnade objekten för den angivna överordnade söker efter en widget med det begärda ID-värdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14943">This service searches through the children of the specified parent looking for a widget with the  requested ID value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14944">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14944">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14945">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget från vilken sökningen startas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14945">**parent** Pointer to parent widget from which search is started</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14946">**widget_id** Widget-ID att söka efter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14946">**widget_id** Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14947">**search_depth** Definierar den rekursiva kapslings nivå som funktionen ska söka igenom underordnade widgetar i.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14947">**search_depth** Defines the recursive nesting level into which the function will search child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14948">Om det här värdet är <= 0 genomsöks bara omedelbara underordnade objekt till den överordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14948">If this value is <= 0, only immediate children of the parent widget are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14949">Om det här värdet är GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE genomsöks alla underordnade widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14949">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, all children of all child widgets are exhaustively searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14950">För andra värden > 0 begränsar det här värdet hur djupt kapslad den här funktionen söker igenom underordnad widget som sökts efter begärt widgets-ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14950">For any other value > 0, this value limits how deeply nested this function will search through child widgets looked for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14951">**return_widget** Pekare till målet för widgeten hittades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14951">**return_widget** Pointer to destination for found widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14952">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14952">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14953">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) sökning efter lyckad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14953">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14954">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0X09) widgeten är inte fount</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14954">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Widget not fount</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14955">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14955">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14956">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14956">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14957">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14957">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14958">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14958">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14959">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14959">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *widget_found;

/* Find widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_find(&my_widget, GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE
                        MY_WIDGET_ID, &widget_found);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pointer “widget_found” contains the pointer to the widget found. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_first_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14996">gx_widget_first_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14996">gx_widget_first_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-first-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14997">Återställ pekare till första underordnade widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14997">Return pointer to first child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14998">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14998">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_first_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-14999">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-14999">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15000">GUIX underhåller en träd struktur lista över överordnade och underordnade widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15000">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15001">Den här tjänsten returnerar en pekare till det överordnade objektets första widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15001">This service returns a pointer to the first child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15002">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15002">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15003">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15003">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15004">**widget_return** Pekare för att returnera widgeten för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15004">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15005">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15005">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15006">**GX_SUCCESSs** pekare (0x00) returnerades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig widgets pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15008">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15008">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15009">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15009">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15010">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15010">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15011">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15011">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{
      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_first_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15012">Se även</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15012">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15013">gx_widget_last_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15013">gx_widget_last_child_get</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15015">gx_widget_parent_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15015">gx_widget_parent_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15016">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15016">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15017">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15017">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_focus_next"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15018">gx_widget_focus_next</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15018">gx_widget_focus_next</span></span>
### <a name="move-focus-to-next-widget-in-navigation-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15019">Flytta fokus till nästa widget i navigerings ordning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15019">Move focus to next widget in navigation order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15020">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15020">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_focus_next(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15021">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15021">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15022">Den här tjänsten flyttar fokus till nästa på samma nivå-widget i den länkade listan med widgetar som accepterar fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15022">This service moves focus to the next sibling widget in the linked list of widgets that accept focus.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15023">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15023">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15024">**widget** Pekare till kontroll block för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15024">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15025">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15025">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15026">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) har flyttats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15026">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) focus was moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15027">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) fokus flyttades inte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15027">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) focus was not moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15028">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig widgets pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15028">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15030">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15030">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15031">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15031">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15032">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15032">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15033">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15033">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move focus to next widget in navigation order. */ status =
gx_widget_focus_next(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the focus has been moved to the next
widget in the navigation order */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15051">gx_widget_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15051">gx_widget_font_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-font-for-specified-resource-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15052">Hämta teckensnitt för angivet resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15052">Get font for specified resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15053">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15053">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_font_get(
    GX_WIDGETG *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15054">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15054">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15055">Den här tjänsten hämtar det teckensnitt som är associerat med det angivna resurs-ID: t från tabellen Font för visningen där widgeten är synlig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15055">This service retrieves the font associated with the specified resource ID from the font table of the display on which this widget is visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15056">Den här funktionen ska endast anropas av en Visible-widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15056">This function should only be called by a visible widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15057">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15057">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15058">**widget** Pekare till kontroll block för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15058">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15059">**resource_id** Resurs-ID för teckensnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15059">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15060">**return_font** Pekare till mål för teckensnitts pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15060">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15061">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15061">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15062">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har hämtat teckensnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15062">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15063">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15063">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15064">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) widgeten är ogiltig eller så är widgeten osynlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15064">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15065">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig widgets pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15065">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15066">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15066">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15067">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15067">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15068">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15068">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15069">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15069">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;
/* Get font for MY_FONT_ID. */
status = gx_widget_font_get(widget, MY_FONT_RESOURCE_ID, &my_font);
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font pointer has been retrieved in “my_font”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_free"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15073">gx_widget_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15073">gx_widget_free</span></span>
### <a name="release-memory-associated-with-a-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15074">Versions minne som är associerat med en widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15074">Release memory associated with a widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15075">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15075">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_free(GX_WIDGETG *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15076">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15076">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15077">Den här tjänsten frigör det minne som är associerat med ett kontroll block för validering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15077">This service releases the memory associated with a widget control block.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15078">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15078">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15079">**widget** Pekare till kontroll block för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15079">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15080">**resource_id** Resurs-ID för teckensnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15080">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15081">**return_font** Pekare till mål för teckensnitts pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15081">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15082">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15082">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15083">Widgeten **GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har frigjorts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15083">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully freed widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15084">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0X30) minnes fri funktion har inte definierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15084">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15085">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig widgets pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15085">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15086">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15086">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15087">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15087">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15088">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15088">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET widget;
UINT status;

status = gx_widget_allocate(&widget, sizeof(GX_WIDGET))

/* Free a runtime allocated widget. */
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
      status = gx_widget_free(widget);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the memory that allocated to the widget has been released. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_front_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15125">gx_widget_front_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15125">gx_widget_front_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-front"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15126">Flytta widgeten till fram sidan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15126">Move widget to front</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15127">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15127">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_front_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_BOOL *return_moved);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15128">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15128">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15129">Den här tjänsten flyttar widgeten längst fram i den överordnade Z-ordningen lista över underordnade widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15129">This service moves the widget to the front in the parent Z-order list of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15130">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15130">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15131">**widget** Pekare till widget att flytta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15131">**widget** Pointer to widget to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15132">**return_moved** Pekare till mål för widgeten indikator flyttades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15132">**return_moved** Pointer to destination for indication widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15133">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15133">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad widget flytta längst fram</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15135">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15135">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15136">Widgeten **GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) är redan framförd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15136">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) Widget already in front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15137">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15137">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15138">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15138">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15139">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15139">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15140">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15140">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15141">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15141">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL widget_moved;

/* Move widget “my_widget” to the front. */
status = gx_widget_front_move(&my_widget, &widget_moved);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “widget_moved” is GX_TRUE, the
widget “my_widget” was moved to the front . */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_height_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15178">gx_widget_height_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15178">gx_widget_height_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15179">Hämta widgetens höjd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15179">Get widget height</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15180">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15180">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_height_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT *return_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15181">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15181">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15182">Den här tjänsten hämtar widgetens höjd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15182">This service gets the widget height.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15183">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15183">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15184">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15184">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15230">gx_widget_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15230">gx_widget_hide</span></span>
### <a name="hide-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15231">Dölj widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15231">Hide widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15232">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15232">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15233">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15233">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15234">Den här tjänsten döljer widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15234">This service hides the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15235">Den här widgeten är fortfarande kopplad till den överordnade, men det är inte tillåtet att rita på arbets ytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15235">This widget is still attached to it's parent, but it is not allowed to draw on the canvas.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15236">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15236">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15237">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15237">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15238">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15238">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15239">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad widget Dölj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15239">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15240">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15240">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15241">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15241">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15242">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15242">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15243">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15243">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15244">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15244">Initialization and threads</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_last_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15282">gx_widget_last_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15282">gx_widget_last_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-last-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15283">Återställ pekare till sista underordnade widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15283">Return pointer to last child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15284">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15284">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_last_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15285">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15285">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15286">GUIX underhåller en träd struktur lista över överordnade och underordnade widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15286">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15287">Den här tjänsten returnerar en pekare till det överordnade objektets sista widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15287">This service returns a pointer to the last child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15288">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15288">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15289">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15289">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15290">**widget_return** Pekare för att returnera widgeten för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15290">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15291">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15291">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15292">**GX_SUCCESSs** pekare (0x00) returnerades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15292">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15293">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig widgets pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15293">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15294">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15294">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15295">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15295">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15296">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15296">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15297">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15297">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_last_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{

      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_last_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
              return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_next_sibling_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15304">gx_widget_next_sibling_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15304">gx_widget_next_sibling_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15306">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15306">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_next_sibling_get(
    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15307">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15307">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15308">GUIX underhåller en träd struktur lista över överordnade och underordnade widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15308">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15309">Den här tjänsten returnerar en pekare till nästa objekt på samma nivå som den aktuella widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15309">This service returns a pointer to the next sibling of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15310">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15310">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15311">**aktuella** Pekare till aktuell widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15311">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15312">**widget_return** Pekare för att returnera widgeten för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15312">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15313">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15313">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15314">**GX_SUCCESSs** pekare (0x00) returnerades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15314">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15315">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig widgets pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15315">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15316">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15316">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15317">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15317">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15318">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15318">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15319">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15319">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve next sibling widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_next(GX_WIDGET *current)
{
      GX_WIDGET *sibling;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_next_sibling_get(current, &sibling);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return sibling;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15350">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15350">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15351">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15351">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15352">Den här tjänsten hämtar de Pixelmap som är associerade med det tillhandahållna resurs-ID: t.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15352">This service gets the pixelmap associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15353">Den här tjänsten ska endast anropas för synliga widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15353">This service should only be called for visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15354">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15354">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15355">**widget** Pekare till kontroll block för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15355">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15356">**pixelmap_id** Resurs-ID för Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15356">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15357">**return_pixelmap** Pekare till Pixelmap-destinations pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15357">**return_pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap destination pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15358">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15358">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15359">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckades Pixelmap get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15359">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15360">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15360">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15361">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) widgeten är ogiltig eller så är widgeten osynlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15361">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15364">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15364">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15366">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15366">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_PIXELMAP *my_pixelmap;

/* Get the pixelmap associated with MY_PIXELMAP_ID. */
status = gx_widget_pixelmap_get(widget, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID,
                                &my_pixelmap);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_pixelmap” contains the pixemap pointer. */
```

```C
GX_RECTANGLE new_size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&new_size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Resize widget “my_widget”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been resized. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15445">gx_widget_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15445">gx_widget_shift</span></span>
### <a name="shift-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15446">Shift-widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15446">Shift widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15447">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15447">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_shift(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift, 
    GX_BOOL mark_dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15448">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15448">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15449">Den här tjänsten växlar widgeten och markerar den som smutsig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15449">This service shifts the widget and optionally marks it as dirty.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15450">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15450">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15451">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15451">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15452">**x_shift** Antal pixlar som ska flyttas på x-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15452">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15453">**y_shift** Antal pixlar som ska flyttas på y-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15453">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15454">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE för att indikera smutsig, annars GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15454">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE to indicate dirty, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15455">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15455">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15456">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad widgets shift-GX_CALLER_ERROR (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15456">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget shift GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15457">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15457">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15458">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15458">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15459">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15459">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15460">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15460">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15461">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15461">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Shift widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_shift(&my_widget, 10, 20, GX_FALSE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been shifted. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15498">gx_widget_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15498">gx_widget_show</span></span>
### <a name="show-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15499">Visa widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15499">Show widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15500">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15500">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_show(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15501">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15501">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15502">Den här tjänsten visar widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15502">This service shows the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15503">Widgeten blir bara synlig om den är kopplad till en överordnad mapp och den överordnade widgeten också är synlig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15503">The widget will become visible only if it is attached to a parent and the parent widget is also visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15504">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15504">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15505">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15505">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15506">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15506">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15507">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) klar widgeten Visa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15507">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget show</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15508">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15508">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15509">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15509">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15510">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15510">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_status_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15550">gx_widget_status_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15550">gx_widget_status_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15551">Lägg till widgets status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15551">Add widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15552">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15552">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15553">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15553">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15554">Den här tjänsten lägger till valfri kombination av status flaggor i den angivna widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15554">This service adds any combination of status flags to the specified widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15555">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15555">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15556">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15556">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15557">**status** Status som ska läggas till</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15557">**status** Status to add</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15558">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15558">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15559">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) status Lägg till för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15559">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15561">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15561">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15562">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15562">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15563">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15563">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15564">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15564">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add status to widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_add(&my_widget, status_to_add);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” status was. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15601">gx_widget_status_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15601">gx_widget_status_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15602">Hämta widgets status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15602">Get widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15603">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15603">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    ULONG *return_status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15604">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15604">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15605">Den här tjänsten hämtar status flaggor från widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15605">This service retrieves status flags from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15606">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15606">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15607">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15607">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15608">**return_status** Pekare till den status som returneras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15608">**return_status** Pointer to the status being returned</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15609">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15609">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) status Hämta för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15612">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15612">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15613">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15613">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15614">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15614">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15615">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15615">Example</span></span>

```C
ULONT get_status;

/* Retrieve status flag from widget “my_widget”. */ status =
gx_widget_status_get(&my_widget, &get_status);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the status from widget “my_widget” is
saved to “get_status”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15651">gx_widget_status_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15651">gx_widget_status_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15652">Ta bort widgets status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15652">Remove widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15653">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15653">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15654">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15654">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15655">Den här tjänsten tar bort angivna status flaggor från variabeln widget Internal status.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15655">This service removes the specified status flags from the widgets internal status variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15656">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15656">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15657">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15657">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15658">**status** Status som ska tas bort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15658">**status** Status to remove</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15659">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15659">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15660">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) borttagning av widgeten status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15660">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status removal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15661">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15661">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15662">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15662">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15663">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15663">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15664">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15664">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15665">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15665">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_remove(&my_widget, status_to_remove);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the status flags are removed from the
widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_test"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15702">gx_widget_status_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15702">gx_widget_status_test</span></span>
### <a name="test-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15703">Testa widgeten status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15703">Test widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15704">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15704">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15705">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15705">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15706">Den här tjänsten testar status flaggorna för den angivna widgeten och lagrar resultatet i minnet som påpekas av "return_test".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15706">This service tests the status flags of the specified widget and stores the result in the memory pointed by “return_test”.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15707">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15708">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15708">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15709">**status** Status som ska testas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15709">**status** Status to test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15710">**return_status** Pekare till målet för resultatet av testet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15710">**return_status** Pointer to destination for result of test</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15711">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15711">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15712">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) status test för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15712">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15713">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15713">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15714">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15714">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15715">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15715">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15716">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15716">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15717">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15717">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL test_result;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_test(&my_widget, status_to_test,
                              &test_result);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” status was tested
and the result in “test_result”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15726">gx_widget_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15726">gx_widget_string_get</span></span>
### <a name="retrieve-string-associated-with-a-visible-widget-and-string-id-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15727">Hämta strängen som är associerad med en synlig widget och sträng-ID (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15727">Retrieve string associated with a visible widget and string ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15728">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15728">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_string_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15729">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15729">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15730">Den här tjänsten är föråldrad till förmån för gx_widget_string_get_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15730">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_widget_string_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15731">Den här tjänsten returnerar sträng tabell posten för angivet sträng-ID-värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15731">This service returns the string table entry for the given string ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15732">Den här tjänsten liknar gx_display_string_get, förutom att den aktiva visningen fastställs automatiskt i stället för att skickas in av anroparen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15732">This service is similar to gx_display_string_get, except the active display is determined automatically rather than being passed in by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15733">Den här tjänsten kan endast användas för widgetar som är synliga, d.v.s. den visning som är kopplad till denna widget är känd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15733">This service can only be used for widgets which are visible, i.e. the display associated with this widget is known.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15734">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15734">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15735">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15735">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15736">**string_id** Sträng-ID-värde från resurs huvud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15736">**string_id** String ID value from resources header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15737">**sträng** Adress till variabel att returnera sträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15737">**string** Address of variable to return string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15738">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15738">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15739">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) status test för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15739">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_string_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15748">gx_widget_string_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15748">gx_widget_string_get_ext</span></span>
### <a name="retrieve-string-associated-with-a-visible-widget-and-string-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15749">Hämta strängen som är associerad med en synlig widget och sträng-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15749">Retrieve string associated with a visible widget and string ID</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15750">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15750">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_string_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15751">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15751">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15752">Den här tjänsten returnerar sträng tabell posten för angivet sträng-ID-värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15752">This service returns the string table entry for the given string ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15753">Den här tjänsten liknar gx_display_string_get, förutom att den aktiva visningen fastställs automatiskt i stället för att skickas in av anroparen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15753">This service is similar to gx_display_string_get, except the active display is determined automatically rather than being passed in by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15754">Den här tjänsten kan endast användas för widgetar som är synliga, d.v.s. den visning som är kopplad till denna widget är känd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15754">This service can only be used for widgets which are visible, i.e. the display associated with this widget is known.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15755">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15755">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15756">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15756">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15757">**string_id** Sträng-ID-värde från resurs huvud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15757">**string_id** String ID value from resources header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15758">**sträng** Adress till variabel att returnera sträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15758">**string** Address of variable to return string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15759">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15759">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15760">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) status test för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15760">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15761">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15761">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15762">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15762">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15763">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15763">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15764">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15764">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING string;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */

status = gx_widget_string_get_ext(&my_widget,
                          GX_STRING_ID_SHUTDOWN, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string has been retrieved */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15769">gx_widget_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15769">gx_widget_style_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15770">Lägg till format för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15770">Add widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15771">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15771">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15772">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15772">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15773">Den här tjänsten lägger till en stil i widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15773">This service adds a style to the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15774">Dessutom vidtas följande åtgärder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15774">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15775">Om det tillagda formatet är GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT kommer status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT läggas till.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15775">If the added style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15776">Om det tillagda formatet är GX_STYLE_ENABLED kommer status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE läggas till.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15776">If the added style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15777">Om widgeten är synlig inkommer den automatiskt att inval IDE ras och placeras i kö för att rita om.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15777">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15778">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15778">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15779">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15779">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15780">**stil** Nytt format som ska läggas till.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15780">**style** New style to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15781">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15781">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15782">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15782">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15783">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lägg till widgeten format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15783">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15784">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15784">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15785">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15785">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15786">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15786">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15787">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15787">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15788">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15788">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15789">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15789">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add style to widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_add(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the style was successfully applied to the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15826">gx_widget_style_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15826">gx_widget_style_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15827">Hämta widgets format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15827">Get widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15828">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15828">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG *return_style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15829">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15829">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15830">Den här tjänsten hämtar format flaggan från widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15830">This service retrieves style flag from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15831">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15831">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15832">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15832">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15833">**return_style** Pekare till det format som returneras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15833">**return_style** Pointer to the style being returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15834">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15834">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15835">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har hämtat widgets format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15835">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved widget style</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15837">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15837">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15838">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15839">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15839">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15840">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15840">Initialization and threads</span></span>


### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15841">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15841">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve style from widget into “style”. */
status = gx_widget_style_get(&my_widget, &style);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the style flag from widget is saved in “style”. */
```
