## <a name="gx_widget_style_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15878">gx_widget_style_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15878">gx_widget_style_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15879">Ta bort widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15879">Remove widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15880">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15880">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15881">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15881">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15882">Den här tjänsten tar bort en stil från widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15882">This service removes a style from the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15883">Dessutom vidtas följande åtgärder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15883">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15884">Om det borttagna formatet är GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT tas status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15884">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15885">Om det borttagna formatet är GX_STYLE_ENABLED tas status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15885">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15886">Om widgeten är synlig inkommer den automatiskt att inval IDE ras och placeras i kö för att rita om.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15886">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15887">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15887">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15888">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15888">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15889">**stil** Format att ta bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15889">**style** Style to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15890">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15890">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15891">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15891">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15892">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)-lyckad borttagning av widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15892">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style remove</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15893">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15893">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15894">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15894">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15895">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15895">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15896">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15896">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15897">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15897">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15898">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15898">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove style from widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_remove(&my_widget,
                                GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED style was removed from the widget “my_widget”.*/
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15935">gx_widget_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15935">gx_widget_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15936">Ange format för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15936">Set widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15937">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15937">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15938">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15938">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15939">Den här tjänsten ställer in ett format på widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15939">This service sets a style to the widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15940">Om set-formatet innehåller GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT läggs status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT till, annars tas statusen bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15940">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15941">Om set-formatet innehåller GX_STYLE_ENABLED läggs status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE till, annars tas statusen bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15941">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15942">Om widgeten är synlig inkommer den automatiskt att inval IDE ras och placeras i kö för att rita om.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15942">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15943">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15943">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15944">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15944">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15945">**stil** Format som ska anges.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15945">**style** Style to set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15946">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15946">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15947">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15947">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15948">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad widgets format uppsättning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15948">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15949">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15949">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15950">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15950">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15951">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15951">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15952">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15952">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15953">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15953">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-15954">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-15954">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set style GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT to the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_set(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” style is set to GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16072">**x_offset** Justering av ritnings position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16072">**x_offset** Drawing position adjustment</span></span>

```C
gx_string render_string;
render_string.gx_string_ptr = “Hello”;
render_string.gx_string_length =
    strlen(render_string.gx_string_ptr);

VOID my_custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{

                        &render_string, xoffset, yoffset);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_top_visible_child_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16102">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16102">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-visible-child-that-is-top-of-z-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16103">Returnera pekare till synligt underordnat som är överst i Z-ordning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16103">Return pointer to visible child that is top of Z order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16104">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16104">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(
    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16105">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16105">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16106">GUIX underhåller en träd struktur lista över överordnade och underordnade widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16106">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16107">Den här tjänsten returnerar en pekare till den översta synliga underordnad för den aktuella widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16107">This service returns a pointer to the topmost visible child of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16108">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16108">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16109">**aktuella** Pekare till aktuell widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16109">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16110">**widget_return** Pekare för att returnera widgeten för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16110">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16111">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16111">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16112">**GX_SUCCESSs** pekare (0x00) returnerades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16112">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16113">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig widgets pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16113">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16115">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16115">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16116">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16116">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16117">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16117">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve topmost visible widget on the display */

GX_WIDGET *get_top_window(GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root)
{
    GX_WIDGET *top_window;
    UINT status;

    status = gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(root, &top_window);
    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return top_window;
    }
    return GX_NULL;
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16177">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16177">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_width_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE *return_width)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16178">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16178">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16179">Den här tjänsten hämtar bredden på widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16179">This service gets the width of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16180">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16180">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16182">**return_width** Pekare till målet för widgetens bredd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16182">**return_width** Pointer to destination for widget width</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16183">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16183">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16185">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16185">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16186">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16186">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

```C
/* Get width of widget “my_widget”. */

```

## <a name="gx_window_client_height_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16227">gx_window_client_height_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16227">gx_window_client_height_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16229">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16229">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_height_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_VALUE *return_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16230">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16230">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16231">Tjänsten hämtar fönstrets klient höjd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16231">This service gets the client height of the window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16232">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16232">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16233">**fönster** Pekare till fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16233">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16237">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16237">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16238">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16238">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

```C
/* Get client height of “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_client_scroll"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16257">gx_window_client_scroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16257">gx_window_client_scroll</span></span>
### <a name="scroll-window-clients"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16258">Rulla fönster klienter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16258">Scroll window clients</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16259">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16259">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_scroll(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_VALUE x_scroll,
    GX_VALUE y_scroll);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16260">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16260">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16261">Den här tjänsten rullar fönstrets klienter efter den angivna mängden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16261">This service scrolls the window clients by the specified amount.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16262">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16262">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16263">**fönster** Pekare till fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16263">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16264">**x_scroll** Antal att rulla på x-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16264">**x_scroll** Amount to scroll on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16265">**y_scroll** Antal att rulla på y-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16265">**y_scroll** Amount to scroll on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16266">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16266">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16267">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) rullning av fönster klient</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16267">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client scroll</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16268">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16268">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16269">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16269">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16270">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16270">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16271">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) rullnings värde (s) är inte giltiga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16271">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll value(s) not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16272">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16272">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16273">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16273">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16274">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16274">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Scroll clients of “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_client_scroll(&my_window, 10, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the clients of window “my_window” have been scrolled. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_client_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16289">gx_window_client_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16289">gx_window_client_width_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-client-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16290">Hämta fönstrets klient bredd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16290">Get window client width</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16291">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16291">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_width_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16292">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16292">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16293">Den här tjänsten hämtar klient bredden för det angivna fönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16293">This service gets the client width of the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16294">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16294">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16295">**fönster** Pekare till fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16295">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16296">**return_height** Pekare till mål för klient bredd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16296">**return_height** Pointer to destination for client width</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16297">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16297">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16298">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) fönstrets klient bredd Hämta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16298">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16299">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16299">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16300">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16300">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16301">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16301">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16302">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16302">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16303">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16303">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16304">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16304">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE my_client_widthl

/* Get client width of “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_client_width_get(&my_window, &my_client_width);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “my_client_width” contains the client width of window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_close"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16319">gx_window_close</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16319">gx_window_close</span></span>
### <a name="close-modal-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16320">Stäng modal fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16320">Close modal window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16321">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16321">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_close(GX_WINDOW *window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16322">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16322">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16323">Den här tjänsten tvingar fram en spärr ande fönster för att koppla från den överordnade och returnera från den modala körnings slingan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16323">This service forces a modal window to detach from its parent and return from the modal execution loop.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16324">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16324">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16325">**fönster** Pekare till fönster kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16325">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16326">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16326">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16328">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16328">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16329">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16329">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16330">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16330">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16331">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16331">Allowed From</span></span>

```C

status = gx_window_close(&my_window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS window “my_window” has been closed. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16349">gx_window_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16349">gx_window_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16350">Skapa fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16350">Create window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16351">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16351">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_create(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT window_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16352">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16352">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16353">Den här tjänsten skapar ett fönster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16353">This service creates a window.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16354">GX_WINDOW härleds från GX_WIDGET och stöder alla gx_widget API-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16354">GX_WINDOW is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16355">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16355">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16356">**fönster** Pekare till fönster kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16356">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16357">**namn** Logiskt namn på fönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16357">**name** Logical name of window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16358">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16358">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16359">**stil** Fönster format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16359">**style** Window style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16360">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widget-/regionsspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16360">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16361">**window_id** Programdefinierat ID för fönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16361">**window_id** Application-defined ID of the window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16362">**storlek** Storlek på fönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16362">**size** Size of the window</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16363">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16363">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16364">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) fönstret har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16364">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16365">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16365">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16366">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16366">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16367">Widgeten **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16367">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16368">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) ogiltig block storlek för widgets kontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16368">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16369">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16369">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16370">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16370">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16371">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16371">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16372">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16372">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WINDOW my_window;

/* Create window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_create(&my_window, "my window",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                          MY_WINDOW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS window “my_window” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16388">gx_window_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16388">gx_window_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16389">Rita fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16389">Draw window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16390">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16390">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16391">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16391">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16392">Den här tjänsten ritar ett fönster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16392">This service draws a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16393">Den här tjänsten kallas vanligt vis internt under uppdatering av arbets ytan, men kan också anropas från anpassade fönster rit funktioner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16393">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom window drawing functions.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16397">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16397">**None**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16399">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16399">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16400">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16400">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom window draw function. */

{
    /* Call default window draw. */

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16416">gx_window_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16416">gx_window_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-window-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16417">Händelse för process fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16417">Process window event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16418">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16418">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_event_process(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16419">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16419">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16420">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för det här fönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16420">This service processes an event for this window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16421">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16421">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16422">**fönster** Pekare till fönster kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16422">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16423">**händelse** Pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16423">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16424">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16424">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16425">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) bearbetning av händelse bearbetning i fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16425">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16428">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16428">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16429">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16429">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16430">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16430">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16431">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16431">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_window_event_process(GX_WINDOW *window,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default window
            event processing */
            status = gx_window_event_process(window, event);
            break;
        }
        return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_execute"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16447">gx_window_execute</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16447">gx_window_execute</span></span>
### <a name="modally-execute-a-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16448">Köra ett fönster samtidigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16448">Modally execute a window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16449">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16449">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_execute(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    ULONG *return_ptr)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16450">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16450">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16451">Den här tjänsten kör ett fönster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16451">This service modally executes a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16452">Alla indata från användaren (Penn händelser osv.) utanför fönstrets klient del kommer att ignoreras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16452">Any user input (pen events, etc.) outside of the window client area will be ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16453">Observera att den här funktionen anger en kontinuerlig blockerande körnings slinga och återgår inte till anroparen förrän modell körningen har avslut ATS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16453">Note that this function enters a continuous blocking execution loop, and does not return to the caller until the model execution is terminated.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16454">Den modala körningen avslutas när händelse bearbetningen för mottagna händelser returnerar ett status värde som inte är noll eller när gx_window_close API-funktionen anropas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16454">Modal execution terminates when the event processing for any received event returns a non-zero status value, or when the gx_window_close API function is invoked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16455">Retur koden för händelse bearbetning som inte är noll returneras till anroparen genom den return_ptr som skickas till detta API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16455">The non-zero event processing return code is returned to the caller through the return_ptr passed into this API</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16456">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16456">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16457">**fönster** Pekare till fönster kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16457">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16458">**return_ptr** Plats för att spara avslutnings statusen för den modala körningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16458">**return_ptr** Location to save modal execution exit status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16459">Kan vara GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16459">May be GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16460">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16460">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16461">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) lyckad körning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16461">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful execution</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16462">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR (0x05)** Det gick inte att pickup-händelsen från händelse kön</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16462">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR(0x05)** Pickup event from event queue failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16463">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16463">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16464">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16464">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16465">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16465">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16466">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16466">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16467">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16467">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16468">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16468">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Execute a modal window. */
status = gx_window_execute(&my_window, &return_code);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the window was executed, and return_code holds the execution return code. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_root_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16484">gx_window_root_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16484">gx_window_root_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-a-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16485">Skapa ett rot fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16485">Create a root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16486">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16486">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_create(
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16487">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16487">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16488">Den här tjänsten skapar ett rot fönster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16488">This service creates a root window.</span></span>

### <a name="process-event-for-the-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16536">Process händelse för rot fönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16536">Process event for the root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16537">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16537">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_create(
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window,
    GX_EVENT *event)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16538">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16539">Den här tjänsten bearbetar händelser för det angivna rot fönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16539">This service processes events for the specified root window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16540">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16540">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16541">**root_window** Pekare till fönster kontroll block</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16541">**root_window** Pointer to root window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16542">**händelse** Pekare till händelsen som ska bearbetas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16542">**event** Pointer to the event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16543">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16543">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16544">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) har bearbetat rot fönster händelsen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16544">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed root window event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16545">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16545">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16546">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16546">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16547">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16547">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16548">Konversation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16548">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16549">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16549">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic root window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_root_window_event_process(GX_ROOT_WINDOW *root,
                                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default root window
            event processing */
        status = gx_window_root_event_process(root, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16596">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16596">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-scroll-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16597">Hämta fönstrets rullnings information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16597">Get window scroll info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16598">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16598">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scroll_info_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *return_scroll_info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16599">Beskrivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16599">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16600">Den här tjänsten hämtar fönstrets rullnings information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16600">This service gets the window scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16601">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16601">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16602">**fönster** Pekare till fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16602">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16603">**stil** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL eller GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16603">**style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16604">**return_scroll_info** Pekare till mål för rullnings information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16604">**return_scroll_info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16605">Det överordnade fönstret initierar den här strukturen för att informera rullnings listen för det överordnade fönstrets totala storlek, visnings Bart yta och rullnings steg och-gränser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16605">The parent window initializes this structure to inform the scrollbar of the parent window total size, viewable area, and scrolling increment and limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16606">Standard implementeringen använder Windows-klientprogrammet som visnings Bart yta och rullas efter pixlar, men anpassad fönster implementering kan använda rullnings parametrar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16606">The default implementation uses the windows client area as the viewable area and scrolls by pixels, but customized window implementation can utilize the scroll parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16607">**Bilaga i** innehåller definitionen av GX_SCROLL_INFOs strukturen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16607">**Appendix I** contains the definition of the GX_SCROLL_INFO structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16608">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16608">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16609">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) rullning av fönster rullnings information Hämta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16609">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scroll info get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16610">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16610">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16611">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16611">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16612">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0X1B) ogiltig typ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16612">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>

```C

/* Get scroll information for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_scroll_info_get(&my_window,
                    GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL, &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for window “my_window”. */
```

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16699">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16699">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16700">**fönster** Pekare till fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16700">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16701">**wallpaper_id** Resurs-ID för Skriv bords underlägg som ska användas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16701">**wallpaper_id** Resource ID of wallpaper to use</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16702">**panel** Skriv bords underlägg visas sida vid sida om GX_TRUE, annars visas inte bakgrunden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16702">**tile** Wallpaper is tiled if GX_TRUE, otherwise wallpaper is not tiled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16703">Retur värden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16703">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16704">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) fönstrets Skriv bords skriv bord har angetts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16704">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window wallpaper set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16705">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16705">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16706">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16706">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16707">Ogiltig widget för **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16707">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16708">Tillåten från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16708">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16709">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16709">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="2fe44-16710">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2fe44-16710">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set wallpaper for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_wallpaper_set(&my_window,
                                 MY_WALLPAPER_RESOURCE_ID,
                                 GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the wallpaper for window “my_window” is set. */
```
